/study/scriptures/dc-testament/introduct.title: Nnianim
text: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam no yɛ adiyisɛm kronkron ne nkannyan so mpaemuka a wɔaboaboa ano a wɔde maae sɛ wɔmfa nkyekyere Onyankopɔn aheman no ne ɛmu nhyehyɛeɛ wɔ asase yi so nna a ɛtwa toɔ yi mu. Ɛwɔ mu sɛ wɔde afã no mu dodoɔ no ara ma asɔremma a wɔwɔ Yesu Kristo Asɔre a ɛwɔ hɔ ma Nna a Ɛdi Akyire Ahotefoɔ no mu deɛ, nanso ɛmu nkransɛm, kɔkɔbɔ, ne kasakyerɛ no so wɔ mfasoɔ ma adasamma nyina ara, na ɛto nsa frɛ nnipa biara a wɔwɔ baabiara sɛ wɔntie Awurade Yesu Kristo nne a ɛrekasa kyerɛ wɔn sɛdeɛ wɔbɛnya honam mu yiedie ne daapem nkwagyeɛ.

Wɔnyaa adiyisɛm no mu pii a ɛwɔ saa nwoma-anoboaboa yi mu nam Joseph Smith Jr. so, deɛ ɔyɛ Yesu Kristo Asɔre a Ɛwɔ hɔ ma Nna a Ɛdi Akyire Ahotefoɔ nkɔmhyɛni a ɔdi kan ne titenani no. Wɔnam n’adedifoɔ binom so wɔ Titenafoɔ no mu de afoforɔ too dwa (hwɛ N&A 135, 136, ne 138 atifiasɛm ne Asɔre no Dawurubɔ 1 ne 2 no mu).

Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam nwoma no yɛ ntwerɛeɛ kronkron no mu baako a ɛka Twerɛ Kronkron no, Mormon Nwoma no, ne Ɔbohene a Ɛsom Boɔ no ho. Nanso Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam no yɛ sononko esiane sɛ ɛnnyɛ tete nwoma bi nkyerɛaseɛ, na mmom ɛyɛ nwoma a afiri adi aba saa berɛ yi mu, na Onyankopɔn de maae nam Ne nkɔmhyɛfoɔ a wayi wɔn so sɛdeɛ ɔde N’adwuma kronkron bɛsan aba bio na wɔde akyerekyere Onyankopɔn aheman wɔ asase so wɔ saa nna yi mu. Wɔ adiyisɛm no mu no, yɛte Yesu Kristo nne bɔkɔɔ a ɛsan nso yɛ duru no sɛ ɛrekasa bio wɔ asɛmpa berɛ mu wɔ mmerɛ mahyɛ mu bio; na adwuma a wɔayɛ wɔ yei mu no resiesie kwan ama ne mmaeɛ a ɛtɔ so mmienu no, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛhyɛ nkɔmhyɛfoɔ kronkron no nyina ara nsɛm a wɔkaae firi wiase ahyɛaseɛ no ma na ayɛ saa pɛpɛɛpɛ.

Wɔwoo Joseph Smith Jr. wɔ Ɔpɛnimma 23, 1805, wɔ Sharon, Windsor Mantam, Vermont mu. Berɛ a na ɔsua no, ɔne n’abusua tu kɔtenaa seesei Manchester, wɔ New York atɔeɛ fam. Berɛ a na ɔte hɔ wɔ fefɛ berɛ mu wɔ 1820 mu no, berɛ a na wanya mfeɛ dunan no na ɔnyaa n’anisoadehunu a ɛdi kan no; ɛno mu no na Onyankopɔn, Ɔnniawieɛ Agya no, ne Ne Ba Yesu Kristo ankasa bɛsraa no. Wɔka kyerɛɛ no wɔ saa anisoadehunu yi mu sɛ Yesu Kristo Asɔre a ɛyɛ nokorɛ a wɔkyekyeree no wɔ Apam Foforɔ Mmerɛ mu, a ɛde asɛmpa mahyɛ maae no, nni asase so bio. Adiyie afoforɔ dii akyire a ɛno mu no abɔfoɔ pii kyerɛkyerɛɛ no adeɛ; wɔdaa no adi kyerɛɛ no sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ adwuma titiriw bi ma no sɛ ɔnyɛ wɔ asase so na ɛnam ɔno so na wɔde Yesu Kristo Asɔre no bɛsan aba asase so bio.

Mmerɛ kakra akyire no, Joseph Smith nam ɔsoro mmoa so tumi kyerɛɛ Mormon Nwoma no ase na ɔtintim de too dwa. Saa berɛ no ara mu no, Yohane subɔni no hyɛɛ ɔno ne Oliver Cowdery sɔfoɔ kɔɔ Aaron asɔfodie no mu wɔ Kɔtɔnimma 1829 (hwɛ N&A 13), na ɛno akyi annkyɛre nso na tete Asomafoɔ Petro, Yakobo, ne Yohane hyɛɛ wɔn sɔfoɔ kɔɔ Mɛlkisɛdɛk Asɔfodie no mu (hwɛ N&A 27:12). Asɔfohyɛ afoforɔ nso dii akyire baae a ɛnam Mose, Elia, Elias, na tete nkɔmhyɛfoɔ bebree so de asɔfodie nsafoa no maae (hwɛ N&A 110; 128:18, 21). Nokorɛ mu, saa asɔfohyɛ yi yɛ ɔsoro tumi a asan aba bio ma wɔde ama onipa wɔ asase so. Wɔ Oforisuo 6, 1830 no, Joseph Smith nam ɔsoro akwankyerɛ so de kyekyeree Asɔre no, ɛno nti Yesu Kristo nokorɛ Asɔre no yɛ adwuma bio wɔ nnipa ntam sɛ ahyehyɛdeɛ, a ɛkura tumi de kyerɛkyerɛ asɛmpa no na wɔde yɛ nkwagyeɛ ayɛyɛdeɛ. (Hwɛ N&A 20 and Ɔbohene a Ɛsom Boɔ, Joseph Smith—History 1)

Wɔnyaa saa adiyisɛm kronkron yi sɛ mpaebɔ ho mmuaeɛ, wɔ ahokyere mmerɛ mu, a na ɛfiri asetena tebea ankasa mu a ɛfa nnipa ankasa ho. Nkɔmhyɛni no ne n’apamfoɔ hwehwɛɛ ɔsoro akwankyerɛ, na saa adiyisɛm yi di adanseɛ sɛ wɔnyaae. Wɔ saa adiyisɛm yi mu no, yɛhunu sɛ wɔde Yesu Kristo Asɔre no asan aba bio na ayi ne ho adi na ama mmerɛ mahyɛ no mu asɛmpa no ahyɛn mu. Asɔre no akwantuo a wɔtu kɔɔ atɔeɛ fam firii New York ne Pennsylvania kɔɔ Ohio, Missouri, Illinois, na ɛkɔwiee wɔ Great Basin a ɛwɔ Amerika atɔeɛ fam mu no ne Ahotefoɔ no apinisie a wɔsiiɛ berɛ a wɔperee sɛ wɔbɛkyekyere Sion wɔ asase so wɔ nnɛ mmerɛ yi mu no nso no, da adi wɔ saa adiyisɛm yi mu.

Afã a ɛdi kan no mu bebree ka nsɛm a ɛfa Mormon Nwoma no nkyerɛaseɛ ne sɛ ɛpue dwa so ho (hwɛ afã 3, 5, 10, 17, ne 19). Afã a ɛbaa akyire yi binom kyerɛ adwuma a Nkɔmhyɛni Joseph Smith yɛɛe wɔ Twerɛ Kronkron nkannyan so nkyerɛaseɛ no, a berɛ no mu wɔnyaa afa no nkyerɛkyerɛ titriw bebree (hwɛ, sɛ ebia, afã 37, 45, 73, 76, 77, 86, 91, ne 132, a ɛmu biara ne Twerɛ Kronkron no nkyerɛaseɛ binom wɔ twakadie).

Wɔ adiyisɛm no mu no, wɔde asɛmpa no nkyerɛkyerɛ no ato dwa ama nkyerɛkyerɛmu afa nsɛm a ɛho hia bi te sɛ Anyame Mmiɛnsa no su, faako a onipa firi, sɛ Satan wɔ hɔ ampa, deɛ ɛwuo tebea botaeɛ, hia a ɛhia sɛ yɛyɛ setie, hia a ɛhia sɛ yɛsakyera, Honhom Kronkron no dwumadie, ayɛyɛdeɛ ne adeyɔ a ɛfa nkwagyeɛ ho, asase no hyɛberɛ, nnipa daakye tebea wɔ Owusɔreɛ ne Atemmuo no akyi, daapem awareɛ abusuabɔ, ne abusua a ɛnni awieɛ su. Saa ara nso na wɔada Asɔre no ntotoeɛ a wɔahyehyɛ a ɛrebue nkakrankakra no adi fa ahwɛfoɔ, Atitenafoɔ a Wɔdi Kan no, Agyinatufoɔ Dumienu, ne Aduɔsɔn no frɛ no, ne hwɛsofoɔ dibea afoforɔ ne akuoakuo nkyekyereɛ. Deɛ ɛtwa toɔ ne adanseɛ a wɔma fa Yesu Kristo ho—Ne kronkronyɛ, Ne kɛseyɛ, Ne pɛpɛɛpɛyɛ, Ne dɔ, ne Ne gyeɛ tumi—yei ma saa nwoma yi som boɔ kɛse ma adasamma abusua na “ɛdi mu pa ara sene Asase so ahonyadeɛ nyina ara” (hwɛ N&A 70 atifiasɛm).

Joseph Smith atwerɛfoɔ no na wɔdii kan twerɛɛ adiyisɛm no, na asɔremma de anigyeɛ kyekyɛɛ nsaano‐ atwerɛ nkrataa no bi maa wɔn ho wɔn ho. Sɛdeɛ wɔbɛnya twerɛtohɔ a ɛwɔ hɔ daa no, ankyɛre, atwerɛfoɔ twerɛɛ saa adiyisɛm yi yɛɛ no twerɛtohɔ nwoma, ɛno na Asɔre mpanimfoɔ de siesiee adyisɛm a wɔbɛtintim. Joseph ne kane Ahotefoɔ no hunuu adiyisɛm no sɛdeɛ na wɔhunu Asɔre no pɛpɛɛpɛ: Sɛ ɛte ase, ɛte apɔ, na wɔtumi yɛ mu nsakraeɛ de adiyisɛm foforɔ ka ho. Wɔsan nso hyɛɛ no nso sɛ mfomsoɔ a anidaho nnim baa mu berɛ a wɔretwerɛ adiyisɛm na wɔresiesie akɔ tintim no. Ɛno nti na Asɔre nhyiamu kyerɛɛ Joseph Smith wɔ 1831 sɛ “ɔnsiesie saa sintɔ anaa mfomsoɔ a ɔbɛtumi anam Honhom Kronkron no so bɛhunu no.”

Wɔkɔɔ adiyisɛm no mu na wɔsiesieɛ akyi no, Asɔremma a wɔwɔ Missouri hyɛɛ aseɛ tintim nwoma bi a wɔtoo no din A Book of Commandments for the Government of the Church of Christ, (Kristo Asɔre no Sohwɛ Mmaransɛm Nwoma), a na ɛkura Nkɔmhyɛni no adiyisɛm a ɛdi kan no mu pii. Nanso, anamɔn a wɔdii kan tuui no baa awieɛ berɛ a akwasampafoɔ kuo bi sɛee Ahotefoɔ no nwomatintim-bea wɔ Jackson County wɔ Kintawonsa 20, 1833 no.

Wɔtee sɛ wɔasɛe Missouri nwoma tintim bea no, Joseph Smith ne Asɔre akannifoɔ afoforɔ no hyɛɛ aseɛ yɛɛ ahoboa sɛ wɔde adiyisɛm no bɛba dwa so wɔ Kirtland, Ohio. Sɛdeɛ a ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛsiesie mfomsoɔ no, akyerɛkyerɛ nsɛm no mu no, na wɔahyɛ mpuntuo a ɛwɔ asɔre nkyerɛkyerɛ ne ne nhyehyɛeɛ mu nso no, Joseph Smith hwɛ maa wɔsiesiee atwerɛ a ɛwɔ adiyisɛm no bi mu ama wɔayɛ no krado ama wɔatintim de aba dwa so wɔ 1835 sɛ Doctrine and Covenants of the Church of the Latter Day Saints. (Nna a Ɛdi Akyire Ahotefoɔ Asɔre Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam). Joseph Smith maa wɔtintim Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam foforɔ a wɔde baa dwa so abosome kakraabi akyi wɔ Nkɔmhyɛni no mogya dansedie akyi wɔ 1844.

Adiyisɛm no somm Nna a Ɛdi Akyire Ahotefoɔ no bo na wɔhunuu no sɛ ɛyɛ nkransɛm a ɛfiri Onyankopɔn. Berɛ bi wɔ ɛde rekɔ 1831 awieɛ no, mpanimfoɔ bebree dii wɔn adanseɛ a ɛmu dɔ sɛ Awurade adi adanseɛ akyerɛ wɔn akra faa adiyisɛm no nokorɛ ɛyɛ ho. Wɔtintim saa adanseɛ yi wɔ Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam a ɛbaae 1835 no mu sɛ Asomafoɔ Dumienu no adanseɛ a wɔatwerɛ:
Awurade Mmaransɛm Nwoma ho Adansefoɔ no Adansedie, Mmaransɛm a Ɔde maa N’Asɔre nam Joseph Smith, Jun., so, deɛ wɔnam Asɔre no nne so frɛɛ no maa saa botaeɛ yi no:

Ne saa nti, ɛyɛ yɛn pɛ sɛ yɛdi adanseɛ kyerɛ adasamma wɔ wiase nyina ara, abɔdeɛ biara a ɔwɔ asase ani so, sɛ Awurade adi adanseɛ akyerɛ yɛn akra, nam Sunsum Kronkron no a wɔde ama yɛn no so, sɛ wɔnam Onyankopɔn nkannyan so na wɔde mmaransɛm yi maae, na ɛso wɔ mfasoɔ ma nnipa nyina ara na ɛyɛ nokorɛ ampa.

Yɛdi saa adanseɛ yi kyerɛ wiase, na Awurade ne yɛn boafoɔ; na ɛnam Onyankopɔn Agya ne Ne Ba, Yesu Kristo adom so na ama yɛanya saa akwannya yi sɛ yɛnni saa adanseɛ yi nkyerɛ wiase, na yɛdi ahurisie mmorosoɔ wɔ yei ho, na yɛbɔ Awurade mpaeɛ sɛ nnipa mma bɛnya ɛho mfasoɔ.
Dumienu no din ne:

Wɔ Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam nwoma tintim no ntoatoasoɔ mu no, wɔde adiyisɛm afoforɔ anaa twerɛtohɔ nsɛm afoforɔ aka ho, sɛdeɛ nimdeɛfoɔ nhyiamu anaa Asɔre no nhyiamu nyaae na wɔgye too mu no teɛ.Deɛ wɔtintimm no 1876, a Panin Orson Pratt siesieɛ wɔ Brigham Young akwankyerɛ so mu no, wɔhyehyɛɛ adiyisɛm no mmerɛ‐ nnidisoɔ mu na wɔde atifiasɛm afoforɔ a abakɔsɛm tiawatwa nnianim ka ho.

Fiti 1835 ntintim no so no, onyamekyerɛ adesua ho ntintim nnidisoɔ nson na wɔde kaa ho; wɔtoo yeinom din Lectures on Faith (Gyedie ho Nkyerɛkyerɛ). Wɔhyehyɛɛ yeinom sɛ wɔde bɛdi dwuma wɔ Nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no sukuu mu wɔ Kirtland, Ohio, firi 1834 de kɔ 1835. Ɛwɔ mu sɛ ɛho wɔ mfasoɔ ma nkyerɛkyerɛ ne adekyerɛ deɛ, nanso wɔyi firii Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam no mu wɔ 1921 nwoma tintim no mu esiane sɛ wɔammfa amma anaa wɔammfa annto dwa sɛ adiyisɛm a wɔde ma Asɔre mu no nyina ara.

Wɔ 1981 Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam Borɔfo kasa deɛ mu no, wɔde nwoma mmiɛnsa kaa ho deɛ ɛdi kan. Ɛnonom ne afã 137 ne 138, a ɛkyerɛ awufoɔ nkwagyeɛ fapem; ne Asɔre Dawubɔ 2, a ɛka sɛ: wɔbɛtumi ahyɛ Asɔremma mmarima a wɔn ho teɛ nyina ara asɔfoɔ ɛmmfa ho ne wɔn abusua anaa wɔn ahosuo.

Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam nwoma a ɛpuee dwa biara so no, wɔasiesie mfomsoɔ a ɛwɔ mu na wɔde nsɛm foforɔ aka ho, titiriw wɔ abakɔsɛm afa a ɛwɔ ɔfã atifiasɛm no mu. Deɛ ɛwɔ dwa so seesei nso siesie mmerɛ ne mmea-din na ɛyɛ nsiesie afaoforɔ. Wɔayɛ saa nsakyeraeɛ yi sɛdeɛ wɔbɛma nwoma no ne abakɔsɛm a ɛdi mu pa ara ayɛ pɛ. Afa afoforɔ sononko bi ne asase-mfoni a wɔasakyera mu a ɛkyerɛ mmea titire a wɔnyaa adiyisɛm no wɔ, ɛne Asɔre no abakɔsɛm mmeaeɛ a ɛdi mu mfonini, nsɛm-ntotoho, ɔfã atifiasɛm, ne asɛnti tɔfa, na wɔayɛ weinom nyina ara sɛdeɛ ɛbɛboa akenkanfoɔ ma wɔate aseɛ na na wɔadi ahurisie wɔ nkrasɛm a Awurade de ama wɔ Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam no mu. Nsɛm a ɛwɔ ɔfã atifiasɛm no wɔyi firii Asɔre no Abakɔsɛm Nwoma ne History of the Church (Asɔre Abakɔsɛm) a wɔatintim (a wɔfrɛ ne nyina ara wɔ atifiasɛm no mu sɛ Joseph Smith abakɔsɛm) ne Joseph Smith Papers (Joseph Smith Nkrataa).

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/1.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 1
chapter_summary: 1–7, Kɔkɔbɔ nne yi kɔ ma nnipa nyina ara; 8–16, Ɔwaeɛ ne amumuyɔsɛm di Mmaeɛ a ɛtɔ so Mmienu no anim; 17–23, Wɔfrɛɛ Joseph Smith sɛ ɔnsan mfa Awurade nokorɛsɛm ne ne tumi mmraasase so bio; 24–33, Wɔda Mormon Nwoma no adi na wɔkyekyere nokorɛ asɔre no; 34–36, Wɔbɛyi asomdwoeɛ afiri asaase so; 37–39, Hwehwɛ saa mmaransɛm yi mu.

verses.text: Montie, O mo, nkorɔfoɔ a mowɔ m’asɔre mu, ɔno a ɔte soro nne na ɛseɛ, ɔno a n’ani wɔ nnipa nyina ara so; aane, nokorɛ mese: Montie, nnipa a mofiri akyirikyiri; ne mo a mowɔ ɛpo supɔ so, mommɔ mu ntie.
Na nokorɛ, Awurade nne kɔ nnipa nyina ara hɔ, na obiara nni hɔ a ɔfiri mu; na ani biara nni hɔ a ɛrenhunu, anaa aso biara nni hɔ a ɛrente, anaa akoma biara nni hɔ a ɛmu renhwire.
Na awerɛhoɔ pii bɛfiti atuatefoɔ no mu; ɛfiri sɛ wɔbɛka wɔn amumuyɛ wɔ adan atifi na wɔn kokoa mu nnwuma bɛda adi.
Na kɔkɔbɔ nne no bɛkɔ nnipa nyina ara hɔ, afiri m’akyidifoɔ anum, wɔn a mayi wɔn saa nna a ɛtwatoɔ yi mu.
Na wɔbɛfiri adi akɔ a obiara rensi wɔn kwan, ɛfiri sɛ me Awuradena mahyɛ wɔn.
Hwɛ, yei yɛ me tumidie, ɛne me nkoa tumidie, ne me nnianim asɛm ma me mmaransɛm nwoma no, deɛ mede ama sɛ wɔntintim mma mo, O asase sotefoɔ.
Ɛno nti, monsuro na mo ho mpopo, O mo nnipa, sɛdeɛ me Awurade mahyɛ wɔ ɛmu no bɛba mu;
Na nokorɛ mese mo sɛ wɔn a wɔfiri adi kɔ, de saa nkra yi ma asase sotefoɔ no, wɔn na wɔama wɔn tumi sɛ wɔnsɔ, deɛ ɔnnye nni ne ɔtuateni, ano wɔ asase so ne ɔsoro;
Aane, nokorɛ, sɛ wɔnsɔ wɔn ano mma da no, a Onyankopɔn abufuhyeɛ bɛhwie agu abɔnefoɔ so mmorosoɔno—
Ma ɛda no, a Awurade bɛba abɛtua onipa biara ka sɛnea n’adwuma teɛ, na ɔsusu ma onipa biara nsusuiɛ sɛnea wasusuama ne yɔnko nipa.
Ɛno nti Awurade nne kɔ asase ano, sɛ obiara a ɔbɛtie no bɛte:
Monsiesie mo ho, monsiesie moho mma deɛ ɛrebɛba, ɛfiri sɛ Awurade abɛn;
Na Awurade abufuo redɛre, na n’afenaa adware wɔ ɔsoro mu, na ɛbɛte atɔ asase sotefoɔ so.
Na Awurade basa bɛda adi; na ɛda no reba a, wɔn a wɔrentie Awurade nne, anaa ne nkoa nne, na wɔantie nkɔmhyɛfoɔ ne asomafoɔ no nsɛm no, wɔbɛtwa wɔn afiri nkorɔfoɔ no mu;
Ɛnam sɛ wɔatwe wɔn ho afiri m’ayɛyɛdeɛ ho, na wɔabu me daapem apam so;

Wɔnnhwehwɛ Awurade sɛ wɔbɛkyekyere ne teneneeyɛ, mmom onipa biara nante ɔno ankasa kwan so, di mfonin a ɛyɛ n’ankasa nyame akyi, ɔno a ne mfoninyɛ wiase nsɛsoɔ, ɔno a ne nneɛma yɛ ɔbosom deɛ, nea ɛyɛ dada na ɛbɛsɛe wɔ Babel, mpo Babel kɛseɛ no a, ɛbɛhwe ase no.
Ɛno nti, Me Awurade, a menim mmusuo a ɛbɛba asaase sotefoɔ so no, frɛɛ m’akoa Joseph Smith, Jun., na mekasa kyerɛɛ no firii ɔsoro, na me maa no mmaransɛm;
Na mesan maa afoforɔ nso mmaransɛm, sɛ wɔmmɔ saa nneɛma yi ho dawuro nkyerɛ wiase; na yei nyina ara sɛnea ɛbɛhyɛ ma, nea nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no twerɛeɛ no—
Wiase nneɛma a ɛyɛ mmerɛ bɛfiri adi aba abɛbubu aberempɔn ne ahoɔdenfoɔ agu, sɛnea onipa rentu ne yɔnko nipa fo, na wamfa ne werɛ anhyɛ nsa a ɛyɛ honam mu—
Mmom sɛnea onipa biara bɛtumi akasa Awurade Nyankopɔndin mu, mpo wiase Agyenkwa no;
Na gyedie nso adɔɔso wɔ asase so;
Sɛnea me daapem apam ase bɛtim;
Na mmerɛyɛfoɔ ne awiemfoɔ abɔ me nsɛmpa no mahyɛ ho dawuro akyerɛ wiase ano, wɔ ahemfo ne aman sodifoɔ anim.
Hwɛ, Me ne Onyankopɔn, na makasa; saa mmaransɛm yi firi me, na wɔde maa me nkoa wɔn mmerɛyɛ mu, ɛnam wɔn kasasu so, na wɔanya nteaseɛ.
Na mpɛn dodoɔ a wɔfomeeɛ no, wɔatumiahunu;
Na mpɛn dodoɔ a wɔhwehwɛɛ nyansa no, wɔakyerɛkyerɛ wɔn;
Na mpɛn dodoɔ a wɔyɛɛ bɔne no, wɔaka wɔn anim, na wɔasakyera;
Na mpɛn dodoɔ a wɔbrɛɛwɔn ho ase no, wɔayɛden, na wɔafiri soro ahyira wɔn, na wɔanya nimdeɛ berɛ ano berɛ ano.
Na akyire yi a wanya Nifaefoɔ twerɛtohɔ no, aane, mpo m’akoa Joseph Smith Jun., anya tumi nam Onyankopɔn mmɔborɔhunu so, de Onyankopɔn tumi, akyerɛ Mormon Nwoma no ase.

Na, wɔn a wɔde saa mmaransɛm yi maa wɔn no nso, anya tumi ato saa asɔre yi fapem, na wɔde apue afiri kusuuyɛ ne sum mu, ɛno nko ara ne nokorɛ ne ateaseɛ asɔre a ɛwɔ asase yi nyina ara ani so, a ɛno na Me Awurade, ɛsɔ m’ani yie, merekasa kyerɛ asɔre mũno nyina ara na ɛnyɛ ankorɛankorɛ—
Ɛfiri sɛ Me Awurade, mentumi nhwɛ bɔne wɔ ɔkwan kumaa mpo so;
Nanso, deɛ ɔsakyera na ɔdi Awurade mmaransɛm so no, wɔde bɛkyɛ no;
Na deɛ wannsakyera no, wɔbɛgye afiri ne hɔ mpo hann a ɔnyaaeɛ no; ɛnam sɛ me Honhom ne onipa renni apereapereɛ berɛbiara, Asafo Awurade na ɔseɛ.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, O asase sotefoɔ: Me Awurade, mepɛ sɛ meda saa nneɛma yi adi kyerɛ honam nyina ara;

Ɛnam sɛ menyɛ nnipa mu nhwehwɛmu, na mɛpɛ sɛ nnipa nyina ara bɛhunu sɛ ɛda no reba ntɛm so; dɔnhwere no nnuruui, nanso abɛn pa ara, berɛ a, wɔbɛfa asomdwoeɛ afiri asase so, na ɔbonsambɛnya tumi adi n’ankasa deɛ so.
Na Awurade nso bɛnya tumi wɔ n’ahotefoɔ so, na ɔbɛdi hene wɔ wɔn ntam, na ɔde atemmuo bɛba fam wɔ Edom, anaa wiase so.
Hwehwɛ saa mmaransɛm yinom mu, ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ ampa ne nokorɛ, na nkɔmhyɛ ne bɔhyɛsɛm a ɛwɔ mu nyina ara bɛba mu.

Deɛ Me Awurade maka no maka, na menni anoyie biara; na ɛwom sɛ ɔsorosoro ne asase bɛtwam akɔ, na m’asɛm deɛ ɛrentwa mu nkɔ, na ne nyina ara bɛba mu, sɛ ɛyɛ m’ankasa me nne anaa ɛyɛ me nkoa nne, ɛyɛ adekorɔ.
Nti hwɛ, na hwɛ, Awurade yɛ Onyankopɔn, na Sunsum no di ho adanseɛ, na adanseɛ no yɛ nokorɛ, na nokorɛsɛm bɛtena hɔ afebɔɔ ne afebɔɔ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/2.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 2
chapter_summary: 1, Elia bɛda asɔfodie no adi; 2–3, Wɔadua agyanom bɔhyɛsɛm no wɔ mma no akoma mu.

verses.text: Hwɛ, mɛda asɔfɔdie no adi akyerɛ mo, nam nkɔmhyɛni Elia nsa so, ansana Awurade da kɛseɛ, na ɛyɛ hu no aba.
Na ɔbɛdua wɔ mma no akoma mu bɔhyɛsɛm a wɔyɛ maa agyanom no, na mma no akoma bɛdane akɔ wɔn agyanom so.
Sɛ anyɛ saa a, asase no nyina ara bɛsɛe korakora wɔ ne mmaeɛ no.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/3.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 3
chapter_summary: 1–4, Awurade kwan yɛ nkyimiiɛ baako a ɛnni awieɛ; 5–15, Ɛsɛ sɛ Joseph Smith sakyera anyɛ saa a ɔbɛhwere akyɛdeɛ a wɔde kyerɛ aseɛ no; 16–20, Mormon nwoma no ba bɛgye Lihae asefoɔ no.

verses.text: Onyankopɔn nnwuma, ne tirimpɔ, ne ne botae ntumi nyɛ basaa, na kantom atumi ayɛ kwa.
Ɛnam sɛ Onyankopɔn nnante ɔkwan kɔntɔnkye so, na ɔnnane ne ho nkɔ nsa nifa anaa benkum so, na ɔnsesa mfiri nea waka ho nti, n’akwan yɛ tee, na ɛyɛ nkyinsoɔ baako a ɛnni awieɛ.
Kae, kae sɛ ɛnyɛ Onyankopɔn adwuma na ɛyɛ basaa, na ɛyɛ nnipa adwuma;

Ɛte saa sɛ onipa bi bɛnya adiyisɛm bebree, anya tumi ayɛ nnwuma akɛseɛ, na sɛ ɔhoahoa ne ho wɔ ɔno ara ahoɔden mu, na ɔmfa Onyankopɔn afotuo nyɛ hwee, na ɔdi deɛ n’ankasa pɛ kakyerɛ no ne honam mu akɔnnɔ so a, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔhwe ase na ɔgye tenenee Nyankopɔn awerɛtɔ wɔ ne so.
Hwɛ, wɔde saa nneɛma yi ahyɛ wo nsa, na sɛn na na wo mmaransɛm yɛ den fa; na afei sɛ woamfom yeinom a, kae bɔhyɛ nso a wɔhyɛ maa wo no.
Na hwɛ, mprɛ dodoɔ a, woafom me mmaransɛm ne Onyankopɔn mmara no, na woakɔ so ama nnipa adaadaa wo.
Na hwɛ, na ɛnnsɛ sɛ anka wo suro onipa sene Onyankopɔn. Ɛwɔ mu sɛ nnipa mfa Onyankopɔn afotuo nyɛ hwee, na ɔkyiri ne nsɛm—
Nanso, ɛsɛ sɛ anka wo yɛ nokorɛfoɔ; na anka ɔbɛtene ne nsa agyina w’akyi atia ɔtamfo no agyan a ɛredɛre nyina ara; na anka berɛbiara waka wo ho wo haw mu.
Hwɛ, wo ne Joseph, na wɔayi wo sɛ wobɛyɛ Awurade no adwuma, nanso ɛnam mfomsoɔ so, sɛ woanyɛ ahwɛyie a wobɛhwe ase.
Nanso kae, Onyankopɔn yɛ mmɔborɔhunufoɔ; ɛno nti, sakyera wɔ deɛ woayɛ a ɛne mmaransɛm a mede maa wo no bɔ abira, na woda so ara yɛ deɛ wɔayi no, a wɔafrɛ wo adwuma no ho bio;
Gye sɛ woyɛ yei, wɔbɛyi wo ama na wabɛyɛ sɛ nnipa biara, a wonni akyɛdeɛ biara bio.
Na berɛ a woyii deɛ Onyankopɔn maa wo ani ne tumi kyerɛɛ aseɛ maae no, woyii deɛ ɛyɛ kronkron de too nipa bɔnefoɔ nsam,
Deɛ wabu Onyankopɔn afotuo animtia, na wabu bɔhyɛ kronkron kɛseɛ a ɔyɛɛ no wɔ Onyankopɔn anim so, na ɔde ne ho too n’ankasa atemmuo so na ɔhoahoaa ne ho wɔ n’ankasa nyansa mu no.
Na yei nti na woahwere wo dibea berɛ tiaa yi mu—
Ɛnam sɛ, woama ho kwan ama wɔatiatia wo kwankyerɛfoɔ afotuo so afiri mfitiaseɛ no.
Nanso, m’adwuma bɛfiri akɔ, sɛnea Agyenkwa no ho nimdeɛ aba wiase, nam Yudafoɔ adansedie so no, mpo saa ara na Agyenkwa no ho nimdeɛ bɛba me nkurofoɔ hɔ—
Na akɔ Nifaefoɔ, ne Yakobfoɔ, ne Yosefoɔ ne Zoramfoɔ hɔ, nam wɔn agyanom adansedie so—

Na saa adansedie yi bɛba Lamanfoɔ nimdeɛ mu, ne Lemuelfoɔ, ne Ismaelfoɔ, wɔn a wɔtɔɔ ape wɔ annye annie mu, ɛnam wɔn agyanom amumuyɛ nti, wɔn a Awurade ama ho kwan sɛ wɔnsɛe wɔn nuanom Nifaefoɔ no, ɛnam wɔn amumuyɛ ne wɔn akyiwadeɛ nti.
Na ɛnam saa botaeɛ yi nti na wɔkoraa saa mprɛte yi, a ɛkura saa twerɛtohɔsɛm yi—sɛnea Awurade bɔhyɛ a ɔhyɛɛ ne nkorofoɔ no bɛtumi aba mu.

Sɛnea Lamanfoɔ no bɛba wɔn agyanom nimdeɛ mu, na wɔahunu Awurade bɔhyɛ, na wɔagye asɛmpa no adi, na wɔde wɔn ho ato Yesu Kristo nnwumapa so, na wɔahyɛ wɔn animuonyam nam gyedie wɔ ne din mu, na saa ɛnam wɔn nsakyeraeɛ so wɔanya ɔgyeɛ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/4.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 4
chapter_summary: 1–4, Ahoɔden som gye Awurade asomfoɔ; 5–6, Onyamesu ma wɔn fata ɔsom adwuma; 7, Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔhwehwɛ Onyankopɔn nneɛma.

verses.text: Afei hwɛ, adwuma nwanwasoɔ rebɛfiri akɔ nnipa mma ntam.
Ɛno nti, O mo a moafiri aseɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn som mu, monhwɛ sɛ mode mo akoma nyina ara, tumi, adwene ne ahoɔden, som no sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a, mobɛgyina tenenee mu wɔ Onyankopɔn anim da a ɛtwatoɔ no.
Ɛno nti, sɛ mowɔ ɔpɛ sɛ mobɛsom Onyankopɔn a, wafrɛ mo wɔ adwuma no ho;
Na hwɛ afuo no ahoa dada sɛ wɔtwa; na hwɛ, deɛ ɔde n’ahoɔden de ne kantankrankyi si mu no, ɔno ara bɛboa ano de asie adekoraeɛ sɛ ɔrensɛe, mmom ɔde nkwagyeɛ brɛ ne kraa;
Na gyedie, anidasoɔ, ɔdɔ mapa ne ɔdɔ, ɛne ani a ɛyɛ koro wɔ Onyankopɔn animuonyam so, ma obi fata adwuma no.
Kae gyedie, ahonidie, nimdeɛ, anidahɔ, aboterɛ, onuadɔ, nyamesu, ɔdɔ mapa, ahobrɛaseɛ, nsiyɛ.
Bisa, na wobɛnya; bɔ mu na ɛbɛbue ama wo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/5.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 5
chapter_summary: 1–10, Saa awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi bɛnya Awurade asɛmnam Joseph Smith so; 11–18, Adansefoɔ mmiɛnsa bɛdi adanseɛ Mormon Nwoma no ho; 19–20, Wɔbɛhunu Awurade asɛm no mu nokorɛ te sɛ kane mmerɛ no; 21–35, Ɛbɛ ba sɛ Martin Harris bɛsakyera na wayɛ adansefoɔ no mu baako.

verses.text: Hwɛ, mese wo, esiane sɛ m’akoa Martin Harris apɛ adanseɛ wɔ me nsa mu, sɛ wo m’akoa Joseph Smith, Jun., anya mprɛte a wadi ho adanseɛ atwerɛ ato hɔ sɛ wonyaa wɔ me hɔ no nti;

Na afei, hwɛ, yei na wobɛka akyerɛ no—ɔno a ɔkasa kyerɛɛ wo, see wo sɛ: Me, Awurade, mene Onyankopɔn, na mede saa nneɛma yi ama wo, m’akoa Joseph Smith, Jun., na mahyɛ wo sɛgyina sɛ ɔdanseni ma saa nneɛma yinom;
Na mayɛ no sɛ wo ne me nkɔ apam, sɛ woremfa yeinom nkyerɛ gye sɛ saa nnipa a mehyɛɛ wo no; na wonni tumi wɔ yeinom so gye sɛ mema wo ɛho kwan.

Na wowɔ akyɛdeɛ sɛ wokyerɛ mprɛte no ase; na yei yɛ akyɛdeɛ a ɛdi kan a mede akyɛ wo; na mahyɛ sɛ mpatu nya akyɛdeɛ foforɔ kɔsi sɛ me botae bɛba mu wɔ yei mu; ɛfiri sɛ meremma wo akyɛdeɛ biara ho kwan kɔsi sɛ wobɛwie.
Nokorɛ, mese wo, sɛ asase sotefoɔ rentie me nsɛm a, mmusuo bɛba wɔn so;
Na yei akyire no, wɔbɛhyɛ wo sɔfoɔ ama woakɔ de me nsɛm akɔma nnipa mma.
Hwɛ, sɛ wɔrennye mensɛm nni a, wɔrennye wo nni, m’akoa Joseph, mpo sɛ wotumi de saa nneɛma yi a mede ahyɛ wonsa yi nyina ara kyerɛ wɔn a.
O, saa annyeanni ne kɔnseneɛ awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi—m’abufuo redɛre tia wɔn.
Hwɛ, nokorɛ mese wo, makora saa nneɛma yeinom a mede ahyɛ wo nsa yi, m’akoa Joseph, wɔ nyansa botae a ɛwɔ me mu nti, na wɔbɛda no adi akyerɛdaakye awoɔntoatoasoɔ;
Nanso saa awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi nam wo so bɛnya m’asɛm;
Na deɛ ɛbɛka w’adansedie ho no yɛ menkoa mmiɛnsa adansedie, wɔn a mɛfrɛ ahyɛ wɔn asɔfoɔ, wɔn a mede saa nneɛma yi bɛkyerɛ wɔn, na wɔbɛfiri adi de me nsɛm a ɛnam wo so mede ama no akɔ.
Aane, wɔbɛhunu ampara sɛ saa nneɛma yinom yɛ nokorɛ, ɛnam sɛ ɛfiri soro na mɛka ato dwa akyerɛ wɔn.
Mɛma wɔn tumi de ahwɛ na wɔahunu saa nneɛma yi sɛnea ɛteɛ;

Na meremma obi foforɔ biara saa tumi yi, sɛ wɔnya saa adansedie korɔ yi saa awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi mu, wɔ m’asɔre ahyeaseɛ ne ne sɔreɛ a ɛreba afiri ɛserɛ so—korɔgyeen sɛ ɔsrane, fɛɛfɛ sɛ owia, na huuhu sɛ asraafoɔ a wɔkura frankaa.
Na adansefoɔ mmiɛnsa adansedie na mɛsoma akɔ, ɛfa m’asɛm ho.
Na hwɛ, obibiara a ɔgye me nsɛm di no, mede Honhom adiyie mɛsra no; na me na mɛwo no, mpo mede nsuo ne Honhom no—
Na ɛsɛ sɛ wotwɛn kakraabi, ɛfiri sɛ wɔnnya nhyɛɛ wo sɔfoɔ—
Na wɔn adansedie nso bɛfiri akɔ bu saa awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi fɔ sɛ wɔyɛ wɔn akoma den tia wɔn a;

Na da-mpan-sɛeɛ bɛfiri akɔ asase sotefoɔ mu, na sɛ wɔannsakyera a, ɛbɛkɔ so ahwie agu berɛ ano berɛ ano, kɔsi sɛ asase no bɛyɛ hunu, na asase sotefoɔ no bɛhye akɔ na wɔasɛe korakora ɛnam me mmaeɛ no hyerɛn no nti.
Hwɛ, meka saa nsɛm yi kyerɛ wo, mpo sɛnea mekakyerɛɛ nkurofoɔ no nso ɛfa Yerusalem sɛeɛ ho no; na m’asɛm bɛba mu nokorɛ saa berɛ yi mu sɛnea aba mu berɛ a atwa mu kɔ no.
Na afei mehyɛ wo, m’akoa Joseph, sɛ sakyera na nante tenenee muyie wɔ m’anim, na nnyae wo ho mma nnipa nnaadaa bio;
Nahwɛ sɛ wobɛ gyina pintinn adi me mmaransɛm a mahyɛ wo sɛ di so no so; na sɛ woyɛ yei a, hwɛ mpo sɛ wɔkum wo mpo a, mɛma wo nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ.
Na afei, bio, mekasa kyerɛ wo, m’akoa Joseph, ɛfa saa nipa a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔyɛ danseni no ho—

Hwɛ, meka kyerɛ no, ɔma ne ho so na ɔmmrɛ ne ho ase sɛnea ɛhia wɔ m’anim; na sɛ ɔbɛkoto fam wɔ m’anim, abrɛ ne ho ase wɔ mpaebɔ kɛseɛ ne gyedie mu, adi nokorɛ wɔ n’akoma mu a, mɛma no ho kwan ma wahwɛ nneɛma no a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔhunu no.

Na afei ɔbɛka akyerɛ nkurofoɔ a wɔwɔ saa awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi mu sɛ: Hwɛ, mahunu nneɛma a Awurade de akyerɛ Joseph Smith, Jun. no, na menim pefee sɛ ɛyɛ nokorɛ, ɛfiri sɛ mahunu saa nneɛma no, na wɔde akyerɛ me nam Onyankopɔn tumi so na ɛnyɛ nipa deɛ.
Na me Awurade mehyɛm’akoa Martin Harris, sɛ ɔnnka biribiara bio nkyerɛ wɔn fa saa nneɛma yi ho, gyesɛ ɔka sɛ: mahunu yeinom na wɔde akyerɛ me nam Onyankopɔn tumi so; na saa nsɛm yi ne deɛ ɛsɛ sɛ ɔka.
Na sɛ ɔsan yei ho a, ɔbɛbu apam a ɔne me pammeɛ no so, na hwɛ, wɔabu no fɔ.

Na afei, gye sɛ ɔbrɛ ne ho ase na ɔgye nneɛma a wayɛ a ɛyɛ mfomsoɔ to mu kyerɛ me, na ɔne mekɔ apam sɛ ɔbɛdi me mmaransɛm so, na ɔkyerɛ gyedie wɔ me mu, hwɛ, mese no, ɔnnya saa nneɛma no bi nhwɛ, ɛfiri sɛ memma no ho kwan mma ɔnhwɛ saa nneɛma no a maka ho asɛm no.
Na sɛ saa na ɛteɛ deɛ a, mehyɛ wo, m’akoa Joseph, sɛ wobɛka akyerɛ no, sɛ ɔnnyɛ bio, na ɔnnha me koraa bio fa saa asɛmyi ho.
Na sɛ saa na ɛteɛ deɛ a, hwɛ, mese wo Joseph, sɛ wokyerɛ kratafa kakraabi ase ka ho a, wobɛgyae berɛ tiawa bi mu, mpo kɔsi sɛ mɛhyɛ wo bio; ansana woatumiakyerɛ aseɛ bio.
Na gyesɛ woyɛ yei, hwɛ, worennya akyɛdeɛ biara bio, na mɛfa nneɛma a mede ahyɛ wonsa no akɔ.
Na afei, ɛnam sɛ mahunu fidie a wɔasum de rebɛsɛe wo asie nti, aane, mahunu asie sɛ sɛ m’akoa Martin Harris ammrɛ ne ho ase, annya adanseɛ amfiri me nsam a, ɔbɛhwe ase akɔ bɔne mu;
Na dodoɔ no ara na wɔretwɛn sɛ wɔbɛsɛe wo afiri asase ani so; na ɛnam yei nti, sɛ ɛbɛyɛ a wo nna bɛyɛ tentene nti na mede saa mmaransɛm yi ama wo.
Aane, ɛnam yei nti na maka sɛ: Gyae na gyina dinn kɔsi sɛ mɛhyɛ wo, na mɛsiesie kwan a wonam so bɛtumi awie nneɛma a mahyɛ wo no.
Na sɛ woyɛ nokorɛfoɔ di me mmaransɛm so a, wɔbɛma wo so nna a ɛtwa toɔ no. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/6.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 6
chapter_summary: 1–6, Adwumayɛfoɔ a wɔwɔ Awurade afuo no so nya nkwagyeɛ; 7–13, Akyɛdeɛ biara nni hɔ a ɛyɛ kɛseɛ kyɛn nkwagyeɛ akyɛdeɛ no; 14–27, Nokorɛ ho adansedie ba nam Honhom no tumi so; 28–37, Hwɛ Kristo, na kɔso ara yɛ papa.

verses.text: Anwanwa dwuma a ɛyɛ kɛseɛ rebɛfiri aba nnipa mma hɔ.
Hwɛ, mene Onyankopɔn; tie m’asɛm, ɛno a ɛyɛ ntɛm na ahoɔden kɛseɛ wɔ mu, nnamnam sene afena anofanu a, ɛrepaepae akwaa ne hon mu; ɛno nti tie m’asɛm.

Hwɛ, afuo no ahoa dada sɛ wɔtwa; ɛno nti, oniibiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔbu no, ma ɔmfa ne kantankrankyi ne ahoɔden nsi mu, na ɔmmu berɛ a ɛda no wɔ hɔ yi, na wakora daapem nkwagyeɛ ama ne kraawɔ Onyankopɔn aheman no mu.
Aane, onii biara a ɔde ne kantankrankyi bɛsi mu na wabu no, ɔno ara na Onyankopɔn afrɛ no.
Ɛno nti, sɛ wobɛbisa me a, wobɛnya; sɛ wobɛbɔ mu a, wɔbɛbue ama wo.
Afei, sɛ moabisa yi, hwɛ, mese mo sɛ, monni me mmaransɛm so, na monhwehwɛ sɛ mode Sion nkyekyereɛ bɛfiri adi aba;
Monnhwehwɛ ahonyadeɛ na mmom nyansa, na hwɛ, wɔbɛda Onyankopɔn ahintasɛm adi akyerɛ mo, na ɛno na mobɛnya mo ho. Hwɛ, deɛ ɔwɔ nkwa a ɛnniawieɛ no yɛ ɔdefoɔ.
Nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese wo, mpo sɛdeɛ wopɛ firi me hɔ no, saa ara na ɛbɛyɛ ama wo; na sɛ wopɛ a, papayɛ bebree bɛfa wo so aba wɔ saa awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi mu.
Nka biribiara sɛ nsakyeraeɛ kyerɛ saa awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi; di me mmaransɛm so, na boa sɛ wobɛma m’adwuma ada adi, sɛnea me mmaransɛm kyerɛ, na wɔbɛhyira wo.
Hwɛ wo wɔ akyɛdeɛ, na nhyira nka wo ɛnam w’akyɛdeɛ no nti. Kae, ɛyɛ kronkron na ɛfiri ɔsoro na ɛbaae—

Na sɛ wobɛbisa a, wobɛhunu ahintasɛm a ɛyɛ kɛseɛ ne ahodwiri; ɛno nti sɔ w’akyɛdeɛ no hwɛ, sɛnea wobɛhunu ahintasɛm, sɛnea wode dodoɔ no bɛba nokorɛ nimdeɛ ho, aane, mawɔnhunu mfomsoɔ a ɛwɔ wɔn akwan mu.
Mma obiara nhunu w’akyɛdeɛ no gye sɛ wɔn a wɔwɔ wo gyedie mu. Ntoto nneɛma kronkron ase.

Sɛ wobɛyɛ papa, aane, na woakɔ so nokorɛdie mu akɔsi awieɛ a, wɔbɛgye wo wɔ Onyankopɔn aheman no mu, deɛ ɛyɛ kɛseɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn akyɛdeɛ nyina ara mu; na akyɛdeɛ biara nni hɔ a ɛso sene nkwagyeɛ akyɛdeɛ no.
Nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese wo, nhyira nka wo wɔ deɛ woayɛ; ɛnam sɛ wobisaa me, na hwɛ, mpɛn dodoɔ a wobisaae no wonyaa me honhom no nkyerɛkyerɛ. Sɛ anyɛ ne saa a, anka woamma saa bea yi a wowɔ saa berɛ yi.
Hwɛ, wonim sɛ wabisa wɔ me hɔ na mama wo adwene mu hann; na seesei meka yeinom kyerɛ wo sɛnea wobɛhunu sɛ wanya hann no nam nokorɛ Honhom no so;
Aane, meka kyerɛ wo, sɛnea wobɛhunu sɛ obiara nni hɔ gye Onyankopɔn a ɔnim w’adwene ne w’akoma mu nsusuiɛ.
Meka yeinom kyerɛ wo sɛ adanseɛ ma wo—sɛ nsɛm anaa adwuma a watwerɛtwerɛ no yɛ nokorɛ.
Ɛno nti yɛ nsiyɛ; gyina m’akoa Joseph ho, nokorɛ mu, wɔ tebea denden biara a ɔbɛkɔ mu ɛnam asɛm no nti.
Kasa kyerɛ no ne mfomsoɔ mu, na gye kasakyerɛ firi ne hɔ. Si aboterɛ; ma w’ani nna hɔ; yɛ komm; nya aboterɛ, gyedie, anidasoɔ ne ɔdɔ mapa.
Hwɛ, wo ne Oliver, na makasa akyerɛ wo ɛnam wo pɛ nti; ɛno nti kora saa nsɛm yi wɔ w’akoma mu. Di nokorɛ ne yɛ nsiyɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn mmaransɛm so die ho, na mede medɔ basa bɛtwa wo ho ahyia.
Hwɛ, mene Yesu Kristo, Onyankopɔn Babarima no. Mene nea ɔbaa ne deɛ mu na me deɛ annye me no. Me ne hann a ɛhyerɛn wɔ sum mu, na esum ante no aseɛ no.
Nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese wo, sɛ wopɛ adanseɛ aka ho a, twe w’adwene si anadwo no a, wosu kyerɛɛ me wɔ w’akoma mu, sɛ wobɛhunu nokorɛ a ɛfa saa nneɛma yi ho no.
Manka asomdwoeɛsɛm w’adwene mu ɛfa saa adeɛ yi ho? Adanseɛ kɛseɛ bɛn na wobɛnya kyɛn deɛ ɛfiri Onyankopɔn hɔ?
Na afei, hwɛ, woanya adanseɛ; na sɛ maka nneɛma akyerɛ wo a nipa biara nnim a, so wonnyaa adanseɛ anaa?
Na, hwɛ, sɛ wopɛ wɔ me hɔ a, mema wo akyɛdeɛ, ama woakyerɛ aseɛ, mpo te sɛ m’akoa Joseph.
Nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese wo, sɛ atwerɛtohɔsɛm binom wɔ hɔ a ɛkura m’asɛmpa dodoɔ no ara, a wɔatwe asan esiane nkorɔfoɔ no amumuyɛsɛm nti;
Na afei mehyɛ wo sɛ, sɛ wowɔ ɔpɛ pa a—ɔpɛ a wode bɛhyehyɛ ademudeɛ ama w’ankasa wɔ ɔsoro a—ɛnneɛ wode w’akyɛdeɛ no bɛboa ma aba hann mu, metwerɛ kronkron no fã a, wɔde asie ɛnam bɔne nti no.
Na afei, hwɛ, mede ma wo, ɛne m’akoa Joseph nso, saa akyɛdeɛ yi nsafoa, deɛ ɛde saa ɔsom adwuma yi bɛba hann mu; na adansefoɔ mmienu anaa mmiɛnsa ano mu asɛm so na asɛm biara bɛgyina.
Nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese mo, sɛ wɔpo mensɛm, ne saa m’asɛmpa fãyi ne ɔsom adwumayi a, nhyira ne mo, ɛfiri sɛ wɔnntumi nyɛ mo deɛ ɛboro so biara nkyɛn deɛ wɔyɛɛ me no.
Na mpo sɛ wɔde yɛ mo sɛnea wɔde ayɛ me no mpo a, nhyira ne mo, ɛnam sɛ mo ne me bɛtena animuonyam mu.
Na sɛ wɔampo mensɛm, deɛ ɛbɛgyina ɛnam adansedie a wɔde bɛma no so a, nhyira ne wɔn, na ɛno na mobɛnya anigyeɛ wɔ aduaba a mo dwumadieaso no ho.
Nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese mo, sɛnea mesee m’asuafoɔ no, baabi a mmienu anaa mmiɛnsa ahyia abom wɔ me din mu, ɛfa adeɛ baako ho no, hwɛ, ɛhɔ na mɛwɔ wɔn mfinimfini—mpo sɛnea mewɔ mo mfinimfini yi.
Monnsuro sɛ mobɛyɛ papa, me mmammarima, ɛfiri sɛ biribiara a moguo no, ɛno ara na mobɛbu; ɛno nti, sɛ mogu papa a, mobɛbu papa no ara sɛ akatua.
Ɛno nti, monnsuro, kuo ketewa; monyɛ papa; momma asase ne asamando mmɔ mu ntia mo, na sɛ moato mo dan wɔ mebotan no so a, wɔnntumi nni mo so.
Hwɛ, memmu mo fɔ; monkɔ mo kwan na monnyɛ bɔne bio; mo mfa anidahɔyɛ nni dwuma a mahyɛ mo no.
Monhwehwɛ me deɛ modwene ho biara mu; monnhinhim, monnsuro.
Monhwɛ pirakuro a ɛfitii me mfe mu, ne nnadewa ananmu a ɛwɔ me nsa ne me nan mu nso; monni nokorɛ, monni me mmaransɛm so, na mobɛnya ɔsoro aheman no adi. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/7.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 7
chapter_summary: 1–3, Yohane Ɔdɔfopa no bɛtena ase kɔsi Awurade mmaeɛ; 4–8, Petro, Yakobo ne Yohane kura asɛmpa nsafoa no.

verses.text: Na Awurade see me sɛ: Yohane me dɔfopa, deɛn na wopɛ? Sɛ wobɛbisa deɛ wopɛ a, wɔde bɛmawo.
Na mesee no sɛ: Awurade, mame tumi wɔ owuo so, sɛnea mɛtumi atena ase de akra abrɛ wo.
Na Awurade see me sɛ: Nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese wo, ɛnam sɛ wopɛ yei no nti, wobɛtena ase akɔsi sɛ mɛba m’animuonyam mu, na wobɛhyɛ nkɔm mmusuakuo horoɔ, kasa horoɔ ne nnipa anim.

Na saa asɛm yi nti na Awurade see Petro sɛ: Sɛ mepɛsɛ ɔtena ase kɔsi sɛ meba a, ɛfa wo hobɛn? Ɛfiri sɛ ɔpɛɛe wɔ me hɔ sɛ ɔbɛtumi de akra abrɛ me, nanso wodeɛ wopɛɛe sɛ wobɛba me hɔ ntɛmso wɔ m’aheman mu.
Mese wo sɛ, Petro, yei yɛ ɔpɛ papa; nanso medɔfopa apɛ sɛ ɔbɛyɛ bi aka ho, anaa ɔdi dwuma kɛseɛ wɔ nnipa mu kyɛn deɛ wayɛ dada no.
Aane, ɔde adwuma kɛseɛ ato ne ho so; ɛno nti mɛyɛ no ogya a ɛredɛre ne ɔbɔfoɔ somfoɔ ma wabɛsom wɔn a wɔbɛyɛ nkwagyeɛ adedifoɔ a wɔte asase so.
Na mɛma wayɛ ɔsomfoɔ ama no ne wonua barima Yakobo; na mo mmiɛnsa no mɛma mo saa tumi yi ne saa ɔsom adwuma yi nsafoa kɔsi sɛ mɛba.
Nokorɛ mese mo, mo mmienu bɛnya sɛnea mopɛ, ɛnam sɛ mo mmienu di ahurusie wɔ deɛ mopɛɛe mu.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/8.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 8
chapter_summary: 1–5, Adiyisɛm nam Sunsum Kronkron tumi so na ɛba; 6–12, Onyankopɔn ahintasɛm ho nimdeɛ ne tumi a wɔde kyerɛ tete twerɛtohɔsɛm ase nam gyedie so na ɛba.

verses.text: Oliver Cowdery, nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese wo, ampaneampara sɛ Awurade te ase yi, ɔnoa ɔyɛ wo Nyankopɔn ne wo Gyefoɔ no, saa ara mpo naampara wobɛnya nimdeɛwɔ nneɛma biara a wode gyedie bɛbisa no, sɛ wode ɔnokorɛfoɔ akoma, gyedi sɛ wobɛnya nimdeɛ afa nkurukyire a ɛwɔ twerɛtohɔ dada ho, a ɛyɛ tete adeɛ, a ɛkura saa me nsɛmpano fã a wɔaka nam me Honhom adiyie sono a.
Aane, hwɛ, mɛka akyerɛ wo wɔ w’adwene mu ne w’akoma mu, menam Sunsum kronkron no so, deɛ ɔbɛba wo so na ɔbɛtena w’akoma mu no so.
Afei, hwɛ, yei ne adiyie honhom no; hwɛ, yei ne honhom no a Mose nam so de Israelmma baae faa Po Kɔkɔɔ no mu wɔ asase wesee so.
Ɛno nti, yei ne w’akyɛdeɛ; fa di dwuma, na nhyira nka wo, ɛfiri sɛ ɛbɛyi wo afiri w’atamfo nsam, sɛ ɛnte saa a, wɔbɛku wo na wɔde wo kra bɛba ɔsɛeɛ mu.
O, kae saa nsɛm yi, na di me mmaransɛm so. Kae, yei ne w’akyɛdeɛ.
Afei nyɛ w’akyɛdeɛ nyina ara ni; na wowɔ akyɛdeɛ foforɔ, a ɛyɛ Aaron n’akyɛdeɛ no; hwɛ, aka nneɛma pii akyerɛ wo.
Hwɛ, tumi foforɔ biara nni hɔ, gye sɛ Onyankopɔn tumi, a ɛbɛtumi ayɛ ama saa Aaron tumi yi atena wo nkyɛn.
Ɛno nti, nnye akyinnye, ɛnam sɛ ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn akyɛdeɛ; na wobɛkura wɔ wonsamu, na woayɛ nwanwa nnwuma; na tumi biara rentumi nnye mfiri wo nsa mu nkɔ, ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn adwuma.
Na, ɛno nti, biribiara a wobɛbisa me sɛ menka nkyerɛ wo nam saa kwan no so no, mede bɛma wo, na wobɛnya nimdeɛ a ɛfa ho.
Kae sɛ gyedie nka ho a wontumi nyɛ hwee; ɛno nti bisa wɔ gyedie mu. Ntoto saa nneɛma yi ase; mmisa deɛ ɛnnsɛ sɛ wobisa.

Bisa sɛ wobɛtumi ahunu Onyankopɔn ahintasɛm, sɛ wobɛtumi akyerɛ aseɛ na woanya nimdeɛ afiri saa tete twerɛtohɔsɛm no nyina ara mu, deɛ wɔde asie, a ɛyɛ kronkron no; na ɛnam wo gyedie so na ɛbɛyɛ ama wo.
Hwɛ, ɛyɛ me na maka yei; na mekorɔ yi ara na mekasa kyerɛɛ wo firii mfitiaseɛ no. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/9.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 9
chapter_summary: 1–6 Tete twerɛtohɔsɛm foforɔ a ɛsɛ sɛ wɔkyerɛ aseɛ; 7–14, Mormon Nwoma no nkyerɛaseɛ nam adesua ne sɛ honhom no bɛsi so dua.

verses.text: Hwɛ, mese wo, mebabarima, sɛ ɛnam sɛ woankyerɛ aseɛ sɛdeɛ na worepɛ afiri me hɔ no, na wohyɛɛ aseɛ san twerɛɛ bio maa m’akoa Joseph Smith, Jun., ɛno nti mɛpɛ sɛ wobɛtoa so akɔsi sɛ wobɛwie saa twerɛtohɔ yi, deɛ mede ahyɛ ne nsa no.
Na akyire yi, hwɛ, mewɔ twerɛtohɔsɛm foforɔ a, mɛma wo tumi sɛ wobɛboa akyerɛ aseɛ.
Nya aboterɛ, mebabarima, ɛnam sɛ ɛyɛ nyansa ma me, na ɛho nhia sɛ wobɛkyerɛ aseɛ wɔ saa berɛ yi mu.
Hwɛ, adwuma a mafrɛ wo sɛyɛ ne sɛ wobɛtwerɛ ama m’akoa Joseph.
Na, hwɛ, ɛsiane sɛ woantoa so ankyerɛaseɛ sɛdeɛ wohyɛɛ aseɛ no nti, magye saa adom no afiri wo hɔ.
Nwiinwii, mebabarima, ɛnam sɛ ɛyɛ nyansa ma me sɛ mede wo afa saa kwan yi so.
Hwɛ, woannte aseɛ; wosusuu sɛ mede bɛma wo, berɛ a wonnwenee ho ɛka sɛ wobisa me pɛ.
Nanso, hwɛ, mese wo, sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wohwehwɛ mu wɔ w’adwene mu; afei ɛsɛ sɛ wobisa me sɛ ɛyɛ ne kwan so, na sɛ ɛyɛ ne kwan so a mɛma wo koko ayɛ hye wɔ wo mu; ɛno nti, wobɛnya atenka sɛ ɛyɛ ne kwan so.
Na sɛ ɛnyɛ ne kwan so a worenya saa atenka no, mmom w’adwene mu bɛyɛ wo nnaa na ɛbɛma wo werɛ afiri deɛ ɛyɛ mfomsoɔ no; ɛno nti, wontumi ntwerɛ deɛ ɛyɛ kronkron gye sɛ wɔde ama wo firi me hɔ.
Afei, sɛ na wonim yei a anka wotumi kyerɛɛ aseɛ; nanso, enhia mma wosɛ wokyerɛ aseɛ seesei.
Hwɛ, na ɛho hia berɛ a wohyɛɛ aseɛ no; nanso wosuroeɛ, na berɛ no atwa mu, nti ɛho nhia seesei;
Na, wonhunu sɛ mede ahoɔden a ɛhia ama m’akoa Joseph a, ɛnam so ɔde kyerɛ aseɛ anaa? Na mo mu biara nni hɔ a mabu no fɔ.
Yɛ saa adeɛ yi a mahyɛ wo yi, na wobɛdi yie. Yɛ nokorɛfoɔ, na nnyae wo ho mma sɔhwɛ biara.
Gyina pintinn wɔ adwuma a mafrɛ wo wɔ mu no, na wotiri so nwii baako mpo renyera, na wɔbɛma wo so da a ɛtwa toɔ no. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/10.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 10
chapter_summary: 1–26, Satan nunu nnipa tirimuɔdenfoɔ mu ma wɔtia Awurade n’adwuma; 27–33, Ɔhwehwɛ sɛ ɔsɛe nnipa akra; 34–52, Asɛmpa no sɛ sɛ ɛkɔ Lamanfoɔ ne amanamanmufoɔ nyina ara hɔ nam Mormon Nwoma no so; 53–63, Awurade bɛma N’asɛm ne N’Asɔre ase atim wɔ nnipa ntam; 64–70, Ɔbɛboaboa wɔn a wɔasakyera ano agu N’Asɔre mu na ɔbɛgye setiefoɔ.

verses.text: Afei, hwɛ, mese wo, sɛ esiane sɛ woyii saa atwerɛeɛ no a, wɔmaa wo tumi sɛ fa Urim ne Tumim no so kyerɛ aseɛ, too onipa tirimuɔdenfoɔ nsam no, woayera no.
Na woyeraa w’akyɛdeɛ nso berɛ korɔ no ara mu, na w’adwene mu bɛyɛɛ kusuu.
Nanso, seesei wɔasan de ama wo bio; ɛno nti hwɛ na di nokorɛ na toa so kɔwie nkyerɛaseɛ adwuma no nkaeɛ no sɛdeɛ woahyɛ aseɛ no.
Nyɛ adwuma pii anaa ntu mmirika kɛse nkyɛn sɛnea wo wɔ ahoɔden ne kwan a wɔahyehyɛ sɛ ɛmmoa wo ma wonkyerɛ aseɛ; mmom yɛ nsiyɛ kɔsi awieɛ.
Bɔ mpaeɛ berɛbiara, sɛnea wobɛtumi apue nkonimdie mu; aane na woadi nkonim wɔ Satan so, na woafiri ɔbonsam nkoa a wɔtae n’adwuma akyi no nsam.
Hwɛ, wɔahwehwɛ sɛ wɔbɛsɛe wo; aane, mpo nipa a wode wowerɛ ahyɛ ne mu no ahwehwɛ sɛ ɔbɛsɛe wo.
Na yei nti na mekaa sɛ ɔyɛ nipa tirimuɔdenfoɔ, ɛnam sɛ nneɛma a wɔde ahyɛ wonsa no wahwehwɛ sɛ ɔbɛfa akɔ, na wahwehwɛ nso sɛ ɔbɛsɛe w’akyɛdeɛ no.
Na ɛnam sɛ woayi atwerɛeɛ yi ato ne nsam nti no, hwɛ, nnipa atirimuɔdenfoɔ agye afiri wo hɔ.
Ɛno nti, woayi yeinom ama, aane, deɛ na ɛyɛ kronkron, ama atirimuɔdensɛm.
Na, hwɛ, Satan de ato wɔn akoma mu sɛ wɔnsakyera nsɛm a woayɛ ama wɔatwerɛ, anaa deɛ woakyerɛ aseɛ no a afiri wonsam kɔ no.
Na hwɛ, mese wo, sɛ ɛnam sɛ wɔasakyera nsɛm no nti, deɛ woakyerɛ aseɛ ama wɔatwerɛ no ne n’akenkan bɔ abira.
Na, wɔ kwan yei so, ɔbonsam ahwehwɛ sɛ ɔsum aniteɛ fidie, sɛdeɛ ɔbɛtumi asɛe saa adwuma yi;
Ɛfiri sɛ ɔde ahyɛ wɔn akoma mu sɛ wɔnyɛ yei, na ɛnam atorɔdie so wɔbɛtumi aka sɛ wɔakye wo wɔ nsɛm a woapatu sɛ woakyerɛ aseɛ no.
Nokorɛ, mese wo, sɛ meremma kwan sɛ Satan bɛwie ne tirimpɔ bɔne no yɛ wɔ saa adeɛ yi mu.
Ne saa nti hwɛ, ɔde ato wɔn akoma mu sɛ wɔbɛnya wo ma woasɔ w’Awurade wo Nyankopɔn ahwɛ, wɔ sɛ worebisa akyerɛ aseɛ bio.
Na afei, hwɛ, wɔka san dwene wɔn akoma mu sɛ—Yɛbɛhwɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn na ama no tumi sɛ ɔnkyerɛ aseɛ anaa; sɛ ɛte saa a, ɔbɛsan ama no tumi bio;
Na sɛ Onyankopɔn ma no tumi bio, anaa sɛ ɔkyerɛ aseɛ bio, anaa nsɛm foforɔ mu, sɛ ɔde nsɛm korɔ no ara firi adi ba a, hwɛ, yɛwɔ adekorɔ wɔ yɛn nkyɛn na yɛasakyera nsɛm no;
Ɛno nti ɛnnyɛ baako, na yɛbɛka sɛ wadi atorɔ wɔ nensɛm mu, ɛno nti ɔnni akyɛdeɛ biara, na saa na ɔnni tumi biara;
Ɛno nti yɛbɛsɛe no, ne adwuma no nso; na yɛbɛyɛ yei sɛdeɛ awieɛ no yɛn anim ntumi ngu ase, sɛdeɛ yɛbɛnya wiase animuonyam.
Nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese wo, sɛ Satan kuta wɔn akoma mu denden pa ara; na ɔnunu wɔn ma wɔyɛ amumuyɛ tia nea ɛyɛ papa;
Na wɔn akoma yɛ porɔeɛ, na atirimuɔdensɛm ne akyiwadeɛ ahyɛ mu ma; na wɔdɔ sum mmom sene hann, ɛfiri sɛ wɔn nnwuma yɛ bɔne; ɛno nti wɔremmisa wɔ me hɔ.
Ɔbonsam nunu wɔn mu, ama wadi wɔn kraa kan de wɔn akɔ sɛeɛ mu.
Ne saa nti wasum aniteɛ fidie, adwene sɛ ɔbɛsɛe Onyankopɔn adwuma; nanso mɛhwehwɛ yei afiri wɔn nsam, na ɛbɛdane wɔn animguaseɛ ne fɔbuo wɔ atɛmmuo da no.
Aane, ɔnunu wɔn akoma mu sɛ wɔbɛnya abufuo atia saa adwuma yi.

Aane, ɔse wɔn sɛ: Monnaadaa na monna hɔ ntwɛn na moakyere, ama moasɛe; hwɛ, yei nyɛ bɔne. Na saa na ɔdɛfɛdɛfɛ wɔn, kakyerɛ wɔn sɛ yei nyɛ bɔne sɛ wɔbɛdi atorɔ ama wɔakyere onipa wɔ n’atorɔ mu, sɛdeɛ wɔbɛtumi asɛe no.
Na saa na ɔdɛfɛdɛfɛ wɔn, na ɔdi wɔn kan kɔ kɔsi sɛ ɔtwe wɔn kraa kɔ asamando; na saa na ɔyɛ sɛ wɔbɛkyere wɔn ho wɔn ho wɔ wɔn ankasa fidie mu.
Na saa na ɔkɔ soro ba fam, di akɔneaba wɔ asase so, rehwehwɛ sɛ ɔsɛe nnipa akra.
Nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese wo, mmusuo nka deɛ ɔdi atorɔ de daadaa esiane sɛ ɔdwene sɛ ɔfoforɔ nso di atorɔ de daadaa, ɛfiri sɛ saa nnipa no remfiri Onyankopɔn atɛntenenee mu.
Afei, hwɛ, wɔasakyera saa nsɛm yi, ɛfiri sɛ Satan se wɔn sɛ: Wadaadaa mo―na saa na ɔdɛfɛdɛfɛ wɔn ma wɔkɔyɛ amumuyɛ, sɛ wɔbɛnya wo ma woasɔ Awurade wo Nyankopɔn ahwɛ.
Hwɛ, mese wo, sɛ worenkyerɛ saa nsɛm yi a afiri wonsamu kɔ no ase bio.

Saanti, hwɛ, wɔrentumi nyɛ nsusuiɛ bɔne a wɔde bɛdi atorɔ atia saa nsɛm no. Saa nti, hwɛ, sɛ wode nsɛm korɔ no ara sane ba a, wɔbɛka sɛ woadi atorɔ na wopatuu sɛ worekyerɛ aseɛ, nanso woakasa atia woara wo ho.
Afei, hwɛ, wɔbɛbɔ yei ho dawuro, na Satan bɛma nkurofoɔ no akoma ayɛ den na wanunu wɔn ma wɔanya abufuo atia wo, sɛdeɛ wɔrennye mensɛm nni.
Saa nti, Satan dwene sɛ ɔbɛdi w’adansedie so nkonim wɔ saa awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi mu, ama adwuma no anntumi amma wɔ saa awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi mu.
Nanso hwɛ, nyansa nie, na esiane sɛ merekyerɛ wo nyansa nti, mema wo mmaransɛm ɛfa saa nneɛma yi ho, deɛ wobɛyɛ nie, mfa nkyerɛ wiase kɔsi sɛ wobɛyɛ nkyerɛaseɛ adwuma no awie.
Mma woho nwiri wo sɛ mesee wo sɛ : Nyansa nie, mfa nkyerɛ wiase—ɛfiri sɛ mese, mfa nkyerɛ wiase, na woanya banbɔ.
Hwɛ, menka sɛ mfa nkyerɛ ateneneefoɔ;

Na esiane sɛ wontumi nhunu teneneeni berɛbiara, anaa wontumi nkyerɛ tirimuɔdenni mfiri teneneeni mu nti, afei mese wo sɛ, nya aboterɛ kɔsi sɛ mɛhunu sɛ ɛfata sɛ mɛda nneɛma nyina ara adi akyerɛ wiase ɛfa saa nsɛm yi ho.
Na afei, nokorɛ mese wo, sɛ saa nneɛma no a woatwerɛ no ho amaneɛbɔ, deɛ afiri wonsa mu kɔ no, wɔakurukyire wɔ Nifae mprɛte no so.
Aane, na wokae sɛ wɔkaa wɔ saa ntwerɛeɛ no mu sɛ, wɔmaa amaneɛbɔ a ɛhia pa ara fa saa nneɛma yi ho wɔ Nifae mprɛte no so.
Na afei, esiane sɛ amaneɛbɔ a w’akurukyire wɔ Nifae mprɛte no so ho hia pa ara nkankaɛfa nneɛma a, me nyansa mu, mede bɛba nkurofoɔ no nimdeɛ mu wɔ saa amaneɛbɔ yi mu no―
Ɛno nti, wobɛkyerɛ nkurukyire a ɛwɔ Nifae mprɛte no so ase, ɛkɔ ara mpo kɔpem Ɔhene Benyamin ahennie so, anaa kɔpem baabi a woakyerɛ aseɛ aduru, a ɛwɔ wo hɔ no so;
Na hwɛ, wobɛtintim no sɛ Nifae twerɛtohɔsɛm; na hwɛ mɛma wɔn a wɔasakyera me nsɛm no anim agu ase.
Memma ho kwan sɛ wɔbɛsɛe m’adwuma; aane, mɛkyerɛ wɔn sɛ me nyansa yɛ kɛseɛ sene ɔbonsam aniteɛ no.
Hwɛ, wɔanya ɛfã bi pɛ, anaa Nifae amaneɛbɔ no tiatwa.

Hwɛ, nneɛma bebree na w’akurukyire wɔ Nifae mprɛte no so a ɛde nteaseɛ kɛseɛ ba m’asɛmpa no mu; ɛno nti, ɛyɛ nyansa wɔ me mu sɛ wobɛkyerɛ Nifae nkurukyire no fã a ɛdi kan no ase, na woasoma akɔ wɔ saa adwuma yi mu.
Na, hwɛ, saa adwuma yi nkaeɛ nyina ara kura me nsɛmpa no fa biara a me nkɔmhyɛfoɔ kronkron, aane, ne m’asuafoɔ no nso, pɛɛe wɔ wɔn mpaebɔ mu sɛ ɛbɛfiri akɔ saa nkurofoɔ yi hɔ.
Na mesee wɔn sɛ, wɔde bɛma wɔn sɛdeɛ wɔn gyedie teɛ wɔ wɔn mpaebɔ mu;
Aane, na yei ne wɔn gyedie―sɛ m’asɛmpa no, deɛ mede maa wɔn sɛ wɔnka ho asɛm wɔ wɔn nna mu no, bɛtumi aba wɔnnuanom Lamanfoɔ, ne wɔn nyina ara nso a wɔabɛyɛ Lamanfoɔ ɛnam wɔn akasakasa so no hɔ.
Afei, ɛnyɛ ne nyina ara ni―wɔn gyedie wɔ wɔn mpaebɔ mu ne sɛwɔbɛhunu saa asɛmpa yi nso, mpo sɛ ɛbɛtumi a, amanaman foforɔ abɛnya saa asase yi;
Na saa na wɔgyaa nhyira guu saa asase yi so wɔ wɔn mpaebɔ mu, na obibiara a ɔbɛgye saa asɛmpa yi wɔ saa asase yi so no anya nkwa a ɛnniawieɛ;
Aane, na ayɛ ahofadie ama obibiaraa ɔfiri ɔman, abusuakuo, kasahoroɔ anaa nnipa biara a wɔyɛ mu.
Na afei, hwɛ, esiane wɔn gyedie wɔ wɔn mpaebɔ mu nti, mɛma saa m’asɛmpa fã yi ho nimdeɛ aba menkurofoɔ hɔ. Hwɛ, memfa mma sɛ ɛbɛsɛe deɛ wɔanya no, mmom ɛbɛto so.
Na yei ho nti na mekaa sɛ: Sɛ awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi anyɛ wɔn akoma den a, mɛte m’asɔre ama aseɛ atim wɔ wɔn ntam.
Afei menka yei mfa nsɛe m’asɔre, mmom meka yei de asi m’asɔre;
Ɛno nti, obibiara a ɔwɔ m’asɔre mu no nni sɛ ɔsuro, ɛfiri sɛ wɔn na wɔbɛnya ɔsoro aheman no adi.

Nanso, ɛyɛ wɔn a wɔnsuro me, anaasɛ wɔnni me mmaransɛm so na wɔsi nsɔre ma wɔn ho nya mfasoɔ, aane, ne wɔn a wɔyɛ atirimuɔdensɛm nyina ara na wɔsi ɔbonsam aheman no―aane, nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese wo, sɛ ɛyɛ wɔn na mɛha wɔn, ama wɔn ho apopo na awoso akɔsi wɔn mu.
Hwɛ, me ne Yesu Kristo, Onyankopɔn Babarima no. Mebaa me deɛ mu, na medeɛ anye me.
Me ne hann a ɛhyerɛn wɔ sum mu, na ɛsum no ante aseɛ no.
Me ne deɛ ɔkaa sɛ―Mewɔ nnwan foforɔa wɔnni kuo yi mu―de kyerɛɛ m’asuafoɔ no, na dodoɔ no ara na wɔwɔ hɔ a wɔante me aseɛ.
Na mɛkyerɛ saa nkorɔfoɔ yi sɛ mewɔ nwan binom nso, na na wɔyɛ nkorabata wɔ Yakob fie;
Na mede wɔn anwanwa nnwumaa wɔyɛɛ wɔ me din mu no, bɛba hann mu;

Aane, na mɛsan nso de m’asɛmpa no a wɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn no aba hann mu, na, hwɛ, wɔrennsan mfiri deɛ woanya no ho, mmom wɔbɛmaso asi hɔ, na ɛde nteaseɛ a ɛwɔ me nokorɛ nkyerɛnkyerɛ mu no bɛba hann mu, aane, ne nkyerɛkyerɛ baakopɛ a ɛwɔ me mu no.

Na yei na mɛyɛ de ada m’asɛmpa no adi, na basabasayɛ pii amma; aane Satan nunu nkorɔfoɔ no akoma mu sɛ wɔnyɛ basabasa mfa nteaseɛ a ɛwɔ menkyerɛkyerɛ mu no ho; na wɔ saa nneɛma yi mu no wɔfom, ɛnam sɛ wɔhwinhwan twerɛsɛm no na wɔnte aseɛ.
Ɛno nti, mɛbue saa ahintasɛm kɛseɛ yi so akyerɛ wɔn;
Saa nti, hwɛ, sɛ wɔrenyɛ wɔn akoma den a, mɛboaboa wɔn ano sɛdeɛ akokɔbaatan boa ne mma ano wɔ n’ataban ase;
Aane, sɛ wɔbɛba a, wɔmra, na wɔn mmɛnom nkwansuo no kwa.
Hwɛ, yei ne menkyerɛkyerɛ—obibiara a ɔsakyera n’adwenena ɔba me hɔ no, ɔno ara yɛ m’asɔreba.
Obibiara a ɔka boro so anaa ɔyi bi firi mu no, ɔno ara nka me ho, mmom ɔsɔretia me; ɛno nti ɔnnka m’asɔre ho.
Na afei, hwɛ, obibiara a ɔka m’asɔre ho, na ɔgyina m’asɔre mu kɔsi awieɛ no, ɔno ara na mɛto n’ase ma watim wɔ me botan so, na asamando apono remmu mfa so.
Na afei, kae ɔno a ɔyɛ wiase nkwa ne ne hann no nsɛm no, wo Gyefoɔ, wo Awurade ne wo Nyankopɔn. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/11.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 11
chapter_summary: 1–6, Adwumayɛfoɔ a wɔwɔ bobeturo no mu bɛnya nkwagyeɛ; 7–14, Hwehwɛ nyansa, Ka nsakyeraeɛ kyerɛ, nya awerɛhyɛmu wɔ Honhom no mu; 15–22, Di mmaransɛm no so, na hwehwɛ Awurade asɛm no mu; 23–27, Mpa adiyisɛm ne nkɔmhyɛ honhom no ho akyi; 28–30, Wɔn a wɔgye Kristo no bɛyɛ Onyankopɔn mma.

verses.text: Anwanwa dwuma a ɛyɛ kɛseɛ rebɛfiri aba nnipa mma ntam.
Hwɛ, me ne Onyankopɔn; tie m’asɛm, ɛno a ɛyɛ nam na ahoɔden wɔ mu, na ano namnam sene afena anofanu, a ɛrepaepae akwaa ne hon mu; ɛno nti tie m’asɛm.

Hwɛ, afuo no ahoa dada sɛ wɔtwa; ɛno nti, oniibiara a ɔwɔ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔbu no, ma no mfa ne kantankrankyi ne ahoɔden nsi mu, na ɔmmu wɔ berɛ a ɛda no wɔ hɔ yi, sɛnea ɔbɛkora daapem nkwagyeɛ ama ne kra wɔ Onyankopɔn aheman no mu.
Aane, oniibiara a ɔde ne kantankrankyi bɛsi mu na wabu no, ɔno ara na Onyankopɔn afrɛ no.
Ɛno nti, sɛ wobɛbisa me a, wobɛnya; sɛ wobɛbɔ mu a, wɔbɛbue ama wo.
Afei, sɛ woabisa yi, hwɛ, mese wo sɛ, di me mmaransɛm so, na hwehwɛ sɛwode Sion nkyekyereɛ ne ne yiedie bɛfiri adi aba.
Nhwehwɛ ahonyadeɛ mmom nyansa; afei, hwɛ, wɔbɛda Onyankopɔn ahintasɛm adi akyerɛ wo, na ɛno na wɔbɛyɛ wo ɔdefoɔ. Hwɛ, deɛ ɔwɔ nkwa a ɛnniawieɛ yɛ ɔdefoɔ.
Nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese wo, mpo sɛ wopɛɛe wɔ me hɔ no saa ara na ɛbɛyɛ ama wo; na, sɛ wopɛ a, papayɛ bebree bɛfa wo so aba wɔ saa awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi mu.
Nka biribiara sɛ nsakyeraeɛ kyerɛ saa awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi. Di me mmaransɛm so, na boa sɛ wobɛma m’adwuma ada adi, sɛnea me mmaransɛm teɛ, na wɔbɛhyira wo.
Hwɛ, wo wɔ akyɛdeɛ, anaasɛ wobɛnya akyɛdeɛ sɛ wode gyedie ne nokorɛ akoma hwehwɛ firi me hɔ, na wogye Yesu Kristo tumi no di, anaa me tumi a ɛrekasa kyerɛ wo yi di a;
Na, hwɛ, ɛyɛ me na merekasa; hwɛ, me ne hann a ɛhyerɛn wɔ sum mu, na ɛnam me tumi so na mede saa nsɛm yi ma wo.
Na afei, nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese wo sɛ, fa wo werɛ hyɛ Honhom no a ɔkyerɛ kwan ma wɔyɛ papa no mu—aane, ma wɔyɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ, nante ahobrɛaseɛ mu, bu atɛntenenee; na yei ne me Honhom.
Nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese wo, mede me Honhom no bi bɛma wo, deɛ ɔbɛbue w’adwene mu, na ɔde anigyeɛ bɛhyɛ wo kra ma;
Na afei wobɛhunu, anaa sɛ ɛnam yei so wobɛhunu adeɛ biara a wopɛ wɔ me hɔ, a ɛyɛ nneɛma a ɛfa tenenee ho no, wɔ gyedie mu, gye me di sɛ wobɛnya.
Hwɛ, mehyɛ wo sɛ mma nsusu sɛ wɔafrɛ wo sɛ ka asɛmpa no kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛfrɛ wo.
Twɛn kakra, kɔsi sɛ wobɛnya m’asɛm, me botan, m’asɔre, ne m’asɛmpa no, ama woatumi ahunu me nkyerɛkyerɛ no pefee.
Na afei, hwɛ, sɛnea wo pɛ kyerɛ, aane, mpo sɛnea wo gyedie kyerɛ na ɛbɛyɛ ama wo.
Di me mmaransɛm so; yɛ dinn; na srɛ mmoa firi me Honhom no hɔ;
Aane, fa w’akoma nyina ara fam me ho, sɛdeɛ wobɛboa ma aba hann mu saa nneɛma a maka ho asɛm no― aane, me nkyerɛaseɛ adwuma no; nya aboterɛ kɔsi sɛ wobɛwie yei.
Hwɛ, yei ne w’adwuma, sɛ wobɛdi me mmaransɛm so, aane, wode wo tumi, w’adwene ne w’ahoɔden nyina ara.

Nhwehwɛ sɛ wode m’asɛm bɛto dwa, mmom di kan hwehwɛ sɛ wobɛnya m’asɛm, na ɛno na wo tɛkyerɛma bɛsane; afei, sɛ wo pɛ a, wobɛnya me Honhom ne m’asɛm, aane, Onyankopɔn tumi a wɔdekasa ma nnipa gye die no.

Nanso seesei yɛ dinn; sua m’asɛm a afiri kɔ nnipa mma ntam no, na sua m’asɛm a ɛbɛfiri aba nnipa mma ntam nso, anaa nea wɔgu so rekyerɛ aseɛ no, aane, kɔsi sɛ wobɛnya deɛ mede bɛma nnipa mma wɔ saa awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi mu nyina ara, na afei wɔde nneɛma nyina ara nso bɛka ho.
Hwɛ, wo ne Hyrum, me babarima; hwehwɛ Onyankopɔn aheman no, na wɔde nneɛma biara a ɛsɛ-fata bɛka wo ho.
To wɔ me botan no so, deɛ ɛyɛ m’asɛmpa no;
Mpo yikyerɛ honhom no, anaasɛ nkɔmhyɛ honhom no, na mmusuo nka deɛ ɔpo saa nneɛma yi;
Ɛno nti, kora wɔ w’akoma mu kɔsi berɛ a menam me nyansa mu bɛma woafiri akɔ.
Hwɛ, mekasa kyerɛ obiara a ɔwɔ ɔpɛ pa, na ɔde ne kantankrankyi asi mu sɛ ɔrebu.
Hwɛ, me ne Yesu Kristo, Onyankopɔn Ba no. Me ne wiase nkwa ne ne hann.
Me ne ɔno a ɔbaa n’ankasa deɛ mu na n’ankasa deɛ annye no;
Nanso nokorɛ, nokorɛ, me se wo, sɛ dodoɔ biara a wɔgye me no, mɛma wɔn tumi ma wɔabɛyɛ Onyankopɔn mma, mpo wɔn a wɔgye me din die no. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/12.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 12
chapter_summary: 1–6, Adwumayɛfoɔ a wɔwɔ bobeturo no mu bɛnya nkwagyeɛ; 7–9, Wɔn a wɔpɛ nyina ara na wɔfata bɛboa wɔ Awurade adwuma no mu.

verses.text: Anwanwa dwuma a ɛyɛ kɛseɛ rebɛfiri aba nnipa mma ntam.
Hwɛ, mene Onyankopɔn; tie m’asɛm, ɛno a ɛyɛ ntɛm na ahoɔden kɛseɛ wɔ mu, na ano yɛ namnam sene afenaa anofanu, a ɛrepaepae akwaa ne hon mu; ɛno nti, tie m’asɛm.

Hwɛ, afuo no ahoa dada sɛ wɔtwa; ɛno nti, oniibiara a ɔwɔ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔbu no ma ɔmfa ne kantankrankyi ne ahoɔden nsi mu, na ɔmmu wɔ berɛ a ɛda no wɔ hɔ yi, na wakora daapem nkwagyeɛ ama ne kra wɔ Onyankopɔn aheman no mu.
Aane, oniibiara a ɔde ne kantankrankyi bɛsi mu na wabu no, ɔno ara na Onyankopɔn afrɛ no.
Ɛno nti, sɛ wobɛbisa me a wobɛnya; sɛ wobɛbɔ mu a wɔbɛbue ama wo.
Afei, sɛ woabisa yi, hwɛ, mese wo sɛ, di me mmaransɛm so, na hwehwɛ sɛ wode Sion nkyekyereɛ ne ne yiedie bɛfiri adi aba.
Hwɛ, mekasakyerɛ wo, ne wɔn nyina ara a wɔwɔ ɔpɛ nso sɛ wɔde saa adwuma yi bɛpue adi na aseɛ atim;
Na obiara ntumi mmoa wɔ saa adwuma yi mu gyesɛ ɔbrɛ ne ho ase na ɔdɔ hyɛ no ma, ɔnya gyedie, anidasoɔ, ne ɔdɔ mapa, ɔkyerɛ anidahɔ ade nyina ara mu, ma biribiara a wɔde bɛhyɛ ne nsa sɛ ɔnhwɛ so.
Hwɛ, me a meka saa nsɛm yi no, mene wiase hann ne ne nkwa, ɛno nti fa w’ahoɔden tie, na ɛno na afei wɔbɛfrɛ wo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/13.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 13
chapter_summary: Ɔde Aaron Asɔfodie nsafoa ne ne tumi no to dwa.

verses.text: M’ayɔnkofoɔ asomfoɔ, wɔ Mesaia no din mu mema mo Aaron Asɔfodie no, deɛ ɛkura abɔfoɔ som nsafoa ne deɛ ɛyɛ nsakyeraeɛ asɛmpa no, a ɛyɛ nsuomuhyɛ asubɔ a ɛma bɔne fafiri no; na wɔrenyi yei mmfiri asase so bio da, kɔsi sɛ Lewi mmammarima bɛbɔ afɔreɛ bio ama Awurade wɔ tenenee mu.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/14.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 14
chapter_summary: 1–6, Adwumayɛfoɔ a wɔwɔ bobeturo no mu bɛnya nkwagyeɛ; 7–8, Nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ na ɛyɛ kɛseɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn akyɛdeɛ mu; 9–11, Kristo na ɔbɔɔ ɔsorosoro ne asase.

verses.text: Anwanwa dwuma a ɛyɛ kɛseɛ rebɛfiri aba nnipa mma mu.
Hwɛ, mene Onyankopɔn; tie m’asɛm, a ɛyɛ ntɛm na ahoɔden wɔ mu, na ano yɛ nam sene afenaa anofanu, a ɛrepaepae akwaa ne hon mu; ɛno nti tie m’asɛm.

Hwɛ, afuo no ahoa dada sɛ wɔtwa; ɛno nti, oniibiara a ɔwɔ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔbu no, ma ɔmfa ne kantankrankyi ne ahoɔden nsi mu, na ɔmmu wɔ berɛ a ɛda no wɔ hɔ yi, na wɔakora daapem nkwagyeɛ ama ne kra wɔ Onyankopɔn aheman mu.
Aane, oniibiara a ɔde ne kantankrankyi bɛsi mu na wabu no, ɔno ara na Onyankopɔn afrɛ no.
Ɛno nti, sɛ wobɛbisa me a wobɛnya; sɛ wobɛbɔ mu a, wɔbɛbue ama wo.
Hwehwɛ sɛ wobɛkyekyere me Sion na afiri aba. Di me mmaransɛm so wɔ ade nyina ara mu.
Afei, sɛ wodi me mmaransɛm so na wogyina mu kɔsi awieɛ a wobɛnya nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ, akyɛdeɛ a ɛyɛ kɛseɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn akyɛdeɛ nyina ara mu.

Na ɛbɛba sɛ, sɛ wobɛbisa Agya no wɔ me din mu, ne gyedie mu na wogyedi a, wobɛnya Sunsum Kronkron no, a ɔma deɛ wɔnka no, ama woatumi agyina sɛ ɔdanseni ama nneɛma a wobɛhunu na wobɛte, na woaka nsakyeraeɛ akyerɛ saa awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi nso.
Hwɛ, mene Yesu Kristo, Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ no Babarima no, deɛ ɔbɔɔ ɔsorosoro ne asase, hann a ɛntumi nsie wɔ sum mu;
Ɛno nti, ɛsɛ sɛ mede m’asɛmpa no mãhyɛ no firi amanamanmufoɔ hɔ ba Israelfie mu.
Afei hwɛ, wone David, na mafrɛ wo sɛ boa; adeɛ a sɛ woyɛ a, na wodi nokorɛ a, wɔbɛhyira wo honhom mu ne honam mu, na w’akatua bɛyɛ kɛseɛ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/15.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 15
chapter_summary: 1–2, Awurade basa no kata asase nyina ara so; 3–6, Deɛ ɛho hia kɛse yɛ sɛ wɔka asɛmpa no gye akra.

verses.text: Tie, m’akoa John, na tie Yesu Kristo nsɛm no, wo Awurade ne wo Gyefoɔ.
Na hwɛ, mede namyɛ ne tumi na ɛkasa kyerɛ wo, ɛnam sɛ me basa kata asase so nyina ara.
Na mɛka deɛ onipa biara nnim akyerɛ wo gye sɛ me ne wo nko ara-
Na mmerɛ pii na woapɛ wɔ me hɔ sɛ wohunu deɛ ɛbɛsom bo kɛse ama wo.
Hwɛ, nhyira nka wo wɔ saa adeɛ yi ho, sɛ woreka me nsɛm a mede ama wo wɔ sɛdeɛ me mmaransɛm teɛ.
Na afei, hwɛ, mese wo, sɛ adeɛ a ɛbɛsom bo kɛse ama wo ne sɛ wobɛka nsakyeraeɛ asɛm akyerɛ saa nkurofoɔ yi, na wode akra abrɛ me, ama wo ne wɔn agye ahome wɔ m’Agya aheman no mu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/16.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 16
chapter_summary: 1–2, Awurade basa no kata asase nyina ara so; 3–6, Deɛ ɛho hia kɛse ne sɛ wɔka asɛmpa no gye akra.

verses.text: Tie, m’akoa Peter, na tie Yesu Kristo nsɛm no, wo Awurade ne wo Gyefoɔ.
Na hwɛ, mede namyɛ ne tumi na ɛkasa kyerɛ wo, ɛnam sɛ me basa kata asase nyina ara so.
Na mɛka deɛ onipa biara nnim akyerɛ wo gye sɛ me ne wo nko ara-
Na mmerɛ pii na woapɛ wɔ me hɔ sɛ wohunu deɛ ɛbɛsom bo kɛse ama wo.
Hwɛ, nhyira nka wo wɔ saa adeɛ yi ho, sɛ woreka me nsɛm a mede ama wo wɔ sɛdeɛ me mmaransɛm teɛ.
Na afei, hwɛ, mese wo, sɛ adeɛ a ɛbɛsom bo kɛse ama wo ne sɛ wobɛka nsakyeraeɛ asɛm akyerɛ saa nkurofoɔ yi, na wode akra abrɛ me, na wo ne wɔn agye ahome wɔ m’Agya aheman no mu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/17.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 17
chapter_summary: 1–4, Adansefoɔ mmiɛnsa no nam gyedie so bɛhunu mprɛte no ne nneɛma kronkron binom nso; 5–9, Kristo di adanseɛ sɛ Mormon Nwoma no yɛ anyankonneɛ.

verses.text: Hwɛ, mese mo sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ mode mo ho to m’asɛm so, na sɛ mode moakoma nyina ara yɛ yei a, mobɛnya mprɛte no ahwɛ, ne nkataboɔ no nso, Laban akofena no, Urim ne Tumim no, a wɔde maa Jared nuabarima wɔ bepɔ no so, berɛ a ɔne Awurade kasaae anim ne anim no, ne akyerɛkyerɛkwan nwanwasoɔ a wɔde maa Lehae berɛ a na wɔwɔ ɛserɛ no so, wɔ Po Kɔkɔɔ ahyeɛ so no.
Na ɛnam mo gyedie so na mobɛnya yeinom ahwɛ, mpo gyedie te sɛ deɛ tete nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no nyaae no.
Na moanya gyedie akyire yi no, na mode moani ahunu yeinom no, monam Onyankopɔn tumi so, bɛdi ho adanseɛ;
Na mobɛyɛ yei ama wɔansɛe m’akoa Joseph Smith, Jun., na mede me tenenee botae aba ama nnipa mma wɔ saa adwuma yi mu.
Na mobɛdi adanseɛ sɛ moahunu nneɛma yi, mpo sɛdeɛ m’akoa Joseph Smith Jun., ahunu no; na ɛnam me tumi so na ɔhunuuiɛ, ɛfiri sɛ na ɔwɔ gyedie.
Na wakyerɛ nwoma no ase, mpo ɛfã no a mahyɛ no no, na sɛdeɛ mo Awurade mo Nyankopɔn te ase yi ɛyɛ nokorɛ.
Ɛno nti, moanya tumi korɔ no ara, ne gyedie korɔ no ara, ne akyɛdeɛ korɔ no ara te sɛdeɛ ɔwɔ no.
Na sɛ modi saa me mmaransɛm a ɛtwa toɔ yinom so, deɛ mede ama mo yi a, asamando apono kɛseɛ rennya tumi wɔ mo so; ɛfiri sɛ m’adom dɔɔso ma mo, na wɔbɛma mo so da a ɛtwa toɔ no.
Na me, Yesu Kristo, mo Awurade ne mo Nyankopɔn, aka akyerɛ mo, na mede me tenenee botae aba nnipa mma hɔ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/18.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 18
chapter_summary: 1–5, Twerɛsɛm no kyerɛ sɛdeɛ wɔbɛkyekyere Asɔre no; 6–8, Ewiase renyini wɔ amumuyɛ mu; 9–16, Akra somboɔ kɛseɛ; 17–25, Ɛsɛ sɛ nnipa fa Kristo din to wɔn ho so na wɔanya nkwagyeɛ; 26–36, Wɔyi Dumienu awɔbɛfrɛ wɔn ne wɔn asɛmpatrɛ kyerɛ; 37–39, Ɛwɔ sɛ Oliver Cowdery ne David Whitmer hwehwɛ Dumienu no; 40–47, Ɛsɛ sɛ nnipa sakyera, bɔ asu, di mmaransɛm no so na wɔanya nkwagyeɛ.

verses.text: Afei, hwɛ, ɛsiane adeɛ a wo, m’akoa Oliver Cowdery, apɛ sɛ wohunu firi me hɔ nti no, mede saa nsɛm yi ma wo:
Hwɛ, me nam me honhom so mpɛn bebree, ada no adi akyerɛ wo, sɛ nneɛma a woatwerɛ no yɛ nokorɛ; ɛno nti wonim sɛ yeinom yɛ nokorɛ.
Na sɛ wonim sɛ yeinom yɛ nokorɛ a, hwɛ, mema wo mmarasɛm, sɛ fa wo ho to nneɛma a wɔatwerɛ no so;
Ɛfiri sɛ ɛmu na wɔatwerɛ biribiara a ɛfa m’asɔre no fapem ho, m’asɛmpa, ne me botan no.
Ɛno nti, sɛ wobɛsi m’asɔre wɔ m’asɛmpa no fapem ne me botan so a, asamando apono kɛseɛ renya tumi wɔ wo so.
Hwɛ, wiase renyini wɔ amumuyɛ mu; na ɛho hia sɛ wɔnunu nnipa mma mu ma wɔsakyera, amanamanmufoɔ ne Israel fiefoɔ nyina ara nso.
Ɛno nti, sɛ wɔabɔ asu wɔ m’akoa Joseph Smith Jun., nsa ase yi, wɔ sɛdeɛ mahyɛ no no, wahyɛ deɛ mehyɛɛ no no mã.

Na afei, mma no nyɛ wo nwanwa sɛ mafrɛ no ama me ankasa me botae, botae a me na menim wɔ me mu; ɛno nti, sɛ ɔde nsiyɛ bɛdi me mmaransɛm so a wɔbɛhyira no akɔ nkwa a enni awieɛ mu; na ne din de Joseph.

Na afei, Oliver Cowdery, mekasa kyerɛ wo, ne David Whitmer nso, wɔ mmaransɛm kwan so; afei, hwɛ, mehyɛ nnipa nyina ara a wɔwɔ baabiara sɛ wɔnsakyera, na mekasa kyerɛ mo, te sɛ deɛ mekasa kyerɛɛ Paulo me somafoɔ no, na mafrɛ mo mpo saa ɔfrɛ no ara a mede frɛɛ no no.
Kae sɛ akra somboɔ wɔ Onyankopɔn anim;
Afei, hwɛ, Awurade wo Dimafoɔ wuui wɔ honam mu, ɛno nti ɔfaa nnipa nyina ara wɔn yawdie ama nnipa nyina ara asakyera na wɔaba ne hɔ.
Na wasɔre bio afiri owuo mu, sɛdeɛ ɔde nnipa nyina ara bɛba ne nkyɛn, wɔ nsakyeraeɛ su so.
Na sɛdeɛ n’ani gyeɛ yɛ kɛseɛ wɔ ɔkra a ɔsakyera ho!
Saa nti, wɔafrɛ mo sɛ monka nsakyeraeɛ nkyerɛ saa nkurofoɔ yi.
Na ɛba sɛ moyɛ adwuma mo nkwa nna nyina ara ka nsakyeraeɛ kyerɛ saa nkurofoɔ yi na mode anka ɔkra baako mpo berɛ me a, anigye kɛseɛ bɛn na mo ne no bɛnya wɔ m’Agya aheman mu!
Na afei, sɛ moanigyeɛ bɛyɛ kɛseɛ wɔ ɔkra baako a mode no abrɛ me wɔ m’Agya aheman no mu a, sɛn na moanigyeɛ bɛyɛ kɛseɛ afa, sɛ mode akra bebree brɛ me a!
Hwɛ, moanya m’asɛmpa no da mo anim, ne me botae, ne me nkwagyeɛ.
Mommisa Agya no wɔ me din mu, na gyedie mu monnye nni sɛ mobɛnya, na mobɛnya Sunsum Kronkron no, ɔno a ɔda nneɛma a ɛho hia adi kyerɛ nnipa mma nyina ara no.
Na sɛ monni gyedie, anidasoɔ, ne ɔdɔ mapa a, montumi nnyɛ hwee.
Monnko ntia asɔre biara, gye sɛ deɛ ɛyɛ ɔbonsam asɔre no.
Momfa Kristo din nto mo ho so, na monka nokorɛ wɔ anidahɔ mu.
Na dodoɔ no ara a wɔsakyera na wɔbɔ wɔn asu wɔ me din mu, a ɛne Yesu Kristo, na wɔgyina mu kɔsi awieɛ no, wɔnna wɔbɛgye wɔn nkwa.
Hwɛ, Yesu Kristo ne din a Agya no de ama, na din biara nni hɔ a wɔde ama a ɛnam so nipa bɛnya nkwa;
Saa nti, ɛsɛ sɛ nnipa nyinaa ara fa din a Agya no de ama no to wɔn ho so, ɛfiri sɛ saa din no na wɔde bɛfrɛ wɔn da a ɛtwa toɔ no mu;
Saa nti, sɛ wɔnnim din a wɔde afrɛ wɔn a, wɔnnya tenabea wɔ m’Agya aheman no mu.
Na afei, hwɛ, afoforɔ wɔ hɔ a wɔafrɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnna m’asɛmpa no adi, nkyerɛ amanamanmufoɔ ne Yudafoɔ nso;
Aane, mpo dumienu; na Dumienu no bɛyɛ m’akyidifoɔ, na wɔbɛfa me din ato wɔn ho so; na Dumienu no ne wɔn a wɔbɛpɛ sɛ wɔyi wɔn akoma mu nyina ara fa me din to wɔn ho so.
Na sɛ wɔpɛ sɛ wɔyi wɔn akoma mu nyina ara fa me din to wɔn ho so a, na wɔafrɛ wɔn sɛ wɔn nkɔ wiase nyina ara nkɔka m’asɛmpa nkyerɛ abɔdeɛ biara.
Na wɔn ne wɔn a mahyɛ wɔn asɔfoɔ sɛ wɔmmɔ asu wɔ me din mu, sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ no no;
Na mowɔ deɛ wɔatwerɛ no da moanim; ɛno nti, ɛsɛ sɛ moyɛ no sɛdeɛ nsɛm a wɔatwerɛ no teɛ.
Na afei mekasa kyerɛ mo, Dumienu no―Hwɛ, m’adom dɔɔso ma mo; nti ɛsɛ sɛ monante nokorɛdie mu wɔ m’anim na mma monnyɛ bɔne.

Na, hwɛ, mone wɔn a mahyɛ mo asɔfoɔ sɛ monhyɛ asɔfoɔnom nyi akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ; sɛ wɔnna m’asɛmpa no adi, sɛdeɛ Sunsum Kronkron no tumi a ɛwɔ mo mu no teɛ, ne sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn frɛ a ɔfrɛ ne akyɛdeɛ a ɔde ma nnipa teɛ;
Na me, Yesu Kristo, mo Awurade ne mo Nyankopɔn no, na maka yei.
Saa nsɛm yi mfiri nnipa anaa onipa hɔ; mmom ɛfiri me hɔ; ɛno nti, mobɛdi ho adanseɛ sɛ ɛfiri me na ɛmmfiri onipa hɔ;
Na ɛyɛ me nne na ɛka yeinom kyerɛ mo; na ɛnam me Honhom so na wɔde ama mo, na ɛnam me tumi so mobɛtumi akenkan akyerɛ mo ho mo ho; na sɛ ɛnyɛ me tumi no a anka montumi nya yeinom;
Saa nti, mobɛtumi adi adanseɛ sɛ moate me nne, na monim me nsɛm.
Na afei, hwɛ, mede ma mo, Oliver Cowdery, ne David Whitmer nso, sɛ mobɛhwehwɛ Dumienu no, wɔn a wɔbɛnya ɔpɛ sɛdeɛ maka ho asɛm no;
Na wɔn pɛ ne wɔn nnwuma so na mode bɛhunu wɔn.
Na berɛ a moahunu wɔn no, mode saa nneɛma yi bɛkyerɛ wɔn.
Na mobɛkoto fam na moasom Agya no wɔ me din mu.
Na ɛsɛ sɛ moka asɛm no kyerɛ wiase sɛ: Ɛsɛ sɛ mo sakyera na wɔbɔ mo asu, wɔ Yesu Kristo din mu;
Na ɛsɛ sɛ nnipa nyina ara sakyera na wɔabɔ asu, nyɛ mmarima nko ara, mmom mmaa ne nkwadaa a wɔaduru mfeɛ a wɔtumi bu akontaa so.
Na afei, moanya yei akyire yi no, ɛsɛ sɛ modi me mmaransɛm so wɔ adeɛ nyina ara mu;
Na ɛnam mo nsa so mɛyɛ adwuma a ɛyɛ anwanwa dwuma wɔ nnipa mma ntam, ama dodoɔ no ara ahunu wɔn bɔne, na wɔaba nsakyeraeɛ mu, na wɔaba m’Agya aheman no mu.
Ne saa nti, nhyira a mede ma mo no boro adeɛ nyina ara so.
Na moanya yei nyina ara akyire yi no, sɛ moanni me mmaransɛm so a, morennya nkwagyeɛ wɔ m’Agya aheman no mu.
Hwɛ, Me, Yesu Kristo, mo Awurade ne mo Nyankopɔn, ne mo Gyefoɔ, menam me Honhom no tumi so na maka yei. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/19.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 19
chapter_summary: 1–3, Kristo wɔ tumi nyina ara; 4–5, Ɛsɛ sɛ nnipa nyina ara sakyera anyɛ saa a wɔbɛhunu amane; 6–12, Asotwe a ɛnni awieɛ yɛ Onyankopɔn asotwe; 13–20, Kristo hunuu amane maa obiara, ama sɛ wɔsakyera a, wɔn annhunu amane; 21–28, Ka nsakyeraeɛ asɛmpa no; 29–41, Da anigyesɛm adi.

verses.text: Mene Alpha ne Omega no, Awurade Kristo no; aane, mpo mene ɔno, ahyɛaseɛ ne awieɛ no, wiase Gyefoɔ no.
Me, mayɛ awie na mawie deɛ meyɛ ne dea no pɛ, mpo Agya no, deɛ ɛfa me ho no―mayɛ yei nyina ara ama mabrɛ nneɛma nyina ara ase ama me ho―

Manya tumi nyina ara, mpo deɛ ɛsɛe Satan ne ne nnwuma wɔ wiase awieɛ, ne atemmuo da kɛseɛ a ɛtwa toɔ no, deɛ mede bɛbu asase sotefoɔ no atɛn, na mɛbu onipa biara atɛn sɛdeɛ ne nnwuma teɛ ne nneɛma a wayɛ.
Na nokorɛ mu ɛsɛ sɛ onipa biara sakyera anyɛ saa a ɔbɛhunu amane, na me, Onyankopɔn, menni awieɛ.
Saa nti, mentwa atɛmmuo a mɛbu no mu, mmom mmusuo bɛfiri akɔ, esu, bena bɔ, ne setwerɛ, aane, na ɛbɛba wɔn a wɔbɛhunu wɔn wɔ me nsa benkum so no.
Nanso, wɔnntwerɛɛe sɛ saa ateetee yi remma awieɛ, mmom wɔatwerɛ sɛ ɛnni awieɛ ateetee.
Bio, wɔatwerɛ sɛ ɛnni awieɛ afobuo; ɛno nti wɔakyerɛ mu yie kyɛn twerɛsɛm a aka no, ama abɔ mu ayɛ adwuma wɔ nnipa mma akoma mu, ɛnam me din animuonyam nti.
Ɛno nti, mɛkyerɛ saa ahintasɛm yi mu akyerɛ mo, ɛfiri sɛ ɛfata sɛ mohunu mpo te sɛ m’asomafoɔ no.
Mekasa kyerɛ mo a wɔayi mo wɔ saa adeɛ yi mu, mpo te sɛ baakofoɔ, sɛdeɛ mobɛwura m’ahomegyeɛ mu.
Na, hwɛ, nyamesu mu ahintasɛm, sɛdeɛ ne kɛseɛ teɛ! Na, hwɛ, menni awieɛ, na asotwe a ɛfiri me nsa mu ba no yɛ asotwe a ɛtoɔ ntwa da, na ɛnniawieɛ ne me din. Ɛno nti―
Ɛnniawieɛ asotwe yɛ Onyankopɔn asotwe.
Ɛnni awieɛ asotwe yɛ Onyankopɔn asotwe.
Ɛno nti, mehyɛ wo sɛ sakyera, na di me mmaransɛm a woanya afiri m’akoa Joseph Smith, Jun. nsa mu no so, wɔ me din mu;
Na ɛnam me tumi kɛseɛ so na woanya yeinom yi;

Ɛno nti, mehyɛ wo sɛ sakyera―sakyera, anyɛ saa a mede m’anum abaa bɛhwe wo, ɛne m’abufuhyeɛ, ɛne m’abufuo, na wo amanehunu bɛyɛ yea ―ne yeaa no wonnim, ne kɛseɛ no wonnim, aane, ne den sɛ wobɛgyina ano nso wonnim.
Na hwɛ, me, Onyankopɔn, mahunu saa nneɛma yi ho amane ama obiara, na sɛ wɔbɛsakyera a, wɔanhunu amane;
Na sɛ wɔansakyera a, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔhunu amane mpo sɛdeɛ mehunuuiɛ no;

Amanehunu a ɛmaa me ankasa, mpo Onyankopɔn, ɔkɛseɛ kyɛn obiara no, ho wosooe ɛnam yea nti, na mepram mogya firii honam tokuro biara mu, na mehunuu amane wɔ honam ne honhom mu―na mepɛɛ sɛ anka mennom kuruwa nwononwono no ano, na maponpono―
Nanso, animuonyam nka Agya no, menomee na mewiee m’ahoboaboa maa nnipa mma.

Ne saa nti, mehyɛ wo bio sɛ sakyera, anyɛ saa a mede me tumi kɛseɛ no bɛbrɛ wo ase; na ka wo bɔne kyerɛ, anyɛ saa a wobɛhunu amane wɔ saa asotwe a maka ho asɛm no ho, ɛno a ɛmu ketewa bi, aane, mpo ɛmu ketekete na woaka ahwɛ berɛ a metwee me Honhom firii wo ho no.
Na mehyɛ wo sɛ nnka biribiara sɛ nsakyeraeɛ, na mfa saa nneɛma yi nkyerɛ wiase kɔsi sɛ ɛbɛyɛ nyansa ama me.
Ɛsiane sɛ wɔnntumi nwe nam seesei, mmom nufosuo na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔnom; ne saa nti, ɛnnsɛ sɛ wɔhunu saa nneɛma yi, ama wɔanyera.
Sua me, na tie me nsɛm, fa ɔdwoɔ nante wɔ me Honhom mu, na wobɛnya asomdwoeɛ wɔ me mu.
Mene Yesu Kristo; menam Agya no pɛ so na ɛbaae, na meyɛ n’apɛdeɛ.
Na bio, mehyɛ wo sɛ mma w’ani mmere wo yɔnko yere; anaa nhwehwɛ wo yɔnko nkwa mfa.
Na bio, mehyɛ wo sɛ mma w’ani mmere w’ankasa wo agyapadeɛ, mmom yi ma kwa na wɔmfa ntintim Mormon Nwoma no, ɛno a ɛkura nokorɛ ne Onyankopɔn asɛm no―
Deɛ ɛyɛ m’asɛm ma amanamanmufoɔ, na ɛnkyɛre biara ɛbɛkɔ Yudafoɔ no hɔ, wɔn a Lamanfoɔ no yɛ wɔn nkãeɛ, na wɔate asɛmpa no ase, na wɔannhwehwɛ Mesaia bi a ɔbɛba kwan, na onii no aba dada.
Na bio, mehyɛ wo sɛ bue w’ano bɔ mpaeɛ na bɔ no w‘akoma mu nso; aane, wɔ wiase anim ne kokoa mu, wɔ badwa mu ne komm bea mu nso.
Na ka anigyesɛm kyerɛ, aane, bɔ no dawuro wɔ mmepɔ so, ne sorɔnsorɔmbea biara so, ne nnipa biara a mobɛhunu wɔn a wɔbɛma ho kwan, ntam.
Na yɛ no ahobrɛaseɛ biara mu, gye me di, na nsopa wɔn a wɔsopa wo.
Deɛ ɛyɛ gyedie a ɛmu dɔ no nkasa ho, mmom ka nsakyeraeɛ ne gyedie wɔ Agyenkwa no mu, ne bɔne fafiri nam asubɔ so, ne ogya mu, aane, mpo Sunsum Kronkron no.
Hwɛ yei ne mmaransɛm kɛseɛ ne deɛ ɛtwa toɔ a mede bɛma wo a ɛfa saa asɛm yi ho; na yei bɛhia ama wo daa ne daa nanteɛ, mpo de kɔsi w’abrabɔ awieɛ.
Sɛ wobu saa afotuo yi animtiaa a, ahohiahia bɛba wo so, aane, mpo wɔbɛsɛe w’ankasa ne w’agyapadeɛ.
Fa w’agyapadeɛ nkyɛmu bi ma, aane, mpo wo nsase fã bi, ne biribiara gye sɛ deɛ wode boa w’abusua.
Tua ɛka biara a wone nwoma tintimfoɔ no dii ano ma ɛsiiɛ. Gye wo ho firi nkoasom mu.
Gya wo dan ne wo fie hɔ, gye sɛ berɛ a wopɛ sɛ wohunu w’abusua;
Na gyae wo ho kasa kyerɛ obiara; aane, ka asɛmpa no, tu fo, ka nokorɛ no kyerɛ, mpo fa ɛnne kɛseɛ, ne anigyeɛ nnyegyeɛ, tea mu sɛ―Hosiana, hosiana, nhyira nka Awurade Nyankopɔn din!
Bɔ mpaeɛ berɛbiara, na mɛhwie me Honhom agu wo so, na wo nhyira bɛyɛ kɛseɛ―aane, mpo kyɛn sɛdeɛ wobɛnya asase so ademudeɛ a ɛporɔ no.
Hwɛ, wobɛtumi akenkan yei wɔ berɛ a w’ani nnye na wo mma w’akoma so nni dɛ anaa?
Anaa wobɛtumi atu mmirika atwa wo ho sɛ ɔkwankyerɛfoɔ nifrani?
Anaa wobɛtumi abrɛ wo ho ase na w’adwo, na woadi wo ho nni nyansa mu wɔ m’anim? Aane, bra me hɔ w’Agyenkwa no. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/20.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 20
chapter_summary: 1–16 Mormon Nwoma no kyerɛ mu pefee sɛ nna a ɛdi akyire dwumadie no firi Nyankopɔn; 17–28, Wɔsi nkyerɛkyerɛ a ɛfa abɔdeɛ, ahweaseɛ, mpata, ne asubɔ ho no pi; 29–37, Wɔde mmara a ɛfa nsakyeraeɛ, bemdie, ahodwira, ne asubɔ ho to dwa; 38–67, Wɔbɔ mpaninfoɔ, asɔfoɔ, akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ ne deaconfoɔ asɛdeɛ no tɔfã; 68–74, Asɔremma asɛdeɛ, mmɔfra nhyira, ne kwan a wɔfa so bɔ asu no, wɔda no adi; 75–84, Wɔde adidi kronkron mpaeɛ ne nhyehyɛeɛ a ɛfa asɔre no ho ma.

verses.text: Kristo Asɔre no sɔreɛ wɔ nna a ɛtwa toɔ yi mu, ɛyɛ mfeɛ apem aha nwɔtwe aduasa, firi yɛn Awurade ne yɛn Agyenkwa Yesu Kristo mmaeɛ wɔ honam mu; wɔhyehyɛɛe na wɔkyekyeree wɔ ne kwan so, sɛdeɛ yɛn man mmara teɛ, nam Onyankopɔn pɛ ne ne mmaransɛm so, wɔ bosome a ɛtɔ so nan, ɛne da a ɛtɔ so nsia wɔ bosome a wɔfrɛ no Oforisuo mu—
Saa mmaransɛm a wɔde maa Joseph Smith, Jun., a Onyankopɔn frɛɛ no, na wɔhyɛɛ no Yesu Kristo somafoɔ no, sɛ ɔnyɛ panin a ɔdikan wɔ asɔre yi mu;
Na wɔde maa Oliver Cowdery, ɔno nso a Onyankopɔn frɛeɛ no, Yesu Kristo somafoɔ, sɛ ɔnyɛ panin a ɔtɔ so mmienuwɔ asɔre yi mu, na ɔhyɛɛ no sɔfoɔ, ne nsa ase;
Na yei, sɛdeɛ yɛn Awurade ne Agyenkwa Yesu Kristo adom teɛ, ɔno na animuonyam nyina ara nka, seesei ne daa. Amen.
Akyire yi a nokorɛ mu wɔdaa no adi kyerɛɛ saa panin a ɔdi kan yi sɛ wanya bɔne fafiri no, ɔde wiase yi mu ahuhusɛm tõatõaa ne ho bio.

Nanso, ɔsakyeraae akyireno, na ɔbrɛɛ ne ho ase nokorɛ muwɔ gyedie mu no, Onyankopɔn nam ne bɔfoɔ kronkron so somm no, nea n’anim hwɛbea tesɛ anyinam, na ne ntadeɛ yɛ korɔgyenn na ɛyɛ fitaa sene deɛ ɛyɛ fitaa biara;
Na ɔmaa no mmaransɛm a ɛkanyann no;
Na ɔmaa no tumi firi soro, nam ɔkwan a wɔahyehyɛ dada so, sɛ ɔmfa nkyerɛ Mormon Nwoma no ase;
A ɛkura nkorɔfoɔ bi a wɔahwe aseɛ twerɛtohɔ, ɛne Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no mahyɛ a wɔde maa Amanamanmufoɔ ne Yudafoɔ nso;
Deɛ wɔnam nkanyan so de maae, na wɔnam abɔfoɔ som so asi no pi akyerɛ afoforɔ, na wɔnam wɔn so abɔ ho dawuro akyerɛ wiase—
De akyerɛ wiase sɛ twerɛ kronkron no yɛ nokorɛ, na Onyankopɔn kanyan nnipa na ɔfrɛ wɔn wɔ n’adwuma kronkron ho saa berɛ ne awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi mu, te sɛ tete awoɔntoatoasoɔ no mu.
Yei kyerɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn te sɛ deɛ ɔteɛ nnora, nnɛ ne afebɔɔ. Amen.
Ɛno nti, ɛnam sɛ ɛwɔ adansefoɔ bebree pa ara nti, ɛno so na wɔbɛfa so abu wiase atɛn, mpo dodoɔ no a akyire yi wɔbɛnya saa adwuma yi ho nimdeɛ no.
Na wɔn a wɔgye no wɔ gyedie mu, na wɔyɛ deɛ ɛtene no, wɔbɛnya nkwa a ɛnniawieɛ ahenkyɛ;
Na wɔn a wɔyɛ wɔn akoma den wɔ annye annie mu, na wɔpo no, ɛbɛdane wɔn ankasa afɔbuo—
Ɛfiri sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn na waka; na yɛn, asɔre no mpaninfoɔ no, yɛate na yɛdi Otumfoɔ Animuonyamfoɔ a ɔwɔ soro no nsɛm ho adanseɛ, ɔno na animuonyam nka afebɔɔ. Amen.
Yɛnam saa nneɛma yinom so hunu sɛ Onyankopɔn bi wɔ soro, a ɔnni anobuo na ɔnni awieɛ, firi daapem kɔsi daapem a ɔte sɛ deɛ ɔteɛ a ɔnsesa, deɛ ɔyɛɛ ɔsoro ne asase ne nneɛma a ɛwɔ mu nyina ara no;
Na ɔbɔɔ onipa, ɔbarima ne ɔbaa, wɔ ɔno ara ne su ne ɔno ara nsɛsoɔ so na ɔbɔɔ wɔn.
Na ɔmaa wɔn mmaransɛm sɛ wɔnnɔ no na wɔnsom no, nokorɛ Nyankopɔn teasefoɔ korɔ no, na ɔno nko ara nyɛ ɔnii a ɛsɛ sɛ wɔsom no.
Nanso, wɔ saa mmara kronkron yinom ho mmaratoɔ nti, nipa bɛyɛɛ honamuni na ɔnyaa ɔbonsam su, na ɔbɛyɛɛ ahweaseɛ nipa.
Ɛno nti, Otumfoɔ Nyankopɔn de ne Ba a Ɔwoo no Korɔ no maae, sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ no wɔ saa twerɛsɛm a wode ama a ɛfa ne ho no mu.
Nsɔhwɛ baa ne so nanso wammua ɛmu biara.
Wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu, ɔwuuiɛ, na ɔsɔree bio, da ɛtɔ so mmiɛnso so;
Na ɔforo kɔɔ soro, kɔtenaa Agya no nsa nifa so, de tumi kɛseɛ adi hene sɛdeɛ Agya no pɛ teɛ;
Ama dodoɔ no ara a wɔbɛgye adie na wɔbɔ wɔn asu wɔ ne din kronkron mu, na wɔgyina wɔ gyedie mu kɔsi awieɛ no, wɔagye wɔn nkwa—

Nyɛ wɔn a wɔgyediiɛ wɔ ne mmaeɛ wɔ berɛ mpɔnpɔnsoɔ mu akyi, wɔ honam mu nko ara; mmom wɔn a wɔfiri ahyɛaseɛ no nyina ara, mpo dodoɔ biara a na wɔwɔ hɔ ansana ɔreba, a wɔgyee nkɔmhyɛfoɔ kronkron no nsɛm diiɛ, wɔn a wɔkasaae nam Sunsum Kronkron akyɛdeɛ nkanyan so, na wɔdii ne ho adanseɛ nokorɛ mu wɔ ade nyina ara mu no, bɛnya nkwa a ɛnniawieɛ.
Ɛne wɔn nso a wɔbɛba akyire yi, wɔn a wɔbɛgye Onyankopɔn akyɛdeɛ ne ne frɛ a ɛnam Sunsum Kronkron so adi no, deɛ adi adanseɛ fa Agya ne Ɔba no ho no;
Agya, Ɔba, ne Sunsum Kronkron a wɔyɛ Nyankopɔn korɔ no, wɔnni anobuo na wɔnni awieɛ, wɔwɔ hɔ daa. Amen.

Na yɛnim sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ nnipa nyina ara sakyera na wɔgye Yesu Kristo din no di, na wɔsom Agya no wɔ ne din mu, na wɔgyina wɔ gyedie mu wɔ ne din mu kɔsi awieɛ, anyɛ saa a wɔrentumi nnye wɔn nkwa wɔ Onyankopɔn aheman mu.
Na yɛnim sɛ bembuo a ɛnam yɛn Awurade ne Agyenkwa Yesu Kristo adom so no tene na ɛyɛ nokorɛ;
Na yɛ san so nim sɛ, ahodwira a ɛnam yɛn Awurade ne Agyenkwa Yesu Kristo adom so no tene na ɛyɛ nokorɛ, ma wɔn a wɔde wɔn tumi nyina ara, wɔn adwene, ne wɔn ahoɔden dɔ Onyankopɔn na wɔsom no no.
Nanso ɛbɛtumi aba sɛ onipa bɛhwe ase afiri adom mu na wafiri Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ no nkyɛn;
Ne saa nti momma asɔre no nhwɛ yie na wɔmmɔ mpaeɛ berɛbiara, anyɛ saa a wɔbɛkɔ sɔhwɛ mu;
Aane, na mpo momma wɔn a wɔate wɔn ho nso nhwɛ yie.

Na yɛnim sɛ saa nneɛma yinom yɛ nokorɛ, na sɛdeɛ adiyisɛm a wɔde maa Yohane teɛ no; yɛmmfa bi nka ho, anaa yɛnnyi bi mmfiri nkɔmhyɛ nwoma no mu, twerɛ kronkron no, anaa Nyankopɔn adiyisɛm a ɛbɛba akyire yi, a ɛnam Sunsum Kronkron akyɛdeɛ ne ne tumi so, Onyankopɔn nne, anaa ɛnam abɔfoɔ som so.
Na Awurade Nyankopɔn na aka; na wɔmfa anidie, tumi ne animuonyam nka ne din kronkron no, seesei ne daa. Amen.

Na bio, wɔ mmarasɛm kwan so ma asɔre no ɛfa yɔbea a wɔmfa so mmɔ asu—wɔn a wɔbrɛ wɔn ho ase wɔ Onyankopɔn anim nyina ara, na wɔpɛ sɛ wɔbɔ wɔn asu, na wɔfiri adi de akoma a abubuo ne honhom a abotoɔ di adanseɛ wɔ asɔre no anim, nokorɛ mu, sɛ wɔasakyera afiri wɔn bɔne nyina ara ho, na wɔpɛ sɛ wɔfa Yesu Kristo din to wɔn ho so, na wɔsi nkete sɛ wɔbɛsom no akɔsi awieɛ no, na nokorɛ mu wɔnam wɔn nnwuma so da no adi sɛ wɔanya Kristo Honhom anya bɔne fafiri no, wɔnam asubɔ so bɛgye wɔn asɔre no mu.
Mpaninfoɔ, asɔfoɔ, akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, deaconfoɔ, ne asafomma a wɔwɔ Kristo asɔre mu asɛdeɛ—Ɔsomafoɔ yɛ asɔre panin, na ɛyɛ ne frɛ sɛ ɔbɔ asu;
Na ɔnhyɛ mpaninfoɔfoforɔ, asɔfoɔ, akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, ne deaconfoɔ;
Na ɔnhyira panoo ne bobesa no so mma—Kristo honam ne ne mogya ho sɛnkyerɛne no—
Na ɔnhyɛ wɔn a wɔabɔ wɔn asu aba asɔre no mu den, nam nsa a wɔde gu wɔn so ma wɔnya ogya asubɔ ne Sunsum Kronkron no, sɛdeɛ twerɛsɛm no kyerɛ no;
Na ɔnkyerɛkyerɛ, nkyerɛkyerɛ aseɛ, nkasa nkyerɛ, mmɔ asu, na ɔnwɛn asɔre no;
Na ɔnhyɛ asɔre no den nam nsa a wɔde gu soɔ no, ne Sunsum Kronkron ma no so.
Na ɔnni nhyiamu nyina ara anim.
Mpaninfoɔ no na wɔni asɔre nhyiamu biara mu dwuma sɛdeɛ Sunsum Kronkron no bɛkyerɛ wɔn no, sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn mmaransɛm ne n’adiyisɛm teɛ no.
Asɔfoɔ no asɛdeɛ ne sɛ: wɔka asɛmpa no, wɔkyerɛkyerɛ, wɔkyerɛkyerɛ aseɛ, wɔtu fo, na wɔbɔ asu, na wɔhyira adidi kronkron no so de ma.
Na wɔnsra asɔremma biara wɔ wɔn fie, na wɔntu wɔn fo sɛ wɔmmue wɔn ano mmɔ mpaeɛ, mmɔ no kokoa mu nso, na wɔnhwɛ abusua asɛdeɛ nyina ara.
Na ɔtumi hyɛ asɔfoɔ foforɔ nso, akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, ne deaconfoɔ.
Na ɛwɔ sɛ ɔdi asɔre nhyiamu anim, berɛ a asɔre panin biara nni hɔ.
Na sɛ panin bi wɔ hɔ a, deɛ ɔyɛ ara ne sɛ ɔka asɛmpa no, kyerɛkyerɛ, kyerɛ aseɛ, tu fo, na ɔbɔ asu.
Na ɔnsra asɔremma biara wɔ wɔn fie, ntu wɔn fo sɛ wɔmmue wɔn ano mmɔ mpaeɛ, mmɔ no kokoa mu, na wɔnhwɛ abusua asɛdeɛ nyina ara.
Wɔ saa asɛdeɛ yi nyina ara mu no, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔsɔfoɔ no boa panin no berɛ a ɛsɛ mu.
Ɔkyerɛkyerɛni n’asɛdeɛ ne sɛ ɔhwɛ asɔre no so daa, na ɔka wɔn ho, hyɛ wɔn den;
Na ɔhwɛ sɛ amumuyɔ biara nni asɔre no mu, anaa mansotwe nni wɔn mu, anaa atorɔsɛm, anaa nkɔnkɔnsa, anaa dinsɛeɛ;
Na ɔhwɛ sɛ asɔre no taa bɔ mu hyia, na ɔhwɛ sɛ asɔremma no nyina ara yɛ wɔn asɛdeɛ.
Na ɔni nhyiamu no anim berɛ a panin anaa ɔsofoɔ nni hɔ—
Na ɛsɛ sɛ deaconfoɔ no boa no daa, wɔ n’asɛdeɛ a ɛwɔ asɔre no mu nyina ara, berɛ a ɛsɛ mu.
Nanso akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ anaa deaconfoɔ no mu biara nni tumi sɛ wɔbɔ asu, hyira adidi kronkron no so de ma, anaa sɛ wɔde nsa gu obi so;
Nanso, ɛwɔ sɛ wɔbɔ kɔkɔ, kyerɛkyerɛ aseɛ, tu fo, na wɔkyerɛkyerɛ, na wɔto nsa frɛ obiara sɛ ɔmmra Kristo hɔ.

Opanin, ɔsofoɔ, ɔkyerɛkyerɛni, anaa deacon biara sɛ sɛ wɔhyɛ no sɔfoɔ sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn akyɛdeɛ ne ne frɛ a ɔde ma no teɛ; na ɛwɔ sɛ wɔhyɛ no sɔfoɔ nam Sunsum Kronkron tumi so, a ɛwɔ deɛ ɔhyɛ no sɔfoɔ no mu no.
Mpaninfoɔ ahoroɔ a wɔyɛ Kristo asɔre no wɔ sɛ wɔyɛ nhyiamu baako abosome mmiɛnsa biara, anaa berɛ ano berɛ ano sɛdeɛ saa nhyiamu no bɛkyerɛ anaa bɛhyɛ;
Na saa nhyiamu no mu na ɛsɛ sɛ asɔre no di dwuma biara a ɛho hia sɛ wɔdi, saa berɛ no.
Ɛsɛ sɛ mpaninfoɔ no gye wɔn tumi krataa firi mpaninfoɔ foforɔ hɔ, wɔ abatoɔ mu wɔ asɔre a wɔwɔ mu, anaa firi nhyiamu no ase.

Ɔsɔfoɔ, ɔkyerɛkyerɛni, anaa deacon biara a ɔsɔfoɔ bi bɛhyɛ no sɔfoɔ no, ɛwɔ sɛ ɔgye abodin krataa firi ne hɔ wɔ saa berɛ no mu, ama sɛ ɔde saa abodin krataa no kyerɛ panin biara a, wanya tumi krataa a ɛma no tumi sɛ ɔnyɛ adwuma a ɛwɔ ne frɛ no mu, anaa ɔbɛtumi agye afiri nhyiamu kɛseɛ bi ase.
Ɛnnsɛ sɛ wɔhyɛ obiara sɔfoɔ ma no diberɛ biara wɔ asɔre yi mu, wɔ bea a asɔre no nkorabata no atim dada, wɔ berɛ a saa asɔre no nto aba;
Nanso mpanifoɔ titenafoɔ, ahwɛfoɔ a wɔtu kwan, agyinatukuo mpaninfoɔ, asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ, ne mpaninfoɔ wɔ ho kwan sɛ wɔhyɛ asɔfoɔ, wɔ bea a asɔre no nkorabata nni hɔ a wɔbɛtumi ama wɔato aba.
Asɔfodie kɛseɛ no titenani (anaa opanin a ɔyɛ titenani), ɔhwɛfoɔ, ɔfotufoɔ panin, ne sɔfo panin biara no, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔhyɛ no sɔfoɔ wɔ agyinatukuo anaa amansan nhyiamu akwankyerɛ so.

Asɔremma no asɛdeɛ akyire yi a wɔnam asubɔ so agye wɔn no― Ɛwɔ sɛ mpaninfoɔ anaa asɔfoɔ no nya berɛ a ɛdɔɔso de kyerɛkyerɛ fa Kristo asɔre no ho sɛdeɛ wɔbɛte aseɛ, ansaana wɔadi akronkrondeɛ no na mpaninfoɔ no de wɔ nsa agu wɔn so ahyɛ wɔn den, sɛdeɛ wɔbɛyɛ nneɛma nyina ara wɔ ne kwan so.

Na asɔremma no bɛda no adi akyerɛ asɔre no, wɔ mpaninfoɔ no nso anim, wɔ nyamesu nanteɛ ne nkɔmmɔdie mu, sɛ wɔfata wɔ ho, ama nnwuma ne gyedie ada adi sɛdeɛ twerɛ kronkron no ka no—nante kronkronyɛ mu wɔ Awurade anim.
Asɔreba biara a ɔwɔ Kristo asɔre no mu a a ɔwɔ mma no wɔ sɛ ɔde wɔn brɛ mpaninfoɔ no wɔ asɔre no anim; wɔn na ɛwɔ sɛ wɔde wɔn nsa gu wɔn so wɔ Yesu Kristo din mu, na wɔhyira wɔn wɔ ne din mu.
Wɔnntumi nnye obiara mma Krsito asɔre yi mu gye sɛ waduru mfie a ɔtumi bu akontaa wɔ Nyankopɔn anim, na ɔbɛtumi asakyera.
Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔyɛ asubɔ wɔ saa kwan yi so ma obiara a wasakyera—

Onipa a Onyankopɔn afrɛ no na ɔwɔ tumi firi Yesu Kristo hɔ sɛ ɔbɔ asu no, ɔne nipa a ɔde ne ho aba sɛ wɔmmɔ no asu no bɛkɔ nsuo no mu, na ɔbɛbɔ ne din aka sɛ: Tumidie a Yesu Kristo de ama me nti, mebɔ wo asu wɔ Agya, ne Ɔba, ne Sunsum Kronkron no din mu. Amen.
Afei ɔde no bɛnu nsuo no mu, na wafiri nsuo no mu aba bio
Ɛho hia sɛ asɔre no taa hyia bɔ mu di paanoo nom bobesa de kae Awurade Yesu.
Na panin no anaa ɔsɔfoɔ no bɛhyira so de ama; na saa kwan yi so na ɔbɛfa ahyira so—ɔne asɔre no bɛbu nkotodwe na wafrɛ Agya no wɔ gyedie mpaebɔ mu ka sɛ:

O Onyankopɔn, Ɔnniawieɛ Agya, yɛsrɛ wo wɔ wo Ba, Yesu Kristo, din mu sɛ hyira saa paanoo yi so na te ho ma akra a wɔbɛdi nyina ara, sɛ wɔbɛdi de akae wo Ba no honamdua no, na adi adanseɛ de akyerɛ wo, O Onyankopɔn, Ɔnniawieɛ Agya, na wɔanya ɔpɛ sɛ wɔbɛfa wo Ba no din ato wɔn ho so, na wɔakae no aberɛ nyina ara na wɔadi ne mmaransɛm a ɔde ama wɔn no so, ama aberɛ nyina ara no, ne Honhom no aka wɔn ho. Amen.
Kwan a wɔfa so hyira bobesa no so de ma—ɔbɛfa kuruwa no nso, na waka sɛ:

O Onyankopɔn, Ɔnniawieɛ Agya, yɛsrɛ wo wɔ wo Ba, Yesu Kristo, din mu sɛ hyira saa bobesa yi sona te ho ma akra a wɔbɛnom bi no nyina ara sɛ wɔbɛyɛ de akae wo Ba no mogya a ɔhwie gu maa wɔn no; na adi adanseɛ akyerɛ wo, O Onyankopɔn, Ɔnniawieɛ Agya, na wɔakae no aberɛ nyina ara, ama wɔanya ne Honhom no ne wɔn atena. Amen.
Kristo n’asɔreba biara a ɔbɛto mmara, anaa mfomsoɔ bi bɛto no no, wɔne no nni sɛdeɛ twerɛsɛm kyerɛ no.
Ɛbɛyɛ asɔre ahoroɔ a ɛbɔ mu yɛ Kristo asɔre no asɛdeɛ sɛ, wɔbɛsoma ɔkyerɛkyerɛni baako anaa wɔn mu dodoɔ no ara sɛ wɔnkɔ nhyiamu ahoroɔ a asɔre mpaninfoɔ no frɛ no bi,

Na wɔde asɔremma ahoroɔ a wɔabɛka asɔre no ho din a wɔatwerɛ firi berɛ a wɔyɛɛ nhyiamu a ɛtwa toɔ no, anaa wɔde bɛhyɛ ɔsofoɔ bi nsa ma a ɔde akɔ; sɛdeɛ wɔbɛnya edin a ɛwɔ asɔre mũ no nyina ara mu wɔ nwoma bi mu a mpaninfoɔ no baako bɛhwɛ so, obiara a mpaninfoɔ nkaeɛ no bɛyi no berɛ ano berɛ ano;
Na bio, sɛ wɔayi ebinom adi afiri asɔre no mu a, ama wɔatumi apopa wɔn din afiri asɔre mũ no nyina ara wɔ din nwoma no mu.

Asɔremma a wɔrefiri asɔre no mu wɔ bea a wɔte no nyina ara, sɛ wɔrekɔ asɔre wɔ bea a wɔnnim wɔn a, wɔbɛtumi agye krataa a ɛkyerɛ sɛ wɔyɛ asɔremma a wɔwɔ gyinabea pa, saa adanseɛ krataa yi no panin anaa sɔfoɔ biara bɛtumi de ne nsa ahyɛ aseɛ, sɛ asɔreba no a ɔregye krataa no nim panin anaa sɔfoɔ no yie a; anaa akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ ne dikɔnfoɔ a wɔwɔ asɔre no mu no bɛtumi de wɔn nsa ahyɛ aseɛ.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/21.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 21
chapter_summary: 1–3 Wɔfrɛ Joseph Smith ma ɔbɛyɛ ɔdehununi, asekyerɛni, nkɔmhyɛni, Yesu Kristo somafoɔ, ne asɔre panin; 4–8, N’asɛm bɛkyerɛ Sion yiedie; 9–12, Ahotefoɔ no bɛgye ne nsɛm a ɔnam Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ so no bɛka no adi.

verses.text: Hwɛ, ɛwɔ sɛ wɔkora twerɛtohɔ bi wɔ mo ntam; na ɛno mu wɔbɛfrɛ wo ɔdehununi, asekyerɛni, nkɔmhyɛni, Yesu Kristo somafoɔ, opanin wɔ asɔre a ɛnam Onyankopɔn Agya no pɛ so, ne mo Awurade Yesu Kristo adom so,
Wonam Sunsum Kronkron no nkanyan so bɛto ne fapem, na wasi de ama gyedie kronkron mmorosoɔ no.
Saa asɔre no a wɔhyehyɛɛeɛ na wɔkyekyereeɛ wɔ mo Awurade n’afe, apem ahanwotwe aduasa, bosome a ɛtɔ so nan mu, ne da a ɛtɔ so nsia wɔ bosome a wɔfrɛ no Oforisuo mu.
Ɛno nti, mo, merekyerɛ asɔre no, wobɛtie ne nsɛm ne mmaransɛm biara a ɔde bɛma mo sɛdeɛ ɔnya no no, monnante wɔ kronkronyɛ nko ara mu wɔ m’anim;
