Ɛfiri sɛ berɛ a Awurade bɛpue no, ne ho bɛyɛ hu kɛseɛ ama wɔn, ama suro aba wɔn so, na wɔbɛgyina akyirikyiri na wɔn ho apopo.
Na aman nyina ara bɛsuro ɛnam Awurade ho hu, ne ne tumi ahoɔden nti. Mpo saa ara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/46.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 46
chapter_summary: 1–2, Ɛsɛ sɛ mpaninfoɔ yɛ nhyiamu sɛdeɛ Honhom Kronkron no bɛkyerɛ wɔn; 3–6, Ɛnnsɛ sɛ wɔyi nokorɛ hwehwɛmufoɔ no adi firi adidi kronkron som mu; 7–12, Bisa Nyankopɔn na hwehwɛ Honhom akyɛdeɛ no; 13–26, Wɔbobɔ Honhom akyɛdeɛ no bi din; 27–33, Wɔma asɔre kannifoɔ no tumi sɛ wɔnhunu Honhom akyɛdeɛ no mu.

verses.text: Montie, O nkorɔfoɔ a mowɔ m’asɔre mu; ɛfiri sɛ nokorɛ mese mo sɛ wɔkaa saa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ mo sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ mo mfasoɔ ne mo adesua.

Ɛwɔ mu sɛ na wɔatwerɛ saa nneɛma yi nanso, wɔde ahyɛ m’asɔre mpaninfoɔ no nsa daa firi mfitiaseɛ no, na ɛbɛyɛ saa ara daa, sɛ wɔnni nhyiamu ho dwuma sɛdeɛ Honhom Kronkron no bɛkyerɛ na ɔbɛma wɔn akwankyerɛ no.
Nanso, wɔahyɛ mo sɛ mma mo mmpamo obiara mmfiri mo badwa mu nhyiamu ase, deɛ moyɛ no wɔ wiase anim no.
Wɔahyɛ mo nso sɛ mma mo mmpamo obiara a ɔka asɔre no ho no mmfiri mo adidi kronkron nhyiamu no ase; nanso, sɛ obi ato mmara a, mma no nni adidi kronkron no bi kɔsi sɛ ɔbɛyɛ nkabom.
Na bio mese mo, mma mo mmpamo wɔn a wɔde nsiyɛ rehwehwɛ aheman no mmfiri mo adidi kronkron nhyiamu ase—meka yei fa wɔn a wɔnnka asɔre no ho no.
Na bio mese mo, ɛfa mo denhyɛ nhyiamu ho no, sɛ wɔn mu bi wɔ hɔ a wɔnnka asɔre no ho, na wɔde nsiyɛ rehwehwɛ aheman no akyiri akwan a, mma mo monyi wɔn mmfiri mu.

Nanso wɔahyɛ mo sɛ nneɛma nyina ara mu no mommisa Onyankopɔn, ɔno a ɔde ma kwa no; na deɛ Honhom no di ho adanseɛ no, mpo saa ara na mepɛ sɛ moyɛ wɔ akoma kronkron mu, na monante tenenee mu wɔ m’anim, na monwenwene mo nkwagye awieɛ ho, na mode mpaebɔ ne aseda yɛ nneɛma nyina ara, ama ahonhom bɔne, anaa abonsam nkyerɛkyerɛ, anaa nnipa mmaransɛm antumi annaadaa mo; ɛfiri sɛ ebi firi nnipa, na ebi nso firi abonsam.
Ɛno nti, monhwɛ yie na wɔannaadaa mo; na sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a wɔrentumi nnaadaa mo no, momfa nsiyɛ nhwehwɛ akyɛdeɛ a ɛsom bo papa, na monkae dabiara deɛ nti a wɔde ama.

Ɛfiri sɛ mese mo, wɔde ama sɛ ɛnyɛ mfasoɔ mma wɔn a wɔdɔ me na wɔdi me mmaransɛm nyina ara so, ne deɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔbɛyɛ saa no; sɛdeɛ obiara a ɔhwehwɛ anaa ɔbisa firi me hɔ no bɛtumi anya ho mfasoɔ, sɛ ɔbisa na wammisa nsɛnkyerɛnne sɛ ɔbɛhwere no n’akɔnnɔ mu a.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, mɛpɛ sɛ mobɛkae berɛbiara, na mode saa akyɛdeɛ yinom adeban bɛto mo adwene mu berɛbiara, deɛ wɔde ama asɔre no.
Ɛfiri sɛ obiara nni akyɛdeɛ nyina ara; ɛfiri sɛ akyɛdeɛ pii wɔ hɔ, na wɔama obiara akyɛdeɛ afiri Nyankopɔn Honhom hɔ.
Ɔma ebinom baako, na ɔma ebinom nso foforɔ, sɛdeɛ obiara bɛnya so mfasoɔ.
Ebinom Sunsum Kronkron no ma wɔhunu sɛ Yesu Kristo yɛ Onyankopɔn Ba no, na wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu maa wiase bɔne.
Ebinom nso wɔma wɔgye wɔn nsɛm di, sɛdeɛ sɛ wɔkɔso yɛ nokorɛfoɔ a wɔn nso bɛtumi anya nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ.
Na bio, ebinom Sunsum Kronkron no ma wɔhunu nsonsonoeɛ a ɛda ɔsom adwuma no mu, deɛ ɛbɛsɔ Awurade korɔ no ara ani, sɛdeɛ Awurade pɛ teɛ, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛfata ama n’ahummɔborɔ sɛdeɛ nnipa mma asetena teɛ.
Na bio, Sunsum Kronkron no ma ebinom hunu dwumadie ahodoɔ, sɛ ɛfiri Onyankopɔn a, ama wɔde Honhom no adiyie atumi ama nipa biara anya ho mfasoɔ.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, wɔma ebi anyansasɛm nam Onyankopɔn Honhom so, ama wɔn nyansasɛm.
Wɔma ɔfoforɔ nimdesɛm, ama watumi akyerɛkyerɛ obiara ma wayɛ onyansafoɔ na wanya nimdeɛ.
Na bio, ebinom wɔma wɔnya gyedie sɛ wɔbɛnya ayaresa;
Na ebinom nso wɔma wɔnya gyedie de sa yareɛ.
Na bio, ebinom wɔma wɔyɛ anwanwa nnwuma.
Na ebinom nso wɔma wɔhyɛ nkɔm;
Na ebinom nso wɔma wɔn honhom hodoɔ mu nhunumu.
Na bio, wɔma ebinom ka kasa hodoɔ;
Na obi nso wɔma no kasa hodoɔ nkyerɛaseɛ.
Na saa akyɛdeɛ yinom nyina ara firi Nyankopɔn hɔ, ama ayɛ mfasoɔ ama Onyankopɔn mma.

Na asɔre no hwɛfoɔ no, ne wɔn a Onyankopɔn bɛyi na ɔbɛhyɛ wɔn asɔfoɔ sɛ wɔn nwɛn asɔre no na wɔnyɛ mpaninfoɔ mma asɔre no, wɔbɛma wɔahunu saa akyɛdeɛ nyina ara mu, anyɛ saa a ebinom bɛba mo mu a wɔbɛka sɛ wɔfiri Nyankopɔn nanso wɔmmfiri no hɔ.
Na ɛbɛba sɛ deɛ ɔbisa wɔ Honhom mu no bɛnya wɔ Honhom mu.
Sɛdeɛ wɔbɛma ebinom saa akyɛdeɛ hodoɔ yinom nyina ara, ama wɔayɛ tire, sɛdeɛ asɔreba biara bɛnya so mfasoɔ.
Onii a ɔbisa wɔ Honhom no mu no bisa sɛdeɛ Nyankopɔn pɛ teɛ; ɛno nti wɔyɛ no te sɛ deɛ ɔbisa no.
Na bio, mese mo sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔyɛ nneɛma nyina ara wɔ Kristo din mu, biribiara a moyɛ no Honhom mu no;
Na ɛsɛ sɛ mode aseda ma Onyankopɔn wɔ Honhom mu wɔ nhyira biara a wɔde hyira mo no.
Na ɛsɛ sɛ mobɔ ɔbra pa yɛ kronkron wɔ m’anim daa. Mpo saa ara.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/47.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 47
chapter_summary: 1–4, Wɔde ahyɛ John Whitmer nsa sɛ ɔnkora Asɔre no abakɔsɛm na ɔntwerɛ mma Nkɔmhyɛni no.

verses.text: Hwɛ, ɛho hia ma me sɛ m’akoa John bɛtwerɛ na ɔbɛkora daa abakɔsɛm, na ɔboa wo, m’akoa Joseph, wɔ nneɛma nyina ara a mede bɛma wo no ntwerɛeɛ mu, kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛfrɛ no sɛ ɔnyɛ asɛdeɛ foforɔ.
Bio, nokorɛ mese wo sɛ ɔbɛtumi nso ama ne nne so wɔ nhyiamu ase, berɛbiara a ɛho bɛhia.
Na bio, mese wo sɛ wɔbɛyi no sɛ ɔnkora asɔre no twerɛtohɔ ne n’abakɔsɛm daa; Oliver Cowdery deɛ mayi no sɛ ɔnyɛ adwuma foforɔ.
Ɛno nti, mpɛn dodoɔ a ɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ no, wɔnam Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ no so de bɛma no sɛ ɔntwerɛ saa nneɛma yinom. Mpo saa ara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/48.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 48
chapter_summary: 1–3, Ɛsɛ sɛ Ahotefoɔ no ne wɔn nuanom no kyɛ wɔn nsase; 4–6, Ɛsɛ sɛ Ahotefoɔ no tɔ nsase, kyekyere kuro, na wɔdi atitenafoɔ no afotuo so.

verses.text: Ɛho hia sɛ mobɛkɔ so atena mo atenaeɛ saa berɛ yi, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ ama mo tebea.
Na sɛ mowɔ nsase a, momfa bi mma mo nuanom a wɔwɔ apueɛ fã mu no;
Na sɛ monni nsase a, wɔmma wɔntɔ bi wɔ amantam a atwa ahyia no mu saa berɛ yi, sɛdeɛ ɛyɛ ama wɔn, esiane sɛ ɛho hia sɛ wɔnya baabi tena seesei.
Ɛho hia sɛ mosie sika biara a mobɛtumi, ama moanya biribiara a moanya wɔ tenenee mu, ama akyire yi moatumi atɔ asase de ayɛ apɛgyadeɛ, mpo kuropɔn.
Ɛnnuruui sɛ wɔda bea no adi; nanso sɛ mo nuanom no firi apueɛ ba wie a, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔyi nnipa binom, na wɔn na wɔbɛma wɔahunu bea no, anaa wɔn na wɔbɛda no adi akyerɛ wɔn.

Na wɔbɛyi wɔn sɛ wɔntɔ nsase no, na wɔnhyɛ aseɛ nto kuropɔn no fapem; na afei mobɛfiri aseɛ aboaboa mo ne mo mmusua ano, barima biara sɛdeɛ n’abusua teɛ, sɛdeɛ n’asetena teɛ, ne sɛdeɛ atitenafoɔ ne asɔre no hwɛfoɔ no bɛkyerɛ, sɛdeɛ mmara ne mmaransɛm a wɔanya no teɛ, ne deɛ mobɛnya akyire yi. Mpo saa ara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/49.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 49
chapter_summary: 1–7, Da ne dɔnhwere a Kristo de bɛba no wɔrenhunu kɔsi sɛ Ɔbɛba; 8–14, Ɛsɛ sɛ nnipa sakyera, gye asɛmpa no di, na wɔyɛ setie ma ayɛyɛdeɛ no ama wɔanya nkwagyeɛ; 15–16, Nyankopɔn na ahyehyɛ awareɛ; 17–21, Mogyanam die yɛ; 22–28, Sion bɛyɛ frɔmfrɔm na Lamanfoɔ no bɛhane sɛ nhyerɛne no ansana Mmaeɛ a Ɛtɔ so Mmienu no aba.

verses.text: Montie m’asɛm, me nkoa Sidney, ne Parley, ne Leman; na hwɛ, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, mema mo mmarasɛm sɛ monkɔ nkɔka m’asɛmpa a moanya, mpo sɛdeɛ monyaa no no, nkyerɛ Shakerfoɔ no.
Hwɛ, mese mo sɛ, wɔpɛ sɛ wɔhunu nokorɛ no fã bi, na nnyɛ ne nyina ara, esiane sɛ wɔntene wɔ m’anim na ɛho hia sɛ wɔsakyera.
Ɛno nti, meresoma mo, me nkoa Sidney ne Parley, sɛ monkɔ ka asɛmpa no nkyerɛ wɔn.
Na wɔnyi m’akoa Leman mma saa adwuma yi, ama watumi ne wɔn adwene, nnyɛ sɛdeɛ wanya afiri wɔn hɔ no teɛ, mmom tesɛ deɛ me nkoa bɛkyerɛkyerɛ no; na sɛ ɔyɛ saa a mɛhyira no, anyɛ saa a ɔrennya nkɔsoɔ.
Sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ nie; na mene Onyankopɔn, na masoma me dɔ Ba a Mewoo no Korɔ aba wiase ama wiase nkwagyeɛ, na mahyɛ sɛ deɛ ɔgye no no wɔbɛgye no, na deɛ wannye no no wɔbɛbu no fɔ—

Na wɔayɛ Onipa Ba no mpo sɛdeɛ wɔpɛ; na wafa tumi wɔ n’animuonyam nsa nifa so, na ɔdi hene seesei wɔ soro, na ɔbɛdi hene kɔsi sɛ ɔbɛsiane aba asase so na ɔde atamfo nyina ara bɛhyɛ ne nan ase, na saa berɛ no abɛn—
Me, Awurade Nyankopɔn na maka; nanso dɔn no ne da no deɛ onipa biara nnim, abɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ soro mpo nnim, na wɔrenhunu kɔsi sɛ ɔbɛba.
Ɛno nti, mɛpɛ sɛ nnipa nyina ara bɛsakyera, esiane sɛ obiara hyɛ bɔne ase, gye sɛ wɔn a makora ama me ho, nnipa kronkron a monnim.
Ɛno nti, mese mo sɛ masoma ma wɔde me daapem apam ama mo, mpo deɛ ɛwɔ hɔ firi ahyɛaseɛ no.
Na deɛ mahyɛ ho bɔ no, saa ara na mama aba mu na aman a wɔwɔ asase so no bɛkoto no; na, sɛ wɔn ankasa anyɛ a, wɔbɛba fam, ɛfiri sɛ deɛ ɛno ankasa ama ne ho so seesei no, wɔbɛbrɛ no ase wɔ tumi mu.
Ɛno nti, mema mo mmarasɛm sɛ monkɔ saa nkurɔfoɔ yi mu, na monka nkyerɛ wɔn sɛ, sɛdeɛ me tete somafoɔ Peter kaaɛ no:
Monnye Awurade Yesu din nni, deɛ na ɔwɔ asase so no, ne deɛ ɔbɛba no, mfitiaseɛ ne awieɛ no;
Monsakyera na wɔmmɔ mo asu wɔ Yesu Kristo din mu, sɛdeɛ mmarasɛm kronkron teɛ, mma mo bɔne fafiri;
Na obiara a ɔyɛ yei no bɛnya Sunsum Kronkron akyɛdeɛ no, nam nsa a asɔre mpaninfoɔ no de gu soɔ no so.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, obiara a ɔsi awareɛ ho kwan no mmfiri Onyankopɔn, esiane sɛ Onyankopɔn na ahyehyɛ awareɛ ama nipa.
Ɛno nti, ɛyɛ mmara kwan so sɛ ɔnya yere baako, na wɔn baanu ayɛ ɔhonam baako, na yei nyina ara sɛdeɛ ɛbɛtumi ahyɛ botae a wɔde bɔɔ asase no mã;
Na wɔatumi de nnipa dodoɔ a ɛsɛ ahyɛ no mã, sɛdeɛ n’adebɔ teɛ ansana wɔrebɔ wiase.
Na obiara a ɔtua mogyanam die, sɛ mma nipa nni bie no mmfiri Onyankopɔn;
Ɛfiri sɛ, hwɛ, wuram mmoa ne ewiem mu nnomaa, ne deɛ ɛfiri asase mu ba no, wɔahyehyɛ sɛ onipa mfa nyɛ aduane ne aduradeɛ, na ama wɔatumi anya no mmorosoɔ.
Nanso wɔnhyehyɛɛe sɛ nipa baako nya ne ho nsene ɔfoforɔ, ɛno nti wiase da bɔne mu.
Na mmusuo nka onipa a ɔka mogya gu anaa ɔsɛe nam a ɔnnhia.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, Onipa Ba no remma wɔ ɔbaa nsɛsoɔ, anaa sɛ ɔbarima a ɔretu kwan wɔ asase so.

Ɛno nti, mma wɔnnaadaa mo, mmom monkɔ so wɔ nokorɛdie mu, nhwɛ kwan sɛ wɔbɛwoso ɔsoro, na asase ahinhim na atɔ ntintan adi akɔneaba sɛ nsaboni, na wɔbɛmema mmonhwa so, na wɔbɛbrɛ mmepɔ ase, na ama bea kokwarikokwari abɛyɛ torontorom—na yeinom nyina ara bɛsi berɛ a ɔbɔfoɔ no bɛhyɛn ne totorobɛnto no.
Nanso ansana Awurade da kɛseɛ no bɛba no, Yakob bɛyɛ frɔmfrɔm wɔ ɛserɛ no so, na Lamanfoɔ no bɛhane sɛ nhyerɛne no.
Sion bɛyɛ frɔmfrɔm wɔ mmepɔ no so na ɔbɛdi ahurusi wɔ mmepɔ no so, na wɔbɛboaboa wɔn ho aba bea a mayi no so.
Hwɛ, mese mo, monkɔ sɛdeɛ mahyɛ mo no; monsakyera mfiri mo bɔne nyina ara ho; mommisa na mobɛnya; mommɔ mu na ɛbɛbue ama mo.
Hwɛ, mɛdi mo anim na mabɔ mo kyidɔm; na mɛwɔ mo, mfinimfini, na wɔremma mo ani nnwu.
Hwɛ, mene Yesu Kristo, na mereba mpofirim. Mpo saa ara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/50.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 50
chapter_summary: 1–5, Atorɔ ahonhom bebree atrɛ wɔ asase so; 6–9, Mmusuo nka nyaatwomfoɔ ne wɔn a wɔatwa wɔn afiri asɔre no mu; 10–14, Ɛwɔ sɛ mpaninfoɔ no fa Honhom no so ka asɛmpa no; 15–22, Ɛhia sɛ asɛnkafoɔ ne atiefoɔ no fa Honhom no so nya hann; 23–25, Deɛ ɛmma nkɔsoɔ no mmfiri Nyankopɔn hɔ; 26–28, Wɔn a wɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ no wɔ ade nyina ara; 29–36, Wɔn a wɔn ho te nya mpaebɔ ho mmuaeɛ; 37–46, Kristo yɛ Odwanhwɛfo Pa no ne Israel Ɔboɔ no.

verses.text: Montie, O m’asɔre mpaninfoɔ, na monyɛ aso mma Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ no nne; na montie nyansasɛm a wɔde bɛma mo no yie, sɛdeɛ moabisa no na mo adwene akɔ bɛnkorɔm ɛfa asɔre no ho no, ne ahonhom a atrɛ akɔ asase so baabiara no.
Hwɛ, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, ahonhom bebree wɔ hɔ a wɔyɛ atorɔ honhom, a wɔafiri adi akɔ asase so, redaadaa wiase.
Na Satan nso ahwehwɛ sɛ ɔbɛdaadaa mo, ama wadi mo so nkonim.
Hwɛ, Me, Awurade, ahwɛ mo, na mahunu akyiwadeɛ a ɛwɔ asɔre a ɛbɔ me din no mu.
Nanso nhyira ne wɔn a wɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ na wɔgyina mu no, sɛ wɔte aseɛ anaa wɔawuo, ɛfiri sɛ wɔbɛnya nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ.
Nanso mmusuo nka wɔn a wɔyɛ nnaadaafoɔ ne nyaatwomfoɔ, ɛfiri sɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ nie, mede wɔn bɛba atemmuo mu.
Hwɛ, nokorɛ mese mo, nyaatwomfoɔ wɔ mo mu, a wɔadaadaa ebinom, na yei ama ɔtamfo no tumi; nanso wɔbɛsan agye wɔn bio;
Nanso wɔbɛhunu nyaatwomfoɔ no na wɔbɛtwa wɔn atwene, sɛ wɔte ase anaa wɔawuo, mpo sɛdeɛ mepɛ; na mmusuo nka wɔn a wɔtwa wɔn twene firi asɔre no mu, ɛfiri sɛ wiase adi wɔn so nkonim.
Ɛno nti, ma onipa biara nhwɛ yie ama wanyɛ deɛ ɛnni nokorɛ ne tenenee mu wɔ m’anim.
Na afei, Awurade nam Honhom no so se n’asɔre mpaninfoɔ no sɛ, mommra na yɛmmɔ mu nnwene, sɛdeɛ mobɛte aseɛ;
Momma yɛnnwene mpo sɛdeɛ onipa ne ne nua yiyi ntɛn anim ne anim.
Afei, sɛ onipa dwennwene a onipa te no aseɛ, ɛfiri sɛ ɔdwennwene sɛ onipa; mpo saa ara na Me, Awurade, ne mo bɛdwennwene sɛdeɛ mobɛte aseɛ.
Ɛno nti, Me Awurade bisa mo saa asɛm yi—deɛn ho nti na wɔhyɛɛ mo asɔfoɔ?
Sɛ momfa Honhom no so nka m’asɛmpa no, mpo Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ no a wɔsomaa no sɛ ɔnkyerɛ nokorɛ no.
Na afei monyaa ahonhom a moante wɔn aseɛ, na mogyee wɔn sɛ wɔfiri Onyankopɔn; na wɔ yei mu no modi bem anaa?
Hwɛ mo ara ankasa momma saa asɛmmisa yi ho mmuaeɛ; nanso, mɛhunu mo mmɔbɔ; onii a ɔyɛ mmerɛ wɔ mo ntam no, wɔbɛhyɛ no den akyire yi.
Nokorɛ mese, deɛ mahyɛ no sɔfoɔ na masoma no sɛ ɔmfa Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ no so nkɔka nokorɛ asɛm no, wɔ nokorɛ Honhom mu no, so ɔnam nokorɛ Honhom no so ka asɛmpa no anaa ɔnam kwan foforɔ bi so?
Na sɛ ɛyɛ kwan foforɔ bi so a, ɛneɛ ɛmfiri Nyankopɔn.
Na bio, deɛ ɔgye nokorɛ asɛm no, so ɔgye no wɔ nokorɛ Honhom no so anaa kwan foforɔ bi so?
Sɛ ɛyɛ kwan foforɔ bi so a, ɛneɛ ɛmfiri Nyankopɔn.
Ne saa nti, adɛn nti na monntumi nteaseɛ na monnhunu sɛ deɛ ɔnam nokorɛ Honhom no so gye asɛm no, ɔgye no wɔ berɛ a wɔnam nokorɛ Honhom no so ka no?
Ɛno nti, deɛ ɔka asɛmpa no, ne deɛ ɔgye no te wɔn ho ase, na wɔn baanu nya nkɔsoɔ na wɔdi ahurusie bɔ mu.
Na deɛ ɛmma nkɔsoɔ no mmfiri Nyankopɔn hɔ, na ɛyɛ sum.
Na deɛ ɛfiri Nyankopɔn no yɛ hann; na deɛ ɔgye hann, na ɔkɔ so wɔ Nyankopɔn mu no, nya hann bebree, na saa hann no kɔso hyerɛn na ɛhyerɛn kɔsi da a ɛdi mũ no.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, na meka yei ama moahunu nokorɛ no, sɛdeɛ mobɛtumi ataataa esum ma afiri mo ntam;
Deɛ Nyankopɔn ahyɛ no sɔfoɔ na wasoma no no, wɔayi no sɛ ɔnyɛ kɛseɛ pa ara, ɛmmfa ho sɛ ɔno na ɔyɛ kumaa pa ara ne obiara somfoɔ.

Ɛno nti, ɔno na nneɛma nyina ara yɛ ne dea; ɛfiri sɛ nneɛma nyina ara hyɛ n’ase, deɛ ɛwɔ soro ne asase so, nkwa no ne hann no, Honhom no ne tumi no, a Agya no de ne pɛ nam ne Ba Yesu Kristo so de asoma no.
Nanso onipa biara nnyɛ nneɛma nyina ara so wura, gyesɛ wɔdwira no na wɔte ne ho firi bɔne nyina ara ho.
Na sɛ modwira mo ho na mote mo ho firi bɔne nyina ara ho a, mobɛbisa biribiara a mopɛ wɔ Yesu din mu na wɔbɛyɛ.
Nanso monhunu yei, wɔbɛ kyerɛ mo deɛ mobɛbisa; na ɛsiane sɛ wɔayi mo sɛ monyɛ atire nti, ahonhom no bɛhyɛ mo ase.

Ɛno nti, ɛbɛba sɛ, sɛ mohunu sɛ honhom bi ada ne ho adi na montumi nteaseɛ a, na sɛ monnya saa honhom no a, mommisa Agya no wɔ Yesu din mu; na sɛ wamma mo saa honhom no a, ɛnneɛ monhunu sɛ ɛmmfiri Onyankopɔn.
Na wɔbɛma mo tumi wɔ saa honhom no so; na momfa nne kɛseɛ mmɔ dawuro ntia honhom no sɛ ɛmmfiri Nyankopɔn—
Mommfa animka dennen mmɔ kwaadu, ama wanni mo so nkonim, anaa mommfa ahomasoɔ anaa ahurusie, ama wanni mo so.
Onii a ɔnya firi Onyankopɔn hɔ no, ma no nhunu sɛ ɛfiri Onyankopɔn; na ɔnni ahurisie sɛ Onyankopɔn abu no sɛ ɔfata sɛ ɔnya.
Na monyɛ setie na monyɛ saa nneɛma a mo nsa aka yi, ne deɛ mobɛnya akyire yi—na Agya no de aheman no ama mo, ne tumi a mode bɛdi nkonim wɔ nneɛma nyina ara a ɛmmfiri no no so—
Na hwɛ, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, nhyira ne mo a seesei moretie saa me nsɛm yi afiri m’akoa ano, esiane sɛ wɔde mo bɔne akyɛ mo.
Ma m’akoa Joseph Wakefield, a ɔsɔ m’ani yie no, ne m’akoa Parley P. Pratt nkɔ nsɔre no ntam na wɔmfa kasakyerɛ nhyɛ wɔn den;

Ne m’akoa John Corril nso, anaa me nkoa dodoɔ no ara a wɔahyɛ wɔn asɔfoɔ wɔ saa dibea yi mu, na momma wɔnyɛ adwuma wɔ me bobeturo no mu; na mma momma obiara nsi wɔn kwan wɔ deɛ mede ama wɔn sɛ wɔnyɛ no ho—
Ɛno nti, wɔ yei mu no m’akoa Edward Partridge nni bem; nanso ma ɔnsakyera na wɔde bɛkyɛ no.
Hwɛ, moyɛ mmɔfra nketewa na monntumi nnyina nneɛma nyina ara ano seesei; ɛsɛ sɛ monyini wɔ adom ne nokorɛ nimdeɛ mu.
Monnsuro, mmɔfra nketewa, ɛfiri sɛ moyɛ medeɛ, na madi wiase so nkomin, na moka wɔn a Agya no de ama me no ho;
Na wɔn a Agya no de ama me no mu biara renyera.
Na Agya no ne me yɛ baako. Mewɔ Agya no mu na Agya no wɔ me mu; na ɛnam sɛ moagye me nti, mowɔ me mu na mewɔ mo mu.
Ɛno nti, mewɔ mo mfinimfini, na mene odwanhwɛfo pa no, ne Israel boɔ no. Na deɛ ɔsi ne dan wɔ saa botan yi so no renhwe ase da.
Na da no reba a mobɛte me nne na mobɛhunu me, na mobɛhunu sɛ mete ase.
Ne saa nti, monwɛn, sɛdeɛ mobɛyɛ krado. Mpo saa ara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/51.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 51
chapter_summary: 1–8, Wɔyi Edward Partridge sɛ ɔnhyehyɛ sohwɛadwuma ahodoɔ ne agyapadeɛ so; 9–12, Ɛwɔ sɛ Ahotefoɔ no di wɔn ho nokorɛ na wɔnya no saa ara pɛpɛɛpɛ; 13–15, Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔnya ɔhwɛfoɔ adekoradan na wɔhyehyɛ agyapadeɛ no sɛdeɛ Awurade mmara teɛ; 16–20, Ohio bɛyɛ bea a wɔbɛboaboa wɔn ho ano atwɛn berɛ tiawa.

verses.text: Montie me, Awurade wo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ, na mɛkasa akyerɛ m’akoa Edward Partridge, na mama no akwankyerɛ; ɛfiri sɛ ɛho bɛhia sɛ ɔnya akwankyerɛ fa sɛdeɛ ɔbɛsi asiesie saa nkorɔfoɔ yi.
Ɛfiri sɛ ɛho bɛhia sɛ wɔsiesie wɔn sɛdeɛ me mmara teɛ; anyɛ saa a, wɔbɛtwa wɔn atwene.
Ɛno nti, ma m’akoa Edward Partridge, ne wɔn a wapaw wɔn a wɔsɔ m’ani yie no, nyi saa nkorɔfoɔ yi kyɛfa mma wɔn, onipa biara pɛpɛɛpɛ sɛdeɛ n’abusua teɛ, sɛdeɛ n’asetena ne n’apɛdeɛ ne n’ahiadeɛ teɛ.

Na sɛ m’akoa Edward Partridge ma ɔbarima biara ne kyɛfã a, momma no ntwerɛ nwoma bi mma no sɛdeɛ ɛbɛbɔ ne kyɛfã no ho ban, ama wasɔ mu, mpo saa hokwan yi ne apɛgyadeɛ wɔ asɔre no mu, kɔsi sɛ ɔbɛto mmara na wɔbɛnam asɔre no nne so abu no fɔ sɛ ɔmfata sɛ ɔbɛka asɔre no ho, sɛdeɛ asɔre no mmara ne apam teɛ.

Na sɛ ɔto mmara na wɔbu no fɔ sɛ ɔnnsɛ ɔka asɔre no ho a, ɔrennya tumi sɛ ɔbɛgye ne kyɛfa a ɔde abɔ afɔreɛ ama ɔhwɛfoɔ no, sɛ wɔmfa mma ɔnnibiefoɔ ne ahiafoɔ a wɔwɔ m’asɔre mu; ne saa nti, n’akyɛdeɛ no renyɛ ne deɛ bio, mmom ɔbɛnya tumi wɔ kyɛfa a wɔnam mmara kwan so de maa no no.
Na saa na wɔbɛma nneɛma nyina ara asi pi, sɛdeɛ asase no mmara teɛ.
Na ma deɛ ɛyɛ nkorɔfoɔ yi dea no wɔnyi mma saa nkurɔfoɔ yi.
Na nkorɔfoɔ yi sika nkaeɛ no—ma wɔnyi ɔnanmusifoɔ mma saa nkorɔfoɔ yi, na ɔmfa sika no ntɔ aduane ne aduradeɛ mma wɔn, sɛdeɛ nkorɔfoɔ no ahiasɛm teɛ.
Na ma onipa biara nni ne ho nokorɛ, na ɔnyɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ wɔ saa nkorɔfoɔ yi ntam, na ɔnya no saa ara, sɛdeɛ mobɛyɛ baako, mpo te sɛ deɛ mahyɛ mo no.
Na mma wɔmmfa deɛ ɛyɛ saa nkorɔfoɔ yi dea mma asɔre yi asafomma foforɔ.
Ɛno nti, sɛ asɔre foforɔ pɛ sɛ wɔgye sika firi saa asɔre yi hɔ a, momma wɔntua mma saa asɔre yi bio sɛdeɛ nhyehyɛeɛ wɔbɛyɛ no teɛ;
Na wɔbɛyɛ yei nam ɔhwɛfoɔ anaa ɔnanmusifoɔ no so, deɛ wɔnam asɔre no nne so bɛyi no no.
Na bio, ma ɔhwɛfoɔ no nyi adekoradan mma asɔre no; na ma biribiara a ɛyɛ sika ne aduane, a ɛdɔɔso kyɛn deɛ ehia ma deɛ saa nkorɔfoɔ yi pɛ no nhyɛ ɔhwɛfoɔ no nsam.
Na ma ɔno nso mfa bi nsie mma n’ankasa pɛ ho, ne deɛ n’abusua pɛ, ɛfiri sɛ wɔbɛfa no adwumayɛni ma wayɛ saa adwuma yi.
Na saa nti mema saa nkorɔfoɔ yi hokwan sɛ wɔnhyehyɛ wɔn ankasa wɔn ho sɛdeɛ me mmara teɛ.
Na medwira saa asase yi ho ma wɔn berɛ tiawa bi mu, kɔsi sɛ Me, Awurade, mɛsiesie baabi foforɔ ama wɔn, na mɛhyɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnkɔ hɔ;
Na dɔn no ne da no deɛ wɔmmfa mmaa wɔn, ɛno nti ma wɔnni dwuma wɔ saa asase yi so te sɛ deɛ wɔretena so mfeɛ pii, na yei bɛdane papa ama wɔn.
Hwɛ, yei bɛyɛ nhwɛsoɔ ama m’akoa Edward Partridge, wɔ mmea foforɔ, wɔ asɔre no mu nyina ara.
Na obiara a wɔbɛhunu no sɛ nokorɛfoɔ, teneneeni, ne hwɛsofoɔ nyansafoɔ no bɛkɔ Awurade anigyeɛ mu, na ɔbɛnya nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ.
Nokorɛ, mese mo sɛ, mene Yesu Kristo, deɛ ɔreba mpofirim no, wɔ dɔn a monnwene ho no. Mpo saa ara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/52.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 52
chapter_summary: 1–2, Wɔbɛyɛ nhyiamu a ɛdi so no wɔ Missouri; 3–8, Wɔda mpaninfoɔ binom a wɔyiyii wɔn sɛ wɔntu kwan mmɔ mu no adi; 9–11, Ɛsɛ sɛ mpaninfoɔ no kyerɛ deɛ asomafoɔ ne Nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no atwerɛ no; 12–21, Wɔn a Honhom no ma wɔn hann no so ayɛyie ne nyansa aba; 22–44, Wɔyi mpaninfoɔ ahodoɔ sɛ wɔnkɔka asɛmpa no wɔ berɛ a wɔretu kwan akɔ Missouri akɔyɛ Nhyiamu no.

verses.text: Hwɛ, sei na Awurade ka kyerɛ mpaninfoɔ a wafrɛ wɔn na wapa wɔn wɔ nna a ɛtwa toɔ yi mu, nam ne Honhom nne so—

Reka sɛ: Me, Awurade, mɛma moahunu deɛ mɛpɛ sɛ mobɛyɛ, firi saa berɛ yi kɔsi nhyiamu a ɛdi so no, a wɔbɛyɛ no wɔ Missouri, wɔ asase a mɛdwira ho ama me nkorɔfoɔ, a wɔyɛ Yakob asefoɔ nkaeɛ no, ne wɔn a wɔyɛ adedifoɔ sɛdeɛ apam no teɛ.
Ɛno nti, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, ma me nkoa Joseph Smith, Jun., ne Sidney Rigdon ntu kwan berɛ a wɔbɛtumi ayɛ ahoboaboa ntɛm so afiri wɔn afie, na wɔntu kwan nkɔ Missouri asase no so.
Na mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ ma me no, wɔbɛma wɔn ahunu deɛ wɔbɛyɛ;
Na mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔyɛ nokorɛfo no, wɔbɛsan nso ama wɔn ahunu mo apɛgyadeɛ asase no.
Na mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔnnyɛ nokorɛfoɔ no wɔbɛtwa wɔn atwene, mpo sɛdeɛ mepɛ, sɛdeɛ ɛyɛ ma me.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, momma m’akoa Lyman Wight ne m’akoa John Corrill ntu wɔn kwan ntɛmso.
Na m’akoa John Murdock, ne m’akoa Smith nso, ntu wɔn kwan mfa Detroit kwan no so nkɔ saa bea korɔ no ara.

Na ma wɔntu kwan mfiri hɔ nka asɛmpa no asɛm no wɔ kwan so, mma wɔnnka nsɛm foforɔ biara nnka deɛ nkɔmhyɛfoɔ ne asomafoɔ no atwerɛ no ho, ne deɛ wɔnam gyedie mpaebɔ so bɛma Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ no akyerɛkyerɛ wɔn.
Wɔnkɔ mmienu mmienu, na saa na wɔnka asɛmpa no wɔ kwan no so wɔ asafo biara mu, na ma wɔmmɔ asu nsuo mu, na wɔmfa wɔn nsa ngu wɔn so wɔ nsuo no nkyɛn.
Na sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ nie, mɛtwa m’adwuma tia wɔ tenenee mu, na nna no reba a mɛsoma atemmuo akɔ nkonimdie mu.
Na ma m’akoa Lyman Wight nhwɛ yie, ɛfiri sɛ Satan pɛ sɛ ɔpo no sɛ ntɛtɛ.
Na hwɛ, deɛ ɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ no wɔbɛyɛ no sodifoɔ wɔ nneɛma pii so.
Na bio, mɛma mo nhwɛsodeɛ wɔ nneɛma nyina ara mu, ama wɔannaadaa mo; ɛfiri sɛ Satan nenam asase no so, na ɔnenam na ɔredaadaa aman no—
Ɛno nti deɛ ɔbɔ mpaeɛ a ne honhom abotoɔ no, ɔno ara na magye no ato mu, sɛ ɔdi m’ayɛyɛdeɛ so a.
Deɛ ɔkasa a ne honhom abotoɔ no, deɛ ne kasa dwoɔ na ɛma nkɔsoɔ no, sɛ ɔdi m’ayɛyɛdeɛ so a, ɔno ara firi Nyankopɔn.
Na bio, deɛ ne ho popo wɔ me tumi ase no, wɔbɛhyɛ no den, na ɔbɛso ayɛyie ne nokorɛ aba, sɛdeɛ adiyisɛm ne nokorɛ a mede ama mo no teɛ.
Na bio, deɛ wɔdi ne so nkonim na ɔnnso aba no, mpo sɛdeɛ saa nhwɛsodeɛ yi teɛ no, mfiri me hɔ.
Ɛno nti, ɛnam saa nhwɛsoɔ yi so na mobɛhunu ahonhom wɔ nsɛm biara mu wɔ ɔsorosoro ase nyina ara.
Na nna no aba; sɛdeɛ nnipa gyidie teɛ no wɔbɛyɛ ama wɔn.
Hwɛ, wɔde saa mmarasɛm yi ama mpaninfoɔ a wapa wɔn no nyina ara.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, momma m’akoa Thomas B. Marsh ne m’akoa Ezra Thayre nso ntu wɔn kwan nka asɛmpa no wɔ kwan no so nkɔ saa asase korɔ no ara so.
Na bio, momma m’akoa Isaac Morley ne m’akoa Ezra Booth nso ntu kwan, nkɔka asɛm no wɔ kwan so wɔ saa asase yi ara so.
Na bio, momma me nkoa Edward Partridge ne Martin Harris ne me nkoa Sidney Rigdon ne Joesph Smith, Jun. ntu wɔn kwan.
Momma me nkoa David Whitmer ne Harvey Whitlock nso ntu wɔn kwan, nka asɛmpa no wɔ kwan no so nkɔ saa asase korɔ no ara so.
Momma me nkoa Parley P. Pratt ne Orson Pratt ntu wɔn kwan, nka asɛmpa no wɔ kwan no so, mpo nkɔ saa asase korɔ no ara so.
Momma me nkoa Solomon Hancock ne Simeon Carter nso ntu wɔn kwan nkɔ saa asase korɔ no ara so, nka asɛmpa no wɔ kwan no so.
Momma me nkoa Edson Fuller ne Jacob Scott nso ntu wɔn kwan.
Momma me nkoa Levi W. Hancock ne Zebedee Coltrin nso ntu wɔn kwan.
Momma me nkoa Reynolds Cahoon ne Samuel H. Smith nso ntu kwan.
Momma me nkoa Wheeler Baldwin ne William Carter nso ntu wɔn kwan.
Na momma wɔnhyɛ me nkoa Newel Knight ne Selah J. Griffin asɔfoɔ, na wɔn nso ntu wɔn kwan.
Aane, nokorɛ mese, momma yeinom ntu kwan nkɔ bea baako, mfa akwan ahodoɔ so, na onipa baako rensi ne dan wɔ ɔfoforɔ fapem so, anaa ɔntu kwan wɔ ɔfoforɔ anammɔn kwan so.
Deɛ ɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ no, ɔno ara na wɔbɛkora no de aba pii ahyira no.
Na bio, mese mo, momma me nkoa Joseph Wakefield ne Solomon Humphrey ntu wɔn kwan nkɔ apueɛ nsase so;
Momma wɔne wɔn mmusua nyɛ adwuma, mma wɔnka nneɛma foforɔ biara nkyɛn nkɔmhyɛfoɔ ne asomafoɔ no, deɛ wɔahunu ne deɛ wɔate ne deɛ wɔgye di kɛse ampara, sɛdeɛ nkɔmhyɛ no bɛhyɛ ma.
Ɛnam mmaratoɔ nti, momma wɔnnye deɛ wɔde maa Heman Basset no mfiri ne hɔ, na wɔmfa nto Simonds Ryder tiri so.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, momma wɔnhyɛ Jared Carter sɔfo, na George James nso wɔnhyɛ no sɔfo.
Ma mpaninfoɔ a aka no nwɛn asɔre no, na wɔnka asɛm no wɔ amantam a atwa wɔn ho ahyia no mu; na wɔmfa wɔn ankasa nsa nyɛ adwuma ama abosomsɛm amma anaa wɔannyɛ atirimuɔdensɛm biara.
Na ade nyina ara mu no, monkae ɔnnibiefoɔ ne ahiafoɔ, ayarefoɔ ne amanehunufoɔ, ɛfiri sɛ deɛ ɔnnyɛ saa nneɛma yi no nnyɛ me kyidifoɔ.
Na bio, ma me nkoa Joseph Smith, Jun., ne Sidney Rigdon ne Edward Partridge nnye akwanya krataa mfiri asɔre no hɔ. Na ma wɔnye bi mma m’akoa Oliver Cowdery nso.
Na saa na, mpo sɛdeɛ maka no, sɛ moyɛ nokorɛfoɔ a mobɛhyia abɔ mu abɛdi ahurusie wɔ Missouri asase so, deɛ ɛyɛ mo apɛgyadeɛ asase no, deɛ seesei yi ɛyɛ mo atamfo asase no.
Nanso, hwɛ, Me, Awurade, mɛyɛ kuro no ntɛm wɔ ne berɛ mu, na mɛbɔ nokorɛfoɔ no anigyeɛ ne ahurusie abotire.
Hwɛ, Mene Yesu Kristo, Onyankopɔn Ba no, na mɛma wɔn so da a ɛtwa toɔ no. Aane. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/53.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 53
chapter_summary: 1–3, Sidney Gilbert frɛ ne ne yie wɔ Asɔre no mu ne sɛ wɔbɛhyɛ no sɔfoɔ sɛ panin; 4–7, Ɔbɛsan so asom sɛ ɔhwɛfoɔ no nanmusifoɔ.

verses.text: Hwɛ, mese wo, m’akoa Sidney Gilbert, sɛ mate wo mpaebɔ; na woafrɛ me sɛ wɔmma wonhunu wo, mfiri Awurade wo Nyankopɔn hɔ, deɛ ɛfa wo frɛ ne wo yie ho wɔ asɔre a mama so wɔ saa nna a ɛtwa toɔ yi mu no.
Hwɛ, Me, Awurade, a wɔbɔɔ me asɛnnua mu maa wiase bɔne no, ma wo mmarasɛm sɛ ɛwɔ sɛ wo pa wiase akyi.
Fa m’asɔfohyɛ to wo ho so, mpo opanin deɛ no, na ka gyedie ne nsakyeraeɛ ne bɔne fafiri ho asɛm, sɛdeɛ m’asɛm teɛ, ne Honhom Kronkron no nya a ɛnam nsa a wɔde gu soɔ no so;
Na bio sɛ wobɛyɛ ɔnanmusifoɔ ama saa asɔre yi wɔ bea a ɔhwɛfoɔ no bɛkyerɛ no, sɛdeɛ mmaransɛm a wɔde bɛma akyire no teɛ.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese wo, ɛsɛ sɛ wone me nkoa Joseph Smith Jun., ne Sidney Rigdon bɛtu mo kwan.
Hwɛ, yeinom ne m’ayɛyɛdeɛ a ɛdikan a wobɛnya; na nkaeɛ no wɔbɛda no adi wɔ berɛ bi a ɛbɛba no mu, sɛdeɛ w’adwuma wɔ me bobeturo mu teɛ.
Na bio, mɛpɛ sɛ mobɛhunu sɛ deɛ ɔpere kɔsi awieɛ nko ara na wɔbɛgye no. Mpo saa ara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/54.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 54
chapter_summary: 1–6, Ɛsɛ sɛ Ahotefoɔ no di asɛmpa apam no so ama wɔanya mmɔborɔhunu; 7–10, Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔsi aboterɛ wɔ amanehunu mu.

verses.text: Hwɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ nie, mpo Alfa ne Omega, mfitiaseɛ ne awieɛ no, mpo deɛ wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu maa wiase bɔne no—
Hwɛ, nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese wo, m’akoa Newel Knight, sɛ ɛwɔ sɛ wogyina pintinn wɔ dibea a mayi ama wo no mu.
Na sɛ wo nuanom pɛ sɛ wɔdwane wɔn atamfoɔ a, ma wɔnsakyera mfiri wɔn bɔne nyina ara ho, na nokorɛ mu wɔmmrɛ wɔn ho ase na wɔmoto wɔ m’anim.
Na ɛnam sɛ wɔabu apam a wɔne me yɛɛe no so nti, mpo saa ara na abɛyɛ hunu na hwee remfiri mu mma.
Na mmusuo nka deɛ hwintidua nam no so ba no, ɛfiri sɛ ɛbɛyɛ ama no sɛ wɔbɛdɔ no asukɔ wɔ ɛpo bunu mu.
Nanso nhyira ne wɔn a wɔadi m’apam so na wɔadi me mmarasɛm so, na wɔn na wɔbɛhunu wɔn mmɔbɔ.
Ɛno nti, monkɔ seesei na monwane mfiri asase no so, anyɛ saa a mo atamfo bɛba mo so; na montu mo kwan, na monyi deɛ mopɛ sɛ ɔnyɛ mo kannifoɔ, na ɔntuatua mma mo.
Na saa na mobɛtu mo kwan akɔ atɔeɛ amantam no mu, akɔ Missouri asase so, akɔ Lamanfoɔ ahyeɛ no so.
Na akyire yi a moatu kwan no awie, hwɛ, mese mo, monhwehwɛ nnipa asetena pa, kɔsi sɛ mɛsiesie baabi ama mo.
Na bio, monsi aboterɛ wɔ amanehunu mu nkɔsi sɛ mɛba; na, hwɛ, mereba mpofirim, na mekura m’akatua, na wɔn a wɔahwehwɛ me ntɛm no bɛnya ahomegyeɛ ama wɔn akra. Mpo saa ara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/55.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 55
chapter_summary: 1–3, Wɔfrɛ William W. Phelps na wɔpaw no sɛ wɔmmɔ no asu, na wɔnhyɛ no sɔfoɔ sɛ opanin, na ɔnka asɛmpa no; 4, Ɛwɔ sɛ ɔtwerɛ nwoma nso ma mmɔfra a wɔwɔ Asɔre sukuu mu; 5–6, Ɛwɔ sɛ ɔtu kwan kɔ Misssouri, ɛhɔ na ɔbɛyɛ n’adwuma.

verses.text: Hwɛ, sei na Awurade se wo, m’akoa William, aane, mpo asase nyina ara Wura no, wɔafrɛ wo na wɔapaw wo; na wɔde nsuo abɔ wo asu akyire yi no, a sɛ wode ani korɔ yɛ ma m’animuonyam a, wobɛnya wo bɔne fafiri na woanya Honhom Kronkron no nam nsa a wɔde gu soɔ no so.

Na afei wɔnam m’akoa Joseph Smith, Jun., nsa so bɛhyɛ wo sɔfoɔ ma woabɛyɛ opanin ama saa asɔre yi, sɛdeɛ wobɛka nsakyeraeɛ ne bɔne fafiri ho asɛm nam asubɔ so wɔ Yesu Kristo, Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ Ba no din mu.
Na obibiara a wode wo nsa bɛgu no so no, sɛ waboto wɔ m’anim a, wobɛnya tumi ama no Honhom Kronkron no.
Na bio, wɔbɛhyɛ wo sɔfoɔ ama woaboa m’akoa Oliver Cowdery wɔ skuul a ɛwɔ asɔre yi mu no nwoma tintim ne nyiyimu, ne ne twerɛ, ama mmɔfra nketewa nso anya nkyerɛkyerɛ wɔ m’anim sɛdeɛ ɛsɔ m’ani.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese wo, ɛnam yei nti wone me nkoa Joseph Smith, Jun., ne Sidney Rigdon bɛtu mo kwan ama wɔatumi adua wo wɔ w’apɛgyadeɛ asase so ama woayɛ saa adwuma yi.
Na bio, ma m’akoa Joseph Coe nso ne wɔn ntu ne kwan. Wɔbɛda nkaeɛ no adi akyire yi, mpo sɛdeɛ mepɛ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/56.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 56
chapter_summary: 1–2 Ɛsɛ sɛ Ahotefoɔ no fa wɔn asɛnnua na wɔdi Awurade akyi ama wɔanya nkwagyeɛ; 3–13, Awurade hyɛ na ɔtwa mu, na wɔto asoɔdenfoɔ no twene; 14–17, Mmusuo nka adefoɔ a wɔremmoa ahiafoɔ, na mmusuo nka ahiafoɔ a wɔn akoma mmubuuɛ; 18–20, Nhyira nka ahiafoɔ a wɔn akoma mu teɛ, na wɔn na wɔbɛnya asase no adi.

verses.text: Montie, O mo nnipa a mo ka me din kyerɛ, Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ; ɛfiri sɛ hwɛ, m’abufuo redɛre tia atuatefoɔ no, na wɔbɛhunu me basa ne m’abohuro, wɔ asotwe ne abufuo da a ɛreba aman no so.
Na deɛ ɔremfa n’asɛnnua na ɔnni m’akyi, na ɔnni me mmaransɛm soɔ no, wɔrennye no nkwa.
Hwɛ, Me, Awurade, hyɛ mmara; na deɛ ɔrennyɛ setie no, wɔbɛtwa no atwene me ara me mmerɛ a ɛsɛ mu, akyire yi a mahyɛ mmara na wɔabu me mmarasɛm soɔ no.
Ɛno nti, Me, Awurade, hyɛ na metwa mu, sɛdeɛ ɛyɛ ma me; na wɔde yei nyina ara bɛgu atuatefoɔ tiri so, Awurade na ɔseɛ.

Ɛno nti, metwa mmarasɛm a wɔde maa me nkoa Thomas B. Marsh ne Ezra Thayre no mu, na mema m’akoa Thomas mmarasɛm foforɔ, sɛ ɔntu ne kwan ntɛmpa yi ara nkɔ Missouri asase so ntɛmso, na m’akoa Selah J. Griffin nso ne no nkɔ.
Na hwɛ metwa mmarasɛm a wɔde maa me nkoa Selah J. Griffin ne Newel Knight no mu, ɛnam me nkorɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ Thompson no kɔnseneɛ, ne wɔn atuateɛ nti.
Ɛno nti, momma m’akoa Newel Knight nka wɔn ho; na dodoɔ no ara a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔkɔ no wɔnkɔ, wɔn a wɔabotoɔ wɔ m’anim no, na ɔnni wɔn anim kan nkɔ asase a m’ayi no so.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ m’akoa Ezra Thayre sakyera firi n’ahantan ne ne pɛsɛmenkomenya ho, na ɔdi mmarasɛm dada a mede ama no so, a ɛfa bea a ɔte no ho.
Na sɛ ɔbɛyɛ yei a, esiane sɛ mpaepaemu biara remma asase no so nti, wɔbɛkɔ so ara ayi no sɛ ɔnkɔ Missouri asase no so.
Anyɛ saa a ɔbɛgye sika a watua no, na ɔbɛfiri bea hɔ, na wɔbɛtwa no afiri m’asɔre mu, asafo Awurade Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ;
Na ɛwom sɛ ɔsoro ne asase bɛtwa mu akɔ deɛ, saa nsɛm yi rentwa mu nkɔ, na mmom ɛbɛba mu.
Na sɛ ɛho bɛhia sɛ m’akoa Joseph Smith, Jun. tua sika no a, hwɛ, Me, Awurade, mɛtua ama no bio wɔ Missouri asase no so, ama wɔn a ɔbɛnya afiri wɔn hɔ no anya akatua bio sɛdeɛ deɛ wɔyɛ teɛ;
Ɛfiri sɛ wɔbɛnya sɛdeɛ wɔn nnwuma teɛ, mpo wɔ wɔn apɛgyadeɛ nsase so.
Hwɛ, sei na Awurade se me nkorɔfoɔ—a mowɔ nneɛma bebree yɛ na mosakyera firi ho no; ɛfiri sɛ hwɛ, mo bɔne aforo aba me hɔ, na wɔmmfa mfiriiɛ, ɛfiri sɛ mohwehwɛ sɛ motu fo mo ankasa mo akwan so.
Na mo akoma mmeeɛ. Na monnyɛ setie mma nokorɛ no, mmom moani gye wɔ deɛ ɛntene ho.

Mmusuo nka mo adefoɔ, a mommfa mo nneɛma no bi mma onnibiefoɔ, na mo ahonya bɛpo ahonyadeɛ bɛwewe mo akra; na yei bɛyɛ mo kwadwomtoɔ wɔ asotwe ne atemmuo ne abohuro da no mu: Otwa berɛ atwa mu, ahuhuro berɛ aba awieɛ, na wɔannye me kra nkwa!

Mmusuo nka mo ɔnnibiefoɔ, a mo akoma mmubuuɛ, mo a mo honhom mbotooɛ, mo a mo yɛfunu mmeeɛ, ne mo a montwee mo nsa mfirii nnipa foforɔ nneɛma ho, a adifudepɛ ahyɛ mo ani mu ma, na mommfa mo ankasa mo nsa nnyɛ adwuma!

Nhyira ne onnibiefoɔ a wɔn akoma mu teɛ, a wɔn akoma abubuo, na wɔn honhom abotoɔ, na wɔn na wɔbɛhunu Onyankopɔn aheman no sɛ ɛreba wɔ tumi ne animuonyam kɛseɛ mu ama, wɔanya ɔgyeɛ; na asase so sradeɛ bɛyɛ wɔn dea.
Ɛfiri sɛ hwɛ, Awurade bɛba, na ɔde n’akatua bɛba, na ɔbɛtua onipa biara ka, na onnibiefoɔ bɛdi ahurusie;
Na wɔn awoɔntoatoasoɔ no bɛnya asase no adi afiri awoɔntoatoasoɔ so kɔsi awoɔntoatoasoɔ so, afebɔɔ ne afebɔɔ. Mpo saa ara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/57.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 57
chapter_summary: 1–3, Independence, Missouri, ne beaɛ ma Sion Kuropɔn ne tɛmpol no; 4–7, Ɛwɔ sɛ Ahotefoɔ no tɔ nsase na wɔnya apɛgyadeɛ wɔ saa beaɛ hɔ; 8–16, Ɛsɛ sɛ Sidney Gilbert yɛ adwadidan, William W. Phelps bɛyɛ nwoma tintimfoɔ, na Oliver Cowdery bɛsiesie nwoma ama wɔatintim.

verses.text: Montie, O m’asɔre mpaninfoɔ, Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ, mo a moahyia mo ho mo ho abɔ mu, sɛdeɛ me mmaransɛm teɛ, wɔ asase yi so, a ɛyɛ Missouri asase, a ɛyɛ asase a mayi na madwira ho ama ahotefoɔ no anoboaboa.
Ɛno nti, yei ne bɔhyɛ asase no, ne bea ma Sion kuropɔn no

Na sɛdeɛ Awurade mo Nyankopɔn seɛ nie, sɛ mobɛnya nyansa a nyansa nie. Hwɛ, bea a wɔfrɛ no Independence seesei no ne bea no mfinfini; na faako a wɔbɛsi tɛmpol no da atɔeɛ fa mu hɔ, wɔ bea a ɛne asɛnnibea no ntam nnware.
Ɛno nti, ɛyɛ nyansa sɛ ahotefoɔ no bɛtɔ asase no, ne asase biara a ɛda atɔeɛ fa mu hɔ, mpo de kɔsi ɛhyeɛ a ɛda Yudafoɔ ne Amanamanfoɔ ntam pɛpɛɛpɛ no;
Ɛne asase biara nso a ɛne ɛserɛ no bɔ hyeɛ no, sɛ m’akyidifoɔ no bɛtumi atɔ nsase no a. Hwɛ, nyansa nie, sɛ wɔbɛnya no sɛ daapem apɛgyadeɛ.

Na momma m’akoa Sidney Gilbert nnyina dwumadibea a mayi ama no mu, sɛ ɔbɛgyegye sika, sɛ ɔbɛyɛ ɔnamusifoɔ ama asɔre no, sɛ ɔbɛtɔ nsase wɔ amantam a atwa ahyia wɔ hɔ no nyina ara mu, mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔbɛtumi ayɛ no wɔ tenenee mu, ne sɛdeɛ nyansa bɛkyerɛ a.
Na momma m’akoa Edward Partridge nnyina dwumadibea a mayi ama no mu, na ɔnkyɛ ahotefoɔ no apɛgyadeɛ mma wɔn, mpo sɛdeɛ mahyɛ no; ne wɔn nso a wɔayi wɔn sɛ wɔmmoa no no.

Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, momma m’akoa Sidney Gilbert ntena saa bea yi, na ɔnsi adwadidan, ama watumi atɔn adwadeɛ a ɔmmfa amim, sɛdeɛ ɔbɛnya sika atɔ nsase ama ahotefoɔ no yieyɛ, na ama wanya biribiara a akyidifoɔ no bɛhia a wɔde bɛtena wɔn apɛgyadeɛ mu.

Na bio, momma m’akoa Sidney Gilbert nya tumi krataa—hwɛ nyansa nie, na obiara a ɔkan no, ma no nte aseɛ—ama ɔde nneɛma nso akɔma nkorɔfoɔ no, mpo nam obiara a ɔpɛ so, sɛ krakye a wafa no adwuma wɔ ne som mu;
Na saa na monyɛ mfa nhwɛ m’ahotefoɔ, ama wɔatumi aka m’asɛmpa no akyerɛ wɔn a wɔte sum mu ne ɔmantam no mu ne esum kabii mu.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, momma m’akoa William W. Phelps ntena saa bea yi, na ɔnyɛ nwoma tintimfoɔ mma asɔre no.
Na hwɛ, sɛ wiase gye ne ntwerɛeɛ no a—hwɛ nyansa nie—momma ɔnya deɛ ɔbɛtumi anya biara wɔ tenenee mu, mma ahotefoɔ no yieyɛ.

Na momma m’akoa Oliver Cowdery mmoa no, mpo sɛdeɛ mahyɛ no, wɔ baabibiara a mɛyi ama no, sɛ ɔnhwɛso ntwerɛ na ɔnsiesie, na ɔnsa mu, ama nneɛma nyina ara atene wɔ m’anim, sɛdeɛ Honhom no nam no so bɛkyerɛ.
Naa saa na ma wɔn a maka wɔn ho asɛm no, ntena Sion asase no so, ntɛmpa yi ara sɛdeɛ wɔbɛtumi, wɔne wɔn mmusua, na wɔnyɛ saa nneɛma no mpo sɛdeɛ maka no.

Na afei ɛfa anoboaboa ho no—Momma ɔhwɛfoɔ No ne ɔnanmusifoɔ no nyɛ ahoboa mma saa mmusua no a wɔahyɛ wɔn sɛ wɔmmra saa asase yi so no, ntɛmso, ara sɛdeɛ wɔbɛtumi, na wɔntena wɔ wɔn apɛgyadeɛ asase so.
Na mpaninfoɔ ne asɔremma a wɔaka no, wɔbɛma wɔn akwankyerɛ bio akyire yi. Aane. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/58.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 58
chapter_summary: 1–5, Wɔn a wɔgyina amanehunu mu no wɔbɛhyɛ wɔn animuonyam ahenkyɛ; 6–12, Ɛwɔ sɛ ahotefoɔ no siesie wɔn ho ma Adwammaa no awareɛ ne Awurade adidie no; 13–18, Ahwɛfoɔ yɛ Israel atɛmmuafoɔ; 19–23, Ɛwɔ sɛ Ahotefoɔ no yɛ setie ma asase no mmara; 24–29, Ɛwɔ sɛ nnipa de ne pɛ yɛ papa; 30–33, Awurade hyɛ mmara na ɔtwa mu; 34–43, Nsakyeraeɛ mu no, ɛsɛ sɛ nnipa pae mu ka wɔn bɔne na wɔpa wɔn ho akyi; 44–58, Ɛwɔ sɛ ahotefoɔ no tɔ wɔn apɛgyadeɛ na wɔboa wɔn ano wɔ Missouri; 59–65, Ɛwɔ sɛ wɔka asɛmpa no kyerɛ abɔdeɛ biara.

verses.text: Montie, O m’asɔre mpaninfoɔ, na monyɛ aso mma m’asɛm, na monsua mfiri me hɔ me pɛ a ɛfa mo ho, ne deɛ ɛfa saa asase a masoma mo wɔ so yi nso ho.
Na nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, nhyira ne deɛ ɔdi me mmaransɛm so, sɛ ɔte ase anaa wawuo; na deɛ ɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ wɔ amanehunu mu no, ɔno korɔ no ara akatua yɛ kɛse pa ara wɔ ɔsoro aheman mu.
Monntumi mfa mo honam mu ani nhunu, saa berɛ yi mu, mo Nyankopɔn nhyehyɛeɛ a ɛfa saa nneɛma a ɛbɛba akyire yi ho, ne animuonyam a ɛbɛdi so wɔ amanehunu pii akyi.
Na amanehunu pii akyi na nhyira no ba. Ɛno nti ɛda no reba a wɔbɛhyɛ mo animuonyam kɛseɛ ahenkyɛ; dɔnhwere no nnuruui, nanso abɛn pa ara.
Monkae yei, deɛ mereka akyerɛ mo ansa, ama moatumi de ato akoma so, na moagye deɛ ɛbɛdi soɔ no.
Hwɛ, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, yei nti na masoma mo—sɛ mobɛyɛ setie, na afei mobɛsiesie moakoma adi adanseɛ afa nneɛma a ɛbɛba no ho;
Na bio, sɛdeɛ wɔbɛhyɛ mo animuonyam wɔ fapemtoɔ no mu nso, ne adansedie a ɛfa asase a Onyankopɔn Sion no bɛgyina so no ho;
Na bio ama wɔasiesie nneɛma a adɔre apontoɔ ama onnibiefoɔ; aane, nneɛma a adɔre apontoɔ, ɛne bobesa ase a wɔasɔne so yie, sɛdeɛ asase no bɛhunu sɛ nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no ano renni hwammɔ;
Aane, adidie a ɛyɛ Awurade fie deɛ, a wɔasiesie no yie, a wɔbɛto nsa afrɛ amanaman nyina ara no.
Ɛdi kan, adefoɔ ne nimdefoɔ, anyansafoɔ ne animuonyamfoɔ;
Na ɛno akyi na me tumi da no bɛba; afei onnibiefoɔ, mpakye, anifirafoɔ, ne asotifoɔ, bɛba Adwammaa no awareɛ no ase, na wɔbɛfa Awurade adidi no a, wɔasiesie ama da kɛseɛ a ɛreba no.
Hwɛ, Me, Awurade, na maka.
Na sɛdeɛ adansedie no bɛfiri Sion akɔ, aane, afiri Nyankopɔn apɛgyadeɛ kuropɔn no anomu—
Aane, yei nti na masoma mo saa bea yi, na mapaw m’akoa Edward Partridge, na mayi n’asɛmpatrɛ ama no wɔ saa asase yi so.
Nanso sɛ wansakyera amfiri ne bɔne ho, a ɛyɛ annye-annie ne akoma-anifraeɛ a, ma no nhwɛ yie anyɛ saa a ɔbɛhwe ase.
Hwɛ wɔde n’asɛmpatrɛ ama no, na wɔnnsan mfa mma no bio.
Na deɛ ɔgyina saa asɛmpatrɛ yi mu no wɔayi no sɛ ɔmmɛyɛ ɔtɛmmuafoɔ wɔ Israel, te sɛ deɛ na ɛteɛ wɔ tete nna no mu, sɛ ɔbɛkyɛ Onyankopɔn apɛgyadeɛ nsase ama ne mma;
Na ɔmmu ne nnipa atɛn mfa ateneneefoɔ adansedie so, ne n’afotufoɔ mmoa, sɛdeɛ aheman no mmara teɛ, deɛ Onyankopɔn nkɔmhyɛfoɔ de ama.
Na nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, wɔbɛdi me mmara so wɔ asase yi so.
Mma onipa biara nnwene sɛ ɔyɛ ɔsodifoɔ; mmom ma Onyankopɔn nni nea obu atɛn so, sɛdeɛ n’afutuo ne ɔno ara ankasa pɛ te, anaa nsɛm foforɔ mu no, deɛ ɔtu fo anaa ɔte atɛmmuo-adwa no so.
Mma onipa biara mmu asase no mmara so, na deɛ ɔdi Onyankopɔn mmara so no nhia sɛ ɔbu asase no mmara so.
Ɛno nti, monhyɛ tumi biara a ɛwɔ hɔ ase, kɔsi sɛ ɔbɛdi hene ɔno a ɛyɛ ne deɛ sɛ ɔdi hene, na ɔbrɛ atamfo nyina ara ase wɔ ne nan ase.
Hwɛ, mmara a moanya afiri me nsam no yɛ asɔre no mmara, na wɔ hann yei mu na mobɛsɔ mu de akɔ. Hwɛ, nyansa nie.
Na afei, sɛdeɛ Meka faa m’akoa Edward Partridge ho no, saa asase yi ne ne tenabea asase, ne wɔn a wayi wɔn sɛ n’afutufoɔ; ne tenabea de ma deɛ mayi no sɛ ɔnhwɛ m’adekoradan so no nso.
Ɛno nti, momma wɔmfa wɔn mmusua mmra asase yi so, sɛdeɛ afotuo a wɔne me ne wɔn ho bɛtu teɛ.
Na hwɛ, ɛmfata sɛ mɛhyɛ wɔ ade nyina ara mu; na deɛ wɔhyɛ no ade nyina ara mu no, ɔno ara yɛ ɔkwadwofoɔ na ɔnnyɛ akoa nyansafoɔ; ɛno nti ɔnnya akatua.
Nokorɛ mese, ɛwɔ sɛ nnipa de ahopepereɛ de wɔn ho hyɛ adwuma pa mu, na wɔyɛ nneɛma bebree wɔ wɔn ara ankasa pɛ mu, na wɔda teneneeyɛ pii adi;
Esiane sɛ tumi no wɔ wɔn mu, ɛno mu na wɔyɛ ananmusifoɔ ma wɔn ho. Na mmerɛ dodoɔ a nnipa yɛ papa no, kwan biara so, wɔrenhwere wɔn akatua.
Nanso deɛ ɔnyɛ biribiara kɔsi sɛ wɔhyɛ no no, na ɔde annye-annie akoma bɛgye mmarasɛm, na ɔdi so wɔ akwadworɔ mu no, ɔno ara yɛ deɛ wɔabu no fɔ.
Hwan ne me a meyɛɛ nnipa, Awurade na ɔseɛ, na memmu no fɔ, deɛ ɔnnyɛ setie mma me mmaransɛm no?
Hwan ne me, Awurade na ɔseɛ, a mahyɛ bɔ na manni so?
Mehyɛ na nnipa nnyɛ setie; metwam na wɔnnya nhyira no.
Ɛno nti wɔka wɔ wɔn akoma mu sɛ: Yei nyɛ Awurade adwuma, esiane sɛ ne bɔhyɛ amma mu. Nanso mmusuo nka wɔn a wɔte saa no, na wɔn akatua tetɛ aseɛ na ɛmfiri soro.
Na seesei mema mo akwankyerɛ bi ka ho fa saa asase yi ho.
Ɛyɛ nyansa wɔ me mu sɛ m’akoa Martin Harris bɛyɛ nhwɛsoɔ ama asɔre no, sɛ ɔde ne sika bɛto asɔre no hwɛfoɔ no anim.
Na bio, yei yɛ mmara ma onipa biara nso a ɔbɛba saa asase yi so abɛgye apɛgyadeɛ; na ɔde ne sika bɛyɛ sɛdeɛmmara no kyerɛ.
Na ɛyɛ nyansa nso sɛ wɔbɛtɔ nsase wɔ Independence, bea ma adekoradan no, ne fie nso a wɔbɛtintim nwoma wɔ mu no.
Na akwankyerɛ foforɔ a ɛfa m’akoa Martin Harris ho no, Honhom no de bɛma no, ama watumi agye n’apɛgyadeɛ sɛdeɛ ɛyɛ ma no;
Na ɔnsakyera mfiri ne bɔne ho, ɛsiane sɛ ɔhwehwɛ wiase nkamfoɔ.
Na momma m’akoa William W. Phelps nso nnyina dwumadibea a mayi ama no mu, na ɔnye n’apɛgyadeɛ wɔ asase no so.
Na bio, ɛho hia nso sɛ ɔsakyera; na Me, Awurade, ɔnnsɔ m’ani yie, esiane sɛ ɔhwehwɛ sɛ ɔboro obiara so, na ɔnnwo koraa sɛdeɛ ɛfata wɔ m’anim.
Hwɛ, deɛ wasakyera afiri ne bɔne ho no, wɔde akyɛ no, na Me, Awurade, menkae bio.
Ɛnam yei so mobɛhunu sɛ onipa bi asakyera afiri ne bɔne ho—hwɛ, ɔbɛpae mu aka ne bɔne na ɔbɛpa ne ho akyi.

Na afei, nokorɛ, meka fa m’asɔre mpaninfoɔ nkae no ho, berɛ no nnya mmae, mfeɛ bebree mu, sɛ wɔbɛgye wɔn apɛgyadeɛ wɔ saa asase yi so, gye sɛ wɔnya ɛho pɛ nam gyedie mpaebɔ so, sɛdeɛ Awurade bɛyi ama wɔn nko ara.
Na, hwɛ, wɔbɛpia nnipa no abɔ mu firi wiase ano.
Ɛno nti, monhyia mmɔ mu; na wɔn a wɔanyi wɔn sɛ wɔntena saa asase yi so no, momma wɔnka asɛmpa no wɔ amantam a atwa ahyia wɔn ho no; na ɛno akyiri no momma wɔn nsan nkɔ wɔn afie.
Wɔnka asɛmpa no wɔ kwan so, na wɔn-ni nokorɛ no ho adanseɛ, wɔ mmeae mmeae nyina ara, na wɔmfrɛ adefoɔ, adehyeɛ ne awiemfoɔ, ne onnibiefoɔ sɛ wɔnsakyera.
Na momma wɔnsisi nsɔre, mmerɛ dodoɔ a asase sotefoɔ no bɛsakyera.
Na wɔmfa asɔre no nne so nyi ananmusini mma Ohio asɔre no, sɛ ɔbɛgye sika atɔ nsase wɔ Sion.
Na mema m’akoa Sidney Rigdon mmarasɛm, sɛ ɔntwerɛ kasakyerɛmu mfa Sion asase no ho, ne ano-asɛm a ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn pɛ, sɛdeɛ Honhom no bɛda no adi akyerɛ no;

Na wɔntwerɛ krataa ne ntoboa nwoma nkɔto nsɔre no nyina ara anim sɛ wɔbɛnya sika, de ahyɛ ɔhwɛfoɔ no nsam; wɔmfa nhyɛ ɔhwɛfoɔ no nsa, ɔno ankasa anaa ananmusini no, sedeɛ ɔhwɛ a ɛyɛ ma no, anaa sedeɛ ɔbɛkyerɛ; na wɔmfa ntotɔ nsase nyɛ apɛgyadeɛ mma Onyakopɔn mma.
Na, hwɛ, nokorɛ mese mo, ɛyɛ Awurade pɛ sɛ asuafoɔ no ne nnipa mma bɛbue wɔn akoma mu, mpo na sɛ wɔbɛtɔ saa ɔman yi mantam nyina ara, ntɛmso sɛdeɛ berɛ bɛma ho kwan.
Hwɛ, nyansa nie. Momma wɔnyɛ yei, anyɛ saa a wɔrennya apɛgyadeɛ biara, gye sɛ wɔnam mogya-hwiegu so.
Na bio, mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔnya asase no, wɔnsoma adwumayɛfoɔ ahoroɔ biara nkɔ saa asase yi so, nkɔyɛ adwuma mma Onyankopɔn ahotefoɔ.
Momma wɔnyɛ yeinom nyina ara wɔ ne kwan so; na momma nsase no ho adenya biara nna adi berɛ ano berɛ ano, mfiri ɔhwɛfoɔ no anaa asɔre ɔnanmusifoɔ no hɔ.
Na momma anoboaboa adwuma no nnyɛ ntɛmpɛ so, anaa adwane so; na wɔnyɛ no sɛdeɛ asɔre mpaninfoɔ bɛma afotuo wɔ nhyiamu ase, sɛdeɛ nimdeɛ a wɔnya no berɛ ano berɛ ano no teɛ.
Na momma m’akoa Sidney Rigdon ndwira saa asase yi ho na ɔnyi nsi hɔ, ne tɛmpol asase no, mma Awurade.

Na momma wɔmfrɛ agyinatu nhyiamu; na ɛno akyi momma menkoa Sidney Rigdon ne Joseph Smith, Jun., nsan wɔn akyi, na Oliver Cowdery nso nka wɔn ho, nkɔwie adwuma no nkaeɛ a mayi de ama wɔ wɔn ankasa asase so, ne nkaeɛ no sɛdeɛ nhyiamu no bɛkyerɛ.
Na mma onipa biara nsan n’akyi mfiri saa asase yi so gye sɛ ɔdi adanseɛ wɔ kwan so, fa nea ɔnim ho ne ne gyedie a ɔkasa si so dua ho.

Momma wɔnye deɛ mede adom Ziba Peterson no mfiri ne hɔ; na ɔnnyina sɛ asɔreba wɔ asɔre no mu, na n’ankasa mfa ne nsa nyɛ adwuma, ɔne anuanom no, kɔsi sɛ ɔbɛnya asotwe a ɛfata ma ne bɔne nyina ara; ɛfiri sɛ ɔmpae mu nka bɔne no, na ɔdwene sɛ ɔde bɛsie.
Momma saa asɔre yi mpaninfoɔ nkaeɛ no, wɔn a wɔreba saa asase yi so, wɔn mu binom a wɔahyira wɔn mmorosoɔ mpo ɛboro nsusuiɛ so no, nso nyɛ nhyiamu wɔ saa asase yi so.
Na momma m’akoa Edward Partridge mma akwankyerɛ wɔ nhyiamu a wɔbɛyɛ no ase.
Na momma wɔn nso nsan wɔn akyi, nka nsɛmpa no wɔ kwan so, redi adanseɛ afa nneɛma a wɔayi akyerɛ wɔn no ho.
Na, nokorɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ nnyegyeɛ no firi saa bea yi kɔ wiase nyina ara, na ɛkɔ asase ano nyina ara—ɛsɛ sɛ wɔka asɛmpa no kyerɛ abɔdeɛ biara, na nsɛnkyerɛnne bɛdi wɔn a wɔgyedi no akyi.
Na hwɛ Onipa Ba no reba. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/59.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 59
chapter_summary: 1–4, Wɔbɛhyira nokorɛfoɔ ahotefoɔ a wɔwɔ Sion; 5–8, Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔdɔ Awurade na wɔsom no na wɔdi Ne mmaransɛm so; 9–19, Sɛ wɔdi Awurade da no kronkron a, ahotefoɔ no nya nhyira honam mu ne honhom mu; 20–24, Wɔahyɛ ahotefoɔ no asomdwoeɛ bɔ wɔ wiase yi mu ne nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ wɔ wiase a ɛbɛba no mu.

verses.text: Hwɛ, nhyira, Awurade na ɔseɛ, ne wɔn a wɔaba saa asase yi so na wɔn ani wɔ m’animuonyam nko ara so, sɛdeɛ me mmaransɛm teɛ.

Na wɔn a wɔte ase no bɛnya asase no adi, na wɔn a wɔwuo no bɛnya ahome afiri wɔn nnwuma nyina ara ho, na wɔn nnwuma bɛdi wɔn akyi; na wɔbɛgye ahenkyɛ wɔ M’agya fi-kɛseɛ no mu, deɛ masiesie ama wɔn no.
Aane, nhyira ne wɔn a wɔn nan si Sion asase no so, na wɔayɛ setie ama me nsɛm; na wɔbɛnya asase so nneɛma pa sɛ wɔn akatua, na ɛde bɛba wɔ n’ahoɔden mu.
Na wɔde nhyira firi soro nso bɛhyɛ wɔn ahenkyɛ, aane, ne mmaransɛm a ɛnnyɛ kakraa bi, ne adiyisɛm wɔ wɔn mmerɛ mu—wɔn a wɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ ne nsiyɛfoɔ wɔ m’anim no.
Ɛno nti, mema wɔn mmaransɛm, a ɛreka sei: Dɔ Awurade wo Nyankopɔn no, fa w’akoma nyina ara, wotumi nyina ara, w’adwene ne w’ahoɔden; na som no wɔ Yesu Kristo din mu.
Dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho. Mma nwia adeɛ; mmɔ adwamman, nni awu, anaa nyɛ biribiara a ɛyɛ ne nsɛsoɔ.
Da Awurade wo Nyankopɔn ase wɔ ade nyina ara mu.
Bɔ afɔreɛ ma Awurade wo Nyankopɔn wɔ tenenee mu, mpo ɛyɛ akoma a abubuo ne honhom a abotoɔ mu.
Na sɛdeɛ wobɛtwe wo ho yie afiri wiase nkekaawa ho no, kɔ mpaebɔ fie na kɔma w’akronkronneɛ, wɔ me da kronkron mu;
Na nokorɛ yei ne da a wɔayi ama wo sɛ home firi wo nnwuma ho, na fa w’ahofama-som ma Ɔsorosoroni no;
Nanso wo bɛma wo aboadeɛ wɔ tenenee mu wɔ nna nyina ara mu ne mmerɛ nyina ara mu;
Na kae sɛ wɔ saa Awurade da no, wode w’afɔrebɔ ne w’akronkronneɛ bɛma Ɔsorosoroni no, worepae mu aka wo bɔne wɔ wonuanom ne Awurade anim.
Na saa da yi mma nyɛ biribiara, na mmom ma w’aduanenoa nyɛ adeɛ korɔ pɛ a ɛda w’akoma so na ama w’akɔmkyene awie pɛyɛ, anaa nsɛm foforɔ mu no, sɛdeɛ w’anigyeɛ bɛtumi ayɛ ma.
Nokorɛ, yei yɛ akɔmkyene ne mpaebɔ, anaa nsɛm foforɔ mu no, anigyeɛ ne mpaebɔ.
Na mmerɛ dodoɔ a mode nnaaseɛ, na afei mo akoma mu ne mo anim ahosɛpɛ yɛ saa nneɛma yi na ɛnnyɛ sereɛ, ɛfiri sɛ yei yɛ bɔne, na mmom mode akoma a ɛwɔ anigyeɛ, na mo anim kyerɛ ahosɛpɛ a—
Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, mmerɛ dodoɔ a moyɛ yei no, asase so mahyɛ yɛ mo dea, wuram mmoa ne ewiem nnomaa, ne deɛ ɛforo kɔ nnua so ne deɛ ɛnante asase so;
Aane, ne nhahan no, ne nneɛma pa a ɛfiri asase mu ba, sɛ wɔde yɛ aduane anaa wɔde yɛ aduradeɛ anaa adansie, anaa wɔdebɔ mpata, anaa wɔde yɛ afuo, anaa wɔdeyɛ nnuabaturo, anaa abobeturo;
Aane, nneɛma nyina ara a ɛfiri asase mu ba, wɔ wɔn berɛ mu no, wɔyɛɛ sɛ nnipa de bɛyɛ biribi anya ho mfasoɔ, sɛ ɛnsɔ ani na ɛmma akoma mu dɛ;
Aane, ɛyɛ ma aduane anaa aduradeɛ, ne dɛ ne ne huam, sɛdeɛ nnipadua no bɛnya ahoɔden na ama ɔkra no nkanyan.
Na ɛsɔ Onyankopɔn ani sɛ ɔde yei nyina ara ama nnipa; ɛfiri sɛ saa botaeɛ yi nti na wɔyɛɛe sɛ wɔde nsusuiɛ bɛto ho ayɛ, a ɛmmoro so, na ɛnnyɛ amim so.
Na nnyɛ biribiara mu na onipa fom Onyankopɔn, anaa obiara nni hɔ a n’abufuhyeɛ tia no, gye sɛ wɔn a wɔn mpae mu nka sɛ ne nsa wɔ nneɛma nyina ara mu, na wɔnnyɛ setie mma ne mmaransɛm.
Hwɛ, yei yɛ sɛdeɛ mmara ne nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no teɛ; ɛno nti, mma monnha me wɔ saa nsɛm yi ho bio.
Na monhunu sɛ, deɛ ɔdi tenenee nnwuma no bɛnya n’akatua, mpo asomdwoeɛ wɔ wiase yi mu, ne nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ wɔ wiase a ɛbɛba mu.
Me, Awurade, na maka yei, na Honhom no di ho adanseɛ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/60.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 60
chapter_summary: 1–9, Ɛsɛ sɛ mpaninfoɔ no ka asɛmpa no wɔ atirimuɔdenfoɔ asafo mu; 10–14, Ɛnni sɛ wɔma aniha sɛe wɔn berɛ, anaa wɔde wɔn adom-akyɛdeɛ sie; 15–17, Wɔbɛtumi ahohoro wɔn nan ase sɛ adanseɛ atia wɔn a wɔpo asɛmpa no.

verses.text: Hwɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade se n’asɔre mpaninfoɔ nie, wɔn a ɛsɛ sɛ wɔsan wɔn akyi ntɛmpa ara kɔ asase a wɔfiri so baaeɛ no: Hwɛ, ɛsɔ m’ani, sɛ moaba ha;
Nanso ebinom deɛ wɔnsɔ m’ani, ɛfiri sɛ wɔremmue wɔn ano, na wɔde wɔn adom-akyɛdeɛ a mede ama wɔn no sie, esiane nipa ho suro nti.Mmusuo nka wɔn a wɔte saa no, ɛfiri sɛ m’abufuo redɛre tia wɔn.
Na ɛbɛba sɛ, sɛ wɔnnyɛ nokorɛfoɔ mma me a, wɔbɛgye afiri wɔn hɔ, mpo deɛ wɔwɔ no.
Ɛfiri sɛ me, Awurade, medi hene wɔ ɔsoro soro, ne asase so asafo mu; na da a mɛba no, berɛ a mɛtase me sikadwinneɛ no, nnipa nyina ara bɛhunu deɛ ɛda Onyankopɔn tumi n’adi.

Nanso, nokorɛ, mɛkasa akyerɛ mo afa mo kwan a moretu akɔ asase a mofiri so baaɛ no ho. Momma wɔnyɛ ɛhyɛn, anaa montɔ, sɛdeɛ ɛyɛ ma mo, ɛmmfa me ho, na montu mo kwan ntɛmpa ara nkɔ bea a wɔfrɛ no St. Louis.
Na firi hɔ no, momma me nkoa, Sydney Rigdon, Joseph Smith Jun., ne Oliver Cowdery, ntu wɔn kwan nkɔ Cincinnati;

Na wɔ saa bea yi no, wɔmma wɔn nne so mfa nne kɛseɛ mmɔ m’asɛm no dawuro, mma wɔn mmfa abufuhyeɛ anaa akyinnye, wɔmma nsa a ɛho teɛ so wɔ wɔn so. Ɛfiri sɛ mewɔ tumi sɛ meyɛ mo kronkron, na wɔde mo bɔne akyɛ mo.
Na momma wɔn a aka no ntu wɔn kwan mfiri St. Louis, mmienu mmienu, na wɔnka m’asɛm no, nnyɛ ahoɔhare so, wɔ atirimuɔdenfoɔ asafo ntam, kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛsan akɔ nsɔre a wɔfiri mu baaeɛ no.
Na yei nyina ara esiane asɔre no yieyɛ nti; saa botaeɛ yi nti na masoma wɔn.
Na momma m’akoa Edward Partridge nyi sika a mede ama no no bi mma me mpaninfoɔ a wɔahyɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnsan no;
Na ɔnii a ɔbɛtumi no, ma ɔmfa ɔnanmusifoɔ no so nsan mfa mma; na ɔnii a ɔntumi no Awurade nhwehwɛ saa mmfiri ne hɔ.
Na afei mekasa fa wɔn a aka a ɛwɔ sɛ wɔba saa asase yi so ho.
Hwɛ, wɔasoma wɔn sɛ wɔnka m’asɛmpa wɔ atirimuɔdenfoɔ asafo mu; ɛno nti, mema wɔn mmarasɛm, sɛ: mmfa aniha nsɛe wo berɛ, anaa mmfa w’adom-akyɛdeɛ nsie a wɔrenhunu.

Na akyire yi a woaba Sion asase so no, na woabɔ m’asɛm no ho dawuro no, wobɛsan wo akyi ntɛmpa ara, abɔ m’asɛm no ho dawuro wɔ atirimuɔdenfoɔ asafo ntam mu, nyɛ ahoɔhare so, na nnyɛ abufuhyeɛ mu anaa akasakasa mu.
Na poroporo wo nan ase mfuturo tia wɔn a wɔn nnye woɔ no, nnyɛ wɔ wɔn anim anyɛ saa a wobɛhyɛ wɔn abufuo, mmom kokoa mu; na hohoro wo nan ase, sɛ adanseɛ tia wɔn wɔ atemmuo da no.
Hwɛ, yei bɛyɛ ama mo, na ɛyɛ deɛ wasoma mo no ne pɛ.
Na ɛnam m’akoa Joseph Smith Jun., ano so na wɔbɛda no adi ɛfa Sidney Rigdon ne Oliver Cowdery ho. Nkaeɛ no, akyire yi. Aane. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/61.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 61
chapter_summary: 1–12, Awurade ahyɛ ɔsɛeɛ mmara pii wɔ asuo no so; 13–22, Yohane domee asuo no, na ɔsɛefoɔ no nenam so; 23–29, Ebinom wɔ tumi sɛ wɔhyɛ asuo no; 30–35, Ɛsɛ sɛ mpaninfoɔ no tu kwan mmienu mmienu kɔka asɛmpa no; 36–39, Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔsiesie wɔn ho ma Onipa Ba no mmaeɛ no.

verses.text: Monhwɛ, na montie deɛ ɔwɔ tumi nyina ara no nne, deɛ ɔfiri daapem kɔsi daapem, mpo Alfa ne Omega, mfitiaseɛ ne awieɛ no.

Hwɛ, nokorɛ sɛdeɛ Awurade se mo nie, O m’asɔre mpaninfoɔ, a moahyia mu wɔ saa bea yi, mo a seesei yi wɔde mo bɔne akyɛ mo, ɛfiri sɛ me Awurade na, mede bɔne kyɛ, na meyɛ mmɔborɔhunufoɔ ma wɔn a wɔde ahobrɛaseɛ akoma ka wɔn bɔne;
Nanso nokorɛ mese mo, sɛ ɛho nhia sɛ saa me mpaninfoɔ kuo yi nyina ara de ahoɔhare bɛfa asuo yi so wɔ berɛ a ɛsotefoɔ a wɔwɔ afa ne afa resɛe wɔ annye-annie mu.
Nanso, memaa ho kwan sɛdeɛ mobɛdi adanseɛ; hwɛ, asiane pii wɔ asuo no so, na ɛbɛdɔɔso titiriw akyire yi.
Ɛfiri sɛ me, Awurade, mahyɛ ɔsɛeɛ pii wɔ m’abufuo mu wɔ asuo no so; aane, titiriw wɔ saa nsuo yi so.
Nanso, honam nyina ara wɔ me nsam, na deɛ ɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ wɔ mo mu no renwu wɔ asuo so.
Ɛno nti, ɛho hia sɛ m’akoa Sidney Gilbert ne m’akoa William W. Phelps bɛyɛ ntɛm wɔ wɔn soma ne wɔn asɛmpatrɛ ho.
Nanso, memma kwan sɛ mobɛkɔ kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛtwe mo aso wɔ mo bɔne ho, sɛdeɛ mobɛyɛ baako, ama moanwu wɔ amumuyɔ mu;

Nanso afei, nokorɛ mese, ɛho hia me sɛ mokɔ. Ɛno nti momma me nkoa Sidney Gilbert ne William W. Phelps mfa wɔn mfɛfoɔ dada no, na momma wɔntu wɔn kwan wɔ ahoɔhare so ama wɔawie wɔn asɛmpatrɛ no, na wɔafa gyedie so adi nkonim.
Na mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ no, wɔbɛkora wɔn, na Me, Awurade, mɛka wɔn ho.
Na momma nkaeɛ no mfa deɛ ɛhia nyɛ aduradeɛ.
Momma m’akoa Sidney Gilbert mfa deɛ ɛhia nka ne ho, sɛdeɛ mobɛgye ato mu.
Na afei, hwɛ, mo yieyɛ nti memaa mo mmarasɛm ɛfa saa nneɛma yinom ho; na me, Awurade, ne mo bɛdwene tesɛ deɛ mene nnipa a na wɔwɔ tete nna mu no yɛɛeɛ no.
Hwɛ, me, Awurade, wɔ mfitiaseɛ no hyiraa asuo no; nanso nna a ɛtwa toɔ mu no, menam m’akoa Yohane ano so, domee asuo no.
Ɛno nti, nna no bɛba a honam biara mfa ne ho sɔnn wɔ asuo no so.
Na wɔbɛka no saa nna no a ɛreba no mu sɛ, obiara nntumi nkɔ Sion asase so wɔ asuo so, gyesɛ deɛ ɔtene wɔ akoma mu.
Na, sɛdeɛ me, Awurade, mfitiaseɛ no medomee asase no, mpo saa ara na nna a ɛtwa toɔ no mahyira no, wɔ ne berɛ mu, sɛ ahotefoɔ no mfa, ama wɔadi so sradeɛ.

Na afei mema mo mmarasɛm sɛ, deɛ meka kyerɛ ɔbaako no meka kyerɛ obiara, ama moabɔ mo nuanom kɔkɔ ansa ɛfa saa asuo yi ho, ama wɔantu kwan amfa so, anyɛ saa a wɔn gyedie bɛdi ntwo na wɔatɔ fidie a wɔasum mu;
Me, Awurade, mahyɛ, na ɔsɛefoɔ no nenam ɛso, na merentwe deɛ mahyɛ no nsan.
Me, Awurade, me bo fuu mo nnora, nanso ɛnnɛ m’abufuo adane kɔ.
Ɛno nti, momma wɔn a maka wɔn ho asɛm no, a ɛwɔ sɛ wɔtu wɔn kwan ahoɔhare so no—bio meka kyerɛ mo, momma wɔntu wɔn kwan no ahoɔhare so.
Na ɛmmfa me ho, mmerɛ kakra akyi, sɛ wɔbɛtumi awie wɔn asɛmpatrɛ no sɛ wɔbɛfa nsuo so anaa asase so akɔ; momma yei nyɛ sɛdeɛ wɔada no adi akyerɛ wɔn no, sɛdeɛ wɔn nsusuiɛ bɛkyerɛ akyire yi.

Na afei, ɛfa me nkoa, Sidney Ridgon, Joseph Smith, Jun., ne Oliver Cowdery ho no, mma wɔmmfa asuo no so bio mma, gyesɛ wɔfa suka no so, berɛ a wɔretu kwan akɔ wɔn afie no; anaa nsɛm foforɔ mu no, mma wɔmmfa asuo no so ntu kwan, gyesɛ suka no so.

Hwɛ, Me, Awurade, mayi kwan a m’ahotefoɔ mfa so ntu kwan; na hwɛ, yei ne kwan no—na sɛ wɔnya firi suka no mu wie a wɔntu kwan mfa asase so, mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔahyɛ wɔn sɛ wɔntu kwan na wɔnkɔ Sion asase so no;
Na wɔbɛyɛ sɛ Israel mma no, wɔbɛsisi wɔn ntomadan wɔ kwan so.
Na, hwɛ, saa mmarasɛm yi mode bɛma mo nuanom nyina ara.
Nanso, deɛ wɔama no tumi wɔ asuo no so no, ɔno na Honhom no ma ɔhunu n’akwan nyina ara;
Ɛno nti, momma ɔnyɛ sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ Honhom no hyɛ no, sɛ ɛyɛ asase so anaa asuo so, sɛdeɛ ɛwɔ me hɔ sɛ meyɛ akyire yi.
Na mo na wɔde ahotefoɔ kwan no ama, anaa kwan a ahotefoɔ a wɔwɔ Awurade nsraban mu no bɛfa so atu kwan.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, me nkoa Sidney Ridney, Joseph Smith, Jun., ne Oliver Cowdery, sɛ ɛnnsɛ sɛ wɔbue wɔn ano wɔ atirimuɔdenfoɔ asafo mu kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛduru Cincinnati;
Na wɔ saa bea hɔ no wɔbɛma wɔn nne so akyerɛ Onyankopɔn atia nkorɔfoɔ no, aane akyerɛ ɔno a n’abufuo redɛre tia wɔn atirimuɔdensɛm, nkorɔfoɔ a wɔanyini pa ara ama ɔsɛeɛ no.
Na afiri hɔ no, wɔntu kwan nkɔ wɔn nuanom asafo mu, ɛfiri sɛ wɔn nnwuma seesei mpo ho abɛhia kɛse pa ara wɔ wɔn ntam kyɛn atirimuɔdenfoɔ no asafo mu.
Na afei, ɛfa nkaeɛ no ho, momma wɔntu kwan na wɔnka asɛm no wɔ atirimuɔdenfoɔ no asafo mu, mmerɛ dodoɔ a Awurade de bɛma;
Na mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔyɛ yei no wɔbɛhohoro wɔn ntadeɛ mu, na wɔrennya nkekaawa biara wɔ wɔn mu wɔ m’anim.

Na momma wɔntu kwan mmɔ mu, anaa mmienu mmienu, sɛdeɛ ɛyɛ ma wɔn, na ma m’akoa Reynolds Cahoon, ne m’akoa Samuel H. Smith, deɛ ɔsɔ m’ani yie no, nko ara na mma wɔntete wɔn mu kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛsan akɔ wɔn afie, na yei ɛnam nyansa botaeɛ bi a ɛwɔ me mu nti.
Na afei, nokorɛ mese mo, na deɛ meka kyerɛ ɔbaako no meka kyerɛ obiara, momma mo bo ntɔ mo yam, mmɔfra nketewa; ɛfiri sɛ mewɔ mo mfimfini, na menyaee mo;
Na esiane sɛ moabrɛ mo ho ase wɔ m’anim nti, aheman no nhyira no yɛ mo dea.
Mommɔ m’asene na monwɛn na momma mo ani nna hɔ, monhwɛ Onipa Ba no mmaeɛ no kwan, ɛfiri sɛ ɔreba dɔnhwere a monnwene ho.
Mommɔ mpaeɛ berɛbiara ama moankɔ sɔhwɛ mu, ama moatumi agyina ne mmaeɛ da no ano, sɛ ɛyɛ nkwa mu anaa owuo mu. Mpo saa ara Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/62.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 62
chapter_summary: 1–3, Wɔtwerɛ adansedie wɔ soro; 4–9, Ɛsɛ sɛ mpaninfiɔ no tu kwan na wɔkɔka asɛmpa no sɛdeɛ wɔn nsusuiɛ no teɛ ne sɛdeɛ Honhom no bɛkyerɛ.

verses.text: Monhwɛ na montie, O m’asɔre mpaninfoɔ, Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ, mpo Yesu Kristo mo dimafoɔ, deɛ ɔnim onipa mmerɛyɛ ne kwan a ɔbɛfa so aboa wɔn a wɔsɔ wɔn hwɛ no.
Na nokorɛ m’ani wɔ wɔn a wɔnnya nkɔɔ Sion asase so no so; ɛno nti mo asɛmpatrɛ no nnwiee pɛyɛ.
Nanso, wɔahyira mo, ɛfiri sɛ adanseɛ a moadi no wɔatwerɛ no wɔ soro sɛ abɔfoɔ no nhwɛ; na wɔdi ahurusie wɔ mo so, na wɔde mo bɔne akyɛ mo.
Na afei montoa mo akwantuo no so. Mommoa mo ho ano wɔ Sion asase so; na monyɛ nhyiamu na monni ahurusie mmɔ mu, na momfa akronkronneɛ mma Ɔsorosoroni no.

Na afei mobɛtumi asan akɔdi adanseɛ, aane, mpo mo nyina ara, anaa mmienu mmienu, sɛdeɛ ɛyɛ ma mo, ɛmmfa me ho; ɛno ara ne sɛ mobɛyɛ nokorɛfoɔ, na mobɛka anigyesɛm akyerɛ asase sotefoɔ, anaa wɔ atirimɔdenfoɔ no asafo mu.

Hwɛ, Me, Awurade, maboa mo ano abɔ mu sɛdeɛ wɔbɛtumi ahyɛ bɔhyɛ no ma, sɛdeɛ wɔbɛkora nokorɛfoɔ a wɔwɔ mo ntam no na wɔadi ahurusie abɔ mu wɔ Missouri. Me, Awurade, mahyɛ nokorɛfoɔ no bɔ na merentumi nni atorɔ.
Me, Awurade, mepɛ sɛ, sɛ mo mu bi pɛ sɛ ɔbɛtena apɔnkɔ so, anaa afunupɔnkɔ so, anaa teaseɛnam mu a, ɔbɛnya saa nhyira yi, sɛ ɔde anigyeɛ akoma da ase sɛ ɔnya nneɛma nyina ara firi Awurade nsam.
Saa nneɛma yi da mo so sɛ moyɛ no sɛdeɛ mo nsusuiɛ ne Honhom no akwankyerɛ no teɛ a.
Hwɛ, aheman no yɛ mo dea. Na hwɛ, na hunu, Meka nokorɛfoɔ no ho daa. Mpo saa ara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/63.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 63
chapter_summary: 1–6, Abufuohyeɛ da bɛba atirimuɔdenfoɔ so; 7–12, Nsɛnkyerɛnne nam gyedie so na ɛba; 13–19, Akoma mu awaresɛefoɔ no bɛpa gyedie no akyi na wɔbɛto wɔn atwene ogya tadeɛ no mu; 20, Wɔn a wɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ bɛnya apɛgyadeɛ wɔ asase a wɔasakyera no no so; 21, Wɔnnya nnaa amaneɛbɔ a ɛdi mu fa nsɛm a asisii wɔ Nsakyeraeɛ Bepɔ no so; 22–23, Setiefoɔ no nya aheman no ahintasɛm; 24–31, Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔtɔ apɛgyadeɛ a ɛwɔ Sion; 32–35, Awurade hyɛ akõ ma atirimuodenfoɔ kunkum atirimuodenfoɔ; 36–48, Ɛsɛ sɛ Ahotefoɔ boa wɔn ho ano wɔ Sion na wɔma sika de kyekyere Sion; 49–54, Wɔhyɛ nokorɛfoɔ nhyira ho bɔ wɔ Mmaeɛ a Ɛtɔ so Mmienu no, wɔ owusɔre no mu, ne Mfenhyia apem no mu; 55–58, Yei yɛ kɔkɔbɔ da; 59–66, Wɔn a wɔde Awurade din di dwuma wɔ berɛ a wɔnni tumi no bɔ Awurade din kwa.

verses.text: Montie, O mo nnipa, na mommue mo akoma mu na monwɛn mo aso mfiri akyirikyiri; na montie, mo a mofrɛ mo ho Awurade nkorɔfoɔ, na montie Awurade asɛm ne ne pɛ ɛfa mo ho.
Aane, nokorɛ, mese, montie deɛ n’abufuo redɛre tia atirimuɔdenfoɔ ne atuatefoɔ no n’asɛm.
ɔno a ne pɛ ne sɛ ɔfa mpo wɔn a ɔbɛfa, na ɔkora wɔ nkwa mu wɔn a ɔbɛkora no;
Ɔno a ɔsi wɔ n’ankasa ne pɛ ne n’anika mu; na ɔsɛe berɛ a ɔpɛ, na ɔtumi to ɔkra twene ɔbonsam gya mu no.
Hwɛ, Me, Awurade, de me nne kasa, na wɔbɛyɛ setie.

Ɛno nti, nokorɛ mese, momma atirimuɔdenfoɔ nhwɛ yie, na momma atuatefoɔ nsuro na wɔn ho mpopo; na annye-anniefoɔ nsɔ wɔn ano, ɛfiri sɛ abufuhyeɛ da no bɛba wɔn so sɛ kyinhyia mframa, na honam nyina ara bɛhunu sɛ mene Onyankopɔn.
Na onii a ɔhwehwɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne no bɛhunu nsɛnkyerɛnne, mmon ɛnnyɛ deɛ ɛkɔ nkwagyeɛ mu.
Nokorɛ, mese mo, ebinom wɔ mo mu a wɔhwehwɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne, na ebi atena hɔ saa ara mpo firi mfitiaseɛ no;
Nanso, hwɛ, gyedie mmfa nsɛnkyerɛnne so na ɛba, mmom nsɛnkyerɛnne di wɔn a wɔgye die no akyi.
Aane, nsɛkyerɛnne nam gyedie so na ɛba, nnyɛ nnipa pɛ so, anaa sɛdeɛ ɛsɔ wɔn ani, na mmom ɛnam Onyankopɔn pɛ so.

Aane, nsɛnkyerɛnne ba nam gyedie so, de kɔ nnwuma akɛseɛ mu, ɛfiri sɛ gyedie nni mu a obi nntumi nnsɔ Onyankopɔn ani; na wɔn a Onyankopɔn bo afu wɔn no, wɔnsɔ n’ani; ɛno nti, wɔn a wɔte saa no ɔmma wɔn nsɛnkyerɛnne, gye sɛ abufuhyeɛ mu a ɛma wɔn kɔ afɔbuo mu.
Ɛno nti, mo mu binom a wɔapɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne ne anwanwadeɛ ansana wɔagye adie no, na wɔanyɛ ammfa ampɛ nnipa yieyɛ a ɛbɛhyɛ me animuonyam no, wɔnnsɔ Me, Awurade, ani.
Nanso, mema mmaransɛm, na dodoɔ no ara adane wɔn ho afiri me mmaransɛm ho na wɔanni so.
Ebinom wɔ mo ntam a wɔyɛ mmarima ne mmaa awaresɛeɛfoɔ; a wɔn mu binom afiri mo mu kɔ, na afoforɔ nso ka mo ho a wɔbɛda wɔn adi akyire yi.
Wɔn a wɔte saa no nhwɛ yie na wɔnsakyera ntɛmpa yi ara, anyɛ saa a atemmuo bɛba wɔn so te sɛ fidie a wɔasum, na wɔbɛda wɔn nkwaseasɛm adi, na wɔn nnwuma bɛdi wɔn akyi wɔ nkorɔfoɔ no ani so.
Na nokorɛ mese mo, sɛdeɛ maka dada no, obiara a ɔhwɛ ɔbaa na ne kɔn dɔ no no, anaa sɛ, sɛ wɔsɛe awareɛ wɔ wɔn akoma mu a, wɔrennya Honhom no, mmom wɔbɛpa gyedie no akyi na wɔbɛsuro.

Ɛno nti, Me, Awurade, maka sɛ ahufoɔ, ne annye-anniefoɔ, ne atorofoɔ nyina ara, ne obibiara a ɔdɔ na ɔdi atorɔ, ne adwamanfoɔ, ne ntafowayifoɔ no, bɛnya wɔn kyɛfa wɔ ɔtadeɛ a ogya ne sɔfe dɛre wɔ mu no mu, deɛ ɛyɛ owuprenu no.
Nokorɛ mese, wɔrennya kyɛfa wɔ owusɔre a ɛdin kan no mu.
Na afei hwɛ, Me, Awurade, meka kyerɛ mo sɛ monni bem, esiane sɛ saa nneɛma yi wɔ mo ntam.
Nanso, deɛ ɔgyina gyedie mu na ɔyɛ m’apɛdeɛ no, ɔno ara bɛdi nkonim, na ɔbɛnya apɛgyadeɛ wɔ asase so berɛ a nsesaeɛ da no bɛba no;
Berɛ a wɔbɛsesa asase no, mpo sɛdeɛ nhwɛsoɔ a wɔde kyerɛɛ m’asomafoɔ wɔ bepɔ no so teɛ no; a ɛho amaneɛbɔ no monnya nnyaa ne nyina ara.
Na afei, nokorɛ mese mosɛ, sɛdeɛ mekaa sɛ mɛda me pɛ adi akyerɛ mo no, hwɛ mɛda no adi akyerɛ mo, nnyɛ mmarasɛm kwan so, ɛfiri sɛ pii wɔ hɔ a wɔnnhyɛ no nso nni me mmaransɛm so.
Nanso deɛ ɔdi me mmaransɛm soɔ no mɛma no m’aheman no ahintasɛm no, na ɔno ara bɛnya wɔ ne mu nkwa nsuo abura, a ɛfifiri kɔ daa nkwa mu.
Na afei hwɛ, yei ne Awurade wo Nyankopɔn pɛ ɛfa n’ahotefoɔ no ho, sɛ wɔnhyia mmɔ mu wɔ Sion asase so, nnyɛ ntɛmso, ama basabasayɛ amma, deɛ ɛde ɔyaredɔm ba no.
Hwɛ, Sion asase no—Me, Awurade, mekura wɔ me nsam;
Nanso, Me, Awurade, mede nneɛma a ɛyɛ Kaesare deɛ no ma Kaesare.
Ɛno nti, Me Awurade, mɛpɛ sɛ motɔ nsase no, sɛdeɛ mobɛfa wiase ho anya mfasoɔ, ama moatumi adan wiase ka, ama wɔantumi annunu wɔn abufuo mu.
Ɛfiri sɛ Satan de abufuo ahyɛ wɔn akoma mu atia mo, de rekɔ mogyahwiegu mu.
Ɛno nti, wɔrennya Sion asase gye sɛ wɔtɔ anaa wɔnam mogya hwieguo so, anyɛ saa a apɛgyadeɛ biara nni hɔ ma mo.
Na sɛ monya tɔ a, hwɛ wɔbɛhyira mo;

Na sɛ monam mogya hwieguo so a, ɛnam sɛ wɔabra mo sɛ mma monnhwie mogya ngu nti, hwɛ, mo atamfoɔ wɔ mo so, na wɔbɛhwe mo mmaa afiri kuropɔn so akɔ kuropɔn so, na afiri hyiadan mu akɔ hyiadan mu, na kakraabi na wɔbɛgyina anya apɛgyadeɛ.
Na Me, Awurade, me bo afu abɔnefoɔ; Meretwe me Honhom afiri asase sotefoɔ mu.
Maka ntam wɔ m’abufuo mu, na mahyɛ akokoakoko wɔ asase ani so, na atirimuɔdenfoɔ bɛkunkum atirimuɔdenfoɔ, na suro bɛba onipa biara so;
Na ahotefoɔ no remmfiri mu koraa; nanso, Me, Awurade, meka wɔn ho, na mɛfiri m’Agya anim wɔ ɔsoro aba fam wɔ wɔn ntam na mede ogya a ɛnnum da bɛhye atirimuɔdenfoɔ no.
Na hwɛ, yei nnya nnuruuiɛ, nanso ɛrenkyɛ.
Ɛno nti, esiane sɛ Me, Awurade mahyɛ saa nneɛma nyina ara wɔ asase so no, mɛpɛ sɛ m’ahotefoɔ no bɛhyia abɔ mu wɔ Sion asase ani so;
Na onipa biara mfa tenenee wɔ ne nsam ne nokorɛdie mmɔ n’asene mu, na ɔmma kɔkɔbɔ nne so nkyerɛ asase sotefoɔ; na wɔmfa asɛm no nto dwa wɔ adwane so sɛ amanfoyɛ bɛba atirimuɔdenfoɔ so.
Ɛno nti, momma m’asuafoɔ a wɔte saa afuo yi so wɔ Kirtland no nhyehyɛ nneɛma a ɛhia wɔn wɔ honam fam.

Momma m’akoa Titus Billings, a ɔhwɛ so no, ntɔn asase no, ama wasiesie ne ho atu kwan fefɛ berɛ mu akɔ Sion asase so, ɔne wɔn a wɔte hɔ no, gye sɛ wɔn a mɛkora ama me ara me ho, wɔn a wɔrenkɔ kɔsi sɛ mɛhyɛ wɔn no.
Na momma sika a wɔbɛtumi de ama nyina ara no, ɛmmfa me ho sɛ asua anaa ɛdɔɔso, wɔmfa nkɔ Sion asase so, nkɔma wɔn a mayi wɔn sɛ wɔnnye.
Hwɛ, Me, Awurade, mɛma m’akoa Joseph Smith, Jun., tumi ama ɔnam Honhom no so atumi ahunu wɔn a wɔbɛkɔ Sion asase so, ne m’asuafoɔ a wɔbɛka no.
Momma m’akoa Newel K. Whitney nkora n’adwadidan no, anaa nsɛm foforɔ mu no, adwadidan no, wɔ mmerɛ tiawa bi mu.
Nanso, momma ɔmfa sika a ɔbɛtumi ayi ama nyina ara mma, na wɔmfa nkɔ Sion asase so.
Hwɛ, saa nneɛma yi wɔ ɔno ara ankasa nsam, momma ɔnyɛ no sɛdeɛ nyansa teɛ.
Nokorɛ mese, momma wɔnyi no ananmusini mma akyidifoɔ a wɔbɛka no, na momma wɔnhyɛ no sɔfoɔ mma sa tumi yi;
Na afei, ntɛmpa yi ara ɔnkɔsra nsɔre no, ɔnkyerɛkyerɛ saa nneɛma yi ase nkyerɛ wɔn, ɔne m’akoa Oliver Cowdery. Hwɛ, yei ne me pɛ, sɛ wɔbɛnya sika mpo tesɛ deɛ makyerɛ no.
Deɛ ɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ na ɔgyina mu no bɛdi wiase so nkonim.
Deɛ ɔsoma de ademudeɛ kɔ Sion asase so no bɛnya apɛgyadeɛ wɔ wiase yi mu, na ne nnwuma bɛdi n’akyi, ɛne akatua nso wɔ wiase a ɛbɛba no mu.

Aane, na nhyira ne awufoɔ a wɔwu wɔ Awurade mu, firi nnɛ rekorɔ, berɛ a Awurade bɛba, na nnɛema dada bɛtwam akɔ, na nneɛma nyina ara abɛyɛ foforɔ no, wɔbɛsɔre afiri awufoɔ mu na akyire yi wɔrenwu, na wɔbɛnya apɛgyadeɛ wɔ Awurade anim, wɔ Kuro kronkron no mu.
Na deɛ ɔte aseɛ berɛ a Awurade bɛba no, na wakora gyedie no, nhyira ne no; nanso, wɔahyehyɛ ama no sɛ ɔwu wɔ onipa mfeɛ so.
Ɛno nti, mmɔfra bɛnyini kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛyɛ mpaninfoɔ; nnipa a wɔanyini bɛwu; nanso wɔrenna mfuturo mu, mmom wɔbɛsesa anibuo baako mu.
Ɛno nti, yei nti na asomafoɔ no kaa owusɔre ho asɛm kyerɛɛ wiase.
Saa nneɛma yi ne nneɛma a ɛsɛ sɛ mohwehwɛ; na, sɛdeɛ Awurade kaae no, yeinom abɛn pa ara, na ɛbɛba berɛ bi a ɛreba, mpo wɔ da no a ɛyɛ Onipa Ba no mmaeɛ no.

Na kɔsi saa dɔnhwere no mmaabunu nkwaseafoɔ bɛba mmadwemma no mu; na saa dɔnhwere no de ntetemu koraa bi bɛba ateneneefoɔ ne atirimuɔdenfoɔ ntam; na saa da no mu no mɛsoma m’abɔfoɔ abɛyiyi atirimuɔdenfoɔ ato wɔn agu ogya a ɛnnum da mu.
Na afei hwɛ, nokorɛ mese mo, Sidney Rigdon nsɔ Me, Awurade, m’ani; ɔmaa ne ho so wɔ n’akoma mu, na wannye afotuo, mmom ɔhyɛɛ Honhom no awerɛhoɔ;
Ɛno nti deɛ watwerɛ no Awurade nnye nnto mu, na ɔbɛyɛ foforɔ; na sɛ Awurade annye a, hwɛ ɔrennyina ne gyinabea a mayi ama no no bio.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, wɔn a wɔpɛ wɔ wɔn akoma mu, wɔ ɔdwoɔ mu, sɛ wɔbɛbɔ abɔnefoɔ kɔkɔ akɔ nsakyeraeɛ mu no, momma wɔmfa saa tumi yi nhyɛ wɔn.
Ɛfiri sɛ yei yɛ kɔkɔbɔ da, na ɛnnyɛ da a ɛyɛ nsɛm bebree. Ɛfiri sɛ, Me, Awurade, ɛnni sɛ wɔsi me atwetwe wɔ nna a ɛtwa toɔ no mu.
Hwɛ, Mefiri soro, na me tumi wɔ aseɛ. Medi ade nyina ara so, ne mewɔ ade nyina ara mu, na mefa ade nyina ara mu, na mepeepee ade nyina ara mu, na da no reba a nneɛma nyina ara bɛhyɛ m’ase.
Hwɛ, Mene Alfa ne Omega, mpo Yesu Kristo.
Ɛno nti, nnipa nyina ara nhwɛ yie wɔ sɛdeɛ a wɔde me din to wɔn ano no—
Ɛfiri sɛ hwɛ, nokorɛ mese, bebree wɔ hɔ a wɔwɔ saa afɔbuo yi ase, a wɔbɔ Awurade din, na wɔbɔ no kwa, a wɔnni tumi biara.
Ɛno nti, momma asɔre no nsakyera mfiri wɔn bɔne ho, na Me, Awurade, wɔbɛyɛ me dea; anyɛ saa a wɔbɛtwa wɔn atwene.

Monkae sɛ deɛ afiri soro ba no yɛ kronkron, na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔde ahwɛyie ka, ne ɔhyɛ a afiri Honhom no; na yei mu deɛ afɔbuo biara nnim, na monya Honhom no nam mpaebɔ so; ɛno nti, yei nnim a afɔbuo na ɛbɛka.
Momma me nkoa, Joseph Smith, Jun., ne Sidney Rigdon, nhwehwɛ fie mma wɔn ho, sɛdeɛ Honhom no kyerɛkyerɛ wɔn fa mpaebɔ so no.
Aka sɛ wɔbɛdi saa nneɛma yinom so nkonim nam aboterɛ so, ama saa nnipa no anya ɛnni awieɛ animuonyam a ɛyɛ duru no, anyɛ saa a, ɛbɛyɛ afɔbuo kɛseɛ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/64.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 64
chapter_summary: 1–11, Wɔhyɛ Ahotefoɔ no sɛ wɔmfa bɔne nkyɛ wɔn ho wɔn ho, anyɛ saa a bɔne kɛseɛ bɛka wɔn mu; 12–22, Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔde wɔn a wɔnsakyera no ba Asɔre no anim; 23–25, Wɔrenhye onii a ɔtua ntotosoɔ du no wɔ Awurade mmaeɛ no mu; 26–32, Wɔbɔ Ahotefoɔ no kɔkɔ fa ɛka ho; 33–36, Wɔbɛtwa atuatefoɔ atwene afiri Sion; 37–40, Asɔre no bɛbu amanaman atɛn; 41–43, Sion bɛyɛ frɔmfrɔm.

verses.text: Hwɛ, sei na Awurade mo Nyankopɔn se mo nie, O m’asɔre mpaninfoɔ, monyɛ aso na montie, na monnye me pɛ ɛfa mo ho.
Na nokorɛ mese mo, mɛpɛ sɛ mobɛdi wiase so nkonim; ɛno nti mɛnya ayamhyehyeɛ wɔ mo so.
Ebinom wɔ hɔ wɔ mo ntam a wɔayɛ bɔne, nanso nokorɛ, saa berɛ yi pɛ, ɛnam me ara m’animuonyam nti, ne mo akra nkwagyeɛ nti, mede mo bɔne akyɛ mo.
Mɛhunu mo mmɔbɔ, ɛfiri sɛ mede aheman no ama mo.
Na aheman n’ahintasɛm no, wɔremmfa kwan a mayi no so, rennye mmfiri m’akoa Joseph Smith Jun. nsam, berɛ a ɔte aseɛ yi, mmerɛ dodoɔ a ɔbɛdi m’ayɛyɛdeɛ so no.
Ebinom wɔ hɔ a wɔahwehwɛ ne ho mfomsoɔ wɔ berɛ a ɔnyɛɛ hwee.
Nanso, wayɛ bɔne; nanso, nokorɛ mese mo, Me, Awurade, mede bɔne kyɛ wɔn a wɔka wɔn bɔne na wɔsrɛ bɔnefakyɛ wɔ m’anim, a wɔanyɛ bɔne a ɛde kɔ owuo mu no.
M’asuafoɔ, wɔ tete nna mu no, hwehwɛɛ mfomsoɔ tiaa wɔn ho wɔn ho wɔamfa bɔne ankyɛ wɔn ho wɔn ho wɔ wɔn akoma mu; na ɛnam saa bɔne yi nti wɔnyaa amanehunu na wɔkaa wɔn anim pa ara.
Ɛno nti, mese mo, sɛ ɛsɛ mo sɛ mode bɔne kyɛ mo ho mo ho; ɛfiri sɛ deɛ ɔmmfa ne nua mfomsoɔ nkyɛ no no gyina afɔbuo mu wɔ Awurade anim; na bɔne kɛseɛ paa ara na ɛbɛka wɔ ne mu.
Me, Awurade, mede bɔne bɛkyɛ deɛ mede bɛkyɛ no, nanso mo deɛ wɔhyɛ mo sɛ momfa nkyɛ nnipa nyina ara.
Na ɛsɛ sɛ moka no mo akoma mu sɛ—ma Onyankopɔn mmu me ne wo ntam atɛn, na ɔntua wo ka sedeɛ wo nneyɛɛ teɛ.
Na deɛ ɔnsakyera mfiri ne bɔne ho, na ɔrennka nkyerɛ no, mode no bɛba asɔre n’anim, na mobɛyɛ no sɛdeɛ twerɛsɛm no ka kyerɛ mo, sɛ ɛyɛ mmarasɛm kwan so anaa adiyisɛm so.
Na mobɛyɛ yei sɛdeɛ wɔbɛhyɛ Onyankopɔn animuonyam—ɛnnyɛ bɔne a mommfa nkyɛ, ne ahummɔborɔ a monni nti, na mmom sɛ wɔbɛbu mo bem wɔ mmara no ani so, ama moamfom deɛ ɔyɛ mo mmarahyɛfoɔ no—
Nokorɛ mese, yei nti na mobɛyɛ saa nneɛma yinom.
Hwɛ, Me, Awurade, me bo fuu Ezra Booth, ɔno a na ɔyɛ m’akoa, ne m’akoa Isaac Morley nso, ɛfiri sɛ wɔanni mmara, anaa me mmarasɛm no so;
Wɔhwehwɛɛ bɔne wɔ wɔn akoma mu, na Me, Awurade, de me Honhom kameeɛ.
Na m’akoa Edward Partridge nso, hwɛ, wayɛ bɔne, na Satan rehwehwɛ sɛ ɔbɛsɛe ne kra; nanso sɛ wɔda saa nneɛma yinom adi kyerɛ wɔn, na wɔsakyera firi bɔne no ho a, wɔde bɛkyɛ wɔn.
Na afei, nokorɛ mese ɛfata ma me sɛ m’akoa Sidney Gilbert, nnawɔtwe kakra akyi no, bɛsan akɔ n’adwuma so, na wakɔyɛ ɔnanmusifoɔ wɔ Sion asase no so;
Na deɛ wahunu na wate no, wɔbɛtumi ada no adi akyerɛ m’akyidifoɔ no, ama wɔanwu. Na yei nti na maka saa nsɛm yinom.
Na bio, mese mo sɛ, sɛdeɛ wɔnsɔ m’akoa Isaac Morley nhwɛ mmoro deɛ ɔbɛtumi so, na ama wanntu fo bɔne anha mo no nti na memaa mmarasɛm sɛ wɔntɔn n’afuo no.

Ɛnnyɛ me pɛ sɛ m’akoa Frederick G. Williams bɛtɔn n’afuo no, ɛfiri sɛ Me, Awurade, mepɛ sɛ mɛkɔ so ayɛ Kirtland asase no tenabea-srɔnsrɔn, mfeɛ nnum mu, na ɛno mu no meremmɔ atirimuɔdenfoɔ no, ama wɔagye ebinom nkwa.
Na saa da no kyi no, Me, Awurade, meremmu obiara a ɔbɛbue n’akoma mu akɔ Sion asase no so no fɔ; ɛfiri sɛ, Me, Awurade, mehwehwɛ nnipa mma akoma.
Hwɛ, seesei wɔfrɛ no ɛnnɛ kɔsi sɛ Onipa Ba no bɛba, na nokorɛ ɛyɛ afɔrebɔ da, ne ntotosoɔ du du da ma me nkorɔfoɔ; ɛfiri sɛ deɛ ɔtua ntotosoɔ du no, wɔrenhye no wɔ ne mmaeɛ no.

Ɛfiri sɛ ɛnnɛ akyiri no na ɔhyeɛ no bɛba—na yei yɛ sɛdeɛ Awurade kasa—na nokorɛ mese, ɔkyena, ahantanfoɔ nyina ara ne wɔn a wɔyɛ atirimuɔdenneɛ bɛyɛ sɛ ɛsrɛdwanneɛ; na mɛhye wɔn, ɛfiri sɛ Mene asafo Awurade; na merennyae obiara a ɔbɛka wɔ Babel.
Ɛno nti, sɛ mogye me di a, mobɛyɛ adwuma saa berɛ yi a wɔfrɛ no nnɛ yi.
Na ɛmfata sɛ me nkoa, Newel K. Whitney ne Sidney Gilbert, bɛtɔn wɔn adwadidan ne ahodeɛ wɔ ha; ɛfiri sɛ ɛnnyɛ nyansa kɔsi sɛ asɔremma, a wɔaka wɔ saa bea yi, bɛkɔ Sion asase so.
Hwɛ, wɔaka no wɔ me mmara mu, anaa wɔabara, sɛ wobɛde w’atamfo ka;
Nanso hwɛ, wɔnkaa no berɛ biara sɛ Awurade mmfa berɛ a ɔpɛ biara, na ɔtua sɛdeɛ ɛyɛ ma no.
Ɛno nti esiane sɛ moyɛ ananmusifoɔ nti, mowɔ Awurade adwuma mu; na biribiara a mobɛyɛ sɛdeɛ Awurade pɛ teɛ no, ɛyɛ Awurade adwuma.
Na wayi mo sɛ monyɛ n’ahotefoɔ mmoa wɔ nna a ɛtwa toɔ yi mu, ama wɔanya apɛgyadeɛ wɔ Sion asase so.
Na hwɛ, Me, Awurade, meka kyerɛ mo sɛ wɔbɛnya, na me nsɛm no yɛ nokorɛ na ɛrenni nhwiammɔ.
Nanso ɛsɛ sɛ nneɛma nyina ara bɛba mu wɔ wɔn berɛ mu.
Ɛno nti, mma mo mmerɛ wɔ papayɛ mu, ɛfiri sɛ moreto adwuma kɛseɛ bi fapem. Na nneɛma nketewa mu na deɛ ɛyɛ kɛseɛ firi ba.
Hwɛ, Awurade hwehwɛ akoma ne ɔpɛ-adwene; na wɔn a wɔwɔ pɛ na wɔyɛ setie no bɛdi nnepa a ɛwɔ Sion asase so wɔ saa nna a ɛtwa toɔ yi mu.
Na wɔbɛtwa atuatefoɔ no atwene wɔ Sion asase so, na wɔbɛpam wɔn afiri hɔ, na wɔrennya asase no nni.
Na nokorɛ, mese, sɛ atuatefoɔ no nka Efraim mogya ho, ɛno nti wɔbɛyi wɔn afiri mu.
Hwɛ, Me, Awurade, mayɛ m’asɔre wɔ nna a ɛtwa toɔ yi mu te sɛ otemmuafoɔ a ɔte pampa so, anaa sorɔnsorɔmbea so, sɛ ɔmmu aman no atɛn.
Na ɛbɛba sɛ Sion ɛmutefoɔ bɛbu nneɛma nyina ara a ɛfa Sion ho atɛn.
Na wɔbɛsɔ atorofoɔ ne nyaatwomfoɔ ahwɛ, wɔbɛhunu wɔn a wɔnnyɛ asomafoɔ ne nkɔmhyɛfoɔ.
Na ɔhwɛfoɔ no mpo, a ɔyɛ ɔtemmuafoɔ, ne n’afotufoɔ no, sɛ wɔanyɛ nokorɛfoɔ wɔ wɔn sohwɛadwuma ho a, wɔbɛbu wɔn fɔ, na wɔde afoforɔ bɛsi wɔn ananmu.
Na, hwɛ, mese mo sɛ Sion bɛyɛ frɔmfrɔm, na Awurade animuonyam bɛba ne so;
Na ɔbɛyɛ frankaa ama nkorɔfoɔ no, na wɔbɛfiri ɔman biara a ɛwɔ ɔsoro ase aba ne hɔ.
Na da no bɛba a, ɔno nti, asase so aman no ho bɛpopo, na wɔbɛsuro esiane ne ne mma a wɔn ho yɛhu kɛseɛ nti. Awurade na waka. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/65.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 65
chapter_summary: 1–2, Wɔde Onyankopɔn aheman no nsafoa ahyɛ onipa nsa wɔ asase so, na asɛmpa no yiedie bɛdi nkonim; 3–6, Ɔsoro mfirihyia apem aheman no bɛba na abɛka Onyankopɔn aheman no a ɛwɔ asase so ho.

verses.text: Montie, na monhwɛ, obi a ɔte sɛ deɛ wɔasoma no afiri soro no nne, deɛ ɔyɛ ɔbrane ne otumfoɔ, deɛ n’adifiri kɔ asase ano, aane, deɛ ne nne kɔ nnipa nyina ara hɔ no—Monsiesie Awurade kwan, momma n’atenpɔn ntene.
Wɔde Onyankopɔn aheman no nsafoa ahyɛ onipa nsa wɔ asase so, na ɛhɔ na asɛmpa no bɛmuni akɔ asase ano, ɛnyɛ nsa na atwa afiri bepɔ mu bɛmunimuni akɔ, kɔsi sɛ ɛbɛyɛ asase so nyina ara mã.
Aane, nne bi a ɛreteam sɛ—Monsiesie Awurade kwan, monsiesie Adwammaa no apontoɔ no, monyɛ krado mma Ayeforokunu no.
Mommɔ mpaeɛ nkyerɛ Awurade, momfrɛ ne din kronkron no, monna n’anwanwa nnwuma adi wɔ nkorɔfoɔ no ntam.

Momfrɛ Awurade, sɛdeɛ n’aheman bɛtumi afiri akɔ asase so, ama ɛsotefoɔ no atumi anya, na wɔasiesie wɔn ho ama nna a ɛbɛba no, a ɛno mu Onipa Ba no bɛfiri ɔsoro aba fam, sɛ ɔfira n’animuonyam hann, sɛ ɔrebɛhyia Onyankopɔn aheman a wɔasiesie wɔ asase so no.
Ɛno nti, Onyankopɔn aheman nkɔ n’anim, ɔsoro aheman mmra, O Onyankopɔn, animuonyam nka wo wɔ ɔsoro ne asase so, ama wɔabrɛ w’atamfo ase; anidie, tumi ne animuonyam yɛ wo dea, afebɔɔ ne afebɔɔ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/66.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 66
chapter_summary: 1–4, Daapem apam no yɛ asɛmpa no mahyɛ; 5–8, Ɛsɛ sɛ mpaninfoɔ no ka asɛmpa no, di adanseɛ, na wɔne nkorɔfoɔ no dwene ho; 9–13, Ɔsomfoɔ nokorɛfoɔ som si nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ apɛgyadeɛ no pi.

verses.text: Hwɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade se m’akoa William E. McLellin nie—Nhyira ne wo, mmerɛ dodoɔ a woadane wo ho afiri wo amumuyɛ ho, na woagye nokorɛ no, Awurade wo Gyefoɔ no na ɔseɛ, wiase Agyenkwa no, mpo ne dodoɔ no ara a wɔgye me din die no.

Nokorɛ mese mo, nhyira ne mo esiane sɛ moagye me daapem apam no, mpo m’asɛmpa mahyɛ no, a wɔde asoma ama akɔ nnipa mma hɔ no, ama wɔatumi anya nkwa na wɔanya kyɛfa wɔ animuonyam a wɔbɛda no adi wɔ nna a ɛtwa toɔ no mu bi, sɛdeɛ nkɔmhyɛfoɔ ne asomafoɔ no twerɛeɛ wɔ tete nna no mu no.
Nokorɛ mese wo, m’akoa William, sɛ wo ho te, nanso ɛnyɛ ne nyina ara; ɛno nti, sakyera firi saa nneɛma a ɛnsɔ m’ani no ho, Awurade na ɔseɛ, ɛfiri sɛ Awurade bɛda no adi akyerɛ wo.
Na afei, nokorɛ, Me, Awurade, mɛkyerɛ wo deɛ mepɛ ɛfa wo ho, anaa deɛ ɛyɛ me pɛ ɛfa wo ho.
Hwɛ, nokorɛ mese wo, sɛ ɛyɛ me pɛ sɛ wobɛbɔ m’asɛmpa no ho dawuro afiri asase so akɔ asase so, na afiri kuropɔn mu akɔ kuropɔn mu, aane, wɔ saa amantam a atwa ahyia yi mu, faako a wɔmmɔɔ dawuro.
Ntena saa bea yi nna pii; nnkɔ Sion asase so seesei; nanso mmerɛ dodoɔ a wobɛtumi asoma no, soma; ɛnte saa a, mɛnnwene wo agyapadeɛ ho.
Kɔ apueɛ fam, di wo adanseɛ wɔ bea biara kyerɛ nkorɔfoɔ biara, wɔ wɔn ahyiadan mu, na ɛne nkorɔfoɔ no nyiyi ntɛn.
Ma m’akoa Samuel H. Smith ne wo nkɔ, na nnyae no, na ma no wo nkyerɛkyerɛ; na deɛ ɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ no bɛnya ahoɔden wɔ bea biara; na me, Awurade, mene wo bɛkɔ.
Fa wo nsa gu ayarefoɔ so, na wɔbɛnya ayaresa. Nsan w’akyi kɔsi sɛ me, Awurade, mɛsoma wo. Nya aboterɛ wɔ amanehunu mu. Bisa, na wobɛnya; bɔ mu na ɛbɛbue ama wo.
Nhwehwɛ sɛ ɔhaw mma wo ho. Gyae deɛ ɛntene nyina ara. Nsɛe awareɛ—sɔhwɛ bi a aha wo.
Di saa nsɛm yinom so, ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ ampa ne nokorɛ; na di wo gyinabea no nni, na fa daapem anigyeɛ nnwom gu nnipa pii tiri so pia wɔn kɔ Sion.
Kɔso wɔ saa nneɛma yi mu mpo kɔsi awieɛ, na wobɛnya ɛnni awieɛ ahenkyɛ wɔ m’Agya nsa nifa so, ɔno a adom ne nokorɛ ahyɛ no mã.
Nokorɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade wo Nyankopɔn, wo Gyefoɔ, mpo Yesu Kristo seɛ nie. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/67.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 67
chapter_summary: 1–3, Awurade tie mpaninfoɔ no mpaebɔ na Ɔhwɛ wɔn so; 4–9, Ɔtwa ɔnyansani paa ara mpoa sɛ ɔnhwɛ sɛ ɛbɛtumi ayɛ deɛ ɛte sɛ N’adiyisɛm no mu ketewa paa ara a; 10–14, Honhom no bɛma mpaninfoɔ nokorɛfoɔ no nkwa na wɔbɛhunu Onyankopɔn anim.

verses.text: Monhwɛ na montie, O m’asɔre mpaninfoɔ, a moahyia abɔ mu, mo a mate mo mpaebɔ, na menim mo akoma, na mo pɛ aforo aba m’anim.
Monhwɛ na monhunu, m’ani wɔ mo so, na ɔsorosoro ne asase wɔ me ara me nsam, na mmerɛsanten ahonyadeɛ yɛ me ara me dea sɛ mede ma.
Mobɔɔ mmɔden sɛ mobɛgye adi sɛ mo nsa bɛka nhyira a wɔdehyɛɛ mo bɔ no; nanso, hwɛ, nokorɛ, mese mo sɛ suro baa mo akoma mu, na nokorɛ, yei ne deɛ nti a moannya no.
Na afei me, Awurade, mema mo nokorɛ no ho adanseɛ ɛfa saa mmaransɛm yi a ɛda moanim yi ho.
Mo ani awɔ m’akoa Jospeh Smith, Jun. so, na moahunu ne kasa, na moahunu ne sintɔ; na moahwehwɛ nimdeɛ wɔ mo akoma mu sɛ mobɛtumi akasa yie asene ne kasa no; yei nso monim.
Afei, monhwehwɛ mfiri Mmaransɛm Nwoma no mu, mpo ketewa pa ara a ɔwɔ wɔn ntam, na monyi deɛ ɔyɛ badwemma paa ara wɔ mo ntam;
Anaa, sɛ mo mu bi wɔ hɔ a wɔbɛtumi ayɛ baako mpo te sɛ yei a, ɛnneɛ modi bem sɛ moreka sɛ monnim sɛ yeinom yɛ nokorɛ a;
Nanso sɛ monntumi nnyɛ baako te sɛ yei a, mowɔ afɔbuo ase sɛ moanni adanseɛ sɛ ɛyɛ nokorɛ a.
Ɛfiri sɛ monim sɛ deɛ ɛntene biara nni mu, na deɛ ɛtene firi ɔsoro na ɛba fam, ɛfiri hann Agya no hɔ.

Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ ɛyɛ mo akwanya, ne bɔhyɛ a mede ma mo a wɔahyɛ mo sɔfoɔ ama saa ɔsom adwuma yi, sɛ mmerɛ dodoɔ a motwe mo ho firi ninkuntwe ne suro ho, na mobrɛ mo ho ase wɔ m’anim no, ɛfiri sɛ mo ahobrɛase nnsɔ ani, nkata-anim no mu bɛte na mobɛhwɛ me na moahunu sɛ mete ase—ɛnnyɛ mo honam ani anaa mo honam adwene, na mmom honhom deɛ no.
Ɛfiri sɛ onipa biara nhunuu Onyankopɔn da wɔ honam mu, agye sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom no ama no nkwa.
Saa ara na honam mu nipa nntumi nnyina Onyankopɔn anim, anaa ɔmmfa honam adwene.
Monntumi nnyina Onyankopɔn anim seesei, anaa abɔfoɔ som; ɛno nti, monkɔ so wɔ aboterɛ mu kɔsi sɛ mobɛwie pɛ yɛ.
Mma momma mo adwene nnane; na sɛ mo fata a, me ara ankasa me mmerɛ a ɛsɛ mu no, mobɛhunu na moahunu adekodeɛ a wɔnam m’akoa Joseph Smith, Jun., nsa so de maa mo no. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/68.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 68
chapter_summary: 1–5, Mpaninfoɔ no nsɛm a wɔnam Sunsum Kronkron so ka no yɛ twerɛsɛm; 6–12, Ɛsɛ sɛ mpaninfoɔ no ka asɛmpa no na wɔbɔ asu, na nsɛnkyerɛnne bɛdi agyedifiɔ nokorɛfoɔ akyi; 13–24, Aaron mma no mu abakan no bɛtumi asom sɛ Ɔhwɛfoɔ titenani (kyerɛ sɛ, ɔkura atitenafoɔ nsafoa sɛ ɔhwɛfoɔ) wɔnam Atitenafoɔ a Wɔdi Kan no akwankyerɛ no so; 25–28, Wɔhyɛ awofoɔ sɛ wɔnkyerɛ wɔn mma asɛmpa no; 29–35, Ɛsɛ sɛ Ahotefoɔ di Homeda no nni, wɔde mmɔdenmmɔ yɛ adwuma, na wɔbɔ mpaeɛ.

verses.text: Wɔnam m’akoa, Orson Hyde, asɔfohyɛ so frɛɛ no sɛ ɔmfa Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ Honhom no mmɔ daapem asɛmpa no ho dawuro, mfiri nkorɔfoɔ so nkɔ nkorɔfoɔ so, na ɛmfiri asase so nkɔ asase so wɔ atirimuɔdenfoɔ asafo mu, wɔ wɔn ahyiadan mu, ɔne wɔn redwene na ɔrɛkyerɛkyerɛ twerɛsɛm nyina ara mu ase akyerɛ wɔn.
Na, monhwɛ, na monhunu, yei yɛ mfatoho ma wɔn a wɔahyɛ wɔn asɔfoɔ ama asɔfodie no nyina ara, wɔn a wɔayi wɔn asɛmpatrɛ ama wɔn sɛ wɔmfiri adi nkɔ no—
Na yei yɛ mfatoho ma wɔn, sɛ wɔbɛkasa sɛdeɛ Sunsum Kronkron no bɛkanyan wɔn afa.
Na biribibiara a wɔbɛka berɛ a Sunsum Kronkron no bɛkanyan wɔn no bɛyɛ twerɛsɛm, ɛbɛyɛ Awurade pɛ, ɛbɛyɛ Awurade adwene, ɛbɛyɛ Awurade asɛm, ɛbɛyɛ Awurade nne, ne Onyankopɔn tumi a ɛkɔ nkwagyeɛ mu.
Hwɛ, yei yɛ Awurade bɔhyɛ ma mo, O me nkoa.
