Ɛno nti, momma mo bo ntɔ mo yam, na mma mo nsuro, ɛfiri sɛ me, Awurade, meka mo ho, na mɛgyina mo akyi; na mobɛdi me ho adanseɛ, mpo Yesu Kristo, sɛ meyɛ Nyankopɔn teasefoɔ no Ba, sɛ na mewɔ hɔ, sɛ mete ase, na merebɛba.
Yei yɛ Awurade asɛm ma wo, m’akoa Orson Hyde, ne m’akoa Luke Johnson nso, ne m’akoa Lyman Johnson, ne m’akoa William E. McLellin, ne m’asɔre mpaninfoɔ nokorɛfoɔ nyina ara—
Monkɔ wiase nyina ara nkɔka asɛmpa no nkyerɛ abɔdeɛ biara, na monyɛ no wɔ tumi a mede ama mo no mu, mommɔ asu wɔ Agya, ne Ɔba, ne Sunsum Kronkron no din mu.
Na deɛ ɔgye die na wɔbɔ no asu no, wɔbɛgye no nkwa, na deɛ ɔnnye nnie no wɔbɛbu no fɔ.
Na deɛ ɔgye die no wɔbɛhyira no ama nsɛnkyerɛnne adi n’akyi, mpo sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ no.
Na mo na wɔbɛma moahunu mmerɛ no nsɛnkyerɛnne, ne Onipa Ba no mmaeɛ no ho nsɛnkyerɛnne;
Na dodoɔ no ara a Agya no bɛdi wɔn ho adanseɛ no, mo na wɔbɛma mo tumi sɛ monsɔ wɔn ano mma nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ. Amen.
Na afei, deɛ ɛfa nsɛm a ɛka apam ne mmaransɛm no ho nie—
Aka sɛ akyire yi, wɔ Awurade mmerɛ a ɛsɛ mu no, wɔbɛyi ahwɛfoɔ foforɔ asi hɔ ama asɔre no, sɛ wɔnsom sɛdeɛ kane deɛ no teɛ;
Ɛno nti wɔbɛyɛ asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ a wɔfata, na Mɛlkisɛdɛk Asɔfodie Atitenafoɔ a Wɔdi Kan no bɛyi wɔn asi hɔ, gyesɛ wɔyɛ Aaron asefoɔ ankasa.
Na sɛ wɔyɛ Aaron asefoɔ ankasa a mmara ma ho kwan sɛ wɔyɛ ahwɛfoɔ, sɛ wɔyɛ abakan wɔ Aaron mmammarima no ntam a;
Ɛfiri sɛ abakan no kura saa asɔfodie yi titena hokwan, ne ɛho tumi anaa nsafoa.
Onipa biara nni saa diberɛ yi hokwan wɔ mmara kwan so, sɛ ɔbɛkura saa asɔfodie yi nsafoa, gyesɛ ɔyɛ Aaron aseni ankasa ne n’abakan.

Nanso, sɛdeɛ Mɛlkisɛdɛk Asɔfodie sɔfoɔ panin kura tumi sɛ ɔde di dwuma wɔ diberɛ nketewa mu no, ɔbɛtumi adi dwuma wɔ ɔhwefoɔ no diberɛ mu wɔ berɛ a Aaron aseni biara nni hɔ, gyesɛ wɔfrɛ no na wɔyi no si hɔ ma saa tumi yi, wɔ Mɛlkisɛdɛk Asɔfodie Atitenafoɔ a Wɔdi Kan no nsa ase.

Na Aaron aseni ankasa no, nso, ɛsɛ sɛ saa Atitenafoɔ-yi yi wɔn, na wɔhunu wɔn sɛ wɔfata, na wɔsra wɔn ngo, na wɔhyɛ wɔn asɔfoɔ wɔ Atitenafoɔ no nsa ase, anyɛ saa a wɔnni tumi wɔ mmara kwan so sɛ wɔdi dwuma wɔ wɔn asɔfodie mu.

Nanso, esiane sɛ ahyɛdeɛ wɔ hɔ a ɛfa asɔfodie hokwan a wɔwɔ a ɛfiri agya siane kɔ ɔba so ho kwan nti, wɔtumi gye wɔn ngosra berɛ biara a wɔtumi kyerɛ wɔn abusua ase, anaa sɛ wɔnam adiyisɛm so hunu mu nokorɛ firi Awurade hɔ wɔ Atitenafoɔ a wɔabɔ wɔn din dada no nsa ase.

Na bio, ɔhwɛfoɔ anaa ɔsɔfo panin a wɔbɛyi no asi hɔ ama saa ɔsom adwuma yi biara nni hɔ a wɔbɛdi n’asɛm anaa wɔbɛbu no fɔ wɔ asɛmmɔne biara ho, agye sɛ wɔyɛ yei wɔ asɔre no Atitenafoɔ a Wɔdi kan no anim;
Na mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔbɛhunu sɛ ɔdi fɔ wɔ saa Atitenafoɔ yi anim no, ɛnam adanseɛ a wɔnntumi nnye ho kyim so no, wɔbɛbu no fɔ;
Na sɛ ɔsakyera a, wɔde bɛkyɛ no, sɛdeɛ asɔre no apam ne mmaransɛm teɛ.

Na bio, mmerɛ dodoɔ a awofoɔ wɔ mma wɔ Sion, anaa wɔ ne mpɛɛwa biara a wɔahyehyɛ mu no, a wɔnnkyerɛ wɔn mma wɔnnte nsakyeraeɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ ase, gyedie wɔ Kristo Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ Ba no mu, ne asubɔ ne nsa a wɔde gu soɔ ma Sunsum Kronkron akyɛdeɛ no, berɛ a wɔanya mfeɛ nwɔtwe no, bɔne no bɛgu wɔn awofoɔ tiri so.
Ɛfiri sɛ yei bɛyɛ mmara ama Sion ɛmutefoɔ, anaa wɔ ne mpɛɛwa biara a wɔahyehyɛ mu.
Na wɔbɛbɔ wɔn mma asu akɔ bɔne fafiri mu berɛ a wɔanya mfie nwɔtwe, na wɔagye nsa a wɔde gu soɔ no.
Na wɔbɛkyerɛ wɔn mma nso sɛ wɔmmɔ mpaeɛ, na wɔn nnante tenenee mu wɔ Awurade anim.
Na Sion ɛmutefoɔ no nhwɛ Homeda no nso na wɔnyɛ no kronkron.
Na Sion ɛmutefoɔ nso bɛkae wɔn nnwuma, mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔbɛyi wɔn sɛ wɔnyɛ adwuma, wɔ nokorɛdie biara mu; ɛfiri sɛ wɔbɛkae anihafoɔ no wɔ Awurade anim.

Afei, Me, Awurade, Sion ɛmutefoɔ no nsɔ m’ani yie, ɛfiri sɛ akwadwofoɔ wɔ wɔn mu; na wɔn mma so renyini wɔ atirimuɔdensɛm mu; wɔn mmfa mmɔdemmɔ nso nnhwehwɛ daapem ahonyadeɛ, mmom adifudepɛ ahyɛ wɔn ani so mã.
Na ɛnnsɛ sɛ saa nneɛma yinom sisi, na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔyi firi wɔn ntam; ɛno nti, momma m’akoa Oliver Cowdery mfa saa nsɛm yi nkɔ Sion asase so.
Na mede mmarasɛm ma mo—ɛne sɛ, deɛ wammɔ ne mpaeɛ wɔ Awurade anim wɔ ne mmerɛ mu no, wɔmma wɔn nkaeɛ no wɔ me nkorɔfoɔ temmufoɔ no anim.
Saa nsɛm yi yɛ ampa ne nokorɛ; ɛno nti mma mo mmu so, anaa monnyi bi mfiri mu.
Hwɛ, Mene Alfa ne Omega, na mereba mpofirim. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/69.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 69
chapter_summary: 1–2, Ɛwɔ sɛ John Whitmer ka Oliver Cowdery ho kɔ Missouri; 3–8, Ɛsɛ sɛ ɔka asɛmpa no nso na ɔgyegye, twerɛ to hɔ, na ɔtwerɛ ho abakɔsɛm.

verses.text: Montie me, Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ, ɛnam m’akoa Oliver Cowdery yieyɛ nti. Ɛnnyɛ nyansa wɔ me mu sɛ wɔde mmaransɛm ne sika bɛhyɛ ne nsa ama ɔde akɔ Sion asase so, gye sɛ obi ne no kɔ a ɔdi ne ho nni na ɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ.
Ɛno nti, Me, Awurade, mɛpɛ sɛ m’akoa, John Whitmer, ne m’akoa Oliver Cowdery bɛkɔ;
Na bio mɛpɛ sɛ ɔbɛkɔ so atwerɛ nso na wayɛ abakɔsɛm a ɛfa nneɛma a ɛho hia nyina ara a ɔbɛhwɛ na ɔbɛhunu afa m’asɔre ho;
Na bio mɛpɛ sɛ ɔbɛnya afotuo ne mmoa afiri m’akoa Oliver Cowdery ne afoforɔ hɔ.
Na bio, me nkoa nso a wɔatrɛ wɔ asase so no mfa wɔn sohwɛadwuma ho akonta nkɔ Sion asase so;
Ɛfiri sɛ Sion asase bɛyɛ atenaeɛ ne bea a wɔayɛ na wɔbɛyɛ saa nneɛma yi nyina ara.
Nanso, momma m’akoa John Whitmer ntu kwan mmerɛ pii mfiri bea nkɔ bea, ne asɔre mu nkɔ asɔre mu, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛtumi ayɛ mmrɛ pii ma wanya nimdeɛ—

Ɔreka asɛmpa no na ɔrekyerɛkyerɛ aseɛ, ɔretwerɛ, ɔrehwɛ so atwerɛ, ɔreyiyi mu, na ɔrenya nneɛma nyina ara ama asɔre no yieyɛ, ne awoɔntoatoasoɔ a wɔreba a wɔbɛnyini wɔ Sion asase so, na wɔbɛdi asase no so firi awoɔntoatoasoɔ de kɔ awoɔntoatoasoɔ so, afebɔɔ ne afebɔɔ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/70.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 70
chapter_summary: 1–5, Wɔyi ahwɛsofoɔ sɛ wɔntintm adiyisɛm no ntɔn; 6–13, Wɔn a wɔyɛ adwuma wɔ honhom nneɛma mu no fata wɔn akatua; 14–18, Ɛsɛ sɛ Ahotefoɔ no yɛ pɛ wɔ honam fam nneɛma mu.

verses.text: Monhwɛ, na montie, O mo Sion mutefoɔ, ne mo nnipa a mowɔ m’asɔre mu nyina ara a mowɔ akyirikyiri, na montie Awurade asɛm a mede ma m’akoa Joseph Smith, Jun., ne m’akoa Martin Harris nso, ne m’akoa Oliver Cowdery nso, ne m’akoa John Whitmer nso, ne m’akoa Sidney Rigdon nso, ne m’akoa William W. Phelps nso, wɔ mmarasɛm kwan so ma wɔn.
Ɛfiri sɛ mema wɔn mmarasɛm; ɛno nti monyɛ aso na montie, na sɛdeɛ Awurade se wɔn nie—
Me, Awurade, mayi wɔn, na mahyɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnyɛ ahwɛsofoɔ wɔ adiyisɛm ne mmaransɛm a mede ama wɔn no so, ne deɛ mede bɛma wɔn akyire yi;
Na saa sohwɛadwuma yi ho akonta no, mɛhwehwɛ afiri wɔn hɔ atemmuo da no.
Ɛno nti, mayi ama wɔn, na yei ne wɔn adwuma wɔ Onyankopɔn asɔre mu, sɛ wɔbɛhwɛ yeinom so ne deɛ ɛfa ho no, aane, ne ɛho mfasoɔ.
Ɛno nti, mmarasɛm a mede ma wɔn ne sɛ, mma wɔmmfa saa nneɛma yinom mma asɔre no mma wiase;
Nanso, mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔnya deɛ ɛdɔɔso kyɛn deɛ ehia ma wɔn ahiadeɛ ne wɔn apɛdeɛ so no, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔde ma m’adekoradan no;
Na wɔbɛdwira ɛso mfasoɔ no ho ama Sion ɛmutefoɔ no, ne wɔn awoɔntoatoasoɔ, mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔbɛyɛ adedifoɔ sɛdeɛ aheman no mmara teɛ.
Hwɛ, yei ne deɛ Awurade hwehwɛ firi onipa biara hɔ wɔ ne sohwɛadwuma mu, mpo sɛdeɛ Me, Awurade, mede ama anaa mɛyi ama onipa biara akyire yi.
Na hwɛ, wɔnnyi obiara a ɔka Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ n’asɔre ho no mfiri saa mmara yi mu;
Aane, nnyɛ ɔhwɛfoɔ no, nnyɛ ɔnanmusifoɔ no a ɔhwɛ Awurade adekoradan so no, nnyɛ ɔno a wɔayi no hwɛsofoɔ wɔ honam fam nneɛma so.
Deɛ wɔayi no sɛ ɔnhwɛ honhom fam nneɛma so no, ɔfata n’akatua, mpo te sɛ wɔn a wɔayi wɔn sɛ wɔnhwɛ honam fam nneɛma so no;
Aane, mpo deɛ ɛboro so koraa, deɛ ɛyɛ mmorosoɔ a wɔnam Honhom adiyie so ama adɔre ama wɔn no.
Nanso, wɔ mo honam fam nneɛma mu no, ɛsɛ sɛ moyɛ pɛ, na yei nnyɛ amemenemfe, anyɛ saa a wɔde Honhom no adiyie mmorosoɔ no bɛkame mo.
Afei, yei ne mmarasɛm a mede ma me nkoa ama ayɛ wɔn mfasoɔ wɔ berɛ a wɔte nkwa mu, ama ada me nhyira adi wɔ wɔn tiri so, na ama ayɛ wɔn nsiyɛ ne banbɔ ho akatua;
Sɛdeɛ ɛbɛma aduane ne aduradeɛ; na ama apɛgyadeɛ; na ama afie ne nsase, wɔ tebea biara mu a Me, Awurade mede wɔn bɛsi, ne baabiara a Me, Awurade, mɛsoma wɔn.
Ɛfiri sɛ wɔayɛ nokorɛfoɔ wɔ nneɛma pii ho, na wɔayɛ adeɛ ɛfiri sɛ wɔnyɛɛ bɔne.
Hwɛ, Me, Awurade, meyɛ mmɔborɔhunufoɔ na mɛhyira wɔn, na wɔbɛkɔ saa nneɛma yi anigyeɛ mu. Aane. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/71.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 71
chapter_summary: 1–4, Wɔsoma Joseph Smith ne Sidney Rigdon sɛ wɔnkɔ bɔ asɛmpa no ho dawuro; 5–11, Wɔbɛhyɛ ahotefoɔ no atamfo aniwuo.

verses.text: Hwɛ, me nkoa Joseph Smith, Jun., ne Sidney Rigdon, sɛdeɛ Awurade se mo nie, sɛ berɛ no anya aba a ɛhia na ɛfata ma me sɛ mobɛbue mo ano na moabɔ m’asɛmpa no dawuro, aheman no mu nneɛma, monkyerɛkyerɛ ɛmu ahintasɛm mfiri twerɛsɛm no mu, sɛdeɛ Honhom no kyɛfa ne tumi a wɔde bɛma mo no teɛ, mpo sɛdeɛ mepɛ.
Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, mommɔ dawuro nkyerɛ wiase wɔ amantam a atwa ahyia no mu, ne asɔre no mu nso, wɔ mmerɛ kakra mu, mpo kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛda no adi akyerɛ mo.
Nokorɛ yei yɛ asɛmpatrɛ adwuma wɔ mmerɛ kakra bi mu a mede ama mo mu.
Ɛno nti, monyɛ adwuma wɔ me bobeturo mu. Momfrɛ asase sotefoɔ, na monni adanseɛ, na monsiesie kwan mma mmaransɛm ne adiyisɛm a ɛrebɛba no.
Afei, hwɛ yei yɛ nyansa; obiara a ɔkenkan no, ma ɔnte aseɛ na ɔngye nso;
Ɛfiri sɛ deɛ ɔgye no, wɔbɛma no mmorosoɔ, mpo tumi.
Ɛno nti, monhyɛ mo atamfo aniwuo; monfrɛ wɔn ma wɔnhyia mo wɔ badwa mu ne kokoa mu, na mmerɛ dodoɔ a moyɛ nokorɛfoɔ no, wɔn aniwuo bɛda adi.
Ɛno nti, momma wɔmfa wɔn adwene kɛseɛ no mmra mmɛdi Awurade asie.
Nokorɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade se mo nie—akodeɛ biara a wɔayɛ de atia mo no rennyina;
Na sɛ onipa biara ma ne nne so tia mo a n’ani bɛwu wɔ me ara me mmerɛ a ɛsɛ mu.
Ɛno nti, monni me mmaransɛm so; ɛnonom yɛ ampa ne nokorɛ. Aane. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/72.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 72
chapter_summary: 1–8, Ɛsɛ sɛ mpaninfoɔ no bu wɔn sohwɛadwuma ho akonta kyerɛ ɔhwɛfoɔ no; 9–15, Ɔhwɛfoɔ no hwɛ adekoradan no so na ɔhwɛ ɔnnibiefoɔ ne ahiafoɔ; 16–26, Ahwɛfoɔ di adanseɛ fa mpaninfoɔ no mudie ho.

verses.text: Monyɛ aso, na montie Awurade nne, O mo a moahyia abɔ mu, mo a moyɛ m’asɔre asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ, mo a wɔde aheman no ne tumi ama mo.
Ɛfiri sɛ nokorɛ sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ nie, ɛfata ma me sɛ wɔbɛyi ɔhwɛfoɔ ama mo, anaa afiri mo mu, ama asɔre a ɛwɔ Awurade bobeturo fã ha yi.
Na nokorɛ, wɔ yei mu no moayɛ nyansadeɛ, ɛfiri sɛ Awurade rehwehwɛ yei afiri hwɛsofoɔ biara nsam, sɛ ɔbɛbu akonta afa ne sohwɛadwuma ho, wɔ mmerɛ mu ne daapem mu.
Ɛfiri sɛ deɛ ɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ ne nyansafoɔ berɛ ɛsɛ mu no wɔbu no sɛ ɔfata sɛ ɔbɛnya efie kɛseɛ a m’Agya asiesie ama no no adi.
Nokorɛ mese mo, m’asɔre mpaninfoɔ a wɔwɔ me bobeturo mu saa fa ha yi bɛbu wɔn sohwɛdwuma ho akonta akyerɛ ɔhwɛfoɔ no, a mɛyi no wɔ saa me bobeturo mu fã ha yi.
Wɔbɛnya saa nneɛma yi wɔ twerɛtohɔ so, na wɔde ama ɔhwɛfoɔ no wɔ Sion.
Na wɔbɛda ɔhwɛfoɔ n’asɛdeɛ adi nam mmaransɛm a wɔde ama, ne nhyiamu no nne so.
Na afei, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, m’akoa Newel K. Whitney yɛ onipa a ɛsɛ sɛ wɔyi na wɔhyɛ no sɔfoɔ ma saa tumi yi. Yei ne Awurade mo Nyankopɔn, mo Gyefoɔ pɛ. Aane. Amen.
Awurade asɛm, a ɛka mmara a wɔde ama no ho, deɛ ɛda ɔhwɛfoɔ no asɛdeɛ adi, deɛ wɔahyɛ no sɔfoɔ ama asɔre a ɛwɔ saa bobeturo no fã ha yi, a nokorɛ ɛyɛ yei—
Sɛ ɔnhwɛ Awurade adekoradan no so; na ɔnnyegye asɔre no ntoboa wɔ saa bobeturo no fã ha yi;
Na ɔnnye mpaninfoɔ no akontabuo sɛdeɛ wɔahyɛ dada no; na ɔnhwɛ mma wɔn deɛ wɔhia, wɔn a wɔbɛtua deɛ wɔgyeɛ, mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔwɔ deɛ wɔde bɛtua;
Sɛdeɛ wɔbɛte yei nso ho ama asɔre no yieyɛ, onnibiefoɔ ne ahiafoɔ.
Na deɛ ɔnni deɛ ɔde bɛtua no, wɔbɛbu ho akonta na wɔde ahyɛ Sion hwɛfoɔ no nsa, na ɔbɛtua ka no afiri deɛ Awurade de bɛgu ne nsam no mu.
Na nokorɛfoɔ adwumayɛ a wɔyɛ wɔ honhom fam nneɛma mu no, wɔ asɛmpa no som mu ne aheman no mu nneɛma a wɔde ma asɔre no, ne wiase no, bɛyɛ akatua ama ka a wɔde ɔhwɛfoɔ a ɔwɔ Sion no;
Ɛkyerɛ sɛ, yei firi asɔre no mu na ɛba, ɛfiri sɛ sɛdeɛ mmara no teɛ no, onipa biara a ɔbɛba Sion no de nneɛma nyina ara bɛgu ɔhwɛfoɔ no anim wɔ Sion.
Na afei, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, ensiane sɛ opanin biara a ɔwɔ bobeturo no fã ha yi no wɔ sɛ ɔbu ne sohwɛadwuma ho akonta kyerɛ ɔhwɛfoɔ a ɔwɔ bobeturo no fã ha yi nti—

Adansedie nwoma a ɔtemmufoɔ anaa ɔhwɛfoɔ a ɔwɔ bobeturo no fã ha yi de kɔma ɔhwɛfoɔ a ɔwɔ Sion no ma wɔgye onipa biara to mu sɛ ɔnya apɛgyadeɛ, na ɛma nneɛma nyina ara mmuaeɛ, ma wɔgye no sɛ hwɛsofoɔ nyansafoɔ ne odwumayɛni nokorɛfoɔ;
Anyɛ saa a ɔhwɛfoɔ a ɔwɔ Sion no rennye no nto mu.

Na afei, nokorɛ mese mo, opanin biara a ɔbɛbu n’akonta akyerɛ ɔhwɛfoɔ a ɔwɔ bobeturo no fã ha yi no, ɛsɛ sɛ asɔre anaa nsɔre no, a ɔyɛ adwuma wɔ mu no di ne ho adanseɛ, sɛdeɛ ɔbɛtumi ama wɔagye ɔno ara ne n’akonta atom wɔ ade nyina ara mu.
Na bio, momma me nkoa a wɔayi wɔn sɛ hwɛsofoɔ wɔ atwerɛ a ɛfa m’ásɔre ho so no no nnya hokwan sɛ wɔbɛgye mmoa afiri ɔhwɛfoɔ anaa ahwɛfoɔ no hɔ wɔ ade nyina ara mu—
Sɛdeɛ wɔbɛtumi abɔ adiyisɛm no ho dawuro, na afiri adi akɔ asase ano; sɛdeɛ wɔn nso bɛtumi anya sika a ɛbɛyɛ mfasoɔ ama asɔre no wɔ ade nyina ara mu;
Sɛdeɛ wɔbɛma wɔagye wɔn nso atom wɔ ade nyina ara mu, na wɔabu wɔn sɛ hwɛsofoɔ anyansafoɔ.
Na afei, hwɛ, yei bɛyɛ mfatoho ama m’asɔre nkorabata ahodoɔ no nyina ara, wɔ asase biara a wɔbɛsi bi wɔ so. Na afei mede me nsɛm no ba awieɛ. Amen.
Nsɛm kakra a ɛka aheman no mu mmara ho, ɛfa asɔremma no ho—wɔn a wɔnam Honhom Kronkron no so ayi wɔn sɛ wɔnkɔ Sion no, ne wɔn a wɔanya akwanya sɛ wɔbɛkɔ Sion no—
Momma wɔnnye adansedie nwoma mfiri asɔre mpaninfoɔ mmiɛnsa hɔ nkɔma ɔhwɛfoɔ no, anaa tumi krataa a ɛfiri ɔhwɛfoɔ no hɔ;
Anyɛ saa a deɛ ɔbɛkɔ Sion asase no, wɔremmu no sɛ ɔyɛ hwɛsofoɔ nyansafoɔ. Yei nso yɛ mfatoho. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/73.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 73
chapter_summary: 1–2, Ɛsɛ sɛ mpaninfoɔ no kɔ so ka asɛmpa no; 3–6, Ɛsɛ sɛ Joseph Smith ne Sidney Rigdon kɔ so kyerɛ Twerɛ Kronkron no ase kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛwie.

verses.text: Na nokorɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ nie, ɛho hia ma me sɛ wɔkɔ so ka asɛmpa no, na wɔkɔ so wɔ kasakyerɛ mu de ma nsɔre a ɛwɔ amantam a ɛtwa ahyia no mu, kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛyɛ nhyiamu bio;
Na afei, hwɛ, wɔbɛda no adi akyerɛ wɔn, nam nhyiamu no nne so, wɔn asɛmpatrɛ adwuma ahoroɔ so.
Afei, nokorɛ mese mo me nkoa, Joseph Smith, Jun., ne Sidney Rigdon, sɛdeɛ me, Awurade seɛ nie, ɛho hia sɛ moyɛ nkyerɛaseɛ bio;
Na, sɛ ɛbɛtumi a, monka asɛmpa no wɔ amantam a atwa ahyia no mu kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛyɛ nhyiamu; na ɛno akyire no ɛho hia sɛ mobɛkɔso ayɛ nkyerɛaseɛ adwuma no kɔsi sɛ mobɛwie.
Na momma yei nyɛ nhwɛsoɔ mma mpaninfoɔ no kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛma wɔn nimdeɛ aka ho, mpo sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ no.
Seesei memmfa bio nka mo ho saa berɛ yi. Mommɔ mo asene mu abɔsoɔ na mo ani nna hɔ. Mpo saa ara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/74.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 74
chapter_summary: 1–5, Paulo tu Asɔre a ɛwɔ ne mmerɛ so no fo sɛ wɔnni Mose mmara no so; 6–7, Mmɔfra nketewa yɛ kronkron na wɔate wɔn ho nam Mpata no so.

verses.text: Na okunu a ɔnnye nnie no ne yere na ɔte ne ho, na ɔyere a ɔnnye nnie no ne kunu na ɔte ne ho; ɛnte saa a na mo mma ho wɔ fi, nanso afei deɛ wɔn ho ate.
Afei, wɔ asomafoɔ no mmerɛ mu no, na twatiatwa ho mmara wɔ Yudafoɔ no nyina ara mu, wɔn a na wɔnnye Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no nnie no.
Na ɛbaa sɛ aperedie kɛseɛ sɔree nkorɔfoɔ no ntam ɛfa twatiatwa mmara no ho, ɛfiri sɛ na okunu a ɔnnye nnie no pɛ sɛ wɔtwa ne mma twatia na wɔbɛhyɛ Mose mmara a wɔahyɛ no mã no ase.
Na ɛbaa sɛ mmɔfra no, ɛnam sɛ wɔtetee wɔn hyɛɛ Mose mmara no ase nti, wɔtiee wɔn agyanom amammerɛ no na wɔannye Kristo asɛmpa no anni, ɛno mu na wɔn ho yɛɛ fi.

Ɛno nti, ɛnam saa asɛm yi nti na ɔsomafoɔ no twerɛ kɔmaa asɔre no, maa wɔn mmarasɛm, a ɛmfiri Awurade hɔ, mmom ɔno ara hɔ, sɛ mma ɔgyedini ne deɛ ɔnnye nnie nka mmɔ mu; gyesɛ wɔyi Mose mmara no firi wɔn ntam,
Sɛdeɛ wɔn mma bɛkɔ so ayɛ momonoto; na saa amammerɛ no to bɛtwa, deɛ ɛka sɛ mmɔfra nketewa ho nte no; ɛfiri sɛ na ɛwɔ Yudafoɔ no mu;
Nanso mmɔfra nketewa yɛ kronkron, ɛnam sɛ wɔate wɔn ho nam Yesu Kristo mpata no so; na sei na twerɛsɛm no ase kyerɛ.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/75.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 75
chapter_summary: 1–5, Mpaninfoɔ nokorɛfoɔ a wɔka asɛmpa no bɛnya nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ; 6–12, Bɔ mpaeɛ nya Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ no, deɛ ɔkyerɛ nneɛma nyina ara no; 13–22, Mpaninfoɔ bɛtena ase abu wɔn a wɔpo nkrasɛm no atɛn; 23–36, Nsɛmpatrɛfoɔ mmusua bɛnya mmoa afiri Asɔre no hɔ.

verses.text: Nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese mo, Me a menam Honhom no nne so mpo kasa, mpo Alfa ne Omega, mo Awurade ne mo Nyankopɔn—
Montie, O mo a mode mo din ama sɛ mobɛkɔ akɔbɔ m’asɛmpa no ho dawuro, moapempan me bobeturo no mu.
Hwɛ, mese mo sɛ ɛyɛ me pɛ sɛ mobɛ kɔ, na mma mo ntwentwɛn mo nan ase, anaa monnyɛ akwadworɔ, mmom momfa mo ahoɔden nyɛ adwuma—
Momma mo nne so sɛ totorobɛnto nnyegyeeɛ, na mommɔ nokorɛ no ho dawuro sɛdeɛ adiyisɛm ne mmaransɛm a mede ama mo no teɛ.
Na saa na sɛ moyɛ nokorɛfoɔ a wɔbɛkyekyere afiafi bebree agu mo akyi, na wɔbɛbɔ mo anidie, ne honam a ɛnwuo, ne nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ ahenkyɛ.
Ne saa nti, nokorɛ mese m’akoa William E. McLellin, sɛ metwe ahyɛdeɛ a mede maa no sɛ ɔnkɔ apuieɛ aman mu no san;
Na mema no ahyɛdeɛ foforɔ ne mmarasɛm foforɔ, ɛno mu na me, Awurade, mɛtea no ɛnam sɛ ɔnwiiwii wɔ n’akoma mu;
Na ɔyɛɛ bɔne; nanso, mede kyɛ no na meka kyerɛ no bio sɛ, Kɔ anaafoɔ fam aman no so.
Na momma m’akoa Luke Johnson ne no nkɔ, na wɔmmɔ nneɛma a mahyɛ wɔn no ho dawuro—
Na wɔnfrɛ Awurade din nsrɛ Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ no, deɛ ɔbɛkyerɛ wɔn nneɛma nyina ara a ɛfata ma wɔn—
Na wɔmmɔ mpaeɛ berɛbiara ama wɔammrɛ; na mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔyɛ yei no, mɛka wɔn ho mpo akɔsi awieɛ.
Hwɛ, yei ne Awurade mo Nyankopɔm pɛ ɛfa mo ho. Mpo saa ara. Amen.

Na bio, nokorɛ sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ nie, momma m’akoa Orson Hyde ne m’akoa Samuel H. Smith ntu kwan nkɔ apuieɛ aman no mu, na Wɔmmɔ nneɛma a mahyɛ wɔn no ho dawuro; na mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ no, hwɛ, mɛka wɔn ho mpo akɔsi awieɛ.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese m’akoa Lyman Johnson, ne m’akoa Orson Pratt, nso bɛtu wɔn kwan nkɔ apueɛ fam aman no so; na hwɛ, na hunu, meka wɔn nso ho, mpo akɔsi awieɛ.
Na bio, mese m’akoa Asa Dodds, ne m’akoa Calves Wilson, sɛ wɔn nso ntu wɔn kwan nkɔ atɔeɛ fam aman no so, na wɔmmɔ m’asɛmpa no ho dawuro, mpo sɛdeɛ m’ahyɛ wɔn no.
Na deɛ ɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ no bɛdi nneɛma pii so nkonim, na wɔbɛma no so da a ɛtwa toɔ no.
Na bio, mese m’akoa Major N. Ashley, ne m’akoa Burr Riggs sɛ, ma wɔn ntu wɔn kwan nso nkɔ anaafoɔ fam man mu.
Aane, momma wɔn nyina ara ntu wɔn kwan, sɛdeɛ mahyɛ wɔn no, wɔnkɔ fie ne fie, ne akuraa ne akuraa ase, ne kuropɔn ne kuropɔn mu.
Na fie biara a mobɛwura mu a wɔbɛgye mo no, monnya mo nhyira ngu saa fie no so.
Na fie biara a mobɛwura mu a wɔnnye mo no, mobɛyɛ ntɛm afiri saa fie no mu, na monporoporo mo nan ase mfuturo sɛ adanseɛ ntia wɔn.
Na ɛdɛ ne anigyeɛ bɛhyɛ mo mã; na monhunu sɛ, atemmuo da no, mobɛyɛ atemmuafoɔ wɔ saa fie no so, na moabu wɔn fɔ;

Na ɛbɛfanyinam abosonsomfoɔ no atemmuo da no, kyɛn saa fie no; ne saa nti, mommɔ mo asene na monyɛ nokorɛfoɔ, na mobɛdi nneɛma nyina ara so nkonim, na wɔbɛma mo so da a ɛtwa toɔ no. Mpo saa ara. Amen.
Na bio, sɛdeɛ Awurade ka kyerɛ mo nie, O m’asɔre mpaninfoɔ, a mode mo din ama sɛ mobɛhunu ne pɛ ɛfa mo ho—
Hwɛ, mese mo, sɛ ɛyɛ asɔre no asɛdeɛ sɛ wɔboa na wɔtaa saa nkorɔfoɔ no abusuafoɔ akyi, na wɔn a wɔafrɛ wɔn a ɛsɛ sɛ wɔsoma wɔn kɔbɔ asɛmpa no dawuro kyerɛ wiase no, wɔboa wɔn abusuafoɔ nso.
Ɛno nti, Me, Awurade, mema mo saa mmarasɛm yi, sɛ mompɛ baabi mma mo abusuafoɔ ntena, mmerɛ dodoɔ a mo nuanom wɔ pɛ sɛ wɔbɛbue wɔn akoma mu.
Na mma momma wɔn a wɔbɛtumi anya baabi ama wɔn mmusua, na wɔanya asɔre mmoa, nyina ara no nnyae sɛ wɔbɛkɔ wiase, sɛ ɛyɛ apuieɛ anaa atɔeɛ, atifi anaa anaafoɔ.
Na wɔmmisa na wɔbɛnya, wɔmmɔ mu na ɛbɛbue ama wɔn, na wɔbɛda no adi afiri soro akyerɛ wɔn faako a wɔbɛkɔ, mpo nam Ɔwerekyekyefoɔ no so.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, sɛ onipa biara a ɛsɛ sɛ ɔsiesie n’ankasa abusua akyi no, ma ɔnsiesie, na kwan biara so no ɔrenhwere n’ahenkyɛ; na ɔnyɛ adwuma wɔ asɔre no mu.
Onipa biara nyɛ nsiyɛ wɔ nneɛma nyina ara mu. Na onihafoɔ no rennya tenabea wɔ asɔre no mu, agye sɛ ɔsakyera na ɔyɛ n’akwan yie.
Ɛno nti, momma m’akoa Simeon Carter ne m’akoa Emer Harris nka mmɔ mu wɔ ɔsom adwuma no mu;
Ne m’akoa Ezra Thayre ne m’akoa Thomas B. Marsh nso;
Ne m’akoa Hyrum Smith ne m’akoa Reynolds Cahoon nso;
Ne m’akoa Daniel Stanton ne m’akoa Seymour Brunson nso;
Ne m’akoa Sylvester Smith ne m’akoa Gideon Carter nso;
Ne m’akoa Ruggles Eames ne m’akoa Stephen Burnett nso;
Ne m’akoa Micah B. Welton ne m’akoa Eden Smith nso. Mpo saa ara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/76.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 76
chapter_summary: 1–4, Awurade yɛ Onyankopɔn; 5–10, Wɔbɛyi aheman no ahintasɛm akyerɛ ahotefoɔ nyina ara; 11–17, Obiara bɛfiri adi aba abɔnefoɔ anaa ateneneefoɔ wusɔreɛ mu; 18–24, Wiase ahodoɔ ɛmutefoɔ no yɛ Onyankopɔn mmammarima ne mmammaa a wɔawo wɔn ama Onyankopɔn nam Yesu Kristo Mpata no so; 25–29, Onyankopɔn bɔfoɔ bi hwee ase na ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔbonsam; 30–49, Ɔyeramma nya afɔbuo a ɛnni awieɛ amanehunu; wɔn a wɔaka no nya animuonyam aheman bi; 50–70, Wɔka ateasefoɔ a wɔama wɔn so no animuonyam ne wɔn akatua wɔ sɛlɛstia aheman mu no ho asɛm; 71–80, Wɔkyerɛkyerɛ wɔn a wɔbɛnya tɛrɛstra aheman no adi no mu; 81–113, Wɔkyerɛkyerɛ wɔn a wɔbɛnya tɛlɛstia, tɛrɛstra, ne sɛlɛstia animuonyam no dibea mu; 114–119, Nokorɛfoɔ no bɛtumi ahunu na wɔate Onyankopɔn aheman no mu ahintasɛm ase nam Honhom Kronkron tumi so.

verses.text: Ɔsoro, montie, na monyɛ aso, O asase, na monni ahurusie mo asase sotefoɔ, ɛfiri sɛ Awurade yɛ Onyankopɔn, na n’akyi no Agyenkwa biara nni hɔ.
Ne nyansa yɛ kɛseɛ, n’akwan yɛ nwanwa, na obiara ntumi nhunu ne nnwuma ano.
Ne botaeɛ nni nhwammɔ, na obiara nni hɔ a ɔtumi si ne nsa ho kwan.
Firi daapem kɔsi daapem ɔte saa ara, na ne mfeɛ nni hwammɔ.
Na sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ nie—Me, Awurade, meyɛ mmɔborɔhunufoɔ ne domfoɔ ma wɔn a wɔsuro me, na ɛsɔ m’ani sɛ mɛdi wɔn a wɔsom me wɔ tenenee ne nokorɛ mu kɔsi awieɛ no nni.
Kɛseɛ na wɔn akatua bɛyɛ na ɛnni awieɛ bɛyɛ wɔn animuonyam.

Na wɔn na mɛda ahintasɛm nyina ara adi akyerɛ wɔn, aane, aheman no ahintasɛm biara a wɔde asie firi tete nna no mu, ne mfeɛ a ɛbɛba, mɛda me nsusuieɛ pa ho anigyesɛm a ɛfa nneɛma nyina ara a ɛfa m’aheman ho no akyerɛ wɔn.
Aane, mpo daapem anwanwadeɛ na wɔbɛhunu, na nneɛma a ɛbɛba na mɛkyerɛ wɔn, mpo awoɔntoatoasoɔ pii nneɛma.
Na wɔn nyansa bɛyɛ kɛseɛ, na wɔn nteaseɛ bɛduru soro; na anyansafoɔ nyansa bɛsɛe wɔ wɔn anim, na mmadwemma nteaseɛ bɛyɛ kwa.
Na ɛnam me Honhom so mɛma wɔn hann, na ɛnam me tumi so mɛda me kokoam pɛ adi akyerɛ wɔn—aane, mpo saa nneɛma a ani nhunuuiɛ, anaa aso nteeɛ, na ɛnnya nwuraa onipa akoma mu.
Yɛn, Joseph Smith, Jun., ne Sidney Rigdon, na yɛwɔ Honhom mu da ɛtɔ so du-nsia wɔ Ogyefuo mu, wɔ yɛn Awurade afe apem, ahanwɔtwe aduasa-mmienu mu—
Ɛnam Honhom no tumi so yɛn ani bueei na yɛn nteaseɛ mu yɛɛ hann, ɛno nti yɛhunuu Onyankopɔn nneɛma tee aseɛ—
Mpo saa nneɛma a ɛwɔ hɔ firi mfitiaseɛ no ansana wiase rebɛba, a Agya no hyehyɛɛeɛ, nam ne Ba a Ɔwoo no Korɔ no so, ɔno a na ɔwɔ Agya no koko mu, mpo firi mfitiaseɛ no;
Ɔno na yɛdi ne ho adanseɛ; na adanseɛ a yɛdi no yɛ Yesu Kristo asɛmpa no mahyɛ, deɛ ɔyɛ Ɔba no, a yɛhunuu no na yɛne no kasaae wɔ ɔsoro anisoadehunu no mu no.
Na berɛ a na yɛreyɛ nkyerɛaseɛ adwuma no, a na Awurade ayi ama yɛn no, yɛduruu Yohane ti nnum, nkyekyɛmu aduonu nkron, a wɔde maae yɛn sɛ deɛ adi soɔ yi—
Deɛ ɛkasa fa awufoɔ no owusɔreɛ ho, na ɛfa wɔn a wɔbɛte Onipa Ba no nne no:
Na wɔbɛfiri adi aba; na wɔn a wɔayɛ papa no bɛwɔ ateneneefoɔ wusɔreɛ mu; na wɔn a wɔayɛ bɔne no bɛwɔ abɔnefoɔ wusɔreɛ mu.
Afei, yei yɛɛ yɛn nwanwa, ɛfiri sɛ wɔnam Honhom no so na wɔde maa yɛn.
Na berɛ a yɛredwendwen saa nneɛma yi ho no, Awurade de ne nsa kaa yɛn nteaseɛ ani na ɛbueeɛ, na Awurade animuonyam hyerɛn twaa yɛn ho hyiaae.
Na yɛhunuu Ɔba no animuonyam, wɔ Agya no nsa nifa so, na yɛnyaa ne mahyɛ;
Na yɛhunuu abɔfoɔ kronkron no, ne wɔn a wɔate wɔn ho wɔ n’ahennwa no anim, sɛ wɔresom Onyankopɔn, ne Adwammaa no, wɔsom no afebɔɔ ne afebɔɔ.
Na afei, adansedeɛ bebree a wɔadi afa no ho akyire no, yei ne adansedeɛ a ɛtwa toɔ koraa, a yɛdi fa ne ho: Sɛ ɔte ase!
Ɛfiri sɛ yɛhunuu no, mpo wɔ Onyankopɔn nsa nifa so; na yɛtee nne no sɛ ɛredi ne ho adanseɛ sɛ Ɔno ne Agya no Ba a Ɔwoo no Korɔ no—
Sɛ wɔfaa ne so, na wɔnam ne mu, na ɔno ara no so na wɔbɔɔ wiase ahodoɔ no, na ɛmutefoɔ no yɛ Onyankopɔn mma mmarima ne mma mmaa a wawo wɔn.

Na yɛhunuu yei nso, na yɛdi adanseɛ, sɛ Onyankopɔn bɔfoɔ a na ɔwɔ tumi wɔ Onyankopɔn anim, a ɔsɔre tiaa Ɔba a Wɔwoo no Korɔ no a Agya no dɔ no a na ɔwɔ Agya no koko mu no, wɔtoo no twenee fam firii Onyankopɔn ne Ɔba no anim,
Na wɔfrɛɛ no Ɔyeraba, ɛfiri sɛ ɔsoro suu no—ɔno ne Lusifa, adekyeeɛ ba no.
Na yɛhunuuɛ, na hwɛ, wahwe ase! wahwe ase, mpo adekyee ba no!

Na berɛ a na yɛda so wɔ Honhom mu no, Awurade hyɛɛ yɛn sɛ yɛntwerɛ anisoadehunu no; ɛfiri sɛ yɛhunuu Satan, saa ɔwɔ dada no, mpo ɔbonsam no, deɛ ɔtee Onyankopɔn so atua, na ɔhwehwɛɛ sɛ ɔgye yɛn Nyankopɔn aheman ne ne Kristo no—
Ɛno nti, ɔtu Onyankopɔn ahotefoɔ so sa, na ɔtwa wɔn ho hyia.
Na yɛnyaa anisoadehunu faa wɔn a ɔtuu wɔn so sa na ɔdii wɔn so nkonim no amanehunu ho, ɛfiri sɛ sei na Awurade nne a ɛbaa yɛn hɔ no seeɛ:
Sei na Awurade seɛ ɛfa wɔn a wɔnim me tumi nyina ara, ne wɔn a wɔanya mu kyɛfa, na wɔama wɔn ho kwan na ɔbonsam tumi adi wɔn so, na wɔapa nokorɛ no akyi na wɔbu me tumi no animtia—
Wɔn na wɔyɛ ɔyeramma no, wɔn na meka sɛ, sɛ wɔanwo wɔn a, anka ɛbɛyɛ ama wɔn;
Ɛfiri sɛ wɔyɛ abufuhyeɛ anwenneɛ, a wɔadome wɔn sɛ wɔnhunu amane wɔ Onyankopɔn abufuhyeɛ ano, wɔne ɔbonsam ne n’abɔfoɔ wɔ daapem mu;
Wɔn na maka sɛ bɔnefakyɛ nni hɔ ma wɔn wɔ saa wiase yi mu anaa wiase a ɛbɛba no mu—
Ɛfiri sɛ wɔapa Honhom Kronkron no a wɔnyaae no akyi, na wɔapa Agya no Ba a Ɔwoo no Korɔ no akyi, na wɔabɔ no asɛnnua mu ama wɔn ho na wɔabɔ no ahohoraa akyerɛ.
Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔbɛkɔ ogya ne sɔfe tadeɛ mu no, wɔne ɔbonsam ne n’abɔfoɔ—
Na wɔn nko ara na owuo a ɛtɔ so mmienu no bɛnya wɔn so tumi;
Aane, nokorɛ, wɔn nko ara na wɔrennye wɔn nkwa wɔ Awurade mmerɛ a ɛsɛ mu, berɛ a n’abufuhyeɛ amanehunu aba awie no.
Na wɔde nkaeɛ no nyina ara bɛfiri awufoɔ wusɔre mu aba, nam Adwammaa no nkonimdie ne n’animuonyam so, deɛ wɔkumm no no, deɛ na ɔwɔ Agya no koko mu ansaana wɔrebɛyɛ wiase-ahodoɔ no.
Na yei ne m’asɛmpa no, anigyesɛm no, a ɛnne a ɛfiri soro no baae no dii ho adanseɛ kyerɛɛ yɛn—
Sɛ ɔbaa wiase, mpo Yesu Kristo, sɛ wɔmmɔ no asɛnnua mu mma wiase, na ɔnsoa wiase bɔne, na na ɔnwira wiase ho, na ɔnte ho mfiri deɛ ɛntene nyina ara ho;
Sɛdeɛ ɛnam ne so obiara betumi anya nkwa, wɔn a Agya no de ahyɛ ne tumi ase na ɔbɔɔ wɔn no;
Deɛ ɔhyɛ Agya no animuonyam, na ɔkora ne nsa ano nnwuma nyina ara, gye sɛ ɔyeramma no a wɔpa Ɔba no akyi, akyire yi a Agya no ada no adi akyerɛ no.

Ɛno nti, ɔgye obiara nkwa gye sɛ wɔn—wɔbɛkɔ daapem asotwe mu, a ɛyɛ asotwe a ɛtoɔ ntwa da, deɛ ɛyɛ ɛnni awieɛ asotwe no, na wɔne ɔbonsam ne n’abɔfoɔ bɛdi hene wɔ daapem mu, faako a wɔn mu mmoa nnwu da, na ogya no nnum da, yei ne wɔn ateetee—
Na n’awieɛ, anaa bea korɔ, anaa wɔn ateetee no, onipa biara nnim;
Na wɔanna no adi, wɔnnaa no adi, na wɔrenna no adi nkyerɛ onipa, gye sɛ wɔn a wɔbɛnya ɛmu kyɛfa no;
Nanso, Me, Awurade, meyi kyerɛ pii wɔ anisoadehunu mu, nanso ntɛm pa ara me to mu bio;
Ɛno nti, n’awieɛ, ne terɛ, ne korɔn, ne bunu mu, ne n’ahohiahia no, wɔnnte aseɛ, na onipa biara nte aseɛ gye sɛ wɔn a wɔayi wɔn ama saa afɔbuo yi.
Na yɛtee sɛ nne no reka sɛ: Montwerɛ anisoadehunu yi, na hwɛ, yei ne anisoadehunu a ɛfa abɔnefoɔ amanehunu ho no awieɛ.
Na bio yɛdi adanseɛ—ɛfiri sɛ yɛhunuu na yɛteeɛ, na yei ne Kristo asɛmpa no ho adanseɛ ɛfa wɔn a wɔbɛfiri adi aba wɔ ateneneefoɔ wusɔreɛ mu—
Wɔn ne wɔn a wɔgyee Yesu ho adanseɛ no, na wɔgyee ne din diiɛ na wɔbɔɔ wɔn asu wɔ ne sie yɔbea so, wɔde wɔn siee wɔ nsuo mu wɔ ne din mu, na yei sɛdeɛ mmarasɛm a wɔde maaeɛ no teɛ—

Ama sɛ wɔdi mmaransɛm no so a wɔahohoro wɔn ho na wɔate wɔn ho afiri wɔn bɔne nyina ara ho na wɔanya Honhom Kronkron no nam nsa a wɔde gu soɔ so a ɛfiri deɛ wɔahyɛ no sɔfoɔ na wɔasɔ n’ano ama saa tumi yi;
Ne deɛ ɔnam gyedie so di nkonim, na Honhom Kronkron Bɔhyɛ no sɔ n’ano no, deɛ Agya no de agu wɔn a wɔtene na wɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ nyina ara so no.
Wɔn ne wɔn a wɔyɛ Abakan n’asɔre no.
Wɔn ne wɔn a Agya no de nneɛma nyina ara ahyɛ wɔn nsa—
Wɔn ne wɔn a wɔyɛ asɔfoɔ ne ahemfo, a wɔanya ne mahyɛ, ne n’animuonyam no bi no;
Na wɔyɛ Ɔsorosoroni no asɔfoɔ, wɔ Mɛlkisɛdɛk kwan so, deɛ na ɛyɛ Henok kwan so, deɛ na ɛyɛ Ɔba a Wɔwoo no Korɔ no kwan so no.
Ɛno nti, sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ no, wɔyɛ anyame, mpo Onyankopɔn mmamarimma—
Ɛno nti, nneɛma nyina ara yɛ wɔn dea, sɛ ɛyɛ nkwa anaa owuo, anaa nneɛma a ɛwɔ hɔ seesei, anaa nneɛma a ɛbɛba, ne nyina ara yɛ wɔn dea, na wɔyɛ Kristo dea, na Kristo yɛ Onyankopɔn dea.
Na wɔbɛdi nneɛma nyina ara so nkonim.
Ɛno nti mma onipa biara nhyɛ onipa animuonyam, na mmom ɔnhyɛ Onyankopɔn animuonyam, ɔno na ɔbɛbrɛ atamfo nyina ara ase wɔ ne nan ase.
Yeinom bɛtena Onyankopɔn ne ne Kristo nkyɛn afebɔɔ ne afebɔɔ.
Yeinom ne wɔn a ɔne wɔn bɛba, mmerɛ a ɔbɛba wɔ ɔsoro mununkum mu abɛdi hene wɔ asase so wɔ ne nkorɔfoɔ so no.
Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔbɛnya kyɛfa wɔ owusɔre a ɛdi kan no mu.
Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔbɛfiri adi aba wɔ ateneneefoɔ wusɔreɛ no mu.
Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔaba Sion Bepɔ so no, ne Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ ahenkuro no mu, kronkronbea no, ne nyina ara mu kronkron mu kronkron.
Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔaba abɔfoɔ a wɔn dodoɔ nni ano kuo mu no, na wɔaba amansan nhyiamu ne Henok, ɛne Abakan n’asɔre mu no.
Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔatwerɛ wɔn din wɔ soro, faako a Onyankopɔn ne Kristo yɛ nnipa nyina ara temmuafoɔ no.
Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔyɛ ateneneefoɔ a ɔtamgyinafoɔ Yesu apam foforɔ no ama wɔayɛ pɛ, ɔno a ɔyɛɛ saa mpata a ɛdi mu yi nam ɔno ankasa ne mogya a ɔhwie guuiɛ so.
Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔn honam yɛ sɛlɛstia, a wɔn animuonyam yɛ owia no nsɛsoɔ, mpo Onyankopɔn animuonyam, deɛ ɔkron kyɛn obiara, a wɔatwerɛ sɛ n’animuonyam tesɛ owia a ɛwɔ soro no.

Na bio, yɛhunuu tɛrɛstra wiase no, na hwɛ na hunu, yeinom ne wɔn a wɔwɔ tɛrɛstra no, a n’animuonyam nte sɛ Abakan n’asɔre no a anya Agya no mahyɛ no, mpo sɛdeɛ ɔsrane deɛ no nte sɛ owia deɛ wɔ soro no.
Hwɛ, yeinom ne wɔn a wɔwuui a wɔanya mmara;
Na bio wɔn ne nnipa ahonhom a wɔde wɔn guu afiase, a Ɔba no kɔsraa wɔn, na ɔkaa asɛmpa no kyerɛɛ wɔn, sɛdeɛ wɔbɛbu wɔn atɛn sɛ nnipa a wɔwɔ honam mu no;
Wɔn a wɔannye Yesu ho adanseɛ wɔ honam mu, nanso wɔgyee no akyire yi.
Yeinom ne nnipa animuonyamfoɔ a wɔwɔ asase so, wɔn a nnipa aniteɛ firaa wɔn ani no.
Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔnyaa n’animuonyam, nanso ɛnnyɛ ne mahyɛ no.
Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔnya Ɔba no anim-hwɛ no, nanso nnyɛ Agya no mahyɛ no.
Ɛno nti, wɔyɛ tɛrɛstra honam, na wɔnnyɛ sɛlɛstia honam, na ɛsono wɔn animuonyam no, sɛdeɛ ɛsone ɔsrane ne owia no.
Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔn adanseɛ fa Yesu ho no mu nnyɛ den; ɛno nti, wɔrennya ahenkyɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn aheman no mu.
Na afei yei ne anisoadehunu a yɛhunu faa tɛrɛstra ho no awieɛ, deɛ Awurade hyɛɛ yɛn sɛ yɛntwerɛ no, berɛ a na yɛda so wɔ Honhom mu no.
Na bio, yɛhunuu tɛlɛtia animuonyam no, deɛ ɛyɛ animuonyam ketewa no, mpo sɛdeɛ nsoromma animuonyam no nte sɛ ɔsrane deɛ ɛwɔ ewiem no.
Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔannye Kristo asɛmpa no, annye Yesu ho adanseɛ no.
Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔampa Honhom Kronkron no akyi.
Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔsum wɔn gu asamando no.
Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔrennye wɔn mfiri ɔbonsam nsam kɔsi owusɔre a ɛtwa toɔ no, kɔsi sɛ Awurade, mpo Kristo a ɔyɛ Adwammaa no, bɛwie n’adwuma.
Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔnnya ne mahyɛ wɔ wiase a ɛnni awieɛ no mu, nanso wɔbɛnya Honhom Kronkron no nam tɛrɛstrafoɔ som so;
Na tɛrɛstra bɛnya, nam sɛlɛstiafoɔ som so.
Na tɛlɛtia nso nya firi abɔfoɔ som mu, wɔn, a wɔayi wɔn sɛ wɔnsom wɔn no, anaa wɔn a wɔayi wɔn sɛ wɔnyɛ ahonhom asomfoɔ mma wɔn; ɛfiri sɛ wɔbɛyɛ nkwagyeɛ adedifoɔ.
Na sei na yɛhunuu tɛlɛtia animuonyam, wɔ ɔsoro anisoadehunu no mu, deɛ ɛboro nteaseɛ nyina ara so no;
Na onipa biara nnim gye sɛ onii a Onyankopɔn ayi akyerɛ no.
Na saa na yɛhunuu tɛrɛstra animuonyam no, deɛ ɛboro tɛlɛtia animuonyam so wɔ ade nyina ara mu, mpo wɔ animuonyam mu, wɔ tumi mu, wɔ ahoɔden mu, ne tumidie mu.
Na saa na yɛhunuu sɛlɛstia animuonyam no, deɛ ɛboro ade nyina ara so no—faako a Onyankopɔn, mpo Agya no, di hene wɔ n’ahennwa so afebɔɔ ne afebɔɔ;
Ɔno a n’ahennwa anim nneɛma nyina ara koto wɔ obuo ahobrɛaseɛ mu, na wɔhyɛ no animuonyam afebɔɔ ne afebɔɔ no.
Wɔn a wɔte ne nkyɛn no yɛ Abakan no asɔre; na wɔhunu sɛdeɛ wɔhunu wɔn, na wɔnim sɛdeɛ wɔnim wɔn, ɛfiri sɛ wɔanya ne mahyɛ ne n’adom;
Na ɔyɛ wɔn pɛpɛɛpɛ wɔ tumi mu, ne ahoɔden mu, ne tumidie mu.
Na sɛlɛstia animuonyam no yɛ baako, mpo sɛdeɛ owia n’animuonyam yɛ baako no.
Na tɛrɛstra animuonyam no yɛ baako, mpo sɛdeɛ ɔsrane animuonyam yɛ baako no.

Na tɛlɛtia animuonyam no yɛ soronko, mpo sɛdeɛ nsoromma animuonyam yɛ soronko no; ɛfiri sɛ sɛdeɛ nsoromma baako ne ɔfoforɔ bɔ abira wɔ animuonyam mu no, mpo sa ara na baako ne ɔfoforɔ bɔ abira wɔ animuonyam mu wɔ tɛlɛtia wiase mu;
Ɛfiri sɛ yeinom ne wɔn a wɔyɛ Paulo deɛ, ne Apolo deɛ, ne Kefa deɛ no.

Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔka sɛ wɔn mu binom yɛ yei deɛ na ebinom nso yɛ yei deɛ—ebinom yɛ Kristo deɛ na ebinom yɛ Yohane deɛ, na ebinom yɛ Mose deɛ, na ebinom yɛ Elia deɛ, na ebinom yɛ Esaia deɛ, na ebinom yɛ Yesaia deɛ, na ebinom yɛ Henok deɛ;
Nanso wɔannye asɛmpa no, annye Yesu ho adanseɛ no, annye Nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no, annye daapem apam no.
Deɛ ɛtwa toɔ koraa no, yeinom ne wɔn a wɔremmoaboa wɔn ano nka ahotefoɔ no ho, ama wɔahwim wɔn akɔ Abakan n’asɔre no mu, na wɔagye wɔn wɔ mununkum no mu.
Na yeinom ne wɔn a wɔyɛ atorɔfoɔ, ne ntafowayifoɔ, na awaresɛefoɔ, ne adwamammɔfoɔ, ne obibiara a ɔdɔ na ɔdi atorɔ.
Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔhunu amane wɔ Onyankopɔn abufuhyeɛ ano wɔ asase so.
Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔhunu amane wɔ ogya a ɛnni awieɛ aweretɔ mu.
Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔato wɔn atwene asamando na wɔhunu amane wɔ Otumfoɔ Nyankopɔn abufuhyeɛ ano, kɔsi mmerɛ mu mahyɛ no, berɛ a Kristo bɛbrɛ atamfo nyina ara ase ahyɛ ne nan ase, ama n’adwuma awie pɛyɛ;

Berɛ a ɔde aheman no bɛma, na ɔde bɛkyerɛ Agya no, a nkekaawa biara nni ho, na ɔbɛka sɛ: madi nkonim na me nko ara na matiatia nsã-kyi amena no mu, mpo Otumfoɔ Nyankopɔn abufuhyeɛ wirɛmfoɔ nsa-kyi amena no.
Afei wɔde n’animuonyam ahenkyɛ bɛhyɛ no, na watena ne tumi ahennwa no so adi hene afebɔɔ ne afebɔɔ.
Nanso hwɛ, na hunu, yɛhunuu tɛlɛtia wiase animuonyam ne ɛmutefoɔ, sɛ wɔdɔɔso sɛ nsoromma a wɔwɔ ɔsoro ntrɛmu mu, anaa sɛ anwea a ɛwɔ mpoano;
Na yɛtee Awurade nne sɛ ɛreka sɛ: Yeinom nyina ara bɛbu nkotodwe na tɛkrɛma nyina ara bɛpae mu aka akyerɛ deɛ ɔte ahennwa no so no daa afebɔɔ;
Ɛfiri sɛ wɔbɛbu wɔn atɛn sɛdeɛ wɔn nnwuma teɛ, na onipa biara, sɛdeɛ ɔno ara nnwuma teɛ no, bɛnya n’ankasa ne tumidie, wɔ fi-kɛseɛ a wɔasiesie ama no mu;
Na wɔbɛyɛ Ɔsorosoroni no ne nkoa; nanso faako a Onyankopɔn anaa Kristo wɔ no, wɔrentumi mma hɔ, dabiara da.
Yei ne anisoadehunu a yɛhunuu no n’awieɛ, a wɔhyɛɛ yɛn sɛ yɛntwerɛ berɛ a na yɛda so wɔ Honhom mu no.
Nanso Awurade nnwuma yɛ akɛseɛ na ɛyɛ nwanwa, na n’aheman no mu ahintasɛm a ɔyi kyerɛɛ yɛn no boro nteaseɛ nyina ara so wɔ animuonyam mu, ne tumi mu, ne tumidie mu;
Deɛ ɔhyɛɛ yɛn sɛ mma yɛntwerɛ berɛ a na yɛda so wɔ Honhom mu, na onipa nni ho kwan sɛ ɔka;
Na onipa rentumi nna no adi, ɛfiri sɛ wɔbɛtumi ahunu na wɔate aseɛ nam Honhom Kronkron no tumi nko ara so, deɛ Onyankopɔn de ma wɔn a wɔdɔ no, na wɔate wɔn ho wɔ n’anim no;
Wɔn a ɔma wɔn akwanya sɛ wɔn ankasa nhunu na wɔnte aseɛ;
Sɛdeɛ ɛnam Honhom no tumi ne n’adiyie so no, berɛ a wɔwɔ honam mu no, wɔbɛtumi agyina n’anim wɔ animuonyam wiase no mu.
Na animuonyam, ne anidie, ne tumidie nka Onyankopɔn ne Adwammaa no afebɔɔ ne afebɔɔ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/77.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 77
chapter_summary: 1–4, Mmoa wɔ ahonhom na wɔbɛtena ase wɔ ahotɔ a ɛnniawieɛ mu; 5–7, Saa asase yi wɔ asetena tiawa a ɛyɛ mfeɛ 7,000 mu; 8–10, Abɔfoɔ ahodoɔ de asɛmpa no san ba bio na wɔsom wɔ asase so; 11, 144,000foɔ no nsɔano; 12–14, Kristo bɛba mfeɛ a ɛtɔ so mpem nsɔn no ahyɛaseɛ mu; 15, Wɔbɛfrɛ nkɔmhyɛfoɔ mmienu wɔ Yudafoɔ man mu.

verses.text: ASƐMMISA. Deɛn ne ahwehwɛ po no a Yohane kaa ho asɛm, wɔ Adiyisɛm ti nnan, ne nkyekyɛmu nsia no?MMUAEƐ. Ɛyɛ asase no, wɔ n’ahoteɛ mu, ɔnnwuo, ne ɛnni awieɛ tebea mu.

ASƐMMISA. Deɛn na ɛwɔ sɛ yɛte aseɛ fa mmoa nnan, a wɔka wɔn ho asɛm wɔ saa nkyekyɛmu no ara mu no?MMUAEƐ. Ɛyɛ kasayima, a Yohane, Odiyifoɔ no, de kyerɛkyerɛɛ ɔsoro mu, Onyankopɔn paradise, onipa, ne mmoa, ne mmoa a wɔwea, ne ewiem nnomaa anigyeɛ mu; deɛ ɛyɛ honhom no yɛ deɛ ɛyɛ honam no nsɛsoɔ; na deɛ ɛyɛ honam no yɛ deɛ ɛyɛ honhom no nsɛsoɔ; onipa honhom yɛ ne honamdua nsɛsoɔ, saa ara nso na aboa honhom teɛ, ne abɔdeɛ foforɔ biara a Onyankopɔn abɔ.

ASƐMMISA. So mmoa nnan no gyina hɔ ma mmoa ankorɛankorɛ nnan pɛ, anaa wɔgyina hɔ ma akuokuo anaa nhyehyɛeɛ?MMUAEƐ. Wɔyɛ mmoa ankorɛankorɛ nnan, a wɔde kyerɛɛ Yohane, a wɔgyina hɔ ma ateasefoɔ akuoakuo no animuonyam wɔ wɔn hyɛbrɛ nhyehyɛeɛ anaa abɔdeɛ atenaeɛ mu, wɔ wɔn ɛnni awieɛ anigyeɛ mu.

ASƐMMISA. Sɛn na ɛwɔ sɛ yɛte aseɛ fa ani ne ntaban, a na mmoa no wɔ?MMUAEƐ. Wɔn ani no gyina hɔ ma hann ne nimdeɛ, a ɛkyerɛ sɛ, nimdeɛ ahyɛ wɔn mã; na wɔn ntaban no gyina hɔ ma tumi, a wɔde di akɔneaba, de di dwuma, ne deɛ ɛkeka ho.

ASƐMMISA. Sɛn na ɛwɔ sɛ yɛte aseɛ fa mpaninfoɔ aduonu nan no, a Yohane kaa wɔn ho asɛm no?MMUAEƐ. Ɛwɔ sɛ yɛte aseɛ sɛ saa mpaninfoɔ a Yohane hunuu wɔn no, yɛ mpaninfoɔ a na wɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ wɔ ɔsom adwuma no mu a wɔawuwuo; wɔn a na wɔka asafo nsɔn no ho, a na saa berɛ no wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn paradise hɔ.

ASƐMMISA. Deɛn na ɛwɔ sɛ yɛte aseɛ fa nwoma a Yohane hunuuɛ no ho, deɛ wɔde nsɔano nson asosɔ akyire no?MMUAEƐ. Ɛwɔ sɛ yɛte aseɛ sɛ ɛkura Onyankopɔn pɛ a wada n’adi, n’ahintasɛm ne ne nnwuma; esumasɛm a ɛfa n’amammuo a ɛfa saa asase yi mfeɛ mpem nson a akɔ so atena hɔ, anaa n’asetena tiawa no ho.

ASƐMMISA. Sɛn na ɛwɔ sɛ yɛte aseɛ fa nsɔano nsɔn a wɔde sɔɔ ano no?MMUAEƐ. Ɛwɔ sɛ yɛte ase sɛ nsɔano a ɛdi kan no kura nneɛma a ɛwɔ mfeɛ apem a ɛdi kan no mu, deɛ ɛtɔ so mmienu no nso fa mfeɛ apem a ɛtɔ so mmienu no ho, na saa ara na ɛteɛ de kɔsi deɛ ɛtɔ so nson no.

ASƐMMISA. Sɛn na ɛwɔ sɛ yɛte aseɛ fa abɔfoɔ baanan, a wɔka wɔn ho asɛm wɔ Adiyisɛm ti nsɔn ne nkyekyɛmu baako no ho?MMUAEƐ. Ɛwɔ sɛ yɛte aseɛ sɛ wɔyɛ abɔfoɔ baanan a Onyankopɔn asoma wɔn, a wɔama wɔn tumi wɔ asase afanan so, sɛ wɔnnye nkwa anaa wɔnsɛe; yeinom ne wɔn a wɔwɔ daapem asɛmpa no a wɔde ma ɔman, abusua kuo, kasa, ne nnipa biara no; na wɔwɔ tumi sɛ wɔto soro mu, sɛ wɔsɔ ano ma nkwa, anaa wɔto twene mmeammea a ɛyɛ sum mu.

ASƐMMISA.Deɛn na ɛwɔ sɛ yɛte aseɛ fa ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔreforo kɔ soro firi apueɛ no, wɔ Adiyisɛm ti nsɔn nkyekyɛmu mmienu no?MMUAEƐ. Ɛwɔ sɛ yɛte aseɛ sɛ ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔreforo kɔ soro firi apueɛ no yɛ deɛ wɔde Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ no nsɔano tumi wɔ Israel mmusuakuo dumienu no so ama no no; ɛno nti, ɔtea mu kyerɛ abɔfoɔ baanan a wɔkura daapem asɛmpa no, ka sɛ: Mma monnha asase no, anaa ɛpo, anaa nnua, kɔsi sɛ yɛbɛsɔ yɛn Nyankopɔn nkoa no ano wɔ wɔn moma so. Na, sɛ mobɛgye ato mu a, yei ne Elia a ɛsɛ sɛ ɔba bɛboaboa Israel mmusuakuo ano na ɔde nneɛma nyina ara san si wɔn sibea no.
ASƐMMISA.Berɛ bɛn na nneɛma a wɔka ho asɛm wɔ saa ti yi mu no bɛba mu?MMUAEƐ. Ɛsɛ sɛ ɛba mu wɔ mfeɛ a ɛtɔ so mpem nsia no mu, anaa sɛ sɛ wɔbue nsɔano a ɛtɔ so nsia no a.

ASƐMMISA.Sɛn na ɛwɔ sɛ yɛte aseɛ fa mpem ɔha aduanan-nanfoɔ no nsɔano no ho, wɔn a wɔfiri Israel mmusuakuo mu no—a mpem dumienu firi abusua biara mu no?MMUAEƐ. Ɛwɔ sɛ yɛte aseɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔasɔ wɔn ano no yɛ asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ, a wɔahyɛ wɔn asɔfoɔ ama Onyankopɔn nhyehyɛeɛ kronkron no, sɛ wɔnni daapem asɛmpa no ho dwuma mma; ɛfiri sɛ wɔn na wɔahyɛ wɔn asɔfoɔ afiri ɔman biara, abusuakuo, kasa, ne nnipa nyina ara mu, nam abɔfoɔ a wɔama wɔn tumi wɔ asase so aman no so, sɛ wɔmfa dodoɔ biara a wɔbɛba no mmra Abakan n’asɔre mu.

ASƐMMISA.Deɛn na ɛwɔ sɛ yɛte aseɛ fa ntotorobɛnto nnyegyeɛ no ho no, a wɔka ho asɛm wɔ Adiyisɛm ti nwɔtwe no?MMUAEƐ. Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛte aseɛ sɛ sɛdeɛ Onyakopɔn yɛɛ wiase nna nsia, na ɔwiee n’adwuma wɔ da a ɛtɔ so nsɔn no, na ɔtee ho, na ɔnwenee onipa firii asase so dɔteɛ mu no, mpo saa ara na, mfeɛ mpem nsɔn ahyɛaseɛ no, Awurade Nyankopɔn bɛte asase no ho, na wawie onipa nkwagyeɛ, na ɔbɛbu nneɛma nyina ara atɛn, na ɔbɛgye nneɛma nyina ara nkwa, gye sɛ deɛ wammfa annhyɛ ne tumi ase, berɛ a ɔbɛsɔ nneɛma nyina ara ano awie no, akɔsi nneɛma nyina ara awieɛ; na ntotorobɛnto no nnyegyeɛ a ɛfiri abɔfoɔ nsɔn no yɛ n’adwuma no nsiesie ne n’awieɛ, wɔ mfeɛ mpem nsɔn no ahyɛaseɛ—a ɛresiesie kwan ansana ne mmaeɛ berɛ no aduru.
ASƐMMISA. Berɛ bɛn na saa nneɛma yi bɛba mu, deɛ wɔatwerɛ wɔ Adiyisɛm ti nkrɔn no?MMUAEƐ. Ɛsɛ sɛ ɛba mu akyire yi a wɔabue nsɔano a ɛtɔ so nsɔn no ano, asana Kristo bɛba.

ASƐMMISA.Deɛn na ɛwɔ sɛ yɛte aseɛ fa nwoma ketewa no a Yohane diiɛ no, sɛdeɛ Adiyisɛm ti du ka no?MMUAEƐ. Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛte aseɛ sɛ ɛyɛ soma, ne ayɛyɛdeɛ, ma no sɛ ɔbɛboaboa Israel mmusuakuo no ano; hwɛ, yei ne Elia, ɔno a, sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ no, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔba na ɔsan de nneɛma nyina ara ba bio no.

ASƐMMISA.Deɛn na ɛwɔ sɛ yɛte aseɛ fa adansefoɔ mmienu no ho, wɔ Adiyisɛm ti dubaako?MMUAEƐ. Wɔyɛ nkɔmhyɛfoɔ mmienu a wɔbɛyi wɔn ama Yudafoɔ man no wɔ nna a ɛtwa toɔ no mu, wɔ berɛ a wɔde biribiara bɛsan ama bio no, sɛ wɔnhyɛ nkɔm nkyerɛ Yudafoɔ no akyire yi a wɔaboaboa wɔn ano na wɔakyekyere Yerusalem ahenkuro no wɔ wɔn agyanom asase so no.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/78.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 78
chapter_summary: 1–4, Ɛwɔ sɛ Ahotefoɔ no hyehyɛ na wɔkyekyere adekoradan; 5–12, Sɛ wɔhwɛ wɔn agyapadeɛ so yie a, wɔbɛnya nkwagyeɛ; 13–14, Ɛsɛ sɛ Asɔre no de wɔn ho firi wiase tumi ase; 15–16, Mikael (Adam) som wɔ Okronkronni no (Kristo) akwankyerɛ so; 17–22, Nhyira ne nokorɛfoɔ, na wɔn na wɔbɛnya nneɛma nyina ara adi.

verses.text: Awurade kasa kyerɛɛ Joseph Smith, Jun., sɛ: Montie me, Awurade wo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ, mo a wɔahyɛ mo asɔfoɔ ama m’asɔre asɔfodie kɛseɛ no, mo a moahyia abɔ mu yi;
Na montie deɛ wahyɛ mo asɔfoɔ afiri soro no afotuo, deɛ ɔbɛka anyansasɛm agu mo asom no, sɛdeɛ mobɛnya nkwagyeɛ wɔ ade a mode ato m’anim no ho, Awurade Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.

Ɛfiri sɛ nokorɛ mese mo, berɛ no aso, na seesei abɛn; na hwɛ, na hunu, ɛho hia sɛ me nkorɔfoɔ nya ahyehyɛdeɛ wɔ asiesie ne nkyekyereɛ ho nsɛm a ɛfa adekoradan no ho ma me nkorɔfoɔ mu ɔnnibiefoɔ no, a wɔwɔ saa bea yi ne Sion asase so—
Ama ayɛ daapem nkyekyereɛ a ɛtim hɔ daa ne nhyehyɛeɛ ama m’asɔre no, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛpia yiedie no a mode mo ho ahyɛ mu no, ama onipa nkwagyeɛ, na ahyɛ mo Agya a ɔwɔ soro no animuonyam;
Ama moayɛ pɛ wɔ ɔsoro nneɛma apam mu, aane, ne asase so nneɛma mu nso, sɛdeɛ mobɛnya ɔsoro nneɛma.
Ɛfiri sɛ sɛ moanyɛ pɛ wɔ asase so nneɛma mu a montumi nnyɛ pɛ wɔ ɔsoro nneɛma mu;
Ɛfiri sɛ sɛ mopɛ sɛ mema mo bea wɔ sɛlɛstia wiase mu a, ɛwɔ sɛ moyɛ saa nneɛma yi a mahyɛ mo na mehwehwɛ firi mo hɔ yi de siesie mo ho.
Na afei, nokorɛ sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ ni, ɛfata sɛ mo a moaka abɔ mu wɔ saa nhyehyɛeɛ yi mu no, moyɛ biribiara de hyɛ me animuonyam;
Anaa, nsɛm foforɔ mu no, momma m’akoa Newel K. Whitney ne m’akoa Joseph Smith, Jun., ne m’akoa Sidney Rigdon ne ahotefoɔ a wɔwɔ Sion no ntena ase wɔ agyinatuo mu;
Anyɛ saa a Satan hwehwɛ sɛ ɔbɛdane wɔn adwene afiri nokorɛ no ho, ama wɔabɛyɛ anifraeɛ na wɔannte nneɛma a wɔasiesie ama wɔn no ase.
Ɛno nti, mema mo mmarasɛm, sɛ momfa apam a wɔrentumi mmu so anaa daapem apam nsiesie mo ho na mommoaboa mo ho.
Na deɛ ɔbu so no bɛhwere ne dibea ne gyinabea wɔ asɔre no mu, na wɔde no bɛma Satan ayaayaadeɛ kɔsi ɔgyeɛ da no.
Hwɛ, yei yɛ nsiesie a mede resiesie mo, ne fapem, ne nhwɛsoɔ a mede ma mo, a monam so bɛdi mmaransɛm a mede ama mo no so;
Sɛdeɛ ɛnam m’adom so, ɛmfa ho ne amanehunu a ɛbɛba mo so no, asɔre no bɛtumi ade ne ho afiri abɔdeɛ biara a ɛwɔ sɛlɛstia wiase ase;
Sɛdeɛ mobɛtumi aba ahenkyɛ a wɔasiesie ama mo no ho, na wɔayɛ mo sodifoɔ wɔ aheman pii so, Awurade Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ, Sion Kronkronni no, deɛ wato Adam-ondi-Ahman fapem no;

Ɔno a wayi mo hene-bapɔmba Mikael no, na ne nan si hɔ pintinn, de no asi sorosoro, na wɔde nkwagyeɛ nsafoa ama no wɔ Ɔkronkronni no n’afotuo ne n’akwankyerɛ mu no, ɔno a ɔnni nna mfitiaseɛ ne nkwa awieɛ no.
Nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese mo, moyɛ mmɔfra nketewa, na monnya ntee nhyira akɛseɛ a Agya no wɔ wɔ n’ankasa ne nsam a wasiesie ama mo no ase;
Na monntumi nnyina nneɛma nyina ara ano seesei; nanso momma mo bo ntɔ mo yam, ɛfiri sɛ mɛdi mo anim kan. Aheman no yɛ mo dea na ɛmu nhyira yɛ mo dea, na daapem ahonyadeɛ no yɛ mo dea.
Na deɛ ɔde nnaseɛ gye saa nneɛma yi no wɔbɛhyɛ no animuonyam; na wɔde saa asase yi so nneɛma bɛka ne ho, mpo mmɔho ɔha, aane, bebree.
Ɛno nti, monyɛ nneɛma a mahyɛ mo no, mo Gyefoɔ na ɔseɛ, mpo Ahman Ba no, deɛ ɔsiesie nneɛma nyina ara ansana wafa mo no;
Ɛfiri sɛ moyɛ Abakan n’asɔre, na ɔbɛfa mo wɔ omununkum mu akɔ soro, na wayi onipa biara kyɛfa ama no.
Na deɛ ɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ ne hwɛsofoɔ nyansafoɔ no bɛnya nneɛma nyina ara adi. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/79.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 79
chapter_summary: 1–4, Wɔfrɛ Jared Carter sɛ ɔmfa Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ no so nka asɛmpa no.

verses.text: Nokorɛ mese wo sɛ, ɛyɛ me pɛ sɛ m’akoa Jared Carter bɛkɔ apueɛ fam aman so bio, afiri bea akɔ bea, ne ahenkuro so akɔ ahenkuro so, wɔ asɔfohyɛ tumi a wɔde ahyɛ no sɔfoɔ no mu, mmɔ anigyesɛm a ɛyɛ dɛ kɛseɛ ho dawuro, mpo daapem asɛmpa no.
Na mɛsoma Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ no aba no so, deɛ ɔbɛkyerɛ no nokorɛ no ne kwan a ɔmfa so nkɔ no;
Na mmerɛ dodoɔ a ɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ no, mede afiafi bɛhyɛ no ahenkyɛ bio.
Ɛno nti ma w’akoma nni dɛ, m’akoa Jared Carter, na nnsuro, wo Awurade na ɔseɛ, mpo Yesu Kristo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/80.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 80
chapter_summary: 1–5, Wɔfrɛ Stephen Burnett ne Eden Smith sɛ wɔnka asɛmpa no wɔ baabiara a wɔpɛ.

verses.text: Nokorɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade ka kyerɛ m’akoa Stephen Burnett nie: Kɔ, kɔ wiase na kɔka m’asɛmpa kyerɛ abɔdeɛ biara a ɔbɛte wo nne nnyegyeeɛ.
Na ɛnam sɛ wopɛ ɔhokafoɔ nti, mɛma wo m’akoa Eden Smith.
Ɛno nti, kɔ na kɔka m’asɛmpa no, sɛ ɛyɛ atifi anaa anaafoɔ, apuieɛ anaa atɔeɛ, ɛmfa ho, ɛfiri sɛ worentumi nyɛ mfomsoɔ.
Ne saa nti, monka nto dwa nneɛma a moate, na mogyedi nokorɛ mu, na monim sɛ ɛyɛ nokorɛ.
Hwɛ, yei ne deɛ wafrɛ mo no ne pɛ, mo Gyefoɔ, mpo Yesu Kristo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/81.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 81
chapter_summary: 1–2, Atitenafoɔ a Wɔdi kan no kura aheman no nsafoa no daa; 3–7, Sɛ Frederick G. Williams yɛ nokorɛfoɔ wɔ ne nyamedwuma no mu a, ɔbɛnya nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ.

verses.text: Nokorɛ, nokorɛ mese wo m’akoa Frederick G. Williams sɛ: Tie deɛ ɔrekasa no nne, Awurade wo Nyankopɔn asɛm, na tie ɔfrɛ a wɔde afrɛ wo no, mpo sɛ bɛyɛ sɔfo panin wɔ asɔre no mu, ne fotufoɔ ma m’akoa Joseph Smith Jun.;
Ɔno na mede aheman no nsafoa ama no, deɛ ɛyɛ Asɔfodie Kɛseɛ Atitenafoɔ no deɛ daa no:

Ne saa nti, nokorɛ megye no to mu na mɛhyira no, ne wo nso, mmerɛ dodoɔ a woyɛ nokorɛfoɔ wɔ afotuo mu, wɔ dibea a mayi ama wo no mu, wɔ mpaebɔ mu daa, wobue w’ano ne w’akoma mu, wɔ badwa mu ne kokoa mu, wɔ wo nyamedwuma mu nso wɔ asɛmpa no ho dawurobɔ mu wɔ ateasefoɔ asase so, ne wo nuanom ntam.
Na sɛ woyɛ saa nneɛma yi a, wobɛyɛ papa kɛseɛ paa ara ama wo mfɛfoɔ, na wobɛpagya deɛ ɔyɛ w’Awurade no n’animuonyam.
Ɛno nti, yɛ nokorɛfoɔ; gyina dibea a mayi ama wo no mu; boa wɔn a wɔyɛ mmrɛ, ma nsa a ɛsensɛn fam so, na hyɛ nkotodwe a agoɔ no den.
Na sɛ woyɛ nokorɛfoɔ kɔsi awieɛ a wobɛnya ɔnnwuo tebea ahenkyɛ, ne nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ wɔ fi-kɛseɛ a masiesie wɔ m’Agya fie hɔ no.
Hwɛ, na hunu, yeinom yɛ Alfa ne Omega nsɛm, mpo Yesu Kristo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/82.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 82
chapter_summary: 1–4, Baabi a wɔma dodoɔ no, wɔhwehwɛ dodoɔ firi hɔ; 5–7, Esum di hene wɔ wiase; 8–13, Sɛ yɛyɛ deɛ Awurade ka a, yɛkyekyere No; 14–18, Ɛsɛ sɛ Sion nyini wɔ ahoɔfɛ ne kronkronyɛ mu; 19–24, Ɛsɛ sɛ onipa biara hwehwɛ ne yɔnko yiedie.

verses.text: Nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese mo, me nkoa, mpɛn dodoɔ a mode mo mfomsoɔ kyɛ mo ho mo ho no, mpo saa ara na me, Awurade, mede kyɛ mo.

Nanso, ebinom wɔ mo ntam a wɔayɛ bɔne paa ara; aane, mpo mo nyina ara moayɛ bɔne paa ara; nanso nokorɛ mese mo, monhwɛ yie mfiri nnɛ de rekɔ, na montwe mo ho mfiri bɔne ho, anyɛ saa a atemmuo yaya bɛtɔ mo tiri so.
Ɛfiri sɛ deɛ wɔde dodoɔ ama no no, wɔhwehwɛ dodoɔ firi ne hɔ; na deɛ ɔyɛ bɔne tia hann kɛseɛ paa ara no bɛnya afɔbuo kɛseɛ paa ara.
Mobɔ me din pɛ adiyisɛm, na mede ma mo; na mmerɛ dodoɔ a monni me nsɛm so, deɛ mede ma mo no, mobɛyɛ mmaratofoɔ; na atɛntenenee ne atemmuo yɛ asotwe a ɛbata me mmara ho.
Ne saa nti, deɛ meka kyerɛ ɔbaako no meka kyerɛ obiara: Monwɛn, ɛfiri sɛ ɔsɛefoɔ no atrɛ ne tumidie mu, na esum di hene;
Na Onyankopɔn abufuo dɛre tia asase sotefoɔ; na obiara nnyɛ papa, ɛfiri sɛ obiara amane afiri kwan no so.
Na afei nokorɛ mese mo, me, Awurade, memmfa bɔne biara mmɔ mu kwaadu; monkɔ mo kwan na mma monnyɛ bɔne bio; nanso ɔkra a ɔyɛ bɔne no, bɔne dada no bɛsan aba no so, Awurade wo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.
Na bio, mese mo, mema mo mmarasɛm foforɔ, sɛdeɛ mobɛte me pɛ a ɛfa mo ho no ase;
Anaa, nsɛm foforɔ mu no, mema mo akwankyerɛ ɛfa kwan a mobɛbu bra wɔ m’anim, na atumi adane ama mo nkwagyeɛ.
Me Awurade, ɛkyekyere me, sɛ moyɛ deɛ meka a; nanso, sɛ moanyɛ deɛ meka a, monni bɔhyɛ biara.

Ne saa nti, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ ɛfata ma me sɛ wɔde nseɛ ne apam a wɔrentumi mmfa mmaratoɔ mmu so kyekyere me nkoa Edward Partridge ne Newel K. Whitney, A. Sidney Gilbert ne Sidney Rigdon, ne m’akoa Joseph Smith, ne John Whitmer ne Olive Cowdery, ne W.W Phelps ne Martin Harris bɔ mu, anyɛ saa a atemmuo bɛdi so ntɛm so, wɔ mo sohwɛadwuma ahodoɔ mu—
Sɛ wɔnhwɛ ɔnnibiefoɔ nsɛm so, ne nneɛma nyina ara a ɛfa ahwɛfoɔ ne n’aboafoɔ ho wɔ Sion asase so ne Kirtland asase so;
Ɛfiri sɛ mate Kirtland asase ho wɔ me ara me mmerɛ a ɛsɛ mu ama Ɔsorosoronni no ahotefoɔ mfasoɔ, na Sion anya pɛɛwa.
Ɛsiane sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ Sion nyini wɔ ahoɔfɛ mu, ne kronkronyɛ mu; ɛsɛ sɛ wɔtrɛ n’ahyeɛ mu; ɛwɔ sɛ wɔhyɛ ne mpɛɛwa den; aane, nokorɛ mese mo, ɛsɛ sɛ Sion sɔre na ɔfa n’ataadeɛ fɛɛfɛ hyɛ.
Ne saa nti, mema mo saa mmarasɛm yi, sɛ momfa saa apam yi nka mo ho mmɔ mu, na wɔbɛyɛ no sɛdeɛ Awurade mmara no teɛ.
Hwɛ, yei yɛ nyansa nso wɔ me mu ma mo yieyɛ.

Na ɛsɛ sɛ moyɛ pɛ, anaa nsɛm foforɔ mu no, ɛsɛ sɛ monya agyapadeɛ no ho kwan pɛpɛɛpɛ, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛboa ma wɔahwɛ nsɛm a ɛfa mo hwɛsofoɔ nnwuma ho, onipa biara sɛdeɛ n’apɛdeɛ ne n’ahiasɛm teɛ, mmerɛ dodoɔ a n’apɛdeɛ tene—

Yei nyina ara bɛyɛ mfasoɔ ama Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ n’asɔre no, sɛdeɛ onipa biara bɛtumi atu mpɔn wɔ n’adom-akyɛdeɛ mu, ama onipa biara atumi anya adom-akyɛdeɛ foforɔ, aane, mpo mmɔho ɔha, a wɔde bɛgu Awurade adekoradan mu, na abɛyɛ asɔre mũ no nyina ara agyapadeɛ—
Onipa biara nhwehwɛ ne yɔnko yieɛ, na ɔmfa ani korɔ nyɛ ade nyina ara mma Awurade animuonyam.
Mayi saa nhyehyɛeɛ yi sɛ ɛnyɛ daapem nhyehyɛeɛ mma mo, ne mo adedifoɔ, mmerɛ dodoɔ a monnyɛ bɔne.
Na ɔkra a ɔyɛ bɔne tia saa apam yi, na ɔyɛ n’akoma den tia yei no, wɔne no bɛdi sɛdeɛ m’asɔre mmara teɛ, na wɔbɛgyae no ama Satan ayaayaadeɛ kɔsi ɔgyeɛ da no.
Na afei, nokorɛ mese mo, na yei yɛ nyansa, momfa mamon a ɛntene nyɛ nnamfo, na wɔrensɛe mo.
Monnyae atemmuo mma me nko ara, ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ me deɛ na mɛtua ka. Asomdwoeɛ nka mo; me nhyira nkɔ so nka mo ho.
Na mpo seesei aheman no yɛ mo dea, na ɛbɛyɛ mo deɛ afebɔɔ, sɛ moanhwe ase amfiri mo pintinnyɛ ho a. Mpo saa ara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/83.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 83
chapter_summary: 1–4, Mmaa ne mmɔfra wɔ hokwan sɛ wɔgye mmoa firi wɔn kununom ne wɔn agyanom hɔ; 5–6, Akunafoɔ ne nnyanka wɔ hokwan sɛ wɔgye mmoa firi asɔre no hɔ.

verses.text: Nokorɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ nie, deɛ ɛka asɔre mmara ho a ɛfa mmaa ne mmɔfra ho, wɔn a wɔka asɔre no ho, wɔn a wɔahwere wɔn kununom anaa wɔn agyanom:
Mmaa wɔ ho kwan sɛ wɔgye mmoa firi wɔn kununom hɔ, kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛfa wɔn kununom; na sɛ wɔanhunu wɔn sɛ wɔyɛ mmaratofoɔ a, wɔbɛkɔ so ayɛ asɔremma wɔ asɔre no mu.
Na sɛ wɔanyɛ nokorɛfoɔ a wɔrenkɔ so nnyɛ asɔremma wɔ asɔre no mu; nanso wɔbɛtumi akɔ so atena wɔn apɛgyadeɛ so sɛdeɛ asase no mmara teɛ.
Mma nyina ara wɔ ho kwan sɛ wɔnya mmoa firi wɔn awofoɔ hɔ kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛduru wɔn mpaninfeɛ so.
Na ɛno akyire no, wɔwɔ asɔre no mmoa ho kwan, anaa nsɛm foforɔ mu no, wɔwɔ Awurade adekoradan no ho kwan, sɛ wɔn awofoɔ nni deɛ wɔde bɛma wɔn sɛ apɛgyadeɛ a.
Na wɔnam asɔre n’afɔrebɔ so bɛkora adekoradan no; na wɔbɛhwɛ akunafoɔ ne nnyanka, ne onnibiefoɔ nso. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/84.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 84
chapter_summary: 1–5, Wɔbɛsi Yerusalem Foforɔ no ne tɛmpol no wɔ Missouri; 6–17, Wɔde asɔfodie abusuasanten no firi Mose so de kɔ Adam so ma; 18–25, Asɔfodie kɛseɛ no kura Onyankopɔn ho nimdeɛ safoa; 26–32, Asɔfodie ketewa no kura abɔfoɔ som ne nsiesie asɛmpa safoa; 33–44, Nnipa nya nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ nam asɔfodie ntam ne apam no so; 45–53, Kristo Honhom no ma nnipa hann, na wiase da bɔne mu; 54–61, Ɛsɛ sɛ Ahotefoɔ no di adanseɛ fa nneɛma a wɔanya no ho; 62–76, Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔka asɛmpa no, na nsɛnkyerɛnne bɛdi akyire; 77–91, Ɛsɛ sɛ mpaninfoɔ firi adi kɔ a wɔnkura 92–97, Owuyadeɛ ne nnome retwɛn wɔn a wɔpo asɛmpa no; 98–102, Wɔde Sion gyeɛ ho dwom foforɔ no ma; 103–110, Onipa biara nnyina ɔno ara ne dibea mu na ɔnyɛ adwuma wɔ ɔno ara ne frɛ mu; 111–120, Ɛsɛ sɛ Awurade nkoa bɔ akyiwadeɛ a ɛbɔ man no ho dawuro wɔ nna a ɛtwa toɔ no mu.

verses.text: Yesu Kristo adiyisɛm a ɔde maa n’akoa Joseph Smith, Jun., ne mpaninfoɔ nsia, berɛ a na wɔaka wɔn akoma abɔ mu na wɔama wɔn nne so akɔ soro.

Aane, yei ne Awurade asɛm a ɛfa n’asɔre ho, a wɔakyekyere wɔ nna a ɛtwa toɔ yi mu ama sɛ ne nkorɔfoɔ bɛsan aba bio, sɛdeɛ ɔno aka nam ne nkɔmhyɛfoɔ ano so, ne n’ahotefoɔ anoboaboa sɛ wɔnnyina Sion Bepɔ so, faako a ɛbɛyɛ Yerusalem Foforɔ ahenkuro no.
Ahenkuro a wɔbɛhyɛ aseɛ asi wɔ tɛmpɔl asase so, deɛ Awurade de ne nsatea ayi no, wɔ Ɔman Missouri ahyeɛ so wɔ apueɛ fam, deɛ Joseph Smith, Jun., ne afoforɔ a wɔsɔ Awurade ani no ate ho no.

Nokorɛ yei ne Awurade asɛm, sɛ Yerusalem foforɔ ahenkuro no wɔnam ahotefoɔ no anoboaboa so na wɔbɛkyekyere, wɔbɛhyɛ aseɛ afiri saa bea yi, mpo tɛmpɔl bea no, tɛmpɔl a wɔbɛsi wɔ saa awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi mu.
Ɛfiri sɛ nokorɛ saa awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi rentwa mu nkɔ kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛsi fie ama Awurade, na omunukum bɛkata so, omununkum a ɛbɛyɛ mpo Awurade animuonyam, a ɛbɛhyɛ fie no mã.
Na Mose mmammarima no, sɛdeɛ Asɔfodie Kronkron a ɔnya firii n’ase Yetro nsa ase no teɛ no;
Na Yetro nya firii Kaleb nsa ase;
Na Kaleb nya firii Elihu nsa ase;
Na Elihu nya firii Yeremia nsa ase;
Na Yeremia nya firii Gad nsa ase;
Na Gad nya firii Yesaia nsa ase;
Na Yesaia nya firii Onyankopɔn nsa ase.
Yesaia nso tenaa ase wɔ Abraham nna no mu, na ɔnyaa nhyira firii ne hɔ—
Abraham nyaa asɔfodie no firii Mɛlkɛsɛdɛk hɔ, na ɔno nya firii n’agyanom abusuasanten mu, mpo kɔsi Noa so;
Na ɛfiri Noa so de kɔsi Henok so, nam n’agyanom abusuasanten so;
Na ɛfiri Henok so de kɔ kɔ si Abel so, deɛ ne nua nam atirisopam so kumm no no, deɛ ɔnyaa asɔfodie no nam Onyankopɔn mmaransɛm so, nam n’agya Adam nsa so, deɛ ɔyɛ onipa a ɔdi kan no—
Asɔfodie a ɛkɔ so wɔ Onyankopɔn asɔre mu wɔ awoɔntoatoasoɔ nyina ara mu, na ɛnni nna mfitiaseɛ anaa mfeɛ awieɛ.
Na Awurade de asɔfodie bi nso hyɛɛ Aaron ne n’asefoɔ den, wɔ wɔn awoɔntoatoasoɔ nyina ara mu, a ɛyɛ asɔfodie a ɛno nso wɔ hɔ na ɛne asɔfodie a ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn nhyehyɛeɛ kronkron no te hɔ afebɔɔ.
Na saa asɔfodie kɛseɛ yi di asɛmpa no ho dwuma, na ɛkura aheman n’ahintasɛm safoa, mpo Onyankopɔn ho nimdeɛ safoa.
Ne saa nti, ɛho ayɛyɛdeɛ no mu na nyamesu tumi da adi.
Na ayɛyɛdeɛ a ɛfa ho, ne asɔfodie hokwan no nka ho a, nyamesu tumi no nna adi mma nnipa wɔ honam mu;
Ɛfiri sɛ yei nka ho a onipa biara nntumi nnhunu Onyankopɔn anim, mpo Agya no, na ɔnnya nkwa.
Afei Mose kyerɛkyerɛɛ Israel mma no yei pefee wɔ ɛserɛ no so, na ɔhwehwɛɛe anibereso sɛdeɛ ne nkorɔfoɔ no ho bɛte sɛdeɛ wɔbɛtumi ahunu Onyankopɔn anim;

Nanso wɔyɛɛ wɔn akoma den na wɔantumi annyina n’anim; ne saa nti, Awurade wɔ n’abufuhyeɛ mu no, ɔkaa ntam sɛ wɔrennhyɛne n’ahomegyeɛ mu berɛ a na wɔwɔ ɛserɛ no so, saa ahomegyeɛ a ɛyɛ n’animuonyam mahyɛ no, ɛfiri sɛ n’abufuo dɛre tiaa wɔn.
Ne saa nti, ɔfaa Mose firii wɔn mfinimfini, ne Asɔfodie Kronkron no nso;
Na asɔfodie ketewa no kɔɔ so wɔɔ hɔ, saa asɔfodie no a ɛkura soro abɔfoɔ som ne asɛmpa no asiesie nsafoa no;

Saa asɛmpa no a ɛyɛ nsakyeraeɛ ne asubɔ asɛmpa no, ne bɔne fafire, ne mmara a ɛyɛ honam fa mu mmaransɛm no, deɛ Awurade wɔ n’abufuo mu hwɛ ma ɛkɔɔ so wɔ Aaron fie mu wɔ Israel mma ntam kɔsii Yohane so no, deɛ Onyankopɔn tetee no no, a na Sunsum Kronkron no ahyɛ no mã firi ne maame awotwaa mu no.

Ɛfiri sɛ wɔbɔɔ no asu berɛ a na ɔda so wɔ ne mmɔfraberɛ mu, na wɔhyɛɛ no sɔfoɔ nam Onyankopɔn bɔfoɔ so berɛ a na wanya nnaawɔtwe maa saa tumi yi, sɛ ɔmmɛtu Yudafoɔ aheman no ngu, na ɔmma Awurade kwan no ntene wɔ ne nkorɔfoɔ anim, mfa nsiesie Awurade mmaeɛ, ɔno a wɔde tumi nyina ara agu ne nsam.
Na bio, opanin ne ɔhwɛfoɔ dibea no yɛ mmataho a ɛho hia a ɛka asɔfodie kɛseɛ no ho.
Na bio, ɔkyerɛkyerɛni ne dikɔn dibea no yɛ mmataho a ɛho hia a ɛka asɔfodie ketewa no ho, saa asɔfodie a wɔsii so dua maa Aaron ne ne mma so no.

Ne saa nti, sɛdeɛ meka faa Mose mma ho no—na Mose mmammarima ne Aaron mmammarima nso bɛbɔ afɔdeɛ ne ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ a ɛsɔ ani wɔ Awurade fie, a ɛyɛ fie a wɔbɛsi ama Awurade wɔ saa awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi mu, wɔ baabi a wɔadwira ho sɛdeɛ mayi ama no—
Na Awurade animuonyam bɛhyɛ Mose ne Aaron mmammarima no mã, wɔ Sion Bepɔ so wɔ Awurade fie, mo a mo yɛ ne mmammarima no; na bebree nso na mafrɛ asoma akɔ sɛ wɔnkɔsi m’asɔre.
Ɛfiri sɛ wɔn a wɔbɛyɛ nokorɛfoɔ agye saa asɔfodie mmienu yi a maka ho asɛm yi, na wɔbɛyɛ wɔn frɛ kɛseɛ no, Honhom no te wɔn ho yɛ wɔn honamdua foforɔ.
Wɔbɛyɛ Mose ne Aaron mmammarima ne Abraham asefoɔ, ne asɔre no ne aheman no, ne wɔn a Onyankopɔn ayi wɔn.
Na wɔn nso a wɔgye saa asɔfodie yi nyina ara no gye me, Awurade na ɔseɛ;
Ɛfiri sɛ deɛ ɔgye me nkoa no gye me;
Na deɛ ɔgye me no gye m’Agya;
Na deɛ ɔgye m’Agya no gye m’Agya aheman; ne saa nti deɛ m’Agya wɔ nyina ara no wɔde bɛma no.
Na yei yɛ sɛdeɛ ntam ne apam a ɛka asɔfodie no ho teɛ.
Ne saa nti, wɔn a wɔgye asɔfodie no nyina ara no, gye saa ntam ne apam yi firi m’Agya hɔ, a wɔrentumi mmu so, anaa wɔrentumi nyi mfiri hɔ.
Nanso obiara a ɔbɛbu saa apam yi so berɛ a wagye awie no, na ɔbɛdane afiri ho koraa no, ɔrennya bɔnefakyɛ wɔ saa wiase yi mu anaa wiase a ɛbɛba no mu.
Na mmusuo nka obiara a ɔrennye saa asɔfodie a moanya yi, deɛ seesei mede rema mo a mowɔ ha nnɛ da yi, nam me ara me nne a ɛfiri ɔsorosoro so; na mpo mahyɛ ɔsoro asafo ne m’abɔfoɔ sɛ wɔnhwɛ mo so.
Na afei mema mo mmarasɛm sɛ monhwɛ yie wɔ mo ho mo ho, na momfa nsiyɛ ntie nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ nsɛm.
Ɛfiri sɛ mobɛtena ase nam asɛm biara a ɛfiri Onyankopɔn anomu ba no so.
Ɛfiri sɛ Awurade asɛm yɛ nokorɛ, na deɛ ɛyɛ nokorɛ biara yɛ hann, na deɛ ɛyɛ hann biara yɛ Honhom, mpo Yesu Kristo Honhom no.
Na Honhom no ma onipa biara a ɔba wiase yi mu no hann; na Honhom no ma onipa biara hann wɔ wiase baabiara, deɛ ɔtie Honhom no nne no.
Na obibiara a ɔtie Honhom no nne no ba Onyankopɔn hɔ, mpo Agya no.
Na Agya no kyerɛ no apam a wayɛ no foforɔ na ɔde ama mo no, deɛ ɔde ama mo wɔ mo yieyɛ nti, na ɛnyɛ mo nko ara yieyɛ nti, mmom wiase nyina ara nti.
Na wiase nyina ara da bɔne mu, na wɔsi apini wɔ esum mu ne bɔne nkoasom mu.
Na ɛnam yei so na mobɛhunu sɛ wɔwɔ bɔne nkoasom mu, ɛfiri sɛ wɔmma me hɔ.
Ɛfiri sɛ obiara a ɔmma me hɔ no wɔ bɔne nkoasom mu.
Na obiara a ɔnnye me nne no nnim me nne, na ɔnnyɛ me deɛ.
Na ɛnam yei so na mobɛhunu atenenefoɔ afiri atirimuɔdenfoɔ no mu, na wiase nyina ara si apini wɔ bɔne ase ne sum mu mpo seesei.
Na mmerɛ a abɛsene kɔ no, mo adwene bɛyɛɛ kusuu ɛnam annye-annie nti, na ɛnam sɛ mototoo nneɛma a monyaae no ase nti—
Saa ahuhudeɛ ne annye-annie yi de aɔsre mũ no nyina ara aba afɔbuo ase.
Na saa afɔbuo yi wɔ Sion mma so, mpo obiara.
Na wɔbɛka saa afɔbuo yi ase kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛsakyera na wɔbɛkae apam foforɔ no, mpo Mormon Nwoma no ne mmaransɛm dada no a mede ama wɔn no, ɛnyɛ sɛ wɔka nko ara, na mmom wɔnyɛ sɛ deɛ matwerɛ no—
Ama wɔaso aduaba a ɛfata ama wɔn Agya aheman; anyɛ saa a deɛ aka ama wɔn ne mpireka ne atemmuo a wɔbɛhwie agu Sion mma so.
Na ɛwɔ sɛ aheman no mma no gu m’asase kronkron no ho fi anaa? Nokorɛ, mese mo sɛ, Daabi.
Nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese mo a seesei mo te me nsɛm, a ɛyɛ me nne no, sɛ nhyira ne mo mpɛn dodoɔ a mogye saa nneɛma yi;

Na mede mo bɔne bɛkyɛ mo nam saa mmarasɛm yi so—sɛ mobɛgyina pintinn wɔ mo adwene mu wɔ koomyɛ mu ne honhom mu mpaebɔ, wɔ adanseɛ mu a mobɛdi akyerɛ wiase nyina ara ɛfa saa nsɛm a wɔaka akyerɛ mo no ho.
Ne saa nti, monkɔ wiase mu nyina ara; na bea biara a morentumi nkɔ no monsoma, sɛdeɛ adanseɛ no bɛtumi afiri mo hɔ akɔ wiase mu nyina ara, na akɔ abɔdeɛ biara hɔ.
Na sɛdeɛ meka kyerɛɛ m’asomafoɔ no, mpo saa ara na meka kyerɛ mo, ɛfiri sɛ moyɛ m’asomafoɔ, mpo Onyankopɔn asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ; mo ne wɔn a m’Agya de ama me; moyɛ me nnamfo;
Ne saa nti, sɛdeɛ meka kyerɛɛ m’asomafoɔ no meka kyerɛ mo bio, sɛ ɔkra biara a ɔgye mo nsɛm die, na wɔde nsuo bɔ n’asu ma no bɔne fafiri no, ɔbɛnya Sunsum Kronkron no.
Na saa nsɛnkyerɛnne yi bɛdi wɔn a wɔgyedie no akyiri—
Wɔ me din mu no wɔbɛyɛ anwanwa nnwuma bebree;
Wɔ me din mu no wɔbɛtutu ahonhommɔne;
Wɔ me din mu no wɔbɛsa ayarefoɔ yareɛ;
Wɔ me din mu no wɔbɛbue anifrafoɔ ani, na wɔbɛbue asotifoɔ aso;
Na emum tɛkrɛma bɛkasa;
Na sɛ onipa bi ma wɔn awuduro a ɛrenha wɔn;
Na ɔwɔ ano borɔ renya tumi nha wɔn.
Nanso mmarasɛm a mede ma wɔn ne sɛ mma wɔmmfa saa nneɛma yi nnhoahoa wɔn ho wɔn ho, na mma wɔnnka yienom wɔ wiase anim; ɛfiri sɛ mo mfasoɔ ne nkwagyeɛ nti na wɔde saa nneɛma yi ama mo.

Nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese mo, wɔn a wɔnnye mo nsɛm nni, na wɔmmɔ wɔn asu wɔ nsuo mu wɔ me din mu, ama wɔanya bɔne fafiri, sɛdeɛ wɔbɛtumi anya Sunsum Kronkron no, wɔbɛbu wɔn fɔ, na wɔremma Agya no aheman mu, faako a me ne m’Agya wɔ no.
Na saa adiyisɛm, ne mmarasɛm a mede ma mo yi, hyɛ aseɛ yɛ adwuma firi saa dɔnhwere yi ara wɔ wiase nyina ara so, na asɛmpa no wɔ hɔ ma wɔn a wɔnnyeeɛ nyina ara.

Nanso, nokorɛ meka kyerɛ wɔn a wɔde aheman no ama wɔn nyina ara—sɛ ɛwɔ sɛ wɔka asɛmpa no kyerɛ wɔn firi mo hɔ, sɛdeɛ wɔbɛsakyera afiri wɔn nnwuma bɔne dada no ho; ɛfiri sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wɔka wɔn anim wɔ wɔn annye-annie akoma bɔne nti, ɛne mo nuanom a wɔwɔ Sion sɛ wɔtee mo so atua berɛ a mesomaa mo no.

Na bio mese mo, me nnamfo, ɛfiri sɛ firi nnɛ de rekorɔ mɛfrɛ mo me nnamfo, ɛho hia sɛ mema mo saa mmarasɛm yi, sɛdeɛ mobɛyɛ tesɛ mpo me nnamfonom no wɔ nna no a na mene wɔn wɔ hɔ no mu, berɛ a na metu kwan kɔka asɛmpa no wɔ me tumi mu no;
Ɛfiri sɛ maamma wɔn kwan sɛ wɔmfa sika bɔtɔ anaa kotokuo, anaa ntaadeɛ mmienu.
Hwɛ, mesoma mo sɛ monkɔ sɔ wiase nhwɛ, na odwumayɛfoɔ no fata n’akatua.

Na onipa biara a ɔbɛkɔ akɔka aheman no asɛmpa yi, na ɔrennyae sɛ ɔbɛkɔ so ayɛ nokorɛfoɔ wɔ ade nyina ara mu no, ɔremmrɛ, rennyɛ kusuu wɔ adwene mu, rennyɛ mmerɛ wɔ honamdua, akwaa anaa adwonku mu; na ne tiri so nwii baako mpo rentɔ fam a wɔrenhunu. Na ɔremmfa ɔkɔm anaa sukɔm nkɔ.
Ne saa nti, monnwennwene ɔkyena ho, deɛ mobɛdi, anaa deɛ mobɛnom, anaa deɛ mobɛhyɛ ho.
Na monhwɛ wira mu sukooko, sɛdeɛ wɔnyini; wɔnnyɛ adwuma, anaa wɔnto asaawa; na wiase aheman animuonyam nyina ara mu no, wɔnhyehyɛɛ wɔn ho sɛ yei mu baako mpo.
Na mo Agya, a ɔwɔ soro, nim sɛ mohia saa nneɛma yi nyina ara.
Ne saa nti, momma ɔkyena nnwennwene n’ankasa ne ho nneɛma.
Anaa mma mo nnwennwene deɛ mobɛka ho mmom monkɔ so ara nkora wɔ mo adwene mu nkwa nsɛm no, na wɔde bɛma mo dɔnhwere no ara mu, saa kyɛfa a wɔbɛsusu ama onipa biara no.

Ne saa nti, mma mo mu biara, ɛnam sɛ saa mmarasɛm yi wɔ hɔ ma nokorɛfoɔ nyina ara a Onyankopɔn afrɛ wɔn wɔ asɔre no mu ama nyamedwuma no nti, firi saa dɔnhwere yi firi adi kɔ bɔ aheman no asɛmpa yi ho dawuro no mfa sika bɔtɔ anaa kotokuo.
Hwɛ, mesoma mo ama moakɔka wiase anim wɔ wɔn nneyɛɛe a ɛntene nyina ara ho, na monkyerɛkyerɛ wɔn atemmuo bi a ɛbɛba no.
Na obiara a ɔgye mo no, me nso mɛwɔ hɔ, ɛfiri sɛ mɛdi mo anim kan. Mɛwɔ mo nsa nifa ne mo benkum so, na me Honhom bɛwɔ mo akoma mu, na m’abɔfoɔ bɛtwa mo ho ahyia, asɔ mo mu.
Obiara a ɔgye mo no ɔgye me; na ɔno ara bɛma mo aduane, na ɔbɛhyɛ mo ataadeɛ, na ɔbɛma mo sika.
Na deɛ ɔbɛma mo aduane, anaa ɔbɛhyɛ mo ataadeɛ, anaa ɔbɛma mo sika no, ɔrenhwere n’akatua, kwan biara so.
Na deɛ ɔnnyɛ saa nneɛma yi no nnyɛ m’akyidini; ɛnam yei so na mobɛhunu m’akyidifoɔ.

Deɛ ɔnnye mo no, momfiri ne nkyɛn na mo ara monkɔ, na momfa nsuo nhohoro mo nan ase, nsuo korɔgyeen, sɛ ɛyɛ ahuhoro anaa awɔ berɛ mu, na monni ho adanseɛ nkyerɛ Agya a ɔwɔ soro no, na monnsan nnkɔ saa nipa no hɔ bio.
Na akuraa anaa ahenkuro biara a mobɛkɔ so no, monyɛ saa ara.
Nanso, momfa nsiyɛ nhwehwɛ na mma montwentwɛn mo nan ase; na mmusuo nka saa fie no, anaa saa akuraa anaa saa ahenkuro no a ɔbɛpo mo no, anaa mo nsɛm, anaa mo adansedie a ɛfa me ho no.
Mmusuo, meka bio, nka saa fie, anaa saa akuraa anaa saa ahenkuro no a ɔpo mo no, anaa mo nsɛm, anaa mo adansedie a ɛfa me ho no.
Ɛfiri sɛ me, Otumfoɔ no, de me nsa ato aman no so, sɛ mɛka wɔn mpire ɛnam wɔn atirimuɔdensɛm nti.
Na yaredɔm bɛfiri adi akɔ, na wɔrenyi mfiri asase so kɔsi sɛ mɛwie m’adwuma, a wɔbɛtwa no tia wɔ tenenee mu—

Kɔsi sɛ obiara bɛhunu me, wɔn a wɔbɛka, mpo firi kumaa so kɔsi ɔkɛseɛ so, na Awurade ho nimdeɛ bɛhyɛ wɔn mã, na wɔn nyina ara ani bɛhunu, na wɔbɛma wɔn nne so, wɔde wɔn nne bɛbɔ mu ato saa dwom foforɔ yi, aka sɛ:
Awurade de Sion asan aba bio;Awurade agye ne nkurɔfoɔ, Israel,Sɛdeɛ n’adom yie teɛ,A ɛnam gyedie neAgyanom apam so baaeɛ no.
Awurade agye ne nkurɔfoɔ;Na wɔakyekyere Satan na mmerɛ nni hɔ bio.Awurade aboa nneɛma nyina ara ano ayɛ wɔn baako.Awurade de Sion afiri soro aba fam.Awurade de Sion afiri aseɛ aba.
Awoɔyea aka asase na wawo n’ahoɔden;Na wɔahyehyɛ nokorɛ wɔ ne yam;Na ɔsoro ate n’anim akyerɛ no;Na wɔde ne Nyankopɔn animuonyam afira no;Ɛfiri sɛ ɔgyina ne nkorɔfoɔ ntam.
Animuonyam, ne anidie, ne tumi, ne ahoɔden,Yɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn dea; ɛfiri sɛ mmɔborɔhunu,Atɛntenenee, adom ne nokorɛ, ne asomdwoeɛ ahyɛ no mã,Afebɔɔ ne afebɔɔ, Amen.

Na bio, nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese mo, ɛho hia sɛ onipa biara a ɔbɛfiri adi akɔbɔ me daapem asɛmpa no ho dawuro no, sɛ ɔwɔ abusua a, na sɛ wɔkyɛ no sika a, ɔmfa nsoma nkɔma wɔn anaa ɔmfa nyɛ biribi mmoa wɔn, sɛdeɛ Awurade bɛkyerɛ wɔn, na saa na ɛyɛ ma me.
Na momma wɔn a wɔnni mmusua, a wɔnya sika no, mfa nsoma nkɔma ɔhwɛfoɔ no wɔ Sion, anaa nkɔma ɔhwɛfoɔ a ɔwɔ Ohiono, ama wɔatumi adwira ho ama adiyisɛm no mmaeɛ ne ne tintim, ne Sion nkyekyereɛ.
Na sɛ onipa bi ma mo mu biara ataadesoro, ataade-soro ne aseɛ a, momfa dada no mma onnibiefoɔ, na monkɔ nkɔdi ahurusie.
Na sɛ onipa bi wɔ mo ntam a ɔwɔ ahoɔden honhom mu a, ɔmfa deɛ ɔyɛ mmrɛ nka ne ho, sɛdeɛ ɔbɛtumi anya nkɔsoɔ wɔ ɔdwoɔ biara mu, ama ɔno nso atumi anya ahoɔden.
Ne saa nti, momfa wɔn a wɔahyɛ wɔn asɔfoɔ ama asɔfodie ketewa no nka mo ho, na monni kan nsoma wɔn nkɔyɛ nsrahwɛ ho nhyehyɛeɛ, na wɔnsiesie kwan, na wɔnyɛ nsrahwɛ a mo ankasa montumi nnyɛ.
Hwɛ, yei ne kwan a m’asomafoɔ, a na wɔwɔ tete nna no mu, de sii m’asɔre maa me.

Ne saa nti, ma onipa biara nnyina ɔno ara ankasa ne dibea mu, na ɔnyɛ adwuma wɔ ɔno ara ankasa ne frɛ mu; na mma etiri no nse nan no sɛ ɔnhia nan no; ɛfiri sɛ, sɛ nan no nni hɔ a ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na nipadua no atumi agyina?
Nso honamdua no hia honam akwaa no nyina ara, sɛdeɛ wɔn nyina ara bɛtumi anya nkɔsoɔ abɔ mu, sɛdeɛ nipa mũ no bɛtumi ayɛ pɛ.

Na hwɛ, ɛwɔ sɛ asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ no tu kwan, ɛne mpaninfoɔ no nso, ne asɔfoɔ nkumaa no nso; nanso ɛwɔ sɛ wɔyi dikɔnfoɔ ne akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no ma wɔwɛn asɔre no, na wɔnyɛ faakotena asomfoɔ wɔ asɔre no mu.
Na ɔhwɛfoɔ, Newel K. Whitney, nso ɛwɔ sɛ ɔtu kwan bɔ aporɔ wɔ nsɔre no nyina ara ntam, ɔnhwehwɛ onnibiefoɔ no akyiri kwan na ɔmma wɔn deɛ wɔhia na wafa so abrɛ adefoɔ no ne ahantanfoɔ no ase no.
Ɛwɔ sɛ ɔfa ɔnanmusifoɔ ma no adwuma sɛ ɔnhwɛ ne honam fã mu adwuma so sɛdeɛ ɔbɛkyerɛ.

Nanso, momma ɔhwɛfoɔ no nkɔ New York ahenkuro mu, ne Albany ahenkuro nso mu, ne Boston ahenkuro nso mu, na ɔmfa asɛmpa no nnyegyeeɛ ne nne kɛseɛ nkɔbɔ nkorɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ saa nkuro yinom mu no kɔkɔ, mfa amanfoyɛ ne dwerɛ a ɛretwɛn wɔn sɛ wɔpo saa nneɛma yi a.
Ɛfiri sɛ sɛ wɔpo saa nneɛma yi a wɔn atemmuo dɔn abɛn, na wɔn fie bɛdane amanfo ama wɔn.
Ma ɔnnya gyedie wɔ me mu na n’ani renwu; na ne tiri so nwii baako mpo rentɔ fam a wɔrenhunu.

Na nokorɛ mese mo, me nkoa a moaka no, sɛ momfiri adi nkɔ sɛdeɛ mo asetena bɛma ho kwan, wɔ mo frɛ ahodoɔ mu, monkɔ nkuropɔn a ɛdi mũ mu ne nkuraa ase, na monka wiase anim wɔ tenenee mu ɛfa wɔn nneyɛɛ biara a ɛntene na ɛyɛ bɔne no ho, na momma amanfoyɛ akyiwadeɛ wɔ nna a ɛtwa toɔ no mu no nna adi pefee mma wɔnte aseɛ.
Na, ɛnam mo so, Awurade Tumfoɔ na ɔseɛ, na mɛtete wɔn aheman no mu; Merennwoso asase no nko ara, na mmom ɔsorosoro a nsoromma ahyɛ no ma bɛhinhim bɛwoso.
Na Me, Awurade, atene me nsa ahwayan ɔsoro tumi; morentumi nhunu yei seesei, nanso mmerɛ kakra akyi no mobɛhunu, na mobɛhunu sɛ mete ase, na mene me nkorɔfoɔ bɛba abɛdi hene.
Mene Alfa ne Omega, ahyɛaseɛ ne awieɛ no. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/85.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 85
chapter_summary: 1–5, Wɔnam afɔrebɔ so bɛnya apɛgyadeɛ wɔ Sion; 6–12, Otumfoɔ ne ɔhoɔdenfoɔ bi bɛma Ahotefoɔ no wɔn apɛgyadeɛ wɔ Sion.

verses.text: Ɛyɛ Awurade twerɛtwerɛfoɔ, a wayi no, asɛdeɛ sɛ ɔbɛkora abakɔsɛm, ne asɔre mu no nyina ara twerɛtohɔ a ɛfa nneɛma biara a ɛsisi wɔ Sion, ne wɔn a wɔde wɔn agyapadeɛ bɔ afɔreɛ nyina ara ho, a wɔnam mmara kwan so gye apɛgyadeɛ firi ɔhwɛfoɔ no hɔ;
Ɛne wɔn abrabɔ su nso, wɔn gyedie, ne wɔn nnwuma; ne awaefoɔ no nso a akyire yi wɔnya wɔn apɛgyadeɛ wie a wɔwae.

Ɛne Onyankopɔn pɛ ne ne mmarasɛm bɔ abira sɛ wɔn a wɔmmfa afɔrebɔ so nnya wɔn apɛgyadeɛ, sɛdeɛ ne mmara a ɔde ama teɛ no, sɛdeɛ ɔbɛtumi ama ne nkorɔfoɔ atua ntotosoɔ du du, de asiesie wɔn ama awerɛtɔ ne ɔhyeɛ da no, wɔbɛtwerɛ wɔn din wɔ Onyankopɔn nkorɔfoɔ mu.
Ɛnni nso sɛ wɔkora wɔn anatoɔ, anaa wɔnya wɔ faako a wɔbɛtumi ahunu wɔ asɔre no twerɛtohɔ anaa abakɔsɛm biara mu.
Wɔrenhunu wɔn din, anaa wɔn agyanom din, na wɔrentwerɛ wɔn mma din wɔ Onyankopɔn mmara nwoma no mu, Asafo Awurade na ɔseɛ.
Aane, sei na nne ketewa no seɛ, deɛ ɛwesewese fa adeɛ nyina ara mu na ɛfiti mu no, a mpɛn pii no ɛma me nnompe woso berɛ a ɛda ne ho adi ka sɛ:

Na ɛbɛba sɛ me, Awurade Nyankopɔn, mɛsoma otumfoɔ ne ɔhoɔdenfoɔ bi, a ɔkura tumi ahempoma wɔ ne nsam, a wɔafira no hann aduradeɛ, deɛ n’ano bɛka nsɛm, ɛnni awieɛ nsɛm; na n’ayamdeɛ bɛyɛ nokorɛ asubura, a wɔde bɛsiesie Onyankopɔn fie, na wɔnam ntonto so ahyehyɛ ahotefoɔ a wɔahunu wɔn din no apɛgyadeɛ, ne wɔn agyanom din, ne wɔn mma din, a wɔatwerɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn mmara nwoma no mu no;
Nanso saa nipa a Onyankopɔn frɛeɛ na ɔyii no no, deɛ ɔtene ne nsa de ma Onyankopɔn apam adaka no gyina pintin no, nam owuo bɛmma ano bɛhwe ase, te sɛ dua a anyinam bɛmma nnannam abɔ no.

Na wɔn a wɔnhunuu sɛ wɔatwerɛ wɔn din wɔ nkaeɛ nwoma mu no nyina ara rennya apɛgyadeɛ saa da no, mmom wɔbɛtwitwa wɔn mu, na wɔbɛyi wɔn kyɛfa ama wɔn wɔ annye anniefoɔ ntam, faako a benabɔ ne setwerɛ wɔ no.
Saa nneɛma yi ɛnnyɛ me ara na meka; ne saa nti, sɛdeɛ Awurade ka no, ɔbɛhyɛ no ma nso.

Na wɔn a wɔkura Asɔfodie Kɛseɛ no, a wɔanhunu sɛ wɔatwerɛ wɔn din wɔ mmara nwoma no mu, anaa wɔn a wɔawae, anaa wɔatwa wɔn afiri asɔre no mu no, ne wɔn a wɔkura asɔfodie ketewa no, anaa asɔremma no, saa da no wɔrennya apɛgyadeɛ wɔ Ɔsorosoroni n’ahotefoɔ no ntam;
Ne saa nti, wɔbɛyɛ wɔn sɛdeɛ wɔyɛɛ ɔsɔfoɔ no mma no, sɛdeɛ wɔbɛhunu sɛ wɔatwerɛ wɔ Esra nwoma no mu ti a ɛtɔ so mmienu ne nkyekyɛmu a ɛtɔ so aduosia baako ne mmienu no.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/86.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 86
chapter_summary: 1–7, Awurade ma ayuo ne nwura nwura bɔne abɛbusɛm no nkyerɛaseɛ; 8–11, Ɔkyerɛkyerɛ asɔfodie nhyira a wɔde ma wɔn a wɔyɛ adedifoɔ wɔ mmara kwan so wɔ honam fam no mu.

verses.text: Nokorɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade se mo me nkoa nie, ɛfa ayuo ne nwura bɔne abɛbusɛm no ho no:
Hwɛ, nokorɛ mese, afuo no ne wiase, na asomafoɔ no ne agufoɔ a wɔgu aba no;

Na akyire yi a wɔadeda no asɔre no taafoɔ kɛseɛ no, ɔwaefoɔ no, odwamanfoɔ no, mpo Babel, deɛ ɔhyɛɛ aman nyina ara maa wɔnom ne kuruwa ano no, deɛ ɔtamfo no, mpo Satan, te wɔn akoma mu di hene no—hwɛ ɔno na ɔdua nwura bɔne no; ɛno nti, nwura no mia ayuo no na ɛpamo asɔre no kɔ ɛserɛ no so.
Nanso hwɛ, nna a ɛtwa toɔ no mu no, mpo seesei a Awurade rehyɛ aseɛ sɛ ɔde n’asɛm reba no, a ahahan no refefɛ na ɛgu so yɛ bɛtɛɛ no—
Hwɛ, nokorɛ mese mo, abɔfoɔ no reteam kyerɛ Awurade adekyee ne adesaeɛ, na wɔayɛ krado retwɛn sɛ wɔbɛsoma wɔn akɔ sɛ wɔnkɔtwa mfuo no;
Nanso Awurade se wɔn sɛ, monntutu nwura no berɛ a nhahan no da so yɛ bɛtɛɛ (ɛfiri sɛ nokorɛ mo gyedie yɛ mmerɛ), anyɛ saa a mobɛsɛe ayuo no nso.

Ne saa nti, momma ayuo no ne nwura bɔne no nyini mmɔ mu kɔsi sɛ otwa berɛ no bɛduru koraa; afei mobɛdikan aboaboa ayuo no afiri nwura bɔne no ntam, na moaboaboa ayuo no ano awie no, hwɛ na hunu, wɔbɛkyekyere nwura bɔne no afiafi, na ɛbɛka sɛ wɔbɛhye afuo no.
Ne saa nti, sɛdeɛ Awurade se mo nie, mo a asɔfodie no akɔso aka mo ho nam mo agyanom anatoɔ so—
Ɛfiri sɛ moyɛ adedifoɔ wɔ mmara kwan so, sɛdeɛ honam fa mu teɛ, na wɔde mo ne Kristo asie afiri wiase wɔ Onyankopɔn mu—

Ne saa nti mo nkwa ne asɔfodie no da so wɔ hɔ, na ɛho hia sɛ ɛbɛwɔ hɔ nam mo ne mo asefoɔ so kɔsi sɛ wɔde nneɛma nyina ara bɛsan aba bio, deɛ nkɔmhyɛfoɔ kronkron no nyina ara nam wɔn ano so aka firi wiase ahyɛaseɛ no.
Ne saa nti, nhyira ne mo sɛ mokɔ so tena me papayɛ mu a, ɛyɛ hann ma Amanamanmufoɔ no, na monam saa asɔfodie yi so ayɛ agyenkwa ama me nkorɔfoɔ Israel. Awurade na waka. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/87.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 87
chapter_summary: 1–4, Wɔhyɛ ɔkõ a ɛbɛba Atifi fam Aman ne Anafoɔ fam Aman ntam no ho nkɔm; 5–8, Ɔsɛeɛ kɛseɛ bɛba asase sotefoɔ nyina ara so.

verses.text: Nokorɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ nie ɛfa ako a ɛrenkyɛ ɛbɛba no ho, ɛbɛhyɛ aseɛ afiri South Carolinafoɔ atuateɛ so, a akyire yi ɛde owuo ne amanehunu bɛtwa akra pii so;
Na berɛ no bɛba a wɔbɛhwie ɔkõ agu aman nyina ara so, na ɛbɛhyɛ aseɛ afiri saa bea yi.

Na hwɛ, Anaafoɔ fam Aman bɛkyɛ wɔn mu atia Atifi fam Aman no, na Anaafoɔ fam Aman no bɛfrɛ aman foforɔ, mpo ɔman Great Britain, sɛdeɛ wɔfrɛ no no, na wɔn nso bɛfrɛ aman foforɔ, sɛdeɛ wɔbɛbɔ wɔn ho ban afiri aman foforɔ ho; na afei ɔkõ bɛhwie agu aman nyina ara so.
Na ɛbɛba sɛ, nna bebree akyi no, nnɔnkɔfoɔ no bɛsɔre atia wɔn wuranom, na wɔbɛboaboa wɔn ano atete wɔn akɔ kõ.
Na ɛbɛba nso sɛ nkaeɛ a wɔaka wɔ asase no so no bɛboaboa wɔn ho, na wɔn bo bɛfu pa ara, na wɔde ɔhaw yaaya bɛha Amanamanmufoɔ no.

Na saa na asase sotefoɔ nam afena ne mogyahwiegu so bɛsu; na wɔde ɔkɔm, ne yaredɔm, ne asasewosoɔ, ne ɔsoro aprannaa, ne anyinam werɛmfoɔ a ɛhyerɛn yie nso, bɛma asase sotefoɔ ahunu Otumfoɔ Nyankopɔn abufuhyeɛ, ne n’abuhuro, ne n’asotwe nsa, kɔsi sɛ ɔsɛeɛ a wɔahyɛ no de aman nyina ara awieɛ bɛba;
Sɛdeɛ ahotefoɔ no ntea mu, ne ahotefoɔ no mogya, bɛgyae sɛ ɛforo ba Sabaot Awurade aso mu firi asase so, sɛ wɔntɔ wɔn atamfo so werɛ.
Ɛno nti monnyina mmeammea kronkron mu, na mma monnhinhim, kɔsi sɛ Awurade da no bɛba; ɛfiri sɛ hwɛ, ɛreba mpofirim, Awurade na ɔseɛ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/88.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 88
chapter_summary: 1–5, Ahotefoɔ nokorɛfoɔ nya saa Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ no, deɛ ɔyɛ nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ bɔhyɛ no; 6–13, Kristo Hann no di nneɛma nyina ara so na ɛhwɛ wɔn so; 14–16, Owusɔreɛ nam Ɔgyeɛ so na ɛba; 17–31, Setie a nnipa yɛ ma sɛlɛstia, tɛrɛstra anaa tɛlɛtia mmara no siesie nnipa ma saa aheman korɔ no ne n’animuonyam; 32–35, Wɔn a wɔbɛ tena bɔne mu no bɛkɔ so aka fi mu; 36–41, Wɔde mmara na ɛhwɛ aheman nyina ara so; 42–45, Onyankopɔn de mmara ama nneɛma nyina ara; 46–50, Onipa bɛte Onyankopɔn mpo ase; 51–61, Abɛbusɛm a ɛfa ɔbarima a ɔsoma ne nkoa kɔ afuo mu na ɔkɔsra wɔn baako baako no; 62–73, Montwe mmɛn Awurade, na mobɛhunu N’anim; 74–80, Monte mo ho na monkyerɛkyerɛ mo ho mo ho aheman no nkyerɛkyerɛ no; 81–85, Ɛwɔ sɛ onipa biara a wɔabɔ no kɔkɔ no bɔ ne yɔnko kɔkɔ; 86–94, Nsɛnkyerɛnne, mfitiasedeɛ sɛeɛ, ne abɔfoɔ siesie kwan ma Awurade mmaeɛ no; 95–102, Abɔfoɔ de totorobɛnto frɛ awufoɔ wɔ wɔn nhyehyɛeɛ so; 103–116, Abɔfoɔ de totorobɛnto bɔ dawuro fa asɛmpa no mmaeɛ bio, Babel ahweaseɛ, ne Onyankopɔn kɛseɛ no ko no ho; 117–126, Monhwehwɛ adesua, monsi Onyankopɔn fie (tɛmpol), na momfa ɔdɔ mapa mmara a ɛkyekyere no mfura mo; 127–141, Wɔde Nkɔmhyɛfoɔ Sukuu nhyehyɛeɛ no ne nan ase hohoro ayɛyɛdeɛ noto dwa.

verses.text: Nokorɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade se mo a moahyia abɔ mu sɛ morebɛgye ne pɛ a ɛfa mo ho nie:

Hwɛ, yei sɔ Awurade ani, na abɔfoɔ no di mo ho ahurisie; mo mmɔborɔhunuadeɛ mpaebɔ aforo aba Sabaot Awurade aso mu, na wɔatwerɛ wɔ wɔn a wɔadwira wɔn ho no din nwoma mu, mpo wɔn a wɔwɔ sɛlɛstia wiase, no.

Ɛno nti, seesei meresoma Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ foforɔ aba mo so, mpo wɔ mo so me nnamfonom, sɛdeɛ ɔbɛtena mo akoma mu, mpo Honhom Kronkron bɔhyɛ no; Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ foforɔ korɔ no ara a ɔyɛ deɛ mede hyɛɛ m’akyidifoɔ no bɔ no, sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ no Yohane adansedie mu no.
Saa Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ no ne bɔhyɛ a mede ma mo ɛfa nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ ho, mpo sɛlɛstia aheman no animuonyam no;
Animuonyam a ɛyɛ Abakan n’asɔre deɛ no, mpo nea ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn, a ɔyɛ kronkron kyɛn obiara deɛ, nam ne Ba Yesu Kristo so no—
Ɔno a ɔforo kɔɔ soro, sɛdeɛ nso ɔsiane kɔɔ nneɛma nyina ara ase, na ɛmaa ɔtee nneɛma nyina ara ase no, sɛdeɛ ɔbɛtumi atena ne nyina ara mu na wafa nneɛma nyina ara mu nokorɛ hann no;
Deɛ ɛyɛ nokorɛ a ɛhyerɛn no. Yei ne Kristo hann no. Sɛdeɛ ɔwɔ owia nso mu, ne owia hann, ne tumi a wɔnam so yɛɛe no.
Sɛdeɛ ɔwɔ ɔsrane no nso mu, na ɔyɛ ɔsrane hann, ne ne tumi a wɔnam so yɛɛe no;
Sɛdeɛ ɔwɔ nsoromma hann mu nso, ne tumi a wɔnam so yɛɛ wɔn no;
Ne asase no nso, ne tumi a wɔnam so yɛɛe, mpo asase no a mogyina so no.
Ne hann a ɛhyerɛn, deɛ ɛma mo hann no, nam deɛ ɔma mo ani hann no so, deɛ ɛyɛ hann a ɛkanyan mo nteaseɛ.
Deɛ ɛyɛ hann a ɛfiri Onyankopɔn nkyɛn bɛhyɛ ahunumu a ɛnni ano no ma—

Hann a ɛwɔ ade nyina ara mu, deɛ ɛma nneɛma nyina ara nkwa no, deɛ ɛyɛ mmara a wɔde di nneɛma nyina ara so no, mpo Onyankopɔn a ɔte n’ahennwa so no tumi, deɛ ɔwɔ daapem koko mu no, deɛ ɔwɔ ade nyina ara mfinimfini no.
Afei, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ ɛnam ɔgyeɛ a wɔayɛ ama mo no so na awufoɔ no firi wusɔreɛ no mu ba.
Na honhom no ne nipadua no yɛ onipa kra.
Na awufoɔ wusɔreɛ no yɛ ɔgyeɛ ma ɔkra no.
Na ɔkra gyeɛ nam deɛ ɔma ade nyina ara nkwa so, ɔno kokom na wɔahyɛ sɛ onnibiefoɔ ne wɔn a wɔdwoɔ wɔ asase so no bɛnya asase no adi.
Ne saa nti, ɛho hia sɛ wɔdwira ho firi deɛ ɛntene nyina ara ho, sɛdeɛ wɔbɛtumi asiesie no ama sɛlɛstia animuonyam;
Na akyire yi a wahyɛ n’adebɔ ho botae ma no, wɔbɛhyɛ no animuonyam ahenkyɛ, mpo wɔ Agya Nyankopɔn anim;
Sɛdeɛ nnipadua a wɔyɛ sɛlɛstia aheman no dea no bɛdi so daa afebɔɔ; ɛfiri sɛ, ɛyɛ saa botae yi nti na wɔyɛeɛ na wɔbɔɔeɛ, na ɛyɛ saa botaeɛ yi nti na wɔadwira wɔn ho.
Na wɔn a wɔmmfaa mmara a mede ama mo no so nnwiraa wɔn ho no, mpo Kristo mmara no, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔnya aheman foforɔ di so, mpo deɛ ɛyɛ tɛrɛstra aheman no, anaa deɛ ɛyɛ tɛlɛtia aheman no.
Ɛfiri sɛ deɛ ɔnntumi nni sɛlɛstia mmara so no nntumi nnyina sɛlɛstia animuonyam ano.
Na onii a ɔnntumi nni tɛrɛstra aheman mmara so no nntumi nnyina tɛrɛstra animuonyam ano.
Na onii a ɔntumi nni tɛlɛtia mmara so no nntumi nnyina tɛlɛtia animuonyam ano; ne saa nti ɔmfata sɛ ɔnya animuonyam aheman biara. Ne saa nti ɛsɛ sɛ ɔgyina aheman a ɛnyɛ animuonyam aheman ano.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, asase no di sɛlɛstia aheman no mmara so, ɛfiri sɛ ɔhyɛ n’adebɔ ho botaeɛ no ma, na ɔnnto mmara no—
Ɛno nti, wɔbɛte ho; aane, ɛmfa ho sɛ ɔbɛwu wɔbɛma no nkwa bio na ɛbɛtumi agyina tumi a ɛmaa no nkwa no ano, na ateneneefoɔ no bɛnya so adi.
Ɛfiri sɛ ɛwom sɛ wɔbɛwu deɛ, nanso wɔn nso bɛsɔre bio, sɛ honhom nipadua.
Wɔn a wɔyɛ sɛlɛstia honhom no bɛnya nipadua no ara a na ɛyɛ nipadua awosu no; mpo mobɛnya mo nnipadua, na mo animuonyam bɛyɛ saa animuonyam no a wɔnam so ma mo nnipadua nkwa no.
Mo a wɔnam sɛlɛstia animuonyam kyɛfã so ma mo nkwa no, afei mobɛnya ɛno no ara, mpo ne mahyɛ.
Na wɔn a wɔnam tɛrɛstra animuonyam kyɛfa so ma wɔn nkwa no bɛnya ɛno korɔ no ara afei, mpo ne mahyɛ.
Na wɔn nso a wɔnam tɛlɛtia animuonyam kyɛfa so ma wɔn nkwa no bɛnya ɛno korɔ no ara afei, mpo ne mahyɛ.
Na wɔn a wɔaka no nso wɔbɛma wɔn nkwa; nanso, wɔbɛsan akɔ wɔn ankasa tenabea bio, de deɛ wɔwɔ ɔpɛ sɛ wɔnya no akɔsɛpɛ wɔn ho, ɛfiri sɛ wɔannya ɔpɛ sɛ wɔde deɛ anka wɔbɛnya no bɛsɛpɛ wɔn ho.
Na mfasoɔ bɛn na onipa bɛnya sɛ wɔma no akyɛdeɛ, na ɔrennye akyɛdeɛ no? Hwɛ, ɔnni ahurisie wɔ deɛ wɔde ama no no mu, na ɔnni ahurisie wɔ ɔnii a ɔmaa akyɛdeɛ no mu.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, deɛ wɔde mmara hwɛ so no wɔde mmara nso na ɛkora no na wɔnam ɛno korɔ no ara so ma no yɛ pɛpɛ na wɔdwira ho.
