Deɛ ɛbu mmara so, na ɛnntena mmara mu, na mmom ɛhwehwɛ sɛ ɛbɛyɛ mmara ama ne ho, na ɛpɛ sɛ ɛbɛtena bɔne mu, na ɛtena bɔne mu korakora no, wɔrentumi mmfa mmara so nnwira ho, anaa mmɔborɔhunu so, atɛntenenee, anaa atemmuo so. Ne saa nti, ɛsɛ sɛ ɛkɔso ka fi mu.
Wɔama aheman biara mmara.
Na aheman pii wɔ hɔ; ɛfiri sɛ ahunum biara nni hɔ a aheman nni mu; na aheman biara nni hɔ a ahunum nni hɔ, sɛ ɛyɛ aheman kɛseɛ anaa ketewa.
Na wɔama aheman biara mmara; na mmara biara wɔ ahyeɛ nso ne nhyehyɛeɛ.
Na ateasefoɔ biara a wɔanntena saa nhyehyɛeɛ yi mu no wɔmmu wɔn bem.

Ɛfiri sɛ nhumu fam nhumu ho; nyansa nya nyansa; nokorɛ bam nokorɛ; ahonidie dɔ ahonidie; hann fam hann ho; mmɔborɔhunu wɔ ayamhyehyeɛ ma mmɔborɔhunu na ɔgye n’ankasa deɛ; atɛntenenee kɔso wɔ ne kwan so na ɔgye n’ankasa deɛ; atemmuo firi deɛ ɔte ahennwa no so no anim na ɔdi ade nyina ara so na ɔyɛ ade nyina ara.

Ɔte nneɛma nyina ara ase, na nneɛma nyina ara wɔ n’anim, na nneɛma nyina ara atwa ne ho ahyia; na ɔboro nneɛma nyina ara so, na ɔwɔ nneɛma nyina ara mu, na ɔfa ade nyina ara mu, na ɔtwa nneɛma nyina ara ho hyia; na nneɛma nyina ara nam ne so, na wɔfiri ne hɔ, mpo Onyankopɔn hɔ, daa afebɔɔ.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, wama nneɛma nyina ara mmara, a wɔnam so de keka wɔn ho wɔ wɔn mmerɛ ne hyɛberɛ mu;
Na wɔahyehyɛ wɔn akwan ato hɔ, mpo ɔsorosoro ne asase akwan, a asase no ne akyinsoromma no nyina ara ka ho no.

Na wɔma wɔn ho wɔn ho hann wɔ wɔn mmerɛ ne wɔn mmerɛ nkyekyɛmu mu, wɔ wɔn simma mu, wɔ wɔn nnɔnhwere mu, wɔ wɔn nna mu, wɔ wɔn nnaawɔtwe mu, wɔ wɔn abosome mu, wɔ wɔn mfeɛ mu—yeinom nyina ara yɛ afe baako ma Onyankopɔn, na mmom ɛnnyɛ saa mma onipa.

Asase no tware wɔ ne ntaban so, na owia no ma ne hann adekyeɛ, na ɔsrane ma ne hann adesae mu, na nsoroma nso ma wɔn hann, berɛ a wɔretware wɔ wɔn ntaban so wɔ wɔn animunyam mu, wɔ Onyankopɔn tumi mfimfin.
Ɛdeɛn ho na mede saa aheman yeinom bɛtoto, sɛdeɛ mo bɛte aseɛ?
Hwɛ yeinom nyina ara yɛ aheman, na onipa biara a wahunu ebinom anaa yeinom mu kumaa biara ahunu Onyankpɔn sɛ ɔrekeka ne ho wɔ ne kɛseyɛ ne tumi mu.
Mese mo sɛ wahunu no; nanso, deɛ ɔbaa ne deɛ mu no, wɔante no aseɛ.
Hann no hyerɛn wɔ esum mu, na esum no ante no aseɛ; nanso, da no bɛba a mobɛte Onyankopɔn mpo ase, ɛfiri sɛ wɔbɛkanyan mu wɔ ne mu, nam ne so.
Afei mobɛhunu sɛ moahunu me, sɛ metease, na meyɛ nokorɛ hann a ɛwɔ mo mu no, na mowɔ me mu; sɛ ɛnte saa a morentumi nnya nkɔsoɔ.
Hwɛ mede saa aheman yinom bɛtoto onipa bi a ɔwɔ afuo ho, na ɔsomaa ne nkoa sɛ wɔnkɔ tutu n’afuo mu.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ deɛ ɔdi kan no sɛ: Kɔ na kɔyɛ adwuma wɔ m’afuo mu, na dɔnhwere a ɛdi kan no mu no mɛba wo nkyɛn, na wobɛhunu m’anim hwɛbea anigyeɛ.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ deɛ ɔtɔ so mmienu no sɛ: Wo nso kɔ afuo no mu, na dɔnhwere a ɛtɔ so mmienu no, mɛba wo nkyɛn na wobɛhunu m’anim hwɛbea anigyeɛ.
Na deɛ ɔtɔ so mmiɛnsa no nso, ɔsee no sɛ: mɛsra wo;
Ne deɛ ɔtɔ so nan no, na ɛtoaa so kɔsii dumienu no so;
Na afuo no wura kɔɔ deɛ ɔdi kan no hɔ dɔnhwere a ɛdi kan no mu, na ɔne no tenaae saa dɔnhwere no nyina ara, na ne wura anim hwɛbea hann no maa n’ani gyeeɛ.
Na afei ɔfirii deɛ ɔdi kan no nkyɛn sɛdeɛ ɔbɛtumi akɔsra deɛ ɔtɔ so mmienu no nso, ne deɛ ɔtɔ so mmiɛnsa no, ne deɛ ɔtɔ so nan, na saa ara kɔsi deɛ ɔtɔ so dumienu no.
Na saa na wɔn nyina ara nyaa wɔn wura anim hwɛbea hann no, onipa biara wɔ ne dɔnhwere mu, ne ne mmerɛ mu, ne ne berɛ nkyekyɛmu mu—
Ɛhyɛ aseɛ firi deɛ ɔdi kan no so, na saa ara kɔsi deɛ ɔtwa toɔ, na efiri deɛ ɔtwa toɔ so kɔsi deɛ ɔdi kan, na afiri deɛ ɔdi kan so akɔsi deɛ ɔtwa toɔ no so;

Onipa biara wɔ n’ankasa nhyehyɛeɛ mu, kɔsi sɛ ne dɔnhwere bɛsa, mpo sɛdeɛ ne wura ahyɛ no no, sɛdɛe wɔbɛtumi ahyɛ ne wura animuonyam wɔ ne mu, na ɔno wɔ ne wura mu, sɛdeɛ wɔbɛtumi ahyɛ wɔn nyina ara animuonyam.

Ne saa nti, mede saa abebusɛm yi bɛto aheman no nyina ara, ne ɛmutefoɔ nyina ara ho—aheman biara wɔ ne dɔnhwere mu, ne ne mmerɛ mu, ne ne mmerɛ nkyekyɛmu mu, mpo sɛdeɛ mmarahyɛ a Onyankopɔn ayɛ no teɛ.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, me nnamfo sɛ, megya saa nsɛm yi ma mo sɛ monnwennwen ho wɔ mo akoma mu, ɛne saa mmarasɛm yi a mede ma mo sɛ, momfrɛ me berɛ a mebɛn mo yi—
Montwe mmɛn me na mɛtwe mabɛn mo; momfa nsiyɛ nhwehwɛ me na mobɛhunu me; mommisa, na mobɛnya; mommɔ mu, na ɛbɛbue ama mo.
Biribiara a ɛfata mo a mobɛbisa Agya no wɔ me din mu no wɔde bɛma mo.
Na sɛ mobisa biribi a ɛmmfata mma mo a, ɛbɛdane mo afɔbuo.

Hwɛ, deɛ mote yi te sɛ obi nne a ɛreteam wɔ ɛserɛ no so—wɔ ɛserɛ so ɛfiri sɛ monntumi nnhunu no—me nne, ɛfiri sɛ me nne yɛ Honhom; me Honhom yɛ nokorɛ; nokorɛ da so wɔ hɔ na ɛnni awieɛ; na sɛ ɛwɔ mo mu a ɛbɛdɔɔso.
Na sɛ mo ani yɛ koro ma m’animuonyam a, hann bɛhyɛ mo nnipadua nyina ara ma, na esum biara rentena mo mu; na nipadua a hann ahyɛ no ma no te nneɛma nyina ara ase.

Ɛno nti, monte mo ho sɛdeɛ mo adwene bɛyɛ koro wɔ Onyankopɔn animuonyam so, na nna no bɛba a mobɛhunu no; ɛfiri sɛ ɔbɛyi n’anim akyerɛ mo, na ɛbɛyɛ wɔ ɔno ara ankasa ne mmerɛ mu, ne ɔno ara ankasa kwan so, ne sɛdeɛ ɔno ara ankasa ne pɛ teɛ.
Monkae bɔhyɛ kɛseɛ a ɛtwa toɔ a mede ahyɛ mo no; monto aniha adwennwene ngu ne mo sereɛ mmorosoɔ mfiri mo mu korakora.
Montwɛn, montwɛn wɔ saa bea yi, na momfrɛ nhyia kronkron, mpo mma wɔn a wɔyɛ adwumayɛfoɔ a wɔdi kan wɔ saa aheman a ɛtwa toɔ mu yi.
Na momma wɔn a wɔabɔ wɔn kɔkɔ wɔ wɔn akwantuo mu no mfrɛ Awurade, na wɔnsusu kɔkɔbɔ a wɔanya no ho wɔ wɔn akoma mu, mmerɛ tiawa bi pɛ.
Hwɛ, na hunu, mɛhwɛ w’asafo so, na mɛtete mpaninfoɔ na masoma akɔ wɔn hɔ.
Hwɛ, mɛyɛ m’adwuma ntɛm wɔ ne berɛ mu.

Na mema mo, a moyɛ adwumayɛfoɔ a wɔdi kan wɔ saa aheman a ɛtwa toɔ yi mu, mmarasɛm sɛ monhyia mmɔ mu, na monhyehyɛ mo ho mo ho, na monsiesie mo ho, na monnwira mo ho mo ho; aane, monte mo akoma mu, na monhohoro mo nsa ho ne mo nan ho wɔ m’anim, ama matumi ama mo ho ate;

Ama matumi adi adanseɛ akyerɛ mo Agya, ne mo Nyankopɔn, ne me Nyankopɔn, sɛ mo ho ate afiri saa awoɔntoatoasoɔ atirimuɔdenfoɔ yi mogya ho; sɛdeɛ mɛtumi adi saa bɔhyɛ yi so, saa bɔhyɛ kɛseɛ a ɛtwa toɔ, a mede ahyɛ mo yi, wɔ berɛ a mepɛ mu.
Bio, mema mo mmarasɛm sɛ mobɛkɔ so wɔ mpaebɔ ne akɔmkyene mu firi saa berɛ yi rekorɔ.
Na mema mo mmarasɛm sɛ mobɛkyerɛkyerɛ mo ho mo ho aheman no nkyerɛkyerɛ no.

Momfa nsiyɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ na m’adom bɛka mo ho, sɛdeɛ wɔbɛtumi akyerɛkyerɛ mo yie ma awie pɛyɛ wɔ nkyerɛkyerɛmu mu, wɔ nyinasosɛm mu, wɔ nkyerɛkyerɛ mu, wɔ asɛmpa no mmara mu, wɔ biribiara a ɛka Onyankopɔn aheman ho, deɛ ɛfata ma mo sɛ mote aseɛ;

Ɛfa nneɛma a ɛwɔ ɔsoro na ɛwɔ asase so, ne deɛ ɛwɔ asase ase; nneɛma a abɛsen kɔ, deɛ ɛwɔ hɔ, nneɛma a ɛrenkyɛ ɛsɛ sɛ ɛba; nneɛma a ɛwɔ fie, nneɛma a ɛwɔ amannɔne; akõ ne aman mu ntotoeɛ, ne atemmuo a ɛwɔ asase no so; ne nimdeɛ nso a ɛfa aman ne aheman ho—
Sɛdeɛ mobɛtumi asiesie mo ho wɔ nneɛma nyina ara mu berɛ a mɛsoma mo bio sɛ monkɔdi ɔfrɛ a mede afrɛ mo, ne soma a mede asoma mo no nni.
Hwɛ, mesomaa mo sɛ monkɔdi adanseɛ na mommɔ nkorɔfoɔ no kɔkɔ, na ɛhia onipa biara a wɔabɔ no kɔkɔ no sɛ ɔbɔ ne yɔnko kɔkɔ.
Ne saa nti, wɔnni anoyie biara, na wɔn bɔne wɔ wɔn ankasa tiri so.
Deɛ ɔhwehwɛ me ntɛm no bɛhunu me, na wɔrempa n’akyi.

Ne saa nti, montwɛn, na momfa nsiyɛ nyɛ adwuma, sɛdeɛ mobɛwie pɛyɛ wɔ mo nyamedwuma mu ma moatumi afiri akɔ Amanamanmufoɔ no ntam berɛ a ɛtwa toɔ, dodoɔ ara a Awurade de n’ano bɛbɔ wɔn din sɛ wɔnkyekyere mmara no na wɔnsɔ adansedie no ano, na wɔnsiesie ahotefoɔ no mma atemmuo dɔn a ɛbɛba no;

Sɛdeɛ wɔn akra bɛtumi afiri Onyankopɔn abufuhyeɛ mu, amanfoyɛ akyiwadeɛ a ɛretwɛn atirimuɔdenfoɔ no, wɔ wiase yi mu ne wiase a ɛbɛba mu. Nokorɛ, mese mo, momma wɔn a wɔnnyɛ mpaninfoɔ a wɔdi kan no nkɔso nyɛ adwuma wɔ bobeturo no mu kɔsi sɛ Awurade de n’ano bɛfrɛ wɔn, ɛfiri sɛ wɔn berɛ nsooeɛ; wɔn ntaadeɛ ho nteeɛ mfirii saa awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi mogya ho.
Montena fahodie a wɔde ama moade mo ho no mu; mma mommfa bɔne nkyekyere mo ho, mmom momma mo nsa ho nte, kɔsi sɛ Awurade bɛba.

Ɛfiri sɛ ɛrenkyɛre asase no bɛhinhim na atɔ ntintan adi akɔneaba sɛ ɔsabofoɔ; na owia de n’anim bɛsie, na ɔmpene sɛ ɔbɛma hann; na mogya bɛdware ɔsrane no; na nsoromma no bo bɛfu yie, na wɔbɛtoto wɔn ho agu fam tesɛ borɔdɔma firi borɔdɔma dua so tɔ fam.
Na mo adansedie akyiri no na abufuhyeɛ ne abohuro bɛba nkorɔfoɔ no so.
Ɛfiri sɛ mo adansedie akyiri no na asasewosoɔ adansedie no bɛba, a ɛbɛma apinisie aba ne mu, na nnipa bɛtotɔ fam na wɔrentumi nnyina.
Na apranaa nne nso adansedie bɛba, ne anyinam nne, ne ahum nne, ne ɛpo asorɔkyeɛ a ɛrebu afa n’ahyeɛ so nne.
Na nneɛma nyina ara bɛyɛ basabasa; na ampa ara, nnipa akoma bɛdi wɔn hwammɔ; ɛfiri sɛ osuro bɛba nnipa nyina ara so.

Na abɔfoɔ bɛtu afa soro, de nne kɛseɛ atea mu, ahyɛn Onyakopɔn totorobɛnto no aka sɛ: Monsiesie mo ho, monsiesie mo ho, O mo asase sotefoɔ; ɛfiri sɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn atemmuo no aba. Hwɛ, na hunu, Ayeforokunu no reba; momfiri adi nkɔhyia no.
Na amonom hɔ ara sɛnkyerɛnne kɛseɛ bi bɛpue wɔ soro, na nnipa nyina ara bɛbɔ mu ahunu.

Na ɔbɔfoɔ foforɔ bɛhyɛn ne totorobɛnto, aka sɛ: Saa asɔre kɛseɛ no, akyiwadeɛ maame no, deɛ ɔmaa aman nyina ara nomm n’adwamammɔ abufuhyeɛ nsã no, deɛ ɔtaataa Onyankopɔn ahotefoɔ no, deɛ ɔhwiee wɔn mogya guui no—deɛ ɔte nsuo pii so, ne ɛpo supɔ so—hwɛ ɔno ne asase so nwura bɔne no; wɔakyekyere no afiafi; na wɔayɛ ne mpɔkyerɛ mu den, a onipa biara rentumi nsane; ne saa nti, wayɛ krado sɛ wɔhye no. Na ɔbɛhyɛn ne totorobɛnto no tententene ne dennennen, na aman nyina ara bɛte.
Na kommyɛ bɛba wɔ ɔsoro dɔnhwere fa ntam; na amonom hɔ ara wɔbɛbue ɔsoro nkatanim no mu, te sɛ nwoma, mmobɔeɛ a wɔabue mu berɛ a wɔabobɔ akyi, na wɔbɛyi Awurade anim nkatanim;
Na ahotefoɔ a wɔwɔ asase so, a wɔwɔ nkwa mu no, wɔbɛkanyan wɔn na wɔbɛhwim wɔn akɔ soro akɔhyia no.
Na wɔn a wɔadeda wɔ wɔn nna mu no bɛfiri adi aba, ɛfiri sɛ wɔn nna so bɛbuebue; na wɔbɛhwim wɔn nso akɔhyia no wɔ ɔsoro fadum mu—

Wɔyɛ Kristo deɛ, nnuaba-kan, wɔn a wɔbɛdi kan ne no asiane, ne wɔn a wɔwɔ asase so ne wɔn nna mu, a wɔbɛdikan ahwim wɔn akɔ soro akɔhyia no; na yei nyina ara no, wɔnam Onyankopɔn bɔfoɔ totorobɛnto nnyegyeɛ so.

Na yei akyiri no ɔbɔfoɔ foforɔ bɛhyɛn, deɛ ɛyɛ totorobɛnto a ɛtɔ so mmienu no; na afei ɔgyeɛ bɛba ama wɔn a wɔyɛ Kristo deɛ wɔ ne mmaeɛ no mu; wɔn a wɔanya wɔn kyɛfa wɔ saa fiase a wɔasiesie ama wɔn no mu, sɛdeɛ wɔbɛnya asɛmpa no, na wɔabu wɔn atɛn sɛ nnipa wɔ honam fa mu.
Na bio, totorobɛnto foforɔ bɛhyɛn, deɛ ɛyɛ totorobɛnto a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa no, na afei nnipa ahonhom a ɛwɔ sɛ wɔbu wɔn atɛn, na wɔhunu wɔn wɔ afɔbuo ase no bɛba;
Na yeinom ne awufoɔ nkaeɛ no; na wɔannya nkwa kɔsi sɛ mfenhyia apem no bɛduru awieɛ, kyerɛ sɛ, kɔsi asase awieɛ.
Na totorobɛnto foforɔ bɛhyɛn, deɛ ɛyɛ totorobɛnto a ɛtɔ so nnan no, aka sɛ: Wɔahunu wɔ wɔn ntam wɔn a ɛwɔ sɛ wɔka kɔsi saa da kɛseɛ a ɛtwa toɔ no, mpo awieɛ no, a wɔbɛda so aka fi mu.
Na totorobɛnto foforɔ bɛhyɛn, deɛ ɛtɔ so num no, deɛ ɛyɛ ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔtɔ so num no, a ɔde daapem asɛmpa no ma no—atu nenam ɔsoro mu, rekɔ aman, mmusuakuo, kasa hodoɔ ne nkorɔfoɔ nyina ara hɔ;

Na yei bɛyɛ ne totorobɛnto nnyegyeeɛ, a ɛreka kyerɛ nkorɔfoɔ nyina ara a wɔwɔ ɔsoro ne asase so nyina ara, ne wɔn a wɔwɔ asase ase—ɛfiri sɛ aso biara bɛte, na kotodwe biara bɛkoto, na tɛkrɛma biara bɛpae mu aka, berɛ a wɔte totorobɛnto nnyegeeɛ no, a ɛreka sɛ: Monsuro Nyankopɔn, ne monhyɛ deɛ ɔte ahennwa no so no animuonyam, daa afebɔɔ; ɛfiri sɛ n’atemmuo dɔnhwere no aba.
Na bio, ɔbɔfoɔ foforɔ bɛhyɛn ne totorobɛnto, deɛ ɛyɛ ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔtɔ so nsia no, aka sɛ: Wahwease, deɛ ɔmaa aman nyina ara nomn n’adwamammɔ abufuhyeɛ nsã no; wahwease, wahwease!

Na bio, ɔbɔfoɔ foforɔ bɛhyɛn ne totorobɛnto, deɛ ɛyɛ ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔtɔ so nson no, aka sɛ: wɔawie; wɔawie! Onyankopɔn Adwammaa no adi nkonim na watiatia nsã-akyi-amena no mu, mpo Otumfoɔ Nyankopɔn abufuhyeɛ werɛmfoɔ nsa-kyi-amena no.
Na afei wɔde ne tumi animuonyam bɛhyɛ abɔfoɔ no ahenkyɛ, na wɔde animuonyam bɛhyɛ ahotefoɔ no mã, na wɔbɛnya wɔn apɛgyadeɛ na wɔama wɔne no ayɛ pɛ.
Na afei ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔdi kan no bɛhyɛn ne totorobɛnto bio agu ateasefoɔ nyina ara aso mu, na ɔbɛda nnipa kokoa mu nnwuma adi, ne Onyankopɔn nnwuma akɛseɛ wɔ mfeɛ apem a ɛdi kan no mu.
Na afei ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔtɔ so mmienu no bɛhyɛn ne totorobɛnto, na ɔbɛda nnipa kokoa mu nnwuma adi, ne wɔn adwene ne wɔn akoma mu nsusuiɛ, ne Onyankopɔn nnwuma akɛseɛ wɔ mfeɛ apem a ɛtɔ so mmienu no mu.

Na saa ara kɔsi sɛ ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔtɔ so nson no bɛhyɛn ne totorobɛnto; na ɔbɛgyina asase ne ɛpo no so, na ɔbɛka ntam wɔ deɛ ɔte ahennwa no so no din mu sɛ mmerɛ nni hɔ bio; na wɔbɛkyekyere Satan, saa ɔwɔ dada no a wɔfrɛ no ɔbonsam no, na wɔrensane no mfeɛ apem ntam.
Na afei wɔbɛsane no mmerɛ tiawa bi pɛ mu, sɛdeɛ ɔbɛtumi aboaboa n’asraafoɔ ano abɔ mu.
Na Mikael, ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔtɔ so nson no, mpo ɔbɔfo panin no, bɛboaboa n’asraafoɔ ano abɔ mu, mpo ɔsoro asafo.
Na ɔbonsam bɛboaboa n’asraafoɔ ano abɔ mu; mpo asamando asafo, na wɔbɛba abɛko atia Mikael ne n’asraafoɔ no.
Na afei Onyankopɔn kokuroko no kõ no bɛba; na wɔbɛto ɔbonsam ne n’asraafoɔ atwene wɔn ara wɔn ankasa deɛ mu, sɛdeɛ wɔnnya tumi biara bio wɔ ahotefoɔ no so koraa.
Ɛfiri sɛ Mikael bɛko wɔn ko no, na ɔbɛdi deɛ ɔhwehwɛ ahennwa a, mpo Adwammaa no te so no, so nkonim.
Yei ne Onyankopɔn ne wɔn a wɔadwira wɔn ho no animuonyam; na wɔrenhunu owuo biara bio.
Ne saa nti, nokorɛ mese mo, me nnamfo, monfrɛ mo nhyia kronkron no, sɛdeɛ mahyɛ mo no.

Na esiane sɛ ɛnyɛ obiara na ɔwɔ gyedie nti, momfa nsiyɛ nhwehwɛ na monkyerɛkyerɛ mo ho mo ho anyansasɛm; aane monhwehwɛ anyansasɛm mfiri nwoma a ɛyɛ papa pa ara mu; monhwehwɛ nimdeɛ, mpo momfa adesua ne gyedie nhwehwɛ.
Monhyehyɛ mo ho mo ho; monsiesie adehiadeɛ biara; na monkyekyere efie, mpo mpaebɔ fie, akɔmkyene fie, gyedie fie, adesua fie, animuonyam fie, nhyehyɛeɛ pa fie, Onyankopɔn fie;
Sɛdeɛ mo fiba bɛyɛ wɔ Awurade din mu; na mo adifiri nso bɛwɔ Awurade din mu; ama mo nkyea nyina ara awɔ Awurade din mu, a moama mo nsa so akyerɛ Ɔsorosoroni no.
Ne saa nti, monyae mo kasa hunu nyina ara, ne sereɛ nyina ara, mo akɔnnɔ bɔne nyina ara, mo ahantan nyina ara ne nkwadaa-dwen, ne mo atirimuɔdensɛm nyina ara.

Monyi ɔkyerɛkyerɛni wɔ mo ntam, na mma mo nyina ara nnyɛ kasamafo prɛko pɛ; mmom momma ɔbaako nkasa ansa, na obiara ntie ne nsɛm, ama sɛ obiara kasa a mo nyina ara moato mo ho mo ho so, na ama onipa biara anya akwanya pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Monhwɛ nnodɔ mo ho mo ho; monyae sɛ moyɛ aniberefoɔ; monsua sɛ mobɛmema mo ho mo ho sɛdeɛ asɛmpa no kyerɛ no.
Monyae sɛ moyɛ akwadworɔ; monyae sɛ mogu mo ho fi; monyae sɛ mopɛ mo ho mo ho mfomsoɔ; monyae sɛ moda boro soɔ; monkɔda ntɛm, ama moammrɛ; monsɔre ntɛm, ama mo honamdua ne mo adwene anya ahoɔden.
Na deɛ ɛkorɔn sene nneɛma nyina ara ne sɛ, momfa ɔdɔ mmapa apam mfira, te sɛ ataadeɛ ngusoɔ, a ɛyɛ pɛpɛyɛ mmara a ɛkyekyere ne asomdwoeɛ.
Mommɔ mpaeɛ berɛbiara, sɛdeɛ monntɔ baha, kɔsi sɛ mɛba. Hwɛ, na hunu, mɛba mpofirim, na mabɛgye mo ama me ara me ho. Amen.

Na bio, yei ne nhyehyɛeɛ a ɛfa nkɔmhyɛfoɔ sukuu a wɔasiesie ama atitenafoɔ no ho, deɛ wɔakyekyere a ɛbɛma wɔanya nkyerɛkyerɛ wɔ nneɛma nyina ara a ɛfata ma wɔn no mu, mpo de ma asomfoɔ a wɔwɔ asɔre no mu nyina ara, anaa nsɛm foforɔ mu no, wɔn a wɔafrɛ wɔn ama ɔsom adwuma wɔ asɔre no mu no, firi asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ so, mpo de kɔsi dikɔnfoɔ so—
Na yei bɛyɛ nhyehyɛeɛ ama sukuu no atititenafoɔ fie no: Deɛ wɔayi no sɛ ɔmmɛyɛ titenani, anaa ɔkyerɛkyerɛni no, ɛwɔ sɛ ɔgyina ne gyinaberɛ, wɔ fie a wɔasiesie ama no no mu.
Ne saa nti, ɔbɛdi kan wɔ Onyankopɔn fie, wɔ bea a asafo no a wɔwɔ fie no mu bɛtumi ate ne nsɛm no yie, na ɛmu da hɔ, ɛnnyɛ kasa denden.
Na sɛ ɔba Onyankopɔn fie hɔ a, ɛfiri sɛ ɛwɔ sɛ ɔdi kan wɔ fie hɔ nti—hwɛ, yei yɛ fɛ, sɛdeɛ ɔbɛtumi ayɛ nhwɛsoɔ—
Ma ɔmfa ne ho mma wɔ mpaebɔ mu wɔ ne nkotodwe anim wɔ Onyankopɔn anim, sɛ sɛnkyerɛnne anaa nkaeɛ ma daapem apam no.
Na sɛ obi ba mu ɔno akyi a, ɔkyerɛkyerɛni no nsɔre, na ɔmma ne nsa so nkɔ soro, aane, mpo tee, mfa nsɛm yi nkyea ne nuabarima anaa anuanom mmarimma:

Woyɛ onuabarima anaa (moyɛ) anuanom mmarimma? Mekyea wo wɔ Yesu Kristo din mu, sɛ sɛnkyerɛnne anaa nkaeɛ ma daapem apam no, saa apam yi mu na megye wo ba kuo yi mu, wɔ nketesie a wɔayɛ atim hɔ mu, a ɛnhinhim da, na ɛnsesa, sɛ mɛyɛ wo yɔnko ne wo nuabaraima nam Onyankopɔn adom so wɔ ɔdɔ apam mu, na mɛnante wɔ Onyankopɔn mmaransɛm nyina ara mu a mfomsoɔ biara mma me ho, wɔ aseda mu, daa afebɔɔ. Amen.
Na deɛ wɔhunu no sɛ ɔmmfata saa nkyea yi no rennya kwan wɔ mo mu; ɛfiri ɛnnsɛ sɛ moma kwan ma ɔgu me fie ho fi.

Na deɛ ɔba mu na ɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ wɔ m’anim, na ɔyɛ onuabarima, anaa sɛ wɔyɛ anuanom mmarimma no, wɔbɛkyea titenani anaa ɔkyerɛkyerɛni no wɔ berɛ a wɔama wɔn nsa so akɔ soro, wɔde saa mpaeɛ korɔ no ara, anaa wɔbɛka Amen, sɛ yei ara ho sɛnkyerɛnne.
Hwɛ, nokorɛ, mese mo, yei yɛ nhwɛsoɔ de ma mo sɛ nkyea ma mo ho mo ho wɔ Onyankopɔn fie, wɔ nkɔmhyɛfoɔ sukuu no mu.

Na wɔafrɛ mo sɛ monyɛ yei wɔ mpaebɔ ne aseda mu, sɛdeɛ Honhom no bɛma mo deɛ monka wɔ mo nnwumadie nyina ara mu wɔ Awurade fie, wɔ nkɔmhyɛfoɔ sukuu no mu, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ kronkronbea, tenabea ma Honhom Kronkron sɛdeɛ ɛbɛma mo nkɔsoɔ.
Na morennye obiara mma mo mu wɔ saa sukuu yi mu gyesɛ ne ho te firi saa awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi mogya ho;
Na wɔbegye no nam nnan-ase hohoro ayɛyɛdeɛ so, ɛfiri sɛ ɛnam saa boateɛ yi so na wɔyɛɛ nnan-ase hohoro ayɛyɛdeɛ no.
Na bio, nnan-ase hohoro ayɛyɛdeɛ no ɛwɔ sɛ titenani no na ɔyɛ, anaa sɛ asɔre no panin titenani no.
Ɛwɔ sɛ wɔde mpaebɔ hyɛ aseɛ; na sɛ wɔdi paanoo no nom nsã no wie a, ɛwɔ sɛ ɔde (mpaho) kyekyere ne ho sɛdeɛ nhwɛsoɔ a ɛwɔ Yohane adansedie ti dumiɛnsa no mu kyerɛ, ɛfa me ho no. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/89.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 89
chapter_summary: 1–9, Wɔbara sɛ wɔfa bobesa, anonneɛ a ano yɛ den, tawa, ne anonneɛ a ɛyɛ hye; 10–17, Wɔayɛ nhahamma, nnuaba, nnam, ne burofua yi ama onipa ne mmoa; 18–21, Setie a wɔyɛ ma asɛmpa mmara no, ɛne Nyansasɛm no de honam ne honhom fam nhyira ba.

verses.text: Nyansasɛm, a ɛyɛ mfasoɔ ma asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ agyinatu kuo no, a wɔahyia mu wɔ Kirtland, ne asɔre no, ne ahotefoɔ nso a wɔwɔ Sion nso—
Wɔmfa nsoma sɛ nkyea; nnyɛ sɛ mmarasɛm anaa ɔhyɛ, mmom sɛ adiyisɛm, ne nyansasɛm, a ɛrekyerɛ Onyankopɔn nhyehyɛeɛ ne ne pɛ a ɛfa ahotefoɔ no nyina ara honam fam nkwagyeɛ ho wɔ nna a ɛtwa toɔ no mu—
Wɔde maae sɛ nyinasosɛm a bɔhyɛ ka ho, wɔasakyera mu ama wɔn a wɔyɛ mmerɛ koraa, wɔn a wɔyɛ ahotefoɔ anaa wɔbɛtumi afrɛ wɔn saa no.

Hwɛ, nokorɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ mo nie: Ɛnam nnebɔneyɛ ne atirimpɔ a ɛwɔ hɔ na ɛbɛtena nnipa a wɔpam tiri-so no akoma mu wɔ nna ɛtwa toɔ no mu nti, mabɔ mo kɔkɔ, na madikan abɔ mo kɔkɔ, menam adiyisɛm so ama mo saa nyansasɛm yi—
Sɛ mmerɛ dodoɔ a onipa biara nom bobesa anaa anonneɛ a ano yɛ den wɔ mo ntam no, hwɛ ɛnnyɛ, anaa ɛmfata wɔ mo Agya anim, gyesɛ berɛ a morehyia mo ho de mo akronkronneɛ ama wɔ n’anim.
Na, hwɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ yei yɛ bobesa, aane, bobesa korɔgyeen a ɛfiri, bobedua no so, a mo ankasa moayɛ.
Na, bio, anonneɛ a ano yɛ den nnyɛ mma yafunu, mmom ɛyɛ ma sɛ mode bɛhohoro mo nnipadua ho.
Na bio, tawa nnyɛ honamdua no deɛ, anaa yafunu no, na ɛnnyɛ mma onipa, mmom ɛyɛ ahahamma ma pira ne anantwie a wɔyare nyina ara, na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔde atemmuo ne nyansa to ho de di dwuma.
Na bio, anonneɛ a ɛyɛ hye nnyɛ nipadua anaa yafunu no deɛ.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, Onyankopɔn ahyira nhahamma a ahoɔden wɔ mu nyina ara so ama awosuo, suban ne sɛ onipa bɛdi—
Ahahamma biara wɔ ne berɛ nkyekyɛmu ara mu, ne aduaba biara wɔ ne berɛ nkyekyɛmu ara mu; yeinom nyina ara ɛwɔ sɛ wɔdi wɔ aniteɛ ne aseda mu.
Aane, mmoa ne ewiem nnomaa nam nso, Me, Awurada ahyira so ama onipa sɛ ɔde aseda di; nanso ɛsɛ sɛ wɔdi no nkakrankakra;
Na ɛsɔ m’ani sɛ wɔrenni, gye sɛ awɔ berɛ, anaa nwunu berɛ, anaa ɛkɔm berɛ mu.

Wɔahyira burofua nyina ara so ama onipa ne mmoa sɛ wɔdi, sɛ ɛnyɛ nkwa poma, nnyɛ onipa nko ara na mmom wuram mmoa, ne ɔsoro nnomaa, ne wuram mmoa a wɔtu mmirika nyina ara anaa wɔwea asase so nyina ara;
Na Onyankopɔn ayɛ yeinom sɛ onipa nni wɔ ɔkɔm ne ɔkɔm denden berɛ nko ara mu.
Na burofua nyina ara yɛ aduane pa ma onipa; saa ara nso na bobe aba no teɛ; deɛ ɛma aduaba, sɛ ɛwɔ asase no mu anaa ɛwɔ asase no soro—

Nanso, ayuo yɛ ma onipa, na aburo yɛ ma nantwie, na oats yɛ ma ɔpɔnkɔ, na rye yɛ ma nnomaa ne mprako, ne wuram mmoa nyina ara, na atokoɔ yɛ ma mmoa a wɔn ho hia nyina ara, na ɛyɛ ma anonneɛ a ano yɛ mmerɛ, sɛdeɛ burofua afoforɔ nso teɛ no.
Na ahotefoɔ nyina ara a wɔkae di saa nsɛm yi so na wɔyɛ, na wɔnante wɔ setie mu ma mmaransɛm no, wɔbɛnya ahoɔden wɔ wɔn afunuma mu ne ohon wɔ wɔn nnompe mu;
Na wɔbɛnya nyansa ne nimdeɛ ademudeɛ kɛseɛ, mpo ademudeɛ a ahinta;
Na wɔbɛtu mmirika a wɔmmrɛ, na wɔbɛnante a wɔnntɔ piti.
Na Me, Awurade, ma wɔn bɔhyɛ, sɛ ɔbɔfoɔ sɛefoɔ no bɛpa wɔn ho akɔ, te sɛ Israel mma no, a ɔrenkum wɔn. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/90.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 90
chapter_summary: 1–5, Wɔde aheman no nsafoa ahyɛ Joseph Smith nsa na wɔnam no so de ama Asɔre no; 6–7, Ɛwɔ sɛ Sidney Rigdon ne Frederick Williams som wɔ Atitenafoɔ a Wɔdi Kan no frɛ no mu; 8–11, Ɛwɔ sɛ wɔka asɛmpa no wɔ Israel, Amanamanmufoɔ, ne Yudafoɔ aman no mu, na onipa biara te wɔ ɔno ara ne kasa mu; 12–18, Ɛwɔ sɛ Joseph Smith ne n’afotufoɔ hyehyɛ Asɔre no wɔ ne kwan so; 19–37, Awurade tu nnipa ahodoɔ fo sɛ wɔnante wɔ tenenee mu na wɔnsom wɔ N’aheman mu.

verses.text: Sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ nie, nokorɛ, nokorɛ mese wo me ba barima sɛ, wɔde wo bɔne akyɛ wo, sɛdeɛ w’adesrɛ teɛ, ɛfiri sɛ wo mpaebɔ ne wo nuanom mpaebɔ aforo aba m’aso mu.
Ne saa nti, nhyira nka wo firi nnɛ de rekorɔ, wo a wokura aheman no nsafoa a wɔde ama wo; saa aheman a ɛrefiri adi aba berɛ a ɛtwa toɔ no.
Nokorɛ mese wo, wɔrennye saa aheman yi nsafoa mfiri wo hɔ, berɛ a wowɔ wiase yi mu, anaa wiase no a ɛbɛba no mu;
Nanso, ɛnam wo so na wɔde adiyisɛm no bɛma ɔfoforɔ, aane, mpo ama asɔre no.

Na wɔn a wɔnya Onyankopɔn nkɔmhyɛfoɔ adiyisɛm nyina ara no, wɔnhwɛ yie wɔ kwan a wɔkura yeinom ama wɔammu no sɛ ɛyɛ ade ketewa, na amfa wɔn ankɔ afɔbuo ase, na wɔansunti na wɔanhwe fam berɛ a ahum bɛsiane, na mframa bɛbɔ, na nsuo bɛtɔ agu wɔn fie so no.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese wo nuanom, Sidney Rigdon ne Frederick G. Williams, sɛ wɔde wɔn bɔne akyɛ wɔn nso, na wɔbu wɔn sɛ wɔne wo yɛ pɛ wɔ aheman a ɛtwa twoɔ no nsafoa kura mu;
Sɛdeɛ ɛnam wo som adwuma nso so no wɔne wo yɛ pɛ wɔ nsafoa kura no mu wɔ nkɔmhyɛfoɔ sukuu no mu, deɛ mahyɛ sɛ wɔnhyehyɛ no;
Sɛdeɛ ɛbɛnam so ama wɔadi mũ wɔ ɔsom adwuma a wɔyɛ ma Sion nkwagyeɛ, Israel man, ne Amanamanmufoɔ no, dodoɔ no ara a wɔbɛgye adie no.
Sɛdeɛ ɛnam wo som adwuma so no wɔbɛtumi anya asɛm no, na ɛnam wɔn som adwuma so no asɛm no bɛfiri adi akɔ asase ano, akɔ Amanamanmufoɔ no hɔ kane, na afei, hwɛ na hunu, wɔbɛdane akɔ Yudafoɔ no so.
Na afei da no bɛba a Awurade basa bɛda adi wɔ tumi mu ama aman, abosomsomfoɔ aman, Yosef fie agye wɔn nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no adi.

Ɛfiri sɛ da no reba a, onipa biara bɛte asɛmpa no mahyɛ wɔ n’ankasa ne kasasu, ne n’ankasa ne kasa mu, nam wɔn a wɔayi wɔn ama saa tumi yi, nam Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ no som adwuma, a wɔahwie agu wɔn so sɛ Yesu Kristo adiyisɛm no.
Na afei, nokorɛ mese mo, mema mo mmarasɛm sɛ monkɔ so wɔ ɔsom no ne atitenafoɔ dwumadie no mu.
Na sɛ mowie nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no nkyerɛaseɛ no a, momfiri saa berɛ yi de rekorɔ nhwɛ asɔre no dwumadie ne sukuu no so;
Na berɛ ano berɛ ano, sɛdeɛ Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ no bɛda n’adi no, mobɛnya adiyisɛm de abue aheman no ahintasɛm ani;
Na mobɛhyehyɛ nsɔre no ne kwan so, mobɛhwehwɛ mu na moasua adeɛ, na moapɛ nhunumu wɔ nwoma pa nyina ara mu, na moahunu kasahodoɔ, ne kasasu, ne nnipa.
Na yei bɛyɛ mo adwuma ne mo soma wɔ mo nkwa nna nyina ara mu, sɛ mobɛyɛ titenafoɔ wɔ agyinatukuo mu, na mobɛhyehyɛ saa asɔre ne aheman yi dwumadie nyina ara wɔ ne kwan so.
Mma mo mfɛre, anaa mo ani nwu; mmom monnye kasa kyerɛ wɔ ahomasoɔ ne ahantan ho, ɛfiri sɛ ɛde fidisum bɛba mo akra so.
Monsiesie mo afie yie wɔ ne kwan so; montwe mo ho mfiri akwadworɔ ne deɛ ɛho nteɛ ho korakora.
Afei, nokorɛ mese wo, ntɛmpa yi ara sɛ ɛbɛtumi a ma wɔn nsiesie baabi mma wo fotufoɔ ne wo twerɛtwerɛfoɔ, mpo Frederick G. Williams abusua.
Na ma m’akoa a n’ani afi, Joseph Smith, panin no, nkɔ so ne n’abusua ntena faako a ɔwɔ seesei yi; na mma wɔnntɔn kɔsi sɛ Awurade ano bɛkyerɛ.
Na ma me fotufoɔ, mpo Sidney Rigdon, nkɔso nwɔ faako a ɔte kɔsi sɛ Awurade ano bɛkyerɛ.
Na ma ɔhwɛfoɔ no mfa nsiyɛ nhwehwɛ sɛ ɔbɛnya ɔnanmusifoɔ, na ma ɔnyɛ onipa a ɔwɔ ahonyadeɛ wɔ adekoraeɛ—Onyankopɔn nipa, a ne gyedie mu yɛ den—
Ama ɛnam so watumi aboa atua ka biara; ama Awurade adekoradan no annya din bɔne wɔ nkurɔfoɔ no anim.
Momfa nsiyɛ nhwehwɛ, mmɔ mpaeɛ berɛbiara, na nneɛma nyina ara bɛbɔ mu adi dwuma ama mo yieyɛ, sɛ monante tenenee mu na mokae apam a mone mo ho mo ho afa a.
Momma mo mmusua nyɛ nketewa, nkanka m’akoa a n’ani afi, Joseph Smith, Sen. deɛ no, ɛfa wɔn a wɔnka mo mmusua ho no;
Ama wɔannye nneɛma a wɔde ama mo, a ɛde m’adwuma bɛba mu no ammfiri mo hɔ na wɔamfa amma wɔn a wɔn mfata—
Na ɛnam so ma wɔasi mo kwan wɔ nneɛma a mahyɛ mo sɛ monyɛ no ho.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, ɛyɛ me pɛ sɛ m’abaawa Vienna Jaques bɛgye sika de atua n’aka, na wakɔ Sion asase no so;
Na sika no nkaeɛ no wɔbɛte ho ama me, na wanya akatua wɔ me ara me mmerɛ a ɛsɛ mu.
Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ ɛfata wɔ m’ani so sɛ ɔkɔ Sion asase no so, na ɔgye apɛgyadeɛ firi ɔhwɛfoɔ no nsam;
Ama watumi atena ase wɔ asomdwoeɛ mu mmerɛ dodoɔ a ɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ, na ɔnnyɛ aniha wɔ ne nna mu firi saa berɛ yi de rekorɔ.
Na hwɛ, nokorɛ mese mo, sɛ montwerɛ saa mmarasɛm yi, na monka nkyerɛ mo nuanom a wɔwɔ Sion, wɔ ɔdɔ nkyea mu, sɛ mafrɛ mo nso sɛ monhwɛ Sion so wɔ me ara me mmerɛ a ɛsɛ mu.
Ne saa nti, ma wɔnyae me haw ɛfa saa asɛm yi ho.
Hwɛ, mese mo sɛ mo nuanom a wɔwɔ Sion no ahyɛ aseɛ resakyera, na abɔfoɔ di wɔn ho ahurisie.
Nanso, nneɛma pii nsɔ m’ani yie; na m’akoa William E. McLellin nsɔ m’ani yie, ɛne m’akoa Sidney Gilbert; ne ɔhwɛfoɔ no nso, ne afoforɔ a wɔwɔ nneɛma pii a ɛwɔ sɛ wɔsakyera firi ho.
Nanso nokorɛ mese mo, sɛ Me, Awurade, ne Sion bɛdi aperepereɛ, na masrɛ n’ahoɔdenfoɔ, na maka n’anim kɔsi sɛ ɔbɛdi nkonim na ne ho ate wɔ m’anim.
Ɛfiri sɛ wɔrennyi no mmfiri ne tenabea. Me, Awurade, na maka. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/91.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 91
chapter_summary: 1–3, Apokrifa no nkyerɛaseɛ dodoɔ no ara yɛ nokorɛ nanso ɛkura deɛ nnipa de wɔn nsa de ahyehyɛ mu bebree a ɛnnyɛ nokorɛ; 4–6, wɔn a Honhom no ama wɔn hann no nya so mfasoɔ.

verses.text: Nokorɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade se mo ɛfa Apokrifa no ho nie—Nneɛma pii wɔ mu a ɛyɛ nokorɛ, na ne nkyerɛaseɛ no fã kɛseɛ di mũ;
Nneɛma pii wɔ mu a ɛnyɛ nokorɛ, a ɛyɛ deɛ nnipa de wɔn nsa de ahyehyɛ mu.
Nokorɛ, mese mo, sɛ ɛho nhia sɛ wɔkyerɛ Apokrifa no ase.
Ne saa nti, obiara a ɔkan no, ɔnte aseɛ, ɛfiri sɛ Honhom no da nokorɛ no adi;
Na obiara a Honhom no ma no hann no bɛnya mfasoɔ afiri mu;
Na obiara a ɔmmfa Honhom no so nnya no, rentumi nnya so mfasoɔ. Ne saa nti ɛho nhia sɛ wɔbɛkyerɛ aseɛ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/92.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 92
chapter_summary: 1–2, Awurade ma mmara a nkabom kuo no fa so gye obi.

verses.text: Nokorɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ nie, mede adiyisɛm ne mmarasɛm ma nkabom kuo, a wɔahyehyɛ sɛdeɛ mmarasɛm a mede ama wɔn dada no teɛ, ɛfa m’akoa Frederick G. Williams ho, sɛ monnye no nto kuo no mu. Deɛ meka kyerɛ ɔbaako no meka kyerɛ obiara.
Na bio, mese wo m’akoa Frederick G. Williams, sɛ wobɛyɛ fekuoni deyɛfoɔ wɔ saa kuo yi mu; na mmerɛ dodoɔ a woyɛ nokorɛfoɔ di me mmaransɛm dada no nyina ara so no wɔbɛhyira wo afebɔɔ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/93.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 93
chapter_summary: 1–5, Wɔn a wɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ nyina ara bɛhunu Awurade; 6–18, Yohane dii adanseɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn Ba no nyaa adom too adom so kɔsi sɛ Ɔnyaa Agya no animuonyam no mahyɛ; 19–20, Nnipa nokorɛfoɔ a wɔfiri adom so kɔ adom so no nso bɛnya Ne mahyɛ no; 21–22, Wɔn a wɔnam Kristo so awo wɔn no yɛ Abakan no Asɔre mma; 23–28, Kristo nyaa nokorɛ nyina ara mahyɛ, na onipa nam setie so bɛtumi ayɛ saa ara; 29–32, Ahyɛaseɛ no na onipa ne Onyankopɔn na ɛwɔ hɔ; 33–35, Ankomadeɛ yɛ ɔnni awieɛ, na onipa bɛtumi anya ɛdɛ mahyɛ wɔ Owusɔreɛ no mu; 36–37, Onyankopɔn animuonyam yɛ nhunumu; 38–40, Mmɔfra nni fɔ wɔ Onyankopɔn anim ɛnam Kristo gyeɛ no nti; 41–53, Wɔhyɛ anuanom akannifoɔ no sɛ wɔnsiesie wɔn mmusua yie.

verses.text: Nokorɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ nie: Ɛbɛba sɛ ɔkra biara a ɔpa ne bɔne akyi na ɔba me hɔ, na ɔbɔ me din, na ɔyɛ setie ma me nne, na ɔdi me mmaransɛm so no, bɛhunu m’anim na wahunu sɛ me te ase;
Na saa mene nokorɛ hann no a ɛhyerɛn ma onipa biara a ɔba wiase no;
Na mewɔ Agya no mu, na Agya no wɔ me mu, na Agya no ne meyɛ baako—
Agya no ɛfiri sɛ ɔmaa me ne mahyɛ, na Ɔba no ɛfiri sɛ na mewɔ wiase na meyɛɛ honam me ntomadan, ne metenaa nnipa mma ntam.
Na mewɔ wiase na menya firii m’Agya hɔ, na wɔdaa ne nnwuma adi pefee.
Na Yohane hunuui na ɔdii adanseɛ faa m’animuonyam mahyɛ ho, na wɔbɛda Yohane adanseɛ no mahyɛ n’adi akyire yi.
Na ɔdii adanseɛ kaa sɛ: Mehunuu n’animuonyam, sɛ na ɔwɔ hɔ mfitiaseɛ no, ansana wiase reba;
Ne saa nti, mfitiaseɛ no na Asɛm no wɔ hɔ, ɛfiri sɛ na ɔno ne Asɛm no, mpo nkwagyeɛ bɔfoɔ no—
Wiase hann ne ne Gyefoɔ; nokorɛ Honhom no, deɛ ɔbaa wiase, ɛfiri sɛ ɔno na ɔyɛɛ wiase, na ne mu na nnipa nkwa ne hann wɔ.
Ɔno na ɔyɛɛ wiase hodoɔ no; ɔno na ɔyɛɛ nnipa; ɛnam ne so na wɔyɛɛ nneɛma nyina ara, ne so, na wɔfaa no so, na ɛfiri no.
Na me, Yohane, di adanseɛ sɛ mehunuu n’animuonyam, sɛ Ɔba a Agya no woo no Korɔ no, a adom ne nokorɛ ahyɛ no ma, mpo nokorɛ Honhom no a ɔba bɛtenaa honam mu, na ɔtenaa yɛn ntam no.
Na me, Yohane, hunuu sɛ wannya mahyɛ mfitiaseɛ no, mmom ɔnyaa adom too adom so;
Na wannya mahyɛ no mfitiaseɛ no, mmom ɔkɔɔ so firii adom mu kɔɔ adom mu, kɔsi sɛ ɔnyaa mahyɛ no;
Na saa nti na wɔfrɛɛ no Onyankopɔn Ba no, ɛfiri sɛ wannya mahyɛ no mfitiase no.
Na me, Yohane, di adanseɛ, na hwɛ, ɔsoro bueeɛ, na Sunsum Kronkron no siane baa ne so wɔ aburuburo nsɛsoɔ, na ɛtenaa ne so, na nne bi firi soro baae, na ɛkaa sɛ: Yei ne me Dɔ ba.
Na me, Yohane, di adanseɛ sɛ ɔnyaa Agya no animuonyam mahyɛ no;
Na ɔnyaa tumi nyina ara, deɛ ɛwɔ soro ne asase so nyina ara, na na Agya n’animuonyam wɔ ne mu, ɛfiri sɛ na ɔwɔ ne mu.
Na ɛbɛba sɛ, sɛ moyɛ nokorɛfoɔ a mobɛnya Yohane adanseɛ no mahyɛ.
Mema mo saa nsɛm yi ama moatumi ate aseɛ na moahunu sɛdeɛ mobɛsom afa, na moahunu deɛ mosom, ama moatumi aba Agya no hɔ wɔ me din mu, na berɛ a ɛsɛ mu no moanya ne mahyɛ.
Na sɛ modi me mmaransɛm so a mobɛnya ne mahyɛ no, na wɔahyɛ mo animuonyam wɔ me mu sɛdeɛ wɔahyɛ me animuonyam wɔ Agya no mu; ne saa nti, mese mo sɛ, mobɛnya adom ato adom so.
Na afei, nokorɛ mese mo, mfitiaseɛ no na mene Agya no wɔ hɔ, na mene Abakan no;
Na wɔn a wɔafa me so awo wɔn no ne me yɛ saa animuonaym no ara adedifoɔ, na wɔyɛ Abakan n’asɔre.
Mo nso na mone Agya no wɔ hɔ mfitiaseɛ no; deɛ ɛyɛ Honhom no, mpo nokorɛ Honhom no;
Na nokorɛ yɛ nimdeɛ a ɛkyerɛ sɛdeɛ nneɛma teɛ, sɛdeɛ na ɛteɛ, ne sɛdeɛ ɛbɛba;
Na biribiara a ɛboro yei so anaa ɛsua sene yei yɛ saa otirimuɔdenfoɔ no honhom, deɛ ɔyɛ ɔtorofoɔ firi mfitiaseɛ no.
Nokorɛ Honhom no firi Onyankopɔn. Mene nokorɛ Honhom no, na Yohane dii me ho adanseɛ kaa sɛ: Ɔnyaa nokorɛ no mahyɛ, aane, mpo nokorɛ nyina ara;
Na onipa biara nnya mahyɛ bi gye sɛ ɔdi ne mmaransɛm so.
Deɛ ɔdi ne mmaransɛm so no nya nokorɛ ɛne hann, kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛhyɛ no animuonyam wɔ nokorɛ mu na ɔbɛhunu nneɛma nyina ara.
Na onipa nso ne Onyankopɔn na ɛwɔ hɔ ahyɛaseɛ no. Wɔammɔ na wɔanyɛ nhumu, anaa nokorɛ hann no, ampa ara wɔrentumi mmɔ.
Nokorɛ nyina ara de wɔn ho wɔ wɔn atenaeɛ a Onyankopɔn de wɔn ato, sɛ wɔnde wɔn ho nni dwuma, sɛdeɛ nhumu nyina ara nso teɛ; anyɛ saa a anka asetena biara nni hɔ.
Hwɛ, yei mu na onipa fahodie wɔ, na yei mu na onipa afɔbuo wɔ; ɛfiri sɛ deɛ ɛwɔ hɔ firi mfitiaseɛ no wɔada n’adi pefee akyerɛ wɔn, nanso wɔnnye hann no.
Na onipa biara a ne honhom nnye hann no wɔ afɔbuo ase.
Ɛfiri sɛ onipa yɛ honhom. Ankomadeɛ yɛ ɔnniawieɛ, na honhom ne ankomadeɛ, a aka abɔ mu a wɔrentumi ntete mu no, nya ɛdɛ a ahyɛ mã;
Na sɛ ɛmu tete a, onipa ntumi nnya ɛdɛ a ahyɛ mã.
Ankomadeɛ yɛ Onyankopɔn tenabea; aane, onipa yɛ Onyankopɔn tenabea, mpo tɛmpol; na tɛmpol biara a wɔagu ho fi no, Onyankopɔn bɛsɛe saa tɛmpol no.
Onyankopɔn animuonyam yɛ nhumu, anaa, nsɛm foforɔ mu no, hann ne nokorɛ.
Hann ne nokorɛ pa ɔbɔnefoɔ no akyi.
Na onipa biara honhom nni fɔ wɔ mfitiaseɛ no; na Onyankopɔn gyee onipa firii ahweaseɛ no mu no, nnipa san kɔɔ wɔn nkɔkoaa tebea mu bio, a wɔnni fɔ wɔ Onyankopɔn anim.
Na saa otirimuɔdenfoɔ no ba na ɔbɛfa hann ne nokorɛ firi nnipa mma hɔ, nam asoɔden so, ne wɔn agyanom amammerɛ nti.
Nanso mahyɛ mo sɛ montete mo mma wɔ hann ne nokorɛ mu.
Nanso nokorɛ mese wo, m’akoa Frederick G. Williams, woda so wɔ saa afɔbuo yi ase;
Woankyerɛ wo mma hann ne nokorɛ no, sɛdeɛ mmaransɛm no teɛ; na saa otirimuɔdenfoɔ no, da so wɔ tumi wɔ wo so, na yei ne wo amanehunu no farebae.
Na afei mede mmarasɛm bi ma wo—sɛ wobɛnya nkwagyeɛ a gye sɛ wosiesie wo fie yie, ɛfiri sɛ nneɛma pii wɔ hɔ a ɛnnyɛ ade pa wɔ wo fie.
Nokorɛ, mese m’akoa Sidney Rigdon, sɛ wɔ nneɛma bi mu no wanni me mmaransɛm so ɛfa ne mma ho; ne saa nti, di kan siesie wo fie.
Nokorɛ, mese m’akoa Joseph Smith, Jun., anaa nsɛm foforɔ mu, mɛfrɛ mo nnamfo, ɛfiri sɛ moyɛ me nnamfo, na mone me bɛnya apɛgyadeɛ—
Ɛnam wiase nti na mefrɛ mo nkoa, na me nti na moyɛ wɔn nkoa—
Na afei, nokorɛ mese Joseph Smith, Jun. sɛ—Woanni mmaransɛm no so, na ɛho hia sɛ wɔka w’anim wɔ Awurade anim;
Ɛho hia sɛ w’abusuafoɔ sakyera na wɔpa nneɛma bi akyi, na wɔde mmɔdenmmɔ paa ara tie me nsɛm, anyɛ saa a wɔbɛyi wɔn afiri wɔn tenabea.
Deɛ meka kyerɛ ɔbaako no meka kyerɛ obiara; wɔmmɔ mpaeɛ berɛbiara anyɛ saa a otirimuɔdenfoɔ no bɛnya tumi wɔ mo so, na ɔbɛyi mo afiri mo tenabea.

M’akoa Newel K. Whitney, m’asɔre hwɛfoɔ, nso hia sɛ wɔka n’anim, na ɔsiesie ne fie, na ɔhwɛ sɛ wɔbɛyɛ nsiyɛfoɔ na wɔahwɛ ayɛ fie adwuma, na wɔabɔ mpaeɛ berɛbiara, anyɛ saa a wɔbɛyi wɔn afiri wɔn tenabea.

Afei, mese mo, me nnamfo, sɛ momma m’akoa Sidney Rigdon ntu ne kwan, na ɔnyɛ ntɛm, na ɔmmɔ Awurade anisɔ afe no, ne nkwagyeɛ asɛmpa no nso ho dawuro, sɛdeɛ mɛkyerɛ no sɛ ɔnka no; na ɛnam mo gyedie mpaebɔ ne adwene korɔ so na mɛtae n’akyi.

Na momma me nkoa Joseph Smith, Jun., ne Frederick G. Williams nso nyɛ ntɛm, na wɔde bɛma wɔn mpo sɛdeɛ wɔn gyedie mpaebɔ teɛ; na mmerɛ dodoɔ a modi me nsɛm so no mo ani renwu wɔ saa wiase yi mu, anaa wiase a ɛbɛba no mu.
Na, nokorɛ mese mo, sɛ ɛyɛ me pɛ sɛ mobɛyɛ ntɛm akyerɛ me twerɛsɛm no ase, na moanya abakɔsɛm ho nimdeɛ, ne aman, ne aheman, ne Onyankopɔn ne nnipa mmara ho, na yei nyina ara Sion nkwagyeɛ nti. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/94.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 94
chapter_summary: 1–9, Awurade ma mmarasɛm a ɛfa si a wɔbɛsi dan a wɔde bɛyɛ Atitenafoɔ no adwuma no ho; 10–12, Wɔsi dan a wɔbɛtintim nwoma wɔ mu; 13–17, Wɔde apɛgyadeɛ binom ma.

verses.text: Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, me nnamfo, mmarasɛm a mede ma mo ne sɛ mobɛhyɛ adwuma aseɛ asusu sɛ mobɛyɛ Sion pɛɛwa ahenkuro no mfitiaseɛ ne ne fapem, wɔ Kirtland asase so ha, monhyɛaseɛ mfiri me fie.
Na hwɛ, ɛwɔ sɛ wɔyɛ no sɛdeɛ nhwɛsoɔ a mede ama mo no teɛ.

Na ma wɔnnwira asase a ɛdi kan wɔ anaafoɔ fam no ho mma me, na wɔmfa nsi dan mma atitenafoɔ no, ama atitenafoɔ no de ayɛ adwuma, de anya adiyisɛm; de ayɛ atitenafoɔ no som adwuma, wɔ nneɛma a ɛfa asɔre ne aheman no ho nyina ara.
Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ wɔnsi mma ne trɛtrɛtɛ nyɛ anammɔn aduonum num na ne tenten nyɛ aduosia num ara, wɔ n’adihɔ hɔ.
Na wɔnyɛ abannwa a ɛwɔ fam ne deɛ ɛkrɔn wɔ hɔ, sɛdeɛ nhwɛsoɔ a wɔde bɛma mo akyire yi no teɛ.
Na wɔbɛ te ho ama Awurade firi ne fapem, sɛdeɛ asɔfodie nhyehyɛeɛ no teɛ, sɛdeɛ nhwɛsoɔ a mede bɛma mo akyire yi teɛ.
Na wɔbɛte ne nyina ara ho ama Awurade ama wɔde ayɛ atitenafoɔ no adwuma.
Na moremma kwan mma adeɛ a ɛnho nteɛ biara mma mu; na m’animuonyam bɛwɔ hɔ, na m’anim bɛwɔ hɔ.
Nanso, sɛ adeɛ a ɛho nteɛ biara ba mu a, m’animuonyam remma hɔ; na me honhom remma mu.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, wɔbɛ te asase a ɛtɔ so mmienu wɔ anaafoɔ fam no ho de asi dan ama me, ama wɔde atintim me twerɛsɛm a wɔakyerɛ aseɛ adwuma no, ne biribibiara a mɛhyɛ mo.
Na ne trɛtrɛtɛ bɛyɛ anammɔn aduonum num na ne tenten yɛ aduosia num, wɔ abannwa no mu; na wɔnyɛ abannwa a ɛwɔ fam ne deɛ ɛkrɔn wɔ hɔ.

Na wɔbɛte saa dan mũ no nyina ara ho ama Awurade firi ne fapem, ama ntimtim adwuma no, wɔ biribibiara a mɛhyɛ mo no mu, sɛ ɛnyɛ kronkron, a efi biara nni hɔ, sɛdeɛ nhwɛsoɔ no teɛ wɔ nneɛma nyina ara mu, sɛdeɛ wɔde bɛma mo.
Na wɔ asase a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa no so na m’akoa Hyrum Smith bɛnya n’apagyadeɛ.
Na wɔ asase a ɛdi kan ne deɛ ɛtɔ so mmienu no so wɔ atifi afam no na me nkoa Reynolds Cahoon ne Jared Carter bɛnya wɔn apɛgyadeɛ—
Ama wɔatumi ayɛ adwuma a mayi ama wɔn no, sɛ wɔnyɛ apamfoɔ a wɔbɛsi m’afie, sɛdeɛ mmarasɛm, a me, Awurade Nyankopɔn, de ama mo no teɛ.
Wɔrensi saa adan mmienu yi kɔsi sɛ mɛma mo mmarasɛm afa ho.
Na afei meremma mo bio nka ho saa berɛ yi. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/95.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 95
chapter_summary: 1–6, Wɔka Ahotefoɔ no anim ɛnam sɛ wɔansi Awurade fie no; 7–10, Awurade pɛ sɛ Ɔde Ne fie ma Ne nkorɔfoɔ ɔsoro akyɛdeɛ ne tumi a ɛfiri soro; 11–17, Ɛwɔ sɛ wɔte fie no ho ma ɔsom ne Asomafoɔ no sukuu.

verses.text: Nokorɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade se mo a medɔ mo, na deɛ medɔ no na meka n’anim ama wɔde ne bɔne akyɛ no, ɛfiri sɛ menam nkanim so na mesiesie kwan ma wɔn nkwagyeɛ wɔ nneɛma nyina ara mu wɔ nsɔhwɛ mu, na madɔ mo—
Ɛno nti, ɛhia sɛ wɔtwe mo aso na wɔka mo anim wɔ m’anim;
Ɛfiri sɛ mode bɔne kɛseɛ ayɛ bɔne atia me, ɛfiri sɛ moankae mmarasɛm kɛseɛ no wɔ nneɛma nyina ara a mede ama mo no mu, ɛfa me fie no sie ho;

Na ayɛ ahosiesie a mabɔ me tirim pɔ sɛ ɛnsiesie m’asomafoɔ no ama wɔapompan me bobeturo nnua ho berɛ a ɛtwa toɔ yi, sɛdeɛ mɛtumi de m’anwanwa nnwuma no bɛba, ama matumi ahwie me Honhom no agu honam nyina ara so—
Nanso hwɛ, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, bebree wɔ hɔ a wɔahyɛ wɔn asɔfoɔ wɔ mo ntam, a mafrɛ wɔn nanso wɔn mu kakraabi na wɔayi wɔn.
Wɔn a wɔnyii wɔn no ayɛ bɔne a ɛyɛ bɔne kɛseɛ, ɛfiri sɛ wɔnante esum mu awia berɛ.
Na yei nti na memaa mo mmarasɛm sɛ monfrɛ mo nhyia kronkron, ama mo akomkyene ne mo sũ aforo aba Sabaot Awurade aso mu, deɛ ne nkyerɛaseɛ yɛ, da a ɛdi kan yɛfoɔ, mfitiaseɛ ne awieɛ no.
Aane, nokorɛ mese mo, memaa mo mmarasɛm sɛ monsi fie, saa fie no mu na mabɔ me tirim pɔ sɛ mede tumi akyɛdeɛ kronkron a ɛfiri soro bɛma wɔn a mayi wɔn no;
Ɛfiri sɛ yei yɛ Agya no bɔhyɛ ma mo; ne saa nti mehyɛ mo sɛ montwɛn, mpo te sɛ deɛ m’asomafoɔ no yɛeɛ wɔ Yerusalem no.
Nanso, me nkoa no yɛɛ bɔne a ɛyɛ bɔne kɛseɛ; na aperedie sɔree wɔ nkɔmhyɛfoɔ sukuu no mu; a na ɛyɛ bɔne kɛseɛ ma me, Awurade na ɔseɛ; ne saa nti mesomaa wɔn firii adi ama wɔatwe wɔn aso.
Nokorɛ mese mo, ɛyɛ me pɛ sɛ mobɛsi dan no. Sɛ modi me mmarasɛm so a mobɛnya tumi de asi.
Sɛ moanni me mmaransɛm so a, Agya no dɔ no nnkɔ so nka mo ho, ne saa nti mobɛnante esum mu.
Afei nyansa, ne Awurade adwene nie—momma wɔnsi fie, nnyɛ wiase yɔbea so, ɛfiri sɛ memmaa mo sɛ montena ase wɔ wiase kwan so;
Ne saa nti, momma wɔnsi no wɔ nhwɛsoɔ a mɛkyerɛ mo mu mmiɛnsa so, wɔn a mobɛyi na mobɛhyɛ wɔn asɔfoɔ ama saa tumi yi.
Na ne kɛseɛ bɛyɛ anammɔn aduonum ne num wɔ ne trɛtrɛtɛ mu, na ma ne tenten mu nyɛ aduosia num, wɔ abannwa no mu.
Na monte abannwa ne fã a ɛwɔ fam no ho mma akronkronneɛ afɔrebɔ, ne mo nsɛmpaka, ne mo akɔmkyene, ne mo mpaebɔ, ne mo apɛdeɛ kronkron pa ara a mode ma me, Awurade na ɔseɛ.
Na monte abannwa no fã a ɛwɔ soro no ho mma m’asomafoɔ no sukuu no, Ahman Ba na ɔseɛ; anaa, nsɛm foforɔ mu no, Alfo, anaa, nsɛm foforɔ mu no, Omego; mpo Yesu Kristo mo Awurade. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/96.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 96
chapter_summary: 1, Ɛwɔ sɛ wɔhyɛ Kirtland Sion Pɛɛwa no den; 2–5, Ɛwɔ sɛ ɔhwɛfoɔ no kyekyɛ apɛgyadeɛ no mu ma Ahotefoɔ no; 6–9, Ɛwɔ sɛ John Johnson bɛyɛ nkabom kuo no ba.

verses.text: Hwɛ, mese mo, nyansa nie, deɛ ɛnam so a mobɛtumi ahunu deɛ mobɛyɛ afa saa asɛm yi ho, ɛfiri sɛ ɛho hia ma me sɛ wɔbɛhyɛ saa pɛɛwa yi a masi ama Sion ahoɔden yi den.
Ne saa nti, momma m’akoa Newel K. Whitney nhwɛ bea a wɔabɔ din wɔ mu ntam no so, faako a mabɔ metirim sɛ wɔnsi me fie kronkron no.
Na bio, wɔmma wɔnkyekyɛ mu, sɛdeɛ ɛfata, mma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ apɛgyadeɛ, ntam agyinatuo bɛkyerɛ.
Ne saa nti, monhwɛ nni saa asɛm yi ho dwuma, ne saa kyɛfa a ɛbɛhia ama me kuo no mfasoɔ no, ama ɛde m’asɛm no afiri adi akɔ nnipa mma hɔ.
Ɛfiri sɛ hwɛ, nokorɛ mese mo, yei ne deɛ ɛho hia paa ara ma me, sɛ m’asɛm bɛfiri adi akɔ nnipa mma hɔ, ama abrɛ nnipa mma akoma ase ama mo yieyɛ. Mpo saa ara. Amen.

Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, ɛyɛ nyansa na ɛho hia ma me, sɛ m’akoa John Johnson a magye n’afɔrebɔ ato mu, na mate ne mpaebɔ no, a mema no nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ bɔhyɛ mmerɛ dodoɔ a ɔbɛdi me mmaransɛm so firi saa berɛ yi—
Ɛfiri sɛ ɔyɛ Yosef aseni na ɔbɛnya bɔhyɛ nhyira a wɔde hyɛɛ n’agyanom no mu kyɛfa—
Nokorɛ mese mo, ɛfata ma me sɛ ɔbɛyɛ kuo no ba, ama waboa ma wɔde m’asɛmpa no afiri adi akɔ nnipa mma hɔ.
Ne saa nti mobɛhyɛ no sɔfoɔ ama saa nhyira yi, na ɔde nsiyɛ bɛhwehwɛ ayi akwansideɛ biara a ɛwɔ me fie no so, deɛ wɔabɔ din wɔ mo ntam no, ama watumi atena mu. Mpo saa ara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/97.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 97
chapter_summary: 1–2, Wɔahyira Ahotefoɔ a wɔwɔ Sion (Jackson County, Missouri) mu pii ɛnam wɔn nokorɛdie nti; 3–5, Wɔkamfo Parley P. Pratt wɔ ne nnwumayɛ mu wɔ sukuu a ɛwɔ Sion no mu; 6–9, Awurade gye wɔn a wɔhwɛ di wɔn apam so no to mu; 10–17, Ɛwɔ sɛ wɔsi dan wɔ Sion, a ɛmu na wɔn a wɔn akoma mu teɛ no bɛhunu Onyankopɔn; 18–21, Sion yɛ wɔn a wɔn akoma mu teɛ; 22–28, Sion bɛfiri Awurade mpire ano sɛ ɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ a.

verses.text: Nokorɛ mese mo me nnamfo, sɛ mede me nne kasa kyerɛ mo, mpo me Honhom nne, ama makyerɛ mo me pɛ ɛfa mo nuanom a wɔwɔ Sion asase so ho, a nokorɛ mu, wɔn mu dodoɔ no ara yɛ ahobrɛaseɛfoɔ na wɔde nsiyɛ rehwɛhwɛ sɛ wɔbɛsua nyansa na wɔahwehwɛ nokorɛ no.

Nokorɛ, nokorɛ mese mo, nhyira nka wɔn a wɔte saa, ɛfiri sɛ wɔbɛnya; na me, Awurade, da mmɔborɔhunu adi kyerɛ wɔn a wɔdwoɔ nyina ara, ne obibiara a mepɛ, ama matumi adi bem berɛ a mede wɔn bɛba atemmuo mu.
Hwɛ, mese mo, ɛfa sukuu a ɛwɔ Sion no ho, me, Awurade, ɛsɔ m’ani sɛ wɔbɛyɛ sukuu wɔ Sion, ne m’akoa Parley P. Pratt nso, ɛfiri sɛ ɔte me mu.
Na mmerɛ dodoɔ a ɔkɔso tena me mu no, ɔbɛkɔ so ahwɛ sukuu a ɛwɔ Sion asase so no so kɔsi sɛ mɛma no mmaransɛm foforɔ.
Na mede nhyira mmɔho mmɔho bɛhyira no, wɔ twerɛsɛm ne ahintasɛm nkyerɛkyerɛ biara mu ama sukuu no so, na asɔre a ɛwɔ Sion no anya nkɔsoɔ.
Na wɔn a wɔbɛka wɔ sukuu no mu no, me, Awurade, mayɛ krado sɛ mɛhunu wɔn mmɔbɔ; nanso ebinom wɔ hɔ a ɛhia sɛ wɔtwe wɔn aso, na wɔbɛda wɔn nnwuma adi.
Wɔde akuma no ato dua no ase; ɛno nti dua biara a anso aba pa no wɔbɛtwa ato fam na wɔato agu ogya no mu. Me, Awurade, na maka.

Nokorɛ mese mo, wɔn a wɔwɔ wɔn ntam no nyina ara a wɔnim sɛ wɔn akoma yɛ nokorɛ, na ɛbubuo, na wɔn ahonhom abotoɔ, na wɔpɛ sɛ wɔfa afɔrebɔ so hwɛ di wɔn apam so no—aane, afɔdeɛ biara a, me, Awurade, mɛhyɛ no—megye wɔn to mu.
Ɛfiri sɛ me, Awurade, mɛyɛ ma wɔaso sɛ dua a ɛso aba pii a wɔadua wɔ asase pa so, wɔ asutene korɔgyeen ho, a ɛso aba a ɛsom bo kɛseɛ.
Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ ɛyɛ me pɛ sɛ wɔsi dan ma me wɔ Sion asase so, te sɛ nhwɛsoɔ a mede ama mo no.
Aane, momma wɔnsi no ntɛmso, nam me nkorɔfoɔ no ntotosoɔ du du so.
Hwɛ, yei yɛ ntotosoɔ du du ne afɔdeɛ a me, Awurade, hwehwɛ firi wɔn nsam, ama wɔasi fie ama me ama Sion nkwagyeɛ—
Ama ayɛ aseda bea ama ahotefoɔ nyina ara, ne nkyerɛkyerɛ bea ama wɔn a wɔafrɛ wɔn aba ɔsom adwuma no mu nyina ara, wɔ wɔn frɛ ne wɔn diberɛ ahodoɔ nyina ara mu;

Ama wɔatumi ayɛ pɛpɛ wɔ nteaseɛ mu wɔ wɔn som adwuma ho, wɔ nkyerɛkyerɛmu mu, wɔ nyinasosɛm mu, wɔ nkyerɛkyerɛ mu, wɔ nneɛma nyina ara mu a ɛfa Onyankopɔn aheman ho wɔ asase so, a wɔde ne nsafoa ama mo no.
Na sɛ me nkurɔfoɔ si dan ma me wɔ Awurade din mu, na wɔmma ho kwan mma adeɛ a ɛho nteɛ biara amma mu, angu ho fi a, m’animuonyam bɛwɔ so.
Aane, na m’anim bɛba hɔ, ɛfiri sɛ mɛba mu, na wɔn a wɔn akoma mu teɛ nyina ara a wɔbɛba mu no bɛhunu Onyankopɔn.
Nanso sɛ wɔgu ho fi a meremma mu, na m’animuonyam remma hɔ; ɛfiri sɛ meremma tɛmpol a ɛnnyɛ kronkron mu.
Na, afei, hwɛ, sɛ Sion yɛ saa nneɛma yi a ɔbɛdi yie, na ɔbɛdɔre abɛnya animuonyam kɛseɛ, ayɛ kɛseɛ na ne ho ayɛ hũ pa ara.
Na asase so aman bɛdi no nni, na wɔbɛka sɛ: Ampa Sion yɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn kuropɔn, na ampa Sion ntumi nhwe ase, anaa wɔrenyi no mfiri ne tenabea, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ hɔ, na Awurade nsa wɔ hɔ;
Na ɔnam n’ahoɔden tumi so aka ntam sɛ ɔbɛyɛ ne nkwagyeɛ ne n’abantenten a ɛkorɔn.
Ne saa nti, nokorɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ nie, momma Sion nni ahurisie, ɛfiri sɛ yei ne Sion—wɔn a wɔn akoma mu teɛ; ne saa nti, momma Sion nni ahurisie, na atirimuɔdenfoɔ nyina ara nsũ.
Ɛfiri sɛ hwɛ, na hunu, awerɛtɔ reba abɔnefoɔ so ntɛm so te sɛ kyinhyia mframa; na hwan na ɔbɛfiri mu afi?
Na Awurade mpire bɛtwam anadwo ne adekyeɛ, na ɛho kaseɛ bɛbɔ aman nyina ara hu; aane, wɔrensi no kwan kɔsi sɛ Awurade bɛba;
Ɛfiri sɛ Awurade abuhuro redɛre tia wɔn akyiwadeɛ ne wɔn atirimuɔden nnwuma nyina ara.
Nanso, Sion bɛfiri mu afi sɛ ɔhwɛ yɛ nneɛma biara a mahyɛ no nyina ara a.
Nanso sɛ wanhwɛ anyɛ biribiara a mahyɛ no a, mɛsra no sɛdeɛ ne nnwuma nyina ara teɛ, mede amanehunu a ɛyɛ ya, ne owuyadeɛ, ne ɔyaredɔm, ne akofena, ne awerɛtɔ, ne ogyatannaa.
Nanso, ma wɔnkan no prɛko pɛ ngu n’asom, sɛ me, Awurade, agye n’afɔdeɛ; na sɛ wanyɛ bɔne bio a saa nneɛma yi mu biara remma ne so;
Na mede nhyira bɛhyira no, na mama nhyira adɔre wɔ ne so, ne n’awoɔntoatoasoɔ so afebɔɔ ne afebɔɔ, Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/98.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 98
chapter_summary: 1–3, ahotefoɔ no amanehunu no bɛyɛ ama wɔn yiedie; 4–8, Ɛwɔ sɛ Ahotefoɔ no fa asase no amanyɔ mmara no adamfo; 9–10, Ɛwɔ sɛ wɔtae nnipa nokorɛfoɔ, nyansafoɔ ne nnipa papa akyi ma wɔnya aban mu nnisoɔ; 11–15, Wɔn a wɔde wɔn nkwa to hɔ ma Awurade adwuma no bɛnya nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ; 16–18, Mompo ɔko na mommɔ asomdwoeɛ ho dawuro; 19–22, Wɔka Ahotefoɔ a wɔwɔ Kirtland no anim na wɔhyɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnsakyera; 23–32, Awurade da ne mmara a ɛfa taaeɛ ne amanehunu a wɔde ato Ne nkorɔfoɔ so no adi; 33–38, Ɔko a Awurade ahyɛ nko ara na ɛyɛ; 39–48, Ɛwɔ sɛ Ahotefoɔ no de kyɛ wɔn atamfo, na sɛ wɔn nso sakyera a wɔbɛfiri Awurade awerɛtɔ mu.

verses.text: Nokorɛ mese mo me nnamfo, monnsuro, momma mo akoma werɛ nkyekyere; aane, monni ahurisie daa, na ade nyina ara mu no momfa aseda mma;
Berɛ a moretwɛn Awurade wɔ aboterɛ mu, ɛfiri sɛ mo mpaebɔ awura Sabaot Awurade aso mu, na wɔde saa nsɔano ne apam atwerɛ—Awurade aka ntam na wahyɛ sɛ wɔde bɛma mo.
Ne saa nti, ɔde apam a ɛnsesa da ma mo saa bɔhyɛ yi, ama wɔahyɛ yeinom ma; na nneɛma a wɔde aha mo no nyina ara bɛbɔ mu adi dwuma ama mo yieyɛ, na ama me din animuonyam, Awurade na ɔseɛ.
Na afei, nokorɛ mese mo ɛfa asase no mmara ho, ɛyɛ me pɛ sɛ me nkurɔfoɔ bɛhwɛ ayɛ nneɛma biara a mehyɛ wɔn no nyina ara.
Na saa asase no mmara a ɛyɛ amanmmara, a ɛfoa ahofadie nyinasosɛm a ɛkora hokwan ne akwanya no yɛ adasamma nyina ara deɛ, na wɔgye to mu wɔ m’anim.
Ne saa nti, me, Awurade, bu mo ne mo nuanom a wɔwɔ m’asɔre no mu bem, ɛnam sɛ mode moafa saa mmara a ɛyɛ asase no amanyɔ mmara no adamfo;
Na deɛ ɛfa onipa mmara ho no, biribiara a ɛdɔɔso anaa ɛsua sene yei no firi bɔne mu.
Me, Awurade Nyankopɔn, ma mode mo ho, ne saa nti moade mo ho ampa; na mmara no nso ma mode mo ho.
Nanso, sɛ atirimuɔdenfoɔ di tumi a nkorɔfoɔ no su.
Ɛno nti, ɛwɔ sɛ wɔde nsiyɛ hwehwɛ nnipa nokorɛfoɔ ne nnipa anyansafoɔ, na ɛwɔ sɛ mohwɛ gyina nnipa papa ne nnipa anyansafoɔ akyi; anyɛ saa a deɛ ɛsua anaa ɛso sene yeinom no firi bɔne mu.
Na mema mo mmarasɛm sɛ mompa bɔne nyina ara akyi na momfam papa nyina ara, ama moatena ase nam asɛm biara a ɛfiri Onyankopɔn anomu ba no so.
Ɛfiri sɛ ɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ nokorɛfoɔ no nkakrankakra, firi nkyerɛkyerɛ so akɔ nkyerɛkyerɛ so; na mede yei bɛsɔ mo ahwɛ na mede akari mo.
Na obiara a ɔde ne nkwa bɛto hɔ ama m’adwuma, me din nti, bɛsan anya no bio, mpo nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ.

Ne saa nti, mma mo nsuro mo atamfo, ɛfiri sɛ mahyɛ wɔ m’akoma mu sɛ, Awurade na ɔseɛ, mɛsɔ mo ahwɛ wɔ nneɛma nyina ara mu, sɛ mobɛtumi agyina wɔ m’apam mu, mpo kɔsi owuo mu a, ama wɔatumi ahunu sɛ mofata.
Ɛfiri sɛ sɛ morenntena m’apam mu a momfata mma me.
Ne saa nti, mompo ɔko na mommɔ asomdwoeɛ ho dawuro, na momfa nsiyɛ nhwehwɛ sɛ wobɛdane mma no akoma akɔ agyanom so, na agyanom akoma akɔ mma no so;
Na bio, Yudafoɔ no akoma nkɔ nkɔmhyɛfo no so, na nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no nkɔ Yudafoɔ no so; anyɛ saa a mɛba na mede nnome bɛbɔ wiase nyina ara, na honam nyina ara bɛsɛe wɔ m’anim.
Mma mo akoma ntutu; ɛfiri sɛ tenabea pii wɔ m’Agya fie, na masiesie bea ama mo; na faako a mene m’Agya wɔ no, mo nso mo bɛba hɔ bi.
Hwɛ, me, Awurade, pii wɔ asɔre a ɛwɔ Kirtland no mu a wɔnsɔ m’ani yie;

Ɛfiri sɛ wɔmpa wɔn bɔne akyi, ne wɔn atirimuɔden akwan, wɔn akoma mu ahantan, ne wɔn anibereɛsɛm, ne wɔn tantanneɛ nneɛma nyina ara, na wɔnhwɛ nni nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ ne anyansasɛm a mede ama wɔn no so.
Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ me, Awurade, mɛka wɔn anim na mɛyɛ biribiara a mepɛ, sɛ wɔansakyera na wɔanhwɛ anyɛ nneɛma biara a maka akyerɛ wɔn no nyina ara a.
Na bio mese mo, sɛ mohwɛ yɛ biribiara a mahyɛ mo a, me, Awurade, mɛdane abufuhyeɛ ne abuhuro biara afiri mo so, na asamando apono rentumi nni mo so.
Afei, mekasa kyerɛ mo fa mo mmusua ho—sɛ nnipa bɔ mo, anaa mo mmusua, mprɛ baako, na sɛ mode aboterɛ gyina ano na moansopa wɔn, anaa moanhwehwɛ awerɛtɔ a, wɔbɛma mo ɛho akatua;
Na sɛ moanya aboterɛ annyina ano a, wɔbɛbu no sɛ ɛyɛ nsusuiɛ a ɛfata a wɔde ama mo.
Na bio, sɛ mo atamfo bɔ mo ne mprenu so, na moansopa mo tamfo, na mode aboterɛ gyina ano a, mo akatua bɛyɛ mmɔho ɔha.
Na bio, sɛ ɔbɔ mo mprɛnsa so, na sɛ mode aboterɛ gyina ano a, wɔbɛbɔ mo akatua ho mmienu na ayɛ mmɔho nnan;
Na saa adanseɛ mmiɛnsa yi bɛsɔre atia mo tamfo sɛ wansakyera a, na wɔrempopa.

Na afei, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, sɛ saa tamfo no bɛfiri m’awerɛtɔ mu, na wɔamfa no amma atemmuo mu wɔ m’anim a, ɛnneɛ mobɛhwɛ sɛ mobɛbɔ no kɔkɔ wɔ me din mu, ama wamma mo so bio, anaa mo abusua so, mpo mo mma mma so kɔsi awoɔntoatoasoɔ mmiɛnsa ne nnan so.
Na afei, sɛ ɔba mo so anaa mo mma so, anaa mo mma mma so kɔsi awoɔntoatoasoɔ mmiɛnsa ne nnan so a, ɛnneɛ mede mo tamfo ahyɛ wo nsa;
Na afei sɛ wode ne ho bɛkyɛ no a, wo teneneeyɛ nti wɔbɛma wo akatua; ɛne wo mma ne wo mma mma nso kɔsi awoɔntoatoasoɔ mmiɛnsa ne nnan so.
Nanso, wo tamfo no wɔ wo nsam; na sɛ wotua no ka sɛdeɛ ne nnwuma teɛ a wodi bem; sɛ wahwehwɛ wo nkwa, na ɔde wo nkwa kɔ mmusuo mu a, wo tamfo no wɔ wo nsam na wodi bem.
Hwɛ, yei ne mmara a mede maa m’akoa Nifae, ne w’agyanom, Yosef, ne Yakob, ne Isak, ne Abraham, ne me tete nkɔmhyɛfoɔ ne asomafoɔ no nyina ara.
Na bio, yei ne mmara a mede maa me tetefoɔ no, sɛ mma wɔmmfiri nkɔko ntia ɔman, abusua kuo, kasa, nkorɔfoɔ biara, gye sɛ me, Awurade, ahyɛ wɔn.
Na sɛ ɔman, kasa, anaa nkorɔfoɔ bi bɔ ɔko ho dawuro tia mo a, ɛwɔ sɛ wɔdi kan ma asomdwoeɛ frankaa so kyerɛ saa nkorɔfoɔ, ɔman, anaa kasa no;
Na sɛ saa nkorɔfoɔ no annye asomdwoeɛ afɔdeɛ no anto mu, anaa deɛ ɛtɔ so mmienu anaa mmiɛnsa no a, wɔmfa saa adanseɛ yi mmra Awurade anim;
Afei me, Awurade, mɛma wɔn mmarasɛm, na mɛbu wɔn bem sɛ wɔmfiri adi nkɔko ntia saa ɔman, kasa, anaa nkorɔfoɔ no.
Na me, Awurade, mɛko wɔn ko no, ne wɔn mma ko, ne wɔn mma mma deɛ, kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛtɔ wɔn atamfo nyina ara so werɛ, kɔsi awoɔntoatoasoɔ mmiɛnsa ne nnan so.
Hwɛ, yei yɛ nhwɛsoɔ ma aman nyina ara, Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ, ama wɔabu wɔn bem wɔ m’anim.
Na bio, nokorɛ, mese wo sɛ, sɛ wo tamfo ba wo so berɛ a ɛdi kan na akyire ɔsakyera na ɔba wo hɔ bɛsrɛ bɔnefakyɛ a, fakyɛ no, na mfa nni adanseɛ ntia wo tamfo no bio—
Na saa ara kɔsi deɛ ɛtɔ so mmienu ne mmiɛnsa so no; na mprɛ dodoɔ a wo tamfo sakyera firi ne mfomsoɔ a wayɛ atia wo no ho ɛwɔ sɛ wode kyɛ no, kɔsi mprɛ aduɔson ahodoɔ nson.
Na sɛ ɔyɛ mfomsoɔ tia wo na wansakyera berɛ a ɛdi kan no a, fakyɛ no.
Na sɛ ɔyɛ mfomsoɔ tia wo na wansakyera berɛ a ɛtɔ so mmienu no a, fakyɛ no bio.
Na sɛ ɔyɛ mfomsoɔ tia wo berɛ ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa, na wannsakyera a, ɛno nso fakyɛ no.

Mmom sɛ ɔyɛ mfomsoɔ tia wo berɛ a ɛtɔ so nnan no a mfa nkyɛ no, na fa saa adanseɛ yi bra Awurade anim; na wɔremmpopa kɔsi sɛ ɔbɛsakyera na ɔbɛtua wo ka mmɔho nnan wɔ nneɛma a wayɛ ho mfomsoɔ atia wo nyina ara mu.
Na sɛ ɔyɛ yei a, yi wo akoma mu nyina ara fakyɛ no; na sɛ wannyɛ yei a, me, Awurade, mɛtɔ ne werɛ ama wo mmɔho ɔha;
Ne ne mma so, ne ne mma mma so, wɔn mu biara a wɔtan me, kɔsi awoɔntoatoasoɔ mmiɛnsa ne nan so.

Nanso sɛ mma no sakyera, anaa mma mma no sakyera, na wɔdane kɔ Awurade wɔn Nyankopɔn hɔ a, wɔde wɔn akoma nyina ara ne wɔn tumi, wɔn adwene, ne wɔn ahoɔden nyina ara, na wɔsan de ma mmɔho nnan wɔ mfomsoɔ a wɔayɛ nyina ara mu, anaa mfomsoɔ a wɔn agyanom ayɛ mu, anaa deɛ wɔn agyanom agyanom ayɛ a, afei m’abuhuro bɛdane akɔ;
Na awerɛtɔ remma wɔn so bio, Awurade wo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ, wɔremmfa wɔn mfomsoɔ mma da sɛ adanseɛ ntia wɔn bio wɔ Awurade anim. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/99.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 99
chapter_summary: 1–8, WɔfrɛJohn Murdock sɛ ɔmmɔ asɛmpa no ho dawuro, na wɔn a wɔgye no gye Awurade na wɔbɛhunu wɔn mmɔbɔ.

verses.text: Hwɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade se m’akoa John Murdock nie—wɔafrɛ wo sɛ kɔ apueɛ aman no mu, kɔ afie afie mu, firi akuraa kɔ akuraa ase, na firi kuropɔn kɔ kuropɔn, na bɔ me daapem asɛmpa no ho dawuro ma ɛmutefoɔ no, wɔ ɔtaaeɛ ne atirimuɔdensɛm mu.
Na deɛ ɔgye wo no gye me; na wobɛnya tumi de m’asɛm no ato dwa wɔ Honhom kronkron no yɛkyerɛ mu.
Na wɔn a wɔgye wo sɛ abɔfra ketewa no, gye m’aheman; na nhyira ne wɔn, ɛfiri sɛ wɔbɛhunu wɔn mmɔbɔ.
Na obiara a ɔpo wo no Agya no bɛpo no ne ne fie; na wobɛprapra wo nan ho wɔ kokoa mu wɔ kwan ho sɛ adanseɛ atia no.
Na hwɛ, na hunu, mereba ntɛmso abɛbu atɛn, ama obiara agye wɔn nneyɛɛ bɔne a wɔayɛ atia me no adi, sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ afa me ho wɔ nwoma kɛseɛ no mu.
Na afei, nokorɛ mese wo sɛ ɛmfata sɛ wobɛkɔ kɔsi sɛ wobɛma wo mma deɛ wɔhia, na woasoma de wɔn akɔma Sion hwɛfoɔ no wɔ ayamyɛ mu.
Na mfeɛ kakra akyire no, sɛ wopɛ firi me hɔ a, wo nso wobɛkɔ asase pa no so, akɔdi wo apɛgyadeɛ so;
Sɛ ɛnte saa a wobɛkɔ so abɔ m’asɛmpa no ho dawuro kɔsi sɛ Awurade bɛfa wo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/100.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 100
chapter_summary: 1–4, Joseph ne Sidney ka asɛmpa no ma akra nkwagyeɛ; 5–8, Wɔde bɛma wɔn wɔ dɔnhwere no ara mu deɛ ɛwɔ sɛ wɔka; 9–12, Ɛwɔ sɛ Sidney yɛ ɔkasamafo na Joseph yɛ ɔdiyifoɔ ne ɔdansedini kɛseɛ; 13–17, Awurade bɛtete nkorɔfoɔ a wɔn akoma mu teɛ, na wɔbɛgye wɔn a wɔyɛ setie no nkwa.

verses.text: Nokorɛ, sei na Awurade se mo, me nnamfo Sidney ne Joseph, mo mmusuafoɔ ho yɛ; wɔwɔ me nsam, na mɛyɛ wɔn sɛdeɛ ɛyɛ ma me; ɛfiri sɛ me mu na tumi nyina ara wɔ.
Ne saa nti, monni m’akyi, na montie afotuo a mede bɛma mo.
Hwɛ, na hunu, mewɔ nkorɔfoɔ bebree wɔ saa bea yi, wɔ amantam a atwa ahyia no mu; na wɔbɛbue ɛpono a ɛdi mũ wɔ amantam a atwa ahyia wɔ saa apueɛ asase yi so.
Ne saa nti, me, Awurade, ama ho kwan ma woaba saa bea yi; ɛfiri sɛ na ɛfata ma me ɛnam akra nkwagyeɛ nti.
Ne saa nti, nokorɛ mese mo, momma mo nne so wɔ saa nkorɔfoɔ yi so; monka adwene a mede bɛhyɛ mo akoma mu no, na moani rennwu wɔ nnipa anim;
Ɛfiri sɛ wɔde bɛma mo dɔnhwere no ara, aane, berɛ korɔ no ara mu, deɛ mobɛka.
Mmom mmarasɛm a mede ma mo, sɛ biribiara a mode bɛto dwa no momfa nto dwa wɔ me din mu, wɔ anidahɔ akoma mu, wɔ ɔdwoɔ honhom mu, wɔ nneɛma nyina ara mu.
Na mema mo saa bɔhyɛ yi sɛ, mmerɛ dodoɔ a moyɛ yei no wɔbɛsoma Sunsum Kronkron no ma biribibiara a mobɛka biara no wadi ho adanseɛ.
Na ɛfata wɔ me mu sɛ m’akoa Sidney bɛyɛ kasamafoɔ ama saa nkurɔfoɔ yi; aane, nokorɛ, mɛhyɛ wo sɔfoɔ ama saa frɛ yi, mpo sɛ wobɛyɛ kasamafo ama m’akoa Joseph.
Na mɛma no tumi ma wabɛyɛ ɔdansedini kɛseɛ.
Na mɛma wo tumi na woabɛyɛ kɛseɛ wɔ twerɛsɛm no nkyerɛkyerɛ mu, ama woabɛyɛ kasamafo ama no, na ɔbɛyɛ diyifoɔ ama wo, ama woahunu nneɛma nyina ara nokorɛ mu, nneɛma a ɛfa m’aheman ho wɔ asase yi so.
Ne saa nti, montoa mo akwantuo no so na moni ahurusie wɔ mo akoma mu; ɛfiri sɛ hwɛ, na hunu, meka mo ho mpo de kɔsi awieɛ.
Na afei me ma mo asɛm bi ɛfa Sion ho. Wɔbɛgye Sion, ɛmfa ho sɛ wɔretwe n’aso berɛ tia.
Wo nuanom, me nkoa Orson Hyde ne John Gould, wɔ me nsam; na mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔdi me mmaransɛm so no wɔbɛgye wɔn nkwa.
Ne saa nti, monkyekyere mo akoma werɛ; ɛfiri sɛ nneɛma nyina ara bɛbom adi aboa ma awie wɔn a wɔnante tenenee mu no yie, na ama asɔre no anya ahoteɛ.
Ɛfiri sɛ mɛtete nkurɔfoɔ a wɔn ho te ama me ho, wɔn a wɔbɛsom me tenenee mu;
Na wɔn a wɔfrɛ Awurade din nyina ara, na wɔdi ne mmaransɛm soɔ no, wɔbɛgye wɔn nkwa. Mpo saa ara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/101.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 101
chapter_summary: 1–8, Wɔtwe ahotefoɔ no aso na wɔha wɔn esiane wɔn mmaratoɔ nti; 9–15, Awurade abohuro bɛgu aman so, nanso wɔbɛboaboa Ne nkorɔfoɔ ano na wɔakyekye wɔn werɛ; 16–21, Wɔbɛkyekyere Sion ne ne mpɛɛwa; 22–31, Wɔda asetena su a ɛbɛwɔ Mfenhyia apem no mu no adi; 32–42, Wɔbɛhyira Ahotefoɔ no na wɔama wɔn akatua; 43–62, Abebusɛm a ɛfa nipa nimuonyamfoɔ no ne ngo nnua no kyerɛ Sion amanehunu ne ne Gyeɛ a ɛbɛdi akyire no ho; 63–75, Ɛwɔ sɛ ahotefoɔ no kɔ so boaboa wɔn ho ano; 76–80, Awurade na ɔhyehyɛɛ Amerika Amanyɔ mmara no; 81–101, Ɛwɔ sɛ Ahotefoɔ no srɛ wɔn nsɛm no ho akatua, sɛdeɛ abebusɛm a ɛfa ɔbaa no ne ɔtemmufoɔ otirimuɔdenfoɔ no ho teɛ no.

verses.text: Nokorɛ mese mo, ɛfa mo nuanom a wɔaha wɔn, na wɔataataa wɔn, na wɔato wɔn afiri wɔn apɛgyadeɛ asase so no—
Me, Awurade, na mama ho kwan ma ɔhaw a wɔde aha wɔn no aba wɔn so, ɛnam wɔn mmaratoɔ nti;
Nanso mɛyɛ wɔn wura, na wɔbɛyɛ me dea wɔ saa da no a mɛba abɛyi m’abohene no.
Ne saa nti, ɛhia sɛ wɔtwe wɔn aso na wɔsɔ wɔn hwɛ, mpo te sɛ Abraham, a wɔhyɛɛ no sɛ ɔmfa ne ba baako pɛ mmɔ afɔdeɛ no.
Ɛfiri sɛ wɔn a wɔrentumi nnyina asotwe ano, na wɔpo me no, wɔrentumi nte wɔn ho.
Hwɛ, mese mo, na abufuferɛ, ne aperedie, ne ahoɔyaa, ne nitan, ne akɔnnɔ bɔne ne anibereɛ apɛdeɛ wɔ wɔn ntam; ne saa nti wɔnam saa nneɛma yi so guu wɔn apɛgyadeɛ ho fi.
Wɔyɛɛ nyaa sɛ wɔbɛtie Awurade wɔn Nyankopɔn nne; ne saa nti, Awurade wɔn Nyankopɔn ayɛ nyaa sɛ ɔbɛtie wɔn mpaebɔ, sɛ ɔbɛma wɔn mmuaeɛ wɔ wɔn haw da mu.
Wɔ wɔn asomdwoeɛ da mu no wɔbuu m’afotuo adewa; nanso wɔ wɔn haw da mu no, ɛnam wɔn ahiasɛm nti wɔpɛ m’akyiri kwan.
Nokorɛ mese mo, ɛmfa ho ne wɔn bɔne, ayamhyehyeɛ ahyɛ me yam mã ama wɔn. Merenyi wɔn totwene korakora; na wɔ m’abuhyeɛ da mu no mɛkae mmɔborɔhunu.
Maka ntam, na ahyɛdeɛ no afiri akɔ nam mmarasɛm dada bi a mede ama mo so, sɛ mɛma m’abohuro afena agu ama me nkorɔfoɔ; na mpo te sɛ deɛ maka no, ɛbɛba mu.
Ɛrenkyɛ wɔbɛhwie m’abuhuro a nsusuieɛ biara nni mu agu aman nyina ara so; na mɛyɛ yei berɛ a wɔn amumuyɔ kuruwa bɛyɛ ma.
Na saa da no wɔn a wɔbɛhunu wɔn wɔ ɔwɛn-aban no so, anaa nsɛm foforɔ mu no, me Israel nyina ara no, wɔbɛgye wɔn nkwa.
Na wɔbɛboaboa wɔn a wɔabɔ wɔn apete no ano.
Na wɔn a wɔasu nyina ara no wɔbɛkyekye wɔn werɛ.
Na wɔn a me din nti wɔde wɔn nkwa ama nyina ara no wɔbɛhyɛ wɔn ahenkyɛ.
Ne saa nti, momma mo akoma werɛ nkyekyere mfa Sion ho; ɛfiri sɛ honam nyina ara wɔ me nsam; monyɛ komm na monhunu sɛ meyɛ Onyankopɔn.
Wɔrennyi Sion mmfiri ne tenabea, ɛmfa ho sɛ wɔabɔ ne mma apete.
Wɔn a wɔaka, na wɔn akoma mu teɛ no bɛsan aba, na wɔbɛba wɔn apɛgyadeɛ so, wɔne wɔn mma, wɔde daapem anigyeɛ nnwom, bɛba abɛsi Sion amanfo no—
Na yei nyina ara sɛdeɛ nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no bɛhyɛ ma.
Na, hwɛ, bea foforɔ biara nni hɔ a wɔayi gye sɛ deɛ mayi ama; anaa wɔrennyi bea foforɔ biara mma gye sɛ deɛ mayi ama ahotefoɔ anoboaboa adwuma no—
Kɔsi sɛ da no bɛba a wɔbɛhunu sɛ kwan nni hɔ bio ma wɔn; na afei mewɔ mmea afoforɔ a mɛyi ama wɔn, na wɔbɛfrɛ no pɛɛwa, a ɛbɛyɛ mmɔhɔɔ anaa Sion ahoɔden.
Hwɛ, ɛyɛ me pɛ, sɛ wɔn a wɔfrɛ me din, na wɔsom me sɛdeɛ daapem asɛmpa no teɛ no, bɛboaboa wɔn ho, na wɔagyina mmea kronkron;
Na wɔnyɛ krado mma adiyisɛm a ɛbɛba no, berɛ a wɔbɛyi nkatanim a ɛkata tɛmpol tenabea no, a ɛde asase no asie no, afiri hɔ, na ɔhonam nyina ara bɛbɔ mu ahunu me.
Na adeɛ biara a ɛporɔ, nnipa, anaa wuram mmoa nyina ara, anaa ewiem nnomaa, anaa ɛpo mu mpataa, a wɔte asase ani so nyina ara no, wɔbɛsɛe wɔn;
Na deɛ ɛyɛ ankomadeɛ nso de ɔhyeɛ denden bɛnane; na nneɛma nyina ara bɛba abɛyɛ foforɔ, ama me ho nimdeɛ ne m’animuonyam atumi atena asase yi nyina ara so.
Na saa da no, onipa mu ɔtan, ne mmoa mu tan, aane, honam nyina ara mu tan, bɛgyae afiri m’anim.
Na saa da no biribibiara a onipa biara bɛbisa no, wɔde bɛma no.
Na saa da no Satan rennya tumi sɛ ɔbɛsɔ onipa biara ahwɛ.
Na awerɛhoɔ biara nni hɔ ɛfiri sɛ owuo nni hɔ.
Na saa da no akɔkoaa renwu kɔsi sɛ ɔbɛnyini; na ne nkwa bɛyɛ te sɛ dua mfeɛ;
Na sɛ owu a ɔrenna, kyerɛ sɛ wɔ asase so, mmom wɔ anibu baako mu no ɔbɛsesa, na wɔbɛhwim no akɔ soro, na n’ahomegyeɛ bɛyɛ animuonyam.
Aane, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, saa da no a Awurade bɛba no, ɔbɛda nneɛma nyina ara adi—
Nneɛma a atwa mu kɔ, ne nneɛma a ahinta a onipa biara nnim, asase so nneɛma deɛ wɔnam so yɛɛe, ne ne botaeɛ ne ne sɛnti—
Nneɛma a ɛsom bo paa ara, nneɛma a ɛwɔ soro, ne nneɛma a ɛwɔ aseɛ, nneɛma a ɛwɔ asase mu, ne deɛ ɛwɔ asase so, ne deɛ ɛwɔ ɔsoro.
Na wɔn a wɔhunu ɔtaae amaneɛ wɔ me din mu nyina ara, na wɔgyina wɔ gyedie mu kɔsi awieɛ, ɛwom sɛ wɔafrɛ wɔn sɛ wɔmfa wɔn nkwa nto hɔ ɛnam me nti, nanso wɔbɛnya saa animuonyam no nyina ara mu kyɛfa.
Ɛno nti, owuo mu mpo monnsuro; ɛfiri sɛ wɔ saa wiase yi mu no mo dɛ nnhyɛ ma, nanso wɔ me mu no mo modɛ hyɛ ma.
Ne saa nti, monnhwɛ honamdua no, anaa honam no nkwa ho; mmom monhwɛ ɔkra no, ne ɔkra no nkwa ho.
Na monhwehwɛ Awurade anim berɛbiara, ama mode aboterɛ akora mo akra, na mobɛnya nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ.
Na sɛ wɔfrɛ nnipa ba me daapem asɛmpa no ho, na wɔde daapem apam yɛ apam a, wɔbu wɔn sɛ asase so nkyene ne nnipa mu dɛ;
Wɔfrɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnyɛ nnipa mu dɛ; ne saa nti, sɛ asase so nkyene yera ne dɛ a, hwɛ, ɛnnyɛ mma hwee bio gye sɛ wɔhwie gu ma nnipa de wɔn nan ase tiatia so.
Hwɛ, nyansa nie, ɛfa Sion mma ho, mpo dodoɔ no ara ho, nnyɛ wɔn nyina ara; wɔhunuu mmaratofoɔ wɔ wɔn mu, ne saa nti ɛhia sɛ wɔtwe wɔn aso.
Deɛ ɔma ne ho so no wɔbɛbrɛ no ase, na deɛ ɔbrɛ ne ho ase no wɔbɛma no so.
Na afei, mɛkyerɛ mo abebɛbusɛm bi, ama moahunu me pɛ ɛfa Sion gyeɛ ho.
Na ɔdehyeɛ bi wɔ asase bi, a ɛsom bo; na ɔka kyerɛɛ ne nkoa sɛ: Monkɔ me bobeturo no mu, mpo asase a ɛsom bo paa ara no so, na monnua ngodua dumienu;

Na ɔmaa awɛmfoɔ twaa ho hyiaaeɛ, na ɔsii ɔwɛn aban, ama obi ahwɛ asase a atwa ahyia no so, na wayɛ ɔwɛmfoɔ wɔ abantenten no so, ama me ngonnua no ammubu berɛ a ɔtamfo no bɛba sɛ ɔrebɛsɛe na ɔrebɛfa me bobeturo no mu aba no.
Afei, ɔdehyeɛ no nkoa kɔ kɔyɛɛ sɛdeɛ wɔn wura hyɛɛ wɔn no, na wɔduaa ngonnua no, na wɔgyee ho ban, na wɔde awɛmfoɔ baa hɔ, na wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔresi abantenten.
Na wɔgu so a wɔreto fapem no, wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ kaa no wɔn mu sɛ: Na mfasoɔ bɛn na saa abantenten yi wɔ ma yɛn wura?
Na wɔdii nkɔmmɔ kyɛɛeɛ, na wɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn ho wɔn ho sɛ: Deɛn na me wura hia wɔ saa abantenten yi ho, esiane sɛ yei yɛ asomdwoeɛ berɛ?
Wɔnntumi mmfa saa sika yi nkɔma sikasesafoɔ no? Ɛfiri sɛ saa nneɛma yi ho nhia.
Berɛ a wɔgu so regye wɔn ho kyim no wɔbɛyɛɛ aniha, na wɔanni wɔn wura mmaransɛm no so.
Na ɔtamfo no baa anadwo, na ɔbubuu ban no guu fam; na onimuonyamfoɔ no nkoa no sɔreeɛ na wɔsurooɛ, na wɔdwaneeɛ; ɔtamfo no sɛee wɔn nnwuma, na ɔbubuu ngonnua no.
Afei, hwɛ, onimuonyamfoɔ no, bobeturo no wura no frɛɛ ne nkoa, na ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ, Adɛn! Deɛn na ɛde saa bɔne kɛseɛ yi baaeɛ?

Na anka ɛnnsɛ sɛ moyɛ deɛ mehyɛɛ mo no mpo, na—moduaa bobeturo no akyire no, na mogyee ban twaa ho hyiaaɛ no, na mode awɛmfoɔ sisii aban no so no—adɛn nti na moansi abantenten no nso, na moamfa ɔwɛmfoɔ ansi abantenten no so, na wanhwɛ me bobeturo no so, ama moanneda, sɛdeɛ ɔtamfoɔ no rentumi mma mo so?

Na hwɛ, anka ɔwɛmfoɔ a ɔwɔ abantenten no so no bɛhunu ɔtamfoɔ no berɛ a ɔwɔ akyirikyiri; na afei anka mobɛtumi ayɛ krado na moatumi asi ɔtamfo no kwan ama wɔammu aban no anngu fam, na anka moatumi agye me bobeturo no afiri ɔsɛefoɔ no nsam.

Na bobeturo no wura see ne nkoa no mu baako sɛ: Kɔ na kɔboaboa me nkoa a wɔaka no ano, na fa ahoɔdenfoɔ a wɔwɔ me fie nyina ara, wɔn a wɔyɛ akofoɔ, mmeranteɛ, ne wɔn a wɔn ani afiri wɔ me nkoa nyina ara ntam, a wɔyɛ me fie ahoɔdenfoɔ no, gye sɛ wɔn a mayi wɔn nko ara sɛ wɔntena hɔ no.
Na ntɛmpa ara monkɔ asase a ɛyɛ me bobeturo no so, na monkɔgye me bobeturo no; ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ me dea; mede sika na atɔ.
Ne saa nti, ntɛmpa yi ara monkɔ m’asase no so; na mommubu m’atamfo aban no ngu fam; mommu wɔn abantenten no ngu fam, na mommɔ wɔn awɛmfoɔ no ahwete.
Na mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔboaboa wɔn ho ano tia mo no, montɔ m’atamfo so werɛ, ama nkakrankakra m’atumi de me fiefoɔ nkaeɛ no aba na manya asase no adi so.
Na akoa no see ne wura sɛ: Berɛ bɛn na saa nneɛma yi bɛsi?
Na ɔsee n’akoa no sɛ: Berɛ a mepɛ; monkɔ ntɛmpa yi ara, na monyɛ nneɛma biara a mahyɛ mo no nyina ara;
Na yei bɛyɛ me nsɔano ne nhyira wɔ wo so—hwɛsofoɔ nokorɛfoɔ ne nyansani wɔ me fie mu, sodifoɔ wɔ m’aheman mu.
Na n’akoa no kɔɔ ntɛmpa ara, na ɔyɛɛ nneɛma biara a ne wura hyɛɛ no no nyina ara; na nna bebree akyi no nneɛma no nyina ara baa mu.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, mɛkyerɛ mo nyansa wɔ me mu ɛfa nsɔre no nyina ara ho, mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔwɔ ɔpɛ sɛ wɔgye akwankyerɛ wɔ ɔkwan pa ne deɛ ɛyɛ so ama wɔn nkwagyeɛ—
Ama m’ahotefoɔ no anoboaboa adwuma no akɔso, ama mede wɔn asi mmea kronkron mu wɔ me din mu; ɛfiri sɛ otwa berɛ no aso, na ɛho hia sɛ m’asɛm no ba mu.

Ne saa nti, ɛwɔ sɛ meboaboa me nkorɔfoɔ no ano, sɛdeɛ nwura ne ayuo ho abɛbusɛm no teɛ no, ama makora ayuo no wɔ pata so, na wɔanya nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ, na wɔahyɛ wɔn sɛlɛstia animuonyam ahenkyɛ, berɛ a mɛba m’Agya aheman mu abɛtua onipa biara ka sɛdeɛ n’adwuma bɛyɛ no;
Nanso wɔbɛkyekyere nwura no afiafi, na wɔbɛyɛ ne mpokyerɛ no mu den, ama wɔde ogya a ɛnnum da ahye no.
Ne saa nti, mema nsɔre no nyina ara mmarasɛm, sɛ wɔntoa so mmoa wɔn ho ano mmɔ mu wɔ mmea a mayi no.
Nanso, sɛdeɛ meka kyerɛɛ mo wɔ mmarasɛm dada no mu no, mma mo anoboaboa nnyɛ ahoɔhare so, anaa adwane so; mmom momma wɔnyɛ nneɛma nyina ara krado wɔ mo anim.
Na sɛdeɛ wɔbɛsiesie nneɛma nyina ara wɔ ne kwanso wɔ mo anim no, monni mmarasɛm a mede ama mo no so ɛfa saa nneɛma yi ho—

Deɛ ɛka anaa ɛkyerɛkyerɛ sɛ, momfa sika ntotɔ nsase no nyina ara, deɛ mobɛtumi de sika atɔ no, wɔ mantam a ɛtwa asase a mayi sɛ ɛnyɛ Sion asase no ho ahyia no, ama wɔahyɛaseɛ aboaboa m’ahotefoɔ no ano;
Nsase a wɔbɛtumi atɔ wɔ Jackson mansin no nyina ara, ne amansin a atwa ahyia no, na monnya nkaeɛ no wɔ me nsam.

Afei, nokorɛ mese mo, momma nsɔre no nyina ara mmoaboa wɔn sika nyina ara ano mmɔ mu; na momma wɔnyɛ saa nneɛma yi wɔ wɔn mmerɛ mu, mmom nyɛ ahoɔhare so; na monhwɛ ma wɔnsiesie nneɛma nyina ara wɔ mo anim.
Na monyi nnipa animuonyamfoɔ, mpo nnipa anyansafoɔ, na monsoma wɔn ma wɔn nkɔtɔ saa nsase no.
Na nsɔre a wɔwɔ apueɛ fam aman mu no, berɛ a wɔbɛkyekyere no, sɛ wɔbɛdi saa afotuo yi so a, wɔbɛtumi atotɔ nsase na wɔaboaboa wɔn ho ano abɔ mu wɔ so; na wɔ saa kwan yi so wɔbɛtumi akyekyere Sion.

Seesei mpo wɔakora deɛ ɛdɔɔso dada, aane, mpo deɛ ɛboro so, sɛ wɔde bɛgye Sion, na wɔasiesie mmea a ada mpan no, na wɔrenni wɔn so nkonim biom, sɛ anka nsɔre, a wɔde me din ato wɔn ho so no, ayɛ krado sɛ wɔbɛtie me nne a.
Na bio mese mo, wɔn a wɔn atamfo abɔ wɔn ahwete no, ɛyɛ me pɛ sɛ wɔbɛkɔ so asrɛ akatua, ne ɔgyeɛ, nam wɔn a wɔde wɔn asi hɔ sɛ sodifoɔ na wɔwɔ tumi wɔ mo so no nsa so—
Sɛdeɛ nkorɔfoɔ no mmara ne amanyɔ mmara no teɛ, deɛ mama ho kwan ma wɔahyehyɛ no, na ɛwɔ sɛ wɔkora ma ɔhonam nyina ara nya hokwan ne banbɔ, sɛdeɛ nyinasosɛm a ɛtene na ɛyɛ kronkron no teɛ no;
Sɛdeɛ onipa biara bɛdi dwuma wɔ nkyerɛkyerɛ ne nyinasosɛm a ɛfa daakye ho, sɛdeɛ fahodie a ɛfata a mede ama no no teɛ, ama onipa biara atumi abu n’ankasa bɔne ho akonta wɔ atemmuo da no mu.
Ne saa nti, ɛmfata sɛ onipa bɛwɔ nkoasom mu wɔ ɔfoforɔ ase.
Saa botaeɛ yi nti na mahyehyɛ saa asase yi so Amanyɔ mmara no, nam nnipa anyansafoɔ a matete wɔn ama saa botaeɛ korɔ yi ara so, na magye saa asase yi nam mogyahwieguo so.
Afei, deɛn na mede bɛtoto Sion mma ho? Mede wɔn bɛtoto abɛbusɛm a ɛfa ɔbaa ne otemmufoɔ a ɔntene no ho, ɛfiri sɛ ɛtwa sɛ nnipa bɔ mpaeɛ a wɔmmrɛ ho, a ɛka sɛ—
Na otemmufoɔ bi wɔ kuro bi so a na ɔnsuro Onyankopɔn, na ɔnni buo mma nnipa.
Na na okunafoɔ bi wɔ saa kuro no mu, na ɔbaa ne nkyɛn kaa sɛ: tɔ me tamfo so werɛ.

Na mmerɛ kakra mu no wannyɛ, nanso akyire yi ɔkaa wɔ ne mu sɛ: Mensuro Onyankopɔn na memmu onipa, nanso esiane sɛ okunafoɔ yi ha me nti mɛtɔ werɛ mama no, anyɛ saa a ɔnam ne ba a ɔba ha ntoasoɔ so bɛdwan me ho.
Saa na mede bɛtoto Sion mma ho.
Momma wɔnkɔsrɛ wɔ otemmufoɔ no nan ase;
Na sɛ wantie wɔn a, momma wɔnkɔsrɛ wɔ amrado no nan ase;
Na sɛ amrado no antie wɔn a, momma wɔnkɔsrɛ wɔ ɔmanpanin no nan ase;
Na sɛ ɔman-panin no antie wɔn a, afei Awurade bɛsɔre na wafiri n’ahintabea no aba, na wɔ n’abufuo mu no ɔde haw bɛba ɔman no so;
Na wɔ n’anibere denden mu, ne n’abufuhyeɛ mu, wɔ ne berɛ mu no, ɔbɛtwa atirimuɔdenfoɔ atwene, ne ɛsohwɛfoɔ a wɔntene no, na ɔde wɔn kyɛfa bɛma wɔn wɔ nyaatwomfoɔ ne annye-anniefoɔ mu;
Mpo wɔ akyirikyiri sum mu, faako a esu, ne benabɔ, ne setwerɛ wɔ no.
Ne saa nti, mommɔ mpaeɛ sɛ wɔn aso bɛbue ama mo su, ama manya mmɔborɔhunu ama wɔn, ama saa nneɛma yi amma wɔn so.
Ɛhia sɛ deɛ maka akyerɛ mo yi ba mu, ama nnipa biara anntumi annya anoyie biara;
Ama anyansafoɔ ne sodifoɔ atumi ate na wɔahunu deɛ wɔnsusuuɛ da;
Ama m’ahyɛ aseɛ de me nneyɛɛ aba, mpo me nneyɛɛ huhuu no, na mayɛ m’adwuma no, m’adwuma huhuu no, ama nnipa atumi ahunu nsonsonoɛ a ɛda ateneneefoɔ ne atirimuɔdenfoɔ no ntam, Onyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.
Na bio, mese mo, ɛne me mmarasɛm ne me pɛ bɔ abira sɛ m’akoa Sidney Gilbert bɛtɔn m’adekoradan no, deɛ mayi ama me nkorɔfoɔ no, ahyɛ m’atamfo nsa.
Mma momma m’atamfo mmfa wɔn a wɔde me din frɛ wɔn ho no mpenesoɔ so no nngu deɛ mahyehyɛ no ho fi;
Ɛfiri sɛ yei yɛ bɔne kɛseɛ a ɛmu yɛ duru tia me, ne me nkorɔfoɔ, ɛnam saa nneɛma a mahyɛ ho mmara a ɛrenkyɛre ɛbɛba aman no so nti.
Ne saa nti, ɛyɛ me pɛ sɛ me nkorɔfoɔ no bɛpere agye, na wɔbɛkɔso apere agye deɛ mayi ama wɔn no, ɛwom sɛ wɔmma wɔn kwan sɛ wɔntena so.
Nanso, menkaa sɛ wɔrentena so; ɛfiri sɛ mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔso aduaba ne nnwuma a ɛsɛ m’aheman no, wɔbɛtena so.
Wɔrensi dan mma afoforɔ ntena mu; wɔbɛdua abobe turo, na wɔbɛdi ɛmu aduaba no. Mpo saa ara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/102.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 102
chapter_summary: 1–8, Wɔyi agyinatukuo sɛ wɔnsiesie nsɛm a ɛhia a ɛbɛsɔre wɔ asɔre no mu; 9–18, Wɔde kwan a wɔmfa so nni nsɛm to dwa; 19–23, Agyinatukuo no titenani no na ɔsi gyinaeɛ no; 24–34, Wɔde kwan a wɔfa so dwan toa wɔ asɛm ho to dwa.

verses.text: Saa da yi amansan agyinatukuo a wɔyɛ asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ aduonu nan hyiaa mu wɔ Joseph Smith Jun., fie, nam adiyisɛm so, na wɔkɔɔ so hyehyɛɛ Kristo asɔre agyinatukuo kɛseɛ no, a ɛwɔ sɛ ɛmu nnipa no yɛ asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ dumienu, ne otitenani baako anaa mmiɛnsa sɛdeɛ ɛbɛhia no.
Wɔnam adiyisɛm so yii agyinatukuo kɛseɛ ama wɔasiesie nsɛm denden a ɛho hia a ɛbɛtumi asɔre wɔ asɔre no mu, a asɔre no anaa ɔhwɛfoɔ no agyinatukuo nntumi nnsiesie mma afanu no nnya abodwoeɛ.

Wɔnam agyinatukuo no nne so gyee Joseph Smith, Jun., Sidney Rigdon ne Frederick G. Williams too mu sɛ atitenafoɔ; na agyinatukuo no nam ɛnne korɔ so paa Joseph Smith, Sen., John Smith, Joseph Coe, John Johnson, Martin Harris, John S. Carter, Jared Carter, Oliver Cowdery, Samuel H. Smith, Orson Hyde, Sylvester Smith, ne Luke Johnson, a wɔyɛ asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ, sɛ asɔre no daadaa agyinatukuo.

Afei wɔbisaa agyinatufoɔ yi a wɔabɔ wɔn din wɔ soro ha yi sɛ wɔgye wɔn nnwuma yi to mu, na wɔbɛdi dwuma wɔ saa dwuma dibea yi sɛdeɛ ɔsoro mmara teɛ anaa; na wɔn nyina ara buaaeɛ sɛ wɔgye wɔn nnwuma no tom, na wɔbɛhyɛ wɔn dwumadibea no ma sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn adom a ɔde agu wɔn so no teɛ.

Nnipa dodoɔ a wɔwɔ agyinatukuo no mu no, wɔn a wɔtoo aba wɔ asɔre no din mu, na wɔyɛ de maa asɔre no, de yii agyinatufoɔ a wɔabɔ wɔn din wɔ soro ha yi no yɛ aduanan-mmiɛnsa, sɛdeɛ ɛdisoɔ yi: asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ nkron, mpaninfoɔ dunson, asɔfoɔ nnan, ne asɔremma dumiɛnsa.
Wɔtoo aba sɛ: agyinatukuo kɛseɛ no nntumi nnya tumi nni dwuma wɔ berɛ a agyinatufoɔ a wɔabɔ wɔn din wɔ soro ha yi no mu nson nnka ho, anaa ananmusifoɔ a wɔayi wɔn a wɔfata no nni hɔ.
Saa nson yi bɛnya tumi ayi asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ afoforɔ, a wɔn a wɔbɛtumi asusu sɛ wɔfata na wɔbɛtumi adi dwuma wɔ agyinatufoɔ no a wɔnni hɔ no anan mu.

Wɔgye toom sɛ: berɛ biara a kwan bɛda hɔ ɛnam agyinatufoɔ a wɔabɔ wɔn din dada no mu bi wuo nti, anaa sɛ wɔyi no firi dibea mu ɛnam mmaratoɔ nti, anaa sɛ ɔtu kwan firi asɔre no mpɔtam a, otitenani anaa atitenafoɔ no bɛyi obi ahyɛ n’anan mu, na amansan agyinatukuo a wɔyɛ asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ, a wɔahyia mu wɔ saa botaeɛ yi nti no, de wɔn nne bɛpene so, ma wɔadi dwuma wɔ asɔre no din mu.
Asɔre no titenani no, a ɔsan yɛ agyinatukuo no titenani no, wɔnam adiyisɛm so na wɔyi no, na wɔnam asɔremma no nne so gye no tom wɔ ne dwumadie mu.
Na yei yɛ sɛdeɛ ne dwuma dibea no kɛseyɛ teɛ sɛ ɔnhwɛ asɔre n’agyinatukuo no so; na ɛyɛ n’akwanya sɛ atitenafoɔ afoforɔ mmienu bɛboa no, wɔn a wɔayi wɔn wɔ kwan korɔ no ara a wɔfaa so yii no no so.

Na sɛ wɔn mu baako anaa wɔn mmienu a wɔayi wɔn sɛ wɔmmoa no no nni hɔ a, ɔwɔ tumi sɛ ɔbɛhwɛ agyinatukuo no so wɔ berɛ a ɔnni ɔboafoɔ; na sɛ ɔno ankasa nni hɔ a, atitenafoɔ afoforɔ no wɔ tumi sɛ wɔhwɛ so wɔ n’anan mu, sɛ ɛyɛ wɔn mmienu anaa wɔn mu biara.

Berɛbiara a wɔbɛhyehyɛ Kristo asɔre n’agyinatukuo kɛseɛ wɔ ne kwan so no, sɛdeɛ nhwɛsoɔ a adi kan no teɛ no, ɛbɛyɛ agyinatufoɔ dumienu no asɛdeɛ sɛ wɔde nkaneeɛ bɛtwe ntonto, na wɔnam so ahunu deɛ ɛwɔ sɛ ɔdi kan kasa wɔ dumienu no mu, ɛhyɛ aseɛ firi baako, na saa ara kɔsi nkaneeɛ dumienu so.

Berɛ biara a agyinatukuo yi bɛhyia mu sɛ wɔreka asɛm biara no, agyinatufoɔ dumienu no bɛhwɛ sɛ ɛyɛ den anaa ɛnnyɛ den; sɛ ɛnnyɛ den a, agyinatufoɔ no mu mmienu pɛ na wɔbɛkasa afa ho, sɛdeɛ kwan a wɔatwerɛ wɔ soro hɔ no teɛ.
Nanso sɛ wɔhunu no sɛ ɛyɛ den a, wɔbɛyi nnipa nnan; na sɛ ɛyɛ den paa ara a, nnipa nsia; mmom kwan biara so no ɛnni sɛ wɔyi nnipa boro nsia ma wɔkasa.
Deɛ wɔabɔ no kwaadu no, wɔ asɛm biara mu no, wɔ agyinatukuo no fã baako ho kwan, sɛdeɛ wɔbɛsi atɛmdidie ne atɛnkyea ho kwan.

Na sɛ wɔhwehwɛ adanseɛ no mu wie a ɛwɔ sɛ agyinatufoɔ a wɔayi wɔn sɛ wɔnkasa no de asɛm no to agyinatukuo no anim, sɛdeɛ asɛm no teɛ ankasa; na ɛwɔ sɛ onipa biara kasa sɛdeɛ pɛpɛyɛ ne atɛntenenee teɛ.
Saa agyinatufoɔ a wɔnya nkaneeɛ a wɔtumi kyɛ ma mmienu no, kyerɛ sɛ, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, ne 12, wɔn na wɔbɛgyina deɛ wɔabɔ no kwaadu no afã, na wɔasi atɛmdidie ne atɛnkyea kwan.

Wɔ asɛm biara mu no deɛ wɔabɔ no kwaadu no ne kwaadubɔfoɔ no wɔ akwanya sɛ wɔkasa ma wɔn ho wɔ agyinatukuo no anim, berɛ a wɔatie adanseɛ no awie na agyinatufoɔ a wɔayi wɔn sɛ wɔnkasa mfa asɛm no ho no akasa awie no.

Sɛ wɔtie adanseɛ no wie a, agyinatufoɔ no, kwaadubɔfoɔ ne deɛ wɔabɔ no kwaadu no kasa a, otitenani no bɛsi gyinaeɛ sɛdeɛ nteaseɛ a wanya wɔ asɛm no ho teɛ, na wafrɛ agyinatufoɔ dumienu no ma wɔde abatoɔ apene ɛno ara so.

Nanso sɛ agyinatufoɔ nkaeɛ no, wɔn a wɔnkasaaɛ no, anaa wɔn mu biara, berɛ a wɔde nokorɛdie atie adanseɛ ne adesrɛdeɛ no awie no, sɛ wɔhunu mfomsoɔ bi wɔ otitenani no gyinaeɛ sie no ho a, wɔbɛtumi ada no adi, na wɔbɛdi asɛm no bio.
Na sɛ, wɔde ahwɛyie di asɛm no bio, na akyire yi wɔhunu nokorɛ foforɔ bi wɔ asɛm no ho a, wɔbɛsesa gyinaeɛ sie no sɛdeɛ ɛsɛ.
Nanso sɛ wɔamma hann foforɔ biara a, gyinaeɛ a ɛdi kan no bɛgyina, na agyinatukuo no fã kɛseɛ no wɔ tumi sɛ wɔma ɛyɛ saa ara.

Sɛ ɛyɛ asɛm a ɛyɛ den a ɛfa nkyerɛkyerɛ anaa nyinasosɛm ho, na sɛ wɔntwerɛɛ deɛ ɛdɔɔso yie a ɛbɛma agyinatufoɔ no adwene ayɛ wɔn fann a, otitenani no bɛtumi abisa na wanya Awurade adwene wɔ adiyisɛm mu.
Asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ no, sɛ wɔtu kwan a, a wɔwɔ tumi sɛ wɔbɛfrɛ na wɔahyehyɛ agyinatukuo wɔ yɔbea a ɛwɔ soro hɔ no nsɛsoɔ, ama wɔde asiesie nsɛm denden, sɛ afanu anaa wɔn mu baako bisa a.
Na saa asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ agyinatukuo no bɛnya tumi de ayi wɔn ara mu baaka ama wahwɛ saa agyinatukuo no so berɛ tiawa mu.

Ɛbɛyɛ saa agyinatukuo n’asɛdeɛ sɛ wɔde nwoma a ɛfa wɔn dwumadie ho bɛsoma, ntɛmso, ne adanseɛ ho amaneɛ a ɛdi mũ a ɛka wɔn atɛn ho, akɔma agyinatukuo kɛseɛ a ɛwɔ Asɔre no Atitenafoɔ a Wɔdi Kan no asoɛeɛ.

Sɛ agyinatukuo no atɛn no ansɔ afanu no anaa wɔn mu baako ani a, wɔbɛtumi adwane atoa Asɔre no Atitenafoɔ a Wɔdi Kan no agyinatukuo kɛseɛ no, na wɔbɛdi asɛm no bio, na wɔbɛtena asɛm no ho, sɛdeɛ nhwɛsoɔ dada a wɔatwerɛ no teɛ, te sɛ deɛ wɔmmuu saa atɛn no.
Wɔbɛfrɛ saa asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ agyinatukuo a wɔwɔ amanɔne berɛ a nsɛm denden aba nko ara mu; na asɛm biara kɛkɛ anaa deɛ ɛnnyɛ den mma wɔntumi mfrɛ saa agyinatuokuo yi.
Asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ a wɔtu kwan anaa wɔwɔ amanɔne no wɔ tumi sɛ wɔka sɛ ɛhia sɛ wɔfrɛ saa agyinatukuo yi anaa ɛnhia.
Nsonsonoɛ da agyinatukuo kɛseɛ anaa asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ a wɔtu kwan kɔ amanɔne, ne agyinatukuo kɛseɛ a wɔtu kwan a ɛyɛ asomafoɔ dumienu no ntam, wɔ wɔn gyinaeɛsie mu.
Gyinaeɛsie a ɛdi kan no na wɔbɛtumi asrɛ akɔ ho bio; nanso gyinaeɛsie a ɛtɔ so mmienu no deɛ wɔrentumi nsrɛ nkɔ ho bio.
Asɔre n’amansan sodifoɔ no nko ara na wɔtumi nya deɛ ɛdi akyire no ho asɛmmisa sɛ ɛyɛ mmarato asɛm a.

Wɔyɛɛ adwene sɛ: otitenani no anaa atitenafoɔ a wɔwɔ Asɔre n’Atitenafoɔ a Wɔdi Kan no asoɛeɛ no bɛnya tumi de akyerɛ sɛ asɛm biara a wɔkɔ ho dwantoa no, ɛyɛ nokorɛ fata sɛ wɔtie no bio akyire yi a wɔahwehwɛ dwantoa no ne adanseɛ ne ano-asɛm a ɛka ho no mu.

Afei agyinatufoɔ dumienu no kɔɔ so bɔɔ ntonto anaa wɔtoo aba, sɛ wɔbɛhunu deɛ ɔbɛdi kan akasa, na deɛ ɛtoa so yi ne deɛ ɛfiri mu baae, wɔn din ne: 1, Oliver Cowdery; 2, Joseph Coe; 3, Samuel H. Smith; 4, Luke Johnson; 5, John S. Carter; 6, Sylvester Smith; 7, John Johnson; 8, Orson Hyde; 9, Jared Carter; 10, Joseph Smith, Sen.; 11, John Smith; 12, Martin Harris.Wɔbɔɔ mpaeɛ wieeɛ no wɔtuu nhyiamu no hyɛɛ da.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/103.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 103
chapter_summary: 1–4, Deɛ nti a Awurade maa ho kwan maa wɔtaataa Ahotefoɔ a wɔwɔ Jackson County no; 5–10, Ahotefoɔ no bɛdi nkonim sɛ wɔdi mmarasɛn no so a; 11–20, Sion gyeɛ no nam tumi so na ɛbɛba, wɔn a wɔde wɔn nkwa to hɔ no bɛnya no bio na Awurade bɛdi Ne nkorɔfoɔ anim kan; 21–28, Ɛsɛ sɛ Ahotefoɔ no boa wɔn ho ano wɔ Sion, na wɔn a wɔde wɔn nkwa to hɔ no bɛnya no bio; 29–40, Wɔfrɛ anuanom ahodoɔ bi ma wɔhyehyɛ Sion Nsraban no; wɔhyɛ wɔn nkonimdie ho bɔ sɛ wɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ a.

verses.text: Nokorɛ mese mo, me nnamfo, hwɛ, mɛma mo adiyisɛm ne mmarasɛm, ama moahunu sɛdeɛ mobɛyɛ mo asɛdeɛ a ɛfa mo nuanom nkwagyeɛ ne wɔn gyeɛ ho, wɔn a wɔabɔ apete wɔ Sion asase so;
Wɔn atamfo nsa repamo wɔn na wɔreboro wɔn, na wɔn so na mɛhwie m’abufuhyeɛ a ɛnni nsusuiɛ aguo wɔ me mmerɛ a ɛsɛ mu.
Na mama wɔn ho kwan abɛsi saa berɛ yi, ama wɔatumi ahyɛ wɔn amumuyɛ nsusuiɛ ma, ama wɔn kuruwa atumi ayɛ ma;
Na ama wɔde asotwe a ɛyɛ ya na ɛyɛ den atwe wɔn a wɔde me din ato wɔn ho so no aso berɛ tiawa mu, esiane sɛ wɔantie ahyɛdeɛ ne mmaransɛm a mede maa wɔn no koraa.
Nanso nokorɛ mese mo, sɛ mahyɛ mmara bi a me nkorɔfoɔ bɛnya, mmerɛ dodoɔ a, firi saa dɔnhwere yi de rekorɔ no, wɔbɛtie afotuo a me Awurade wɔn Nyankopɔn de bɛma wɔn no.
Hwɛ wɔbɛhyɛ aseɛ adi wɔn atamfo so nkonim firi saa dɔnhwere yi de rekorɔ, ɛfiri sɛ me na mahyɛ.

Na sɛ wɔtie na wɔhwɛ di nsɛm no nyina ara so deɛ me, Awurade wɔn Nyankopɔn, mɛka akyerɛ wɔn a, wɔnnyae sɛ wɔbɛdi nkonim kɔsi sɛ wɔde wiase aheman nyina ara bɛhyɛ wɔn nan ase, na wɔde asase no ama ahotefoɔ no, na wɔadi so afebɔɔ ne afebɔɔ.
Nanso mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔnni me mmaransɛm soɔ, na wɔnntie nnhwɛ sɛ wɔdi me nsɛm nyina ara so no, wiase aheman no bɛdi wɔn so nkonim.
Ɛfiri sɛ wɔyɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnyɛ hann mma wiase, ne wɔnyɛ nnipa agyenkwa;
Na mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔnnyɛ nnipa agyenkwa no, wɔte sɛ nkyene a ayera ne dɛ, na ɛnnyɛ mma hwee bio gye sɛ wɔhwie gu ma nnipa de wɔn nan ase tiatia so.
Nanso nokorɛ mese mo, mahyɛ sɛ mo nuanom a wɔabɔ apete no nsan nkɔ wɔn apɛgyadeɛ nsase so, na wɔnkɔsi Sion amanfo no biom.
Na amanehunu pii akyi no, sɛdeɛ meka kyerɛɛ mo wɔ mmarasɛm dada bi mu no, na nhyira no ba.

Hwɛ, yei ne nhyira a mede hyɛɛ mo bɔ mo amanehunu akyire no, ne mo nuanom amanehunu akyi no—mo gyeɛ, ne mo nuanom gyeɛ, mpo kɔ a wɔde wɔn bɛkɔ Sion asase no so bio, abɛkyekyere, a wɔrenntu wɔn ngu bio.
Nanso, sɛ wɔgu wɔn apɛgyadeɛ no ho fi a wɔbɛtu wɔn agu; ɛfiri sɛ sɛ wɔgu wɔn apɛgyadeɛ no ho fi a merennyae wɔn.
Hwɛ, mese mo, ɛhia sɛ Sion gyeɛ no nam tumi so na ɛba;
Ne saa nti, mɛpagya onipa bi ama me nkorɔfoɔ no, deɛ ɔbɛdi wɔn anim te sɛ deɛ Mose dii Israel mma no anim no.
Na moyɛ Israel mma, na moka Abraham asefoɔ ho, na ɛho hia sɛ wɔfa tumi so de nsa a ɛmu atene yi mo firi nkoasom mu.
Na sɛdeɛ wɔdii mo agyanom anim kane no, mpo saa ara na Sion gyeɛ no bɛyɛ.
Ne saa nti, mommma mo akoma nntɔ piti, ɛfiri sɛ mese mo sɛ sɛdeɛ mesee mo agyanom no: Me bɔfoɔ bɛdi mo anim, na nnyɛ m’anim.
