Wɔrentumi anaa ɛnnsɛ sɛ wɔde tumi anaa tumidie biara kora asɔfodie no, gye sɛ ɛnam nkuranhyɛ, abodwokyɛre, boasetɔ ne ɔdwoɔ, ne ɔdɔ kann so;
Ɛnam ayamyɛ, ne nimdeɛ korɔgyeen so, deɛ ɛbɛma ɔkra no anyini pa ara a nyaatwom biara ne nnaadaa biara nni mu—
Ka anim denden berɛ a ɛsɛ mu, sɛ Sunsum Kronkron no kanyan wo a; na afei akyire yi kyerɛ ɔdɔ kɛseɛ kyerɛ onipa no a woaka n’anim no, anyɛ saa a ɔbɛbu wo sɛ ne tamfo;
Ama wahunu sɛ wo nokorɛdie mu yɛ duru kyɛn owuo ahoma.

Ma ɔdɔ mapa nhyɛ wo yam ma mma nnipa nyina ara, ɛne gyedie fiefoɔ no, na ma ahonidie nkɔ so nsiesie w’adwene a ɛnnyae da; afei w’ahotosoɔ bɛnyini abɛyɛ den wɔ Onyankopɔn anim; na asɔfodie nkyerɛkyerɛ no bɛsosɔ agu wo kra so te sɛ bosuo a ɛfiri soro.
Sunsum Kronkron no bɛyɛ wo daadaa yɔnkoɔ, na w’ahempoma bɛyɛ teneneeyɛ ne nokorɛ ahempoma a ɛnsesa da; na wo tumidie bɛyɛ tumidie a ɛte hɔ daa, na ɛbɛtene aba wo so daa afebɔɔ a nhyɛsoɔ biara nni so.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/122.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 122
chapter_summary: 1–4, Asase ano bɛbisa Joseph Smith din akyiri kwan; 5–7, Ne haw ne ɔbrɛ nyina ara bɛma no osuahunu na na ama no yiedie; 8–9, Onipa Ba no asiane akɔ yeinom nyina ara ase.

verses.text: Asase ano bɛbisa wo din akyiri kwan, na nkwaseafoɔ bɛdi wo ho fɛw, na asamando bo bɛfu atia wo;
Nanso wɔn a wɔn akoma mu teɛ, ne anyansafoɔ, ne animuonyamfoɔ, ne ɔbrapafoɔ no bɛhwehwɛ afotuo, ne tumi, ne nhyira afiri wo nsa mu daadaa.
Na wo nkorɔfoɔ remmfa afatwafoɔ adanseɛ so nnane wɔn ho ntia wo da.

Ɛwom sɛ wɔn nkɛntɛnsoɔ de wo bɛkɔ amaneɛ mu, ne afiase adaban ne afasuo mu deɛ, nanso wɔbɛma wo anidie; na aka kakra bi na wo nne abɛyɛ huuhu paa ara wɔ wo atamfo mfinifini kyɛn gyata werɛmfoɔ, ɛnam wo tenenee nti; na wo Nyankopɔn bɛgyina w’akyi daa afebɔɔ.
Sɛ wɔfrɛ wo sɛ fa amanehunu mu; sɛ wowɔ asiane mu wɔ anuanom atorɔfoɔ ntam; sɛ wowɔ asiane mu wɔ akorɔmfoɔ ntam; sɛ wowɔ asiane mu wɔ asase so anaa ɛpo so;

Sɛ wɔde atorɔ kwaadu ahodoɔ nyina ara bɔ wo kwaadu; sɛ w’atamfo ba wo so; sɛ wɔte wo firi w’agya ne wo maame ne wo nuanom mmarima ne mmaa ho; na sɛ w’atamfo twe afena te wo firi wo yere, ne wo mma koko mu, na wo ba barima panin, a wanya mfeɛ nsia pɛ, sɔ w’atadeɛ mu, na ɔka sɛ, m’agya adɛn na wonntumi ne yɛn ntena? O, m’agya, deɛn na nnipa yi rekɔyɛ wo? na sɛ afei wɔde afena te no firi wo ho, na wɔtwe wo kɔ afiase, na w’atamfo kyini fa wo ho te sɛ mpataku a wɔrehwehwɛ adwammaa mogya;

Na sɛ wɔde wo to amena no mu, anaa awudifoɔ nsa mu, na wɔbu wo kumfɔ; sɛ wɔde wo to ɛpo bunu mu; sɛ asorɔkye bɔ twi pam wo tiri so; sɛ mframa gyampatudu bɛyɛ wo tamfo; sɛ ɔsoro muna kabii, na ankomadeɛ nyina ara kabom si wo kwan; na ɛboro ne nyina ara so no, sɛ asamando ankasa bue n’apantan tɛɛ n’ano mu tɛtrɛɛ di w’akyi a, me ba, hunu sɛ saa nneɛma yi nyina ara bɛma wo osuahunu, na ɛbɛyɛ ama wo yieyɛ.
Onipa Ba no asiane akɔ yeinom nyina ara se. So woyɛ kɛseɛ kyɛn no anaa?

Ne saa nti, gyina wo kwan so, na asɔfodie no bɛkɔ so aka wo ho; ɛfiri sɛ wɔahyehyɛ wɔn ahyeɛ, wɔrentumi mpa ho.Wɔnim wo nna, na wɔrente wo mfeɛ so; ne saa nti, nnsuro deɛ onipa bɛtumi ayɛ, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn bɛka wo ho daa afebɔɔ.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/123.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 123
chapter_summary: 1–6, Ɛwɔ sɛ Ahotefoɔ no boaboa wɔn amanehunu ne wɔn ataataae ho nsɛm na wɔbɔ ho dawuro; 7–10, Saa honhom no a ɔbɔɔ atorɔ gyidikasɛm no ase no nso di anim taataa ahotefoɔ no; 11–17, Bebree da so wɔ akuakuo nyina ara ntam a wɔbɛgye nokorɛ no.

verses.text: Na bio, yɛbɛsusu sɛ mobɛdwene hia a ɛhia sɛ ahotefoɔ no bɛboaboa nsɛm a ɛsiiɛ ho nimdeɛ ano, ne amanehunu ne ayaayaadeɛ a nkorɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ saa ɔman yi mu de aba wɔn so.
Ne agyapadeɛ no nso nyina ara ne adesɛeɛ dodoɔ a ato wɔn, deɛ ɛfa wɔn abrabɔ ne wɔn ankasa dɛmdie ho, a adan ne nsase agyapadeɛ ka ho;
Ɛne nnipa nso a wɔn nsa wɔ ateetee a wɔde baa wɔn so no mu nyina ara din, deɛ wɔbɛtumi ahunu na wɔbɛnya biara.
Na ebia wɔbɛtumi ayi apamfoɔ ma wɔahwehwɛ saa nneɛma yi, na wɔatwerɛ anom nsɛm ne ntam; na wɔaboaboa din sɛeɛ nso a wɔabɔ no dawuro a ɛnenam no ano;

Ɛne deɛ ɛwɔ dawurobɔ nwoma, ne nwoma poɔ nyina ara mu, ne atorɔ abakɔsɛm a wɔabɔ ho dawuro, na wɔatwerɛ, ne wɔn a wɔtwerɛeɛ, na wɔnna asesɛ atirimuɔdensɛm ahodoɔ ne nhyɛsoɔ tantanne ne awudisɛm a wɔayɛ atia saa nkorɔfoɔ yi—

Ama yɛammɔ ho dawuro ankyerɛ wiase nko ara, mmom ama yɛde ato aban mpaninfoɔ no anim na yɛada wɔn bɔberɛ a ɛyɛ sum na ɛyɛ abusudeɛ no adi, sɛ anamɔntuo a ɛtwa toɔ a yɛn Soro Agya ahyɛ yɛn sɛ yɛntu, ansana yɛatumi afata bɔhyɛ no yie wɔ mudie mu, deɛ ɛbɛfrɛ no afiri n’ahintabea; na ama ɔman mũ no nyina ara nso annya anoyie ansana watumi asoma ne tumi basa no afiri adi.

Ɛyɛ asɛdeɛ a ɛho hia pa ara a yɛwɔ ma Onyankopɔn, abɔfoɔ, a yɛne wɔn bɛba abɛgyina atemmuo mu, ne yɛn ara yɛn ho nso, yɛn yerenom ne yɛn mma, wɔn a wɔama wɔakoto wɔ awerɛhoɔ, yaw, ne adwendwen mu, wɔ awudie nsa ase a ɛfata afɔbuo pa ara, nhyɛsotrasoɔ, ne aninyanneɛ, a saa honhom no nkɛntɛnsoɔ gyina akyiri na ɛhyɛ ɛho nkuran na ɛkura mu no, a ɛtintim wɔn agyanom, a wɔanya atorɔsɛm no nkyerɛkyerɛ agu mma no akoma so, na ɛde basabasayɛ aba wiase, na akɔ so anyini afiri ahoɔden mu akɔ ahoɔden mu, na seesei ɛyɛ porɔyɛ farebae ankansa, na asase nyina ara si apini wɔ n’amumuyɛ mu duru ase.
Ɛyɛ dadeɛ kɔndua, ɛyɛ mpokyerɛ a ɛmu yɛ den; ɛyɛ asamando adansa, ne ne nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn, ne ne ntweaban.
Ne saa nti yɛde asɛdeɛ a yɛnntumi nnkwati no ho ka, nnyɛ yɛn ankasa yerenom ne mma nko ara, mmom akunafoɔ ne nwisiaa, a ne dadeɛ nsa akunkum wɔn kununom ne wɔn agyanom;
Deɛ ɛyɛ sum ne kusuuyɛ nneyɛeɛ a ɛbɛtumi ama asamando ankasa mpo ahinhim, na ɛhu abɔ no na wahoa, na ɔbonsam ankasa nsa apopo na abubu.
Na ɛyɛ asɛdeɛ a ɛho hia nso a yɛwɔ ma awoɔntoatoasoɔ a wɔreba no nyina ara, ne wɔn a wɔn akoma mu teɛ nyina ara—

Ɛfiri sɛ bebree da so wɔ asase so wɔ akuokuo nyina ara ntam, fekuo, ne asafo mu, a nnipa aniteɛ nnaadaa afira wɔn ani, a wɔnam so tetɛ twɛn sɛ wɔbɛdaadaa wɔn, na wɔde nokorɛ no ahinta wɔn ɛfiri sɛ wɔnnhunu faako wɔbɛhunu wɔ—
Ne saa nti, ɛwɔ sɛ yɛsɛe na yɛhwere yɛn abrabɔ de nneɛma a ahinta no nyina ara ba hann mu, ama yɛatumi ahunu yeinom; na nokorɛ mu wɔada no adi afiri soro—
Afei ɛwɔ sɛ wɔde nsiyɛ kɛseɛ hwɛ yɛ yeinom.
Mma onipa biara mmu yeinom sɛ ɛyɛ nneɛma nketewa; ɛfiri sɛ bebree na ɛwɔ hɔ daakye, ɛfa ahotefoɔ no ho, a ɛgyina saa nneɛma yi so.
Me nuanom, monim sɛ ɛhyɛn kɛseɛ nya mfasoɔ pii firi kudɔ ketewa bi hɔ wɔ ahum berɛ mu, ɛnam sɛ ɛboa no ma ɛfa mframa ne asorɔkyeɛ no mu.

Ne saa nti, anuanom adɔfo pa, momma yɛmfa ahomka nyɛ nneɛma nyina ara a yɛn ahoɔden bɛtumi; na afei yɛatumi agyina pintinn, a yɛwɔ anidasoɔ kɛseɛ paa ara, sɛ yɛbɛhunu Onyankopɔn nkwagyeɛ, na ama ne basa ada adi.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/124.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 124
chapter_summary: 1–14, Wɔhyɛ Joseph Smith sɛ ɔmmɔ asɛmpa no ho dawuro obuo mu nkyerɛ Amɛreka man-panin, amradofoɔ, ne aman sodifoɔ nyina ara; 15–21, Wɔhyira Hyrum Smith, David W. Patten, Joseph Smith Sr. ne afoforɔ wɔ ateasefoɔ ne awufoɔ mu ɛnam wɔn nokorɛdie ne wɔn ahonidie nti; 22–28, Wɔhyɛ Ahotefoɔ no sɛ wɔnsi fie a wɔde bɛgye ahɔhoɔ ɛne Tɛmpol wɔ Nauvoo; 29–36, Ɛwɔ sɛ wɔyɛ awufoɔ asubɔ wɔ tɛmpol mu; 37–44, Awurade nkorɔfoɔ si tɛmpol daa ma wɔde ayɛ ayɛyɛdeɛ kronkron; 45–55, Wɔyi Jackson Tɛmpol sie asɛdeɛ no firi Ahotefoɔ no so esiane wɔn atamfo nhyɛsoɔ nti; 56–83, Wɔma akwankyerɛ fa Nauvoo Fie no sie ho; 84–96, Wɔfrɛ Hyrum Smith sɛ ɔnyɛ agya panin, sɛ ɔngye nsafoa, na ɔnyina Oliver Cowdery ananmu; 97–122, Wɔtu William Law ne afoforɔ fo wɔ wɔn nnwuma mu; 123–145, Wɔbobɔ amansan ne mantam mu asomfoɔ din, na wɔkyerɛ wɔn asɛdeɛ ne wɔn akuo a wɔdɔm.

verses.text: Nokorɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade se wo, m’akoa Joseph Smith nie, m’ani sɔ w’afɔrebɔ ne w’anisɔ, a woayɛ no yie; na saa botaeɛ yi nti na matete wo, ama mada me nyansa adi nam asase so nneɛma a ɛyɛ mmerɛ so.

Wo mpaebɔ sɔ ani wɔ m’anim; na ɛho mmuaeɛ no mese wo seesei sɛ wɔafrɛ wo ntɛmpa yi ara sɛ fa obuo bɔ m’asɛmpa no ho dawuro, ne saa pɛɛwa yi a madua sɛ ɛbɛyɛ Sion tweatiboɔ, deɛ wɔbɛpɔ ho ma ayɛ hyɛnhyɛn sɛ ahemfie nsɛsoɔ.

Wɔbɛbɔ saa dawuro yi akyerɛ wiase ahemfo nyina ara, wɔ n’afanan nyina ara so, akyerɛ ɔmanpanin onimuɔnyamfoɔ a wɔayi no no, ne amrado nimdefoɔ wɔ ɔman a wote mu no, ne asase so aman a wɔabɔ ahwete no nyina ara.
Ma wɔntwerɛ no wɔ ɔdwoɔ honhom mu, nam Sunsum Kronkron no tumi so, deɛ wɔde bɛma wo berɛ a wobɛtwerɛ yei no;
Ɛfiri sɛ wɔde bɛma wo nam Sunsum Kronkron no so ma woahunu me pɛ ɛfa saa ahemfo ne atumfoɔ no ho, mpo deɛ ɛbɛba wɔn so berɛ bi a ɛbɛba no mu.
Ɛfiri sɛ, hwɛ, merebɛsrɛ wɔn ma wɔde wɔn adwene akɔ Sion hann ne n’animuɔnyam so, ɛfiri sɛ berɛ a wɔahyehyɛ no aso sɛ wɔbɛyɛ no adom.
Ne saa nti, fa dawurobɔ kɛseɛ, ne w’adanseɛ srɛ wɔn, na nnsuro wɔn, ɛfiri sɛ wɔte sɛ ɛserɛ, na wɔn animuonyam nyina ara te sɛ ne nhwiren a ɛrenkyɛ ɛbɛtɔ fam, ama wɔannya anoyie biara nso—

Na ama mabɛsra wɔn wɔ asotwe da no mu, berɛ a mɛyi m’anim nkataanim no, ama mɛyi nhyɛsofoɔ no kyɛfa wɔ nyaatwomfoɔ ntam, faako a setwerɛ wɔ no, sɛ wɔpo me nkoa ne m’adanseɛ a mada n’adi akyerɛ wɔn no a—
Na bio, mɛsra wɔn na madwodwo wɔn akoma, wɔn mu dodoɔ no ara ama mo yieyɛ, ama moanya adom wɔ wɔn ani so, ama wɔaba nokorɛ hann no ho, na Amanamanmufoɔ no aba Sion mmasoɔ anaa ne pagya ho.
Ɛfiri sɛ m’asotwe da no reba ntɛm so, wɔ dɔnhwere a monnwene ho mu; na ɛhefa na ɛbɛyɛ ahobanbɔ ama me nkorɔfoɔ, ne dwanekɔhyɛbea ama wɔn a wɔbɛka wɔ wɔn mu no?
Monyane, O asase so ahemfo! Mommra, O, mommra, momfa mo sika kɔkɔɔ ne mo dwetɛ, mmɛboa me nkorɔfoɔ, mma Sion mma-mmaa fie.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese wo, ma m’akoa Robert B. Thompson mmoa wo ma wontwerɛ saa dawurobɔ yi, ɛfiri sɛ ɔsɔ m’ani yie, na ɛwɔ sɛ ɔka wo ho.
Ne saa nti, ma ɔntie w’afotuo, na mede nhyira mmɔho mmɔho bɛhyira no; ma ɔnyɛ nokorɛfoɔ na ɔnni nokorɛ wɔ nneɛma nyina ara mu mfiri nnɛ de rekɔ, na ɔbɛyɛ kɛseɛ wɔ m’ani so;
Nanso ma ɔnkae sɛ mɛhwehwɛ ne hwɛsofoɔ-adwuma afiri ne nsam.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese wo, nhyira ne m’akoa Hyrum Smith; na me, Awurade, medɔ no esiane n’akoma mu mudie nti, na esiane sɛ ɔdɔ deɛ ɛtene wɔ m’anim, Awurade na ɔseɛ.

Bio, ma m’akoa John C. Bennett mmoa wo wɔ w’adwuma a woresoma m’asɛm akɔ asase so ahemfo ne nkorɔfoɔ hɔ, na ɔngyina wo nkyɛn, mpo wo m’akoa Joseph Smith, wɔ amanehunu berɛ mu; na sɛ ɔgye afotuo a n’akatua remmɔ no.
Na ɛnam ne dɔ nti ɔbɛyɛ kɛseɛ, na sɛ ɔyɛ yei a ɔbɛyɛ me dea, Awurade na ɔseɛ. Mahunu adwuma a wayɛ, a sɛ ɔkɔ so yɛ a megye to mu, na mede nhyira ne animuonyam kɛseɛ bɛhyɛ no ahenkyɛ.

Na bio, mese wo sɛ ɛyɛ me pɛ sɛ m’akoa Lyman Wight bɛkɔ so aka asɛmpa no ama Sion, wɔ ɔdwoɔ honhom mu, na ɔda me adi wɔ wiase anim; na mede no bɛtu te sɛ deɛ ɔwɔ ɔkɔdeɛ ntaban so; na ɔbɛnya animuonyam ne anidie ama ne ho ne me din.

Ama sɛ ɔwie n’adwuma a magye no ama me ho, mpo te sɛ deɛ meyɛɛ m’akoa David Patten no, deɛ ɔka me ho saa berɛ yi, ne m’akoa Edward Partridge nso, ne m’akoa Joseph Smith, Sen. a n’ani afi no nso, a ɔte Abraham nsa nifa no, na nhyira ne kronkron ne no, ɛfiri sɛ ɔyɛ me dea.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese wo sɛ, m’akoa George Miller nni nnaadaa su biara; wɔbɛtumi anya awerɛhyɛmu wɔ ne mu esiane n’akoma mu mudie nti; na ɔdɔ a ɔwɔ ma m’adanseɛ nti, me, Awurade, medɔ no.

Ne saa nti mese wo, mesɔ ɔhwɛfoɔ diberɛ ano wɔ ne tiri so, te sɛ m’akoa Edward Partridge, ama wagye me fie afɔrebɔ, ama ɔde nhyira agu onnibiefoɔ a wɔwɔ me nkorɔfoɔ mu tiri so, Awurade na ɔseɛ. Mma obiara mmu m’akoa George animtia, ɛfiri sɛ ɔbɛma me anidie.
Ma m’akoa George, ne m’akoa Lyman, ne m’akoa John Snider, ne afoforɔ nsi fie mma me din, deɛ m’akoa Joseph Smith bɛkyerɛ wɔn no, wɔ bea a ɔbɛkyerɛ wɔn no nso.

Na ɛbɛyɛ ahɔhodan, fie a a ahɔhoɔ bɛfiri akyirikyiri aba abɛsoɛ wɔ mu; ne saa nti momma ɛnyɛ fie papa, a ɛfata biara sɛ wɔgye to mu, ama ɔkwantuni a wabrɛ no atumi anya apomden ne ahobanbɔ berɛ a ɔredwendwen Awurade asɛm no ho; ne tweatiboɔ a mayi ama Sion no.
Sɛ wɔsi saa fie yi ma me din, na sɛ amrado a wɔbɛyi no no amma ade fi biara amma so a, ɛbɛyɛ apomden tenabea. Ɛbɛyɛ kronkron, anyɛ saa a Awurade wo Nyankopɔn rentena mu.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, momma m’ahotefoɔ nyina ara mfiri akyirikyiri mmra.

Na monsoma abɔfoɔ ahoɔharefoɔ, aane, abɔfoɔ a wɔayi wɔn, na monka nkyerɛ wɔn sɛ: Mommra, momfa mo sika kɔkɔɔ, ne mo dwetɛ, ne mo aboɔ a ɛsom boɔ, ne mo tete nneɛma a ɛsombo nyina ara; na wɔn a wɔwɔ nimdeɛ fa tete nneɛma a ɛsombo ho nyina ara, a wɔbɛba no mmra, na wɔmfa adaka dua, ne kwabɔhɔrɔ, ne pepeaa, ne sɛsɛ, ne asase so nnua a ɛsom boɔ nyina ara.
Na momfa dadeɛ, ne kɔbere, ne yaawa, ne dadeɛ fufuo, ne mo asase so nneɛma a ɛsom boɔ nyina ara ; na monsi fie mma me din, mma Ɔsorosoroni no ntena mu.
Ɛfiri sɛ bea biara nni asase so a ɔbɛtumi aba na wasan de deɛ ayera no abrɛ mo bio, anaa deɛ wayi kɔ no, mpo asɔfodie no mahyɛ no.
Ɛfiri sɛ asubɔ-kyɛnsee nni asase so, a wɔn a wɔyɛ m’ahotefoɔ no bɛtumi abɔ asu ama wɔn a wɔawuwuo no—
Ɛfiri sɛ wɔyɛ saa ayɛyɛdeɛ yi wɔ me fie, na ɛrentumi nsɔ m’ani, gye sɛ mo hia nna mu, berɛ a morentumi nsi fie mma me.
Nanso mehyɛ mo, mo, ahotefoɔ nyina ara, sɛ monsi fie mma me; na mema mo mmerɛ a ɛdɔɔso a mode bɛsi fie ama me; na wɔ saa berɛ yi mu no mo asubɔ bɛsɔ m’ani.
Nanso hwɛ, saa mmerɛ yi twa mu a mo awufoɔ asubɔ rensɔ m’ani; na sɛ moannyɛ yeinom na saa mmerɛ yi twa mu a wɔbɛpo mo sɛ asɔre, ne mo awufoɔ, Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.
Na nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, akyire yi a moanya mmerɛ a ɛdɔɔso a mode bɛsi dan ama me, faako a wɔyɛ awufo asubɔ ayɛyɛdeɛ no, a ɛno nti wɔhyehyɛɛ yei firi wiase fapem no, mo awufo asubɔ rentumi nsɔ m’ani;
Na ɛno mu na wɔhyɛ onipa sɔfoɔ ma asɔfodie kronkron no nsafoa, ama moanya anidie ne animuonyam.
Na saa berɛ yi akyi no, mo awufoɔ asubɔ, a wɔn a wɔabɔ apete wɔ amannɔne no yɛ no nsɔ m’ani, Awurade na ɔseɛ.
Ɛfiri sɛ wɔahyehyɛ sɛ wɔ Sion, ne ne mpɛɛwa mu, ne Yerusalem, saa mmeammea a mayi ama sɛ dwanekɔhyɛbea no, na ɛbɛyɛ mmeammea a mommɔ asu mma mo awufoɔ.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na mo nhohoroho asɔ m’ani, gye sɛ moyɛ no wɔ fie a moasi ama me mu?
Na yei nti na mehyɛɛ Mose sɛ ɔnsi tenabea, a wɔde bɛka wɔn ho wɔ aserɛ no so, na ɔnsi fie wa bɔhyɛ asase no so, ama wɔayi saa ayɛyɛdeɛ no a wɔde ahinta ansana wɔrebɛyɛ wiase no adi akyerɛ.

Ne saa nti, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ mo ngosra, ne mo nhohoroho, ne mo awufoɔ asubɔ, ne mo nhyia kronkron, ne mo ayɛyɛdeɛ a moyɛ de kae Lewi mmammarima afɔrebɔ, ne mo adiyisɛm wɔ mmeammea kronkron paa ara no, faako a monya mo nkitahodie no, ne mo mmara ne atemmuo ɛfa adiyisɛm no ahyɛaseɛ ne Sion fapem, ne animuonyam, anidie, ne akyɛdeɛ kronkron ma ne nkorɔfoɔ nyin ara no, wɔnam me fie kronkron so ayɛyɛdeɛ na wɔde si no pi, deɛ wɔhyɛ me nkorɔfoɔ daa sɛ wɔnsi mma me din kronkron no.
Na nokorɛ mese mo, momma wɔnsi saa fie yi mma me din, ama mada m’ayɛyɛdeɛ adi wɔ mu akyerɛ me nkorɔfoɔ;
Na ɛfata ma me sɛ mɛda nneɛma a wɔde ahinta ansana wɔrebɛto wiase fapem no adi kyerɛ m’asɔre, nneɛma a ɛfa asɛmpa berɛ ano mahyɛ ho.
Na mɛkyerɛ m’akoa Joseph nneɛma biara a ɛfa saa fie yi ho, ne asɔfodie a ɛka ho, ne faako a wɔbɛsi no.
Na mobɛsi no wɔ faako a moadwene ho sɛ mobɛsi no no, ɛfiri sɛ ɛhɔ ne bea a mayi sɛ monsi.
Sɛ mode mo ahoɔden nyina ara yɛ adwuma a, mɛdwira saa bea no ho ama ayɛ kronkron.
Na sɛ me nkorɔfoɔ bɛtie me nne, ne me nkoa a mɛyi wɔn sɛ wɔnni wɔn anim no nne a, hwɛ, nokorɛ mese mo, wɔrenyi wɔn mmfiri wɔn tenabea.
Nanso sɛ wɔrenntie me nne, anaa saa nnipa yi a mayi wɔn yi nne a, wɔrennhyira wɔn, esiane sɛ wɔgu m’asase ho fi, ne m’ayɛyɛdeɛ, ne me nhyehyɛeɛ, ne me nsɛm kronkron a mede ama wɔn no.
Na ɛbɛba sɛ, sɛ mosi fie ma me din, na moanyɛ nneɛma a meka no a, menni ntam a mene mo aka no so, na meremma bɔhyɛ a mohwehwɛ firi me nsa mu no mma mu, Awurade na ɔseɛ.

Na wɔ nhyira ananmu no, monam mo ara mo nnwuma so de nnome, abufuhyeɛ, abuhuro, ne atemmuo ba mo ara ankasa mo tiri so, nam mo nkwaseasɛm so, ne mo akyiwadeɛ nyina ara so, deɛ moayɛ wɔ m’anim no, Awurade na ɔseɛ.

Nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese mo, sɛ mema nnipa mma mu biara mmarasɛm sɛ wɔnyɛ adwuma bi mma me din, na saa nnipa mma no de wɔn ahoɔden nyina ara ne deɛ wɔwɔ nyina ara yɛ saa adwuma no, na wɔannyae wɔn nsiyɛ, na sɛ wɔn atamfo ba wɔn so na wɔbɛsi adwuma a wɔreyɛ no ho kwan a, hwɛ, ɛbɛyɛ me pɛ sɛ merennhwehwɛ saa adwuma no mmfiri saa nnipa mma no nsa mu bio, na mmom mɛgye wɔn afɔdeɛ ato mu.

Na mede saa mmara ne mmarasɛm kronkron no ho amumuyɛ ne mmarato ho asotwe bɛba wɔn a wɔasi m’adwuma ho kwan no tiri so, kɔsi awoɔntoatoasoɔ mmiɛnsa ne nnan no so, mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔnnsakyera, na wɔtan me no, Awurade Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.

Ne saa nti ɛnam yei so na magye wɔn a mahyɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnkyekyere kuro na wɔnsi fie mma me din no afɔdeɛ ato mu, wɔ Jackson County, Missouri, a wɔn atamfo sii wɔn ho kwan no, Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.

Na mede atemmuo, abufuhyeɛ, ne abuhuro, agyaadwoɔ, ne ahometeɛ, ne setwerɛ bɛgu wɔn tiri so, kɔsi awoɔntoatoasoɔ mmiɛnsa ne nnan no so, mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔnnsakyera, na wɔtan me, Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.
Na mede yei yɛ nhwɛsoɔ ma mo, ama mo awerɛkyekyerɛ ɛfa wɔn a wɔahyɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnyɛ adwuma bi na wɔn atamfo nsa ne nhyɛsoɔ asi ho kwan no nyina ara, Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.
Na mene Awurade mo Nyankopɔn, na mɛgya mo nuanom a wɔn akoma mu teɛ, na wɔakunkum wɔn wɔ Missouri asase so no nyina ara, Awurade na ɔseɛ.

Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, mehyɛ mo bio sɛ monsi fie mma me din, mpo wɔ saa bea yi, ama moatumi akyerɛ me sɛ moyɛ nokorɛfoɔ wɔ biribibiara a mɛhyɛ mo no mu, ama matumi ahyira mo, na mede anidie, ɔnnwuo tebea, ne nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ ahyɛ mo ahenkyɛ.

Na afei mese mo, ɛfa me fie a wɔsoɛ mu no deɛ mahyɛ mo sɛ monsi mma ahɔhoɔ nna mu ho no, momma wɔnsi mma me din, na momfa me din nto so, na momma m’akoa Joseph ne ne fie nwɔ hɔ, firi awoɔntoatoasoɔ so kɔsi awoɔntoatoasoɔ so.
Na mede saa ngosra yi agu ne tiri so, ama wɔde ne nhyira nso agu n’asefoɔ a wɔbɛba n’akyi tiri so.
Na sɛdeɛ meka kyerɛɛ Abraham no ɛfa asase mmusuakuo ho no, mpo saa ara na meka kyerɛ m’akoa Joseph: Wo mu ne w’asefoɔ mu na wɔbɛhyira asase so abusuakuo no.
Ne saa nti, momma m’akoa Joseph ne n’asefoɔ a wɔbɛba n’akyi nnya bea wɔ saa fie no mu, firi awoɔntoatoasoɔ so kɔ awoɔntoatoasoɔ so, afebɔɔ ne afebɔɔ, Awurade na ɔseɛ.
Na momma wɔnfrɛ saa fie no Nauvoo Fie; na momma ɛnyɛ anigyeɛ tenabea mma onipa, ne ahomegyebea mma ɔkwantuni a wabrɛ, ama wadwene Sion animuonyam ho, ne saa tweatiboɔ no ara animuonyam ho;
Ama wagye afotuo afiri wɔn a mayi wɔn asi hɔ sɛ wɔnyɛ sɛ nnua a wɔagye din, ne awɛmfoɔ wɔ n’afasuo so.

Hwɛ, nokorɛ mese mo, momma m’akoa George Miller, ne m’akoa Lyman Wight, ne m’akoa John Snider, ne m’akoa Peter Haws, nhyehyɛ wɔn ho wɔn ho, na wɔnyi wɔn mu baako ma ɔnyɛ titenani wɔ wɔn kuo no so mma botae nti a wɔresi saa fie no.
Na wɔbɛyɛ dwumadie-mmara, a wɔnam so bɛgye dwetire de asi saa fie no.
Na wɔrennye dwetire a ɛnnuru dɔla aduonum sɛ kyɛfa wɔ saa fie no no sie mu, na wɔbɛma wɔn kwan sɛ wɔnnye dɔla mpen dunum mfiri sika a onipa biara de ahyɛ fie no sie mu.
Nanso wɔremma wɔn kwan mma wɔnnye dwetire a ɛboro dɔla mpem dunum mmfiri onipa baako biara hɔ.
Wɔremma wɔn kwan mma wɔnnye dwetire a ɛnnuru dɔla aduonum sɛ kyɛfa mmfiri onipa baako biara hɔ wɔ saa fie no mu.
Na wɔremma wɔn kwan mma wɔnnye onipa biara mmɔ dwetire wɔ saa fie no mu, gye sɛ onii no tua sika no gu wɔn nsam berɛ a ɔgye dwetire no.
Na sika dodoɔ a ɔbɛtua agu wɔn nsa mu no na ɛbɛkyerɛ dwetire a ɔbɛgye wɔ saa fie no mu; na sɛ wantua biribiara angu wɔn nsam a ɔrennya kyɛfa biara wɔ saa fie no mu.

Na sɛ obi tua sika gu wɔn nsa mu a ɛbɛyɛ kyɛfa wɔ saa fie no mu, ama ne ho, ne n’awoɔntoatoasoɔ a wɔbɛba n’akyi, firi awoɔntoatoasoɔ so kɔsi awoɔntoatoasoɔ so, mmerɛ dodoɔ a ɔno ne n’adedifoɔ no bɛsɔ saa dwetire a wɔabɔ no mu no, na wɔnntɔn anaa wɔmmfa wɔn ankasa ara pɛ ne nneyɛɛe so mma saa dwetire no mmfiri wɔn nsa mu nkɔ no, sɛ mobɛyɛ me pɛ a, Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.

Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, sɛ m’akoa George Miller, ne m’akoa Lyman Wight, ne m’akoa John Snider, ne m’akoa Peter Haws, nya dwetire biara wɔ wɔn nsa mu, wɔ sika afam, anaa agyapadeɛ afam a ɛno mu wɔnya ɛho sika a ɛne no yɛ pɛ a, wɔremmfa saa dwetire no mu kyɛfa biara nnyɛ ade foforɔ biara, gye saa fie no nko ara.

Na sɛ wɔde saa dwetire no mu kyɛfa kɔ baabi foforɔ, a ɛnnyɛ fie no mu, a deɛ ɔbɔ dwetire no mpene so, na sɛ wɔantua no mmɔho nnan amma deɛ ɔbɔ dwetire a akɔ baabi foforɔ, a ɛnnyɛ fie no mu a, wɔbɛdome wɔn, na wɔbɛyi wɔn afiri wɔn tenabea, Awurade Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ; ɛfiri sɛ me, Awurade, meyɛ Onyankopɔn, na wɔrentumi nsi me atwetwe wɔ saa nneɛma yi mu biara ho.

Nokorɛ mese mo, momma m’akoa Joseph ntua dwetire nto wɔn nsa mu mma sɛ wɔsi saa fie no, sɛdeɛ ɛyɛ ma no; nanso m’akoa Joseph nntumi ntua mmoro dɔla mpem dunum sɛ dwetire wɔ saa fie no mu, anaa deɛ ɛsua sen dɔla aduonum; anaa onipa foforɔ biara, Awurade na ɔseɛ.
Na afoforɔ nso wɔ hɔ a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔhunu me pɛ fa wɔn ho, ɛfiri sɛ wɔabisa afiri me nsa mu.
Ne saa nti, mese mo ɛfa m’akoa Vinson Knight ho, sɛ ɔbɛyɛ me pɛ a ma ɔmfa dwetire nhyɛ saa fie no mu mma ne ho, ne n’awoɔntoatoasoɔ a ɛbɛba n’akyi, firi awoɔntoatoasoɔ so kɔsi awoɔntoatoasoɔ so.

Na ma ɔmma ne nne so tententene ne dennennen, wɔ nkorɔfoɔ no ntam, na ɔnsrɛ onnibiefoɔ ne ahiafoɔ no yiedie; na mma no nni hwammɔ, anaa mma n’akoma ntɔ piti; na mɛgye n’afɔdeɛ ato mu, ɛfiri sɛ ɛremma me hɔ te sɛ Kain afɔdeɛ no, ɛfiri sɛ ɔbɛyɛ me dea, Awurade na ɔseɛ.
Momma n’abusua nni ahurisie na wɔnnane wɔn akoma mfiri amanehunu ho; na mayi no asra no ngo, na wɔbɛdi no nni wɔ ne fie mu, ɛfiri sɛ mede ne bɔne nyina ara bɛkyɛ no, Awurade na ɔseɛ. Amen.
Nokorɛ mese mo, momma m’akoa Hyrum mfa dwetire nhyɛ saa fie no mu sɛdeɛ ɛyɛ ma no mma ne ho, ne n’awoɔntoatoasoɔ a wɔbɛba n’akyi, firi awoɔntoatoasoɔ so kɔsi awoɔntoatoasoɔ so.

Momma m’akoa Isaac Galland mfa sika nhyɛ saa fie no mu; na me, Awurade, me dɔ no ɛnam adwuma a wɔayɛ nti, na mede ne bɔne nyina ara bɛkyɛ no; ne saa nti, momma wɔnkae no sɛ ɔwɔ kyɛfa wɔ saa fie no mu firi awoɔntoatoasoɔ so kɔsi awoɔntoatoasoɔ so.

Momma wɔnyi m’akoa Isaac Galland wɔ mo mu, na wɔmfa m’akoa Williams Marks so nhyɛ no sɔfoɔ, na ɔnhyira no, ma ɔne m’akoa Hyrum nkɔyɛ adwuma a m’akoa Joseph bɛda n’adi akyerɛ wɔn no, na wɔbɛhyira wɔn paa ara.
Momma m’akoa Williams Marks ntua dwetire nhyɛ saa fie no mu, sɛdeɛ ɛyɛ ma no, mma ne ho, ne n’awoɔntoatoasoɔ a wɔbɛdi n’akyi, firi awoɔntoatoasoɔ so kɔsi awoɔntoatoasoɔ so.
Momma m’akoa Henry G. Sherwood ntua dwetire nhyɛ saa fie no mu, sɛdeɛ ɛyɛ ma no, mma ne ho ne n’asefoɔ a wɔbɛba n’akyi, firi awoɔntoatoasoɔ so kɔsi awoɔntoatoasoɔ so.
Momma m’akoa William Law ntua dwetire nhyɛ saa fie no mu, mma ne ho ne n’asefoɔ a wɔbɛba n’akyi, firi awoɔntoatoasoɔ so kɔsi awoɔntoatoasoɔ so.
Sɛ ɔbɛyɛ me pɛ a mma ɔmmfa n’abusua nkɔ apueɛ afa mu nsase so, mpo Kirtland; nanso, me, Awurade, mɛkyekyere Kirtland, nanso me, Awurade, asiesie mpireka ama ɛmutefoɔ no ara.

Na ɛfa m’akoa Almon Babbitt ho no, nneɛma pii wɔ ne ho a ɛnsɔ m’ani yie; hwɛ, ɔhwehwɛ sɛ wɔbɛtie n’afotuo, mmom ɛnnyɛ afotuo a mahyehyɛ, mpo ɛyɛ m’Asɔre Titenafoɔ deɛ no; na wasi sika kɔkɔɔ nantwieba asi hɔ sɛ me nkorɔfoɔ nsom.
Mma onipa biara a waba ha sɔ ɔrebɛbɔ mmɔden adi me mmaransɛm so no mmfiri saa bea yi nkɔ.
Sɛ wɔte ha a momma wɔntena mma me; na sɛ wɔwu a momma wɔnwu mma me; ɛfiri sɛ wɔbɛgye wɔn ahome afiri wɔn nnwuma nyina ara ho wɔ ha, na wɔbɛtoa wɔn nnwuma so.

Ne saa nti, momma m’akoa William mfa ne werɛ nhyɛ me mu, na ɔnyae sɛ ɔsuro ɛfa n’abusua ho, esiane yareɛ a ɛwɔ asase no so nti. Sɛ modɔ me a, monni me mmaransɛm so; na yareɛ a ɛwɔ asase no so bɛdane animuonyam ama mo.

Momma m’akoa William mfa nne kɛseɛ, ne anigyeɛ kɛseɛ nkɔ na ɔmmɔ me daapem asɛmpa no ho dawuro, sɛdeɛ Honhom no bɛkanyan no afa, nkyerɛ Warsaw mutefoɔ, ne Carthage mutefoɔ nso, ne Burlington mutefo, ne Madison mutefoɔ nso, na ɔmfa aboterɛ ne nsiyɛ ntwɛn sɛ ɔbɛnya akwankyerɛ foforɔ wɔ m’amansan nhyiamu no ase, Awurade na ɔseɛ.

Na sɛ ɔbɛyɛ me pɛ a, momma ɔntie m’akoa Joseph afotuo mfiri saa berɛ yi de rekɔ, na ɔmfa ne mfasoɔ mmoa onnibiefoɔ yiedie, na ɔmfa nto dwa m’asɛm kronkron no nkyerɛaseɛ foforɔ no mma asase sotefoɔ no.
Na sɛ ɔbɛyɛ yei a mede nhyira mmɔho mmɔho bɛhyira no, ama wɔrenngya no, anaa wɔrennhunu n’asefoɔ sɛ wɔresrɛ paanoo.

Na bio, mese mo, momma wɔnyi m’akoa William, nhyɛ no sɔfoɔ, na wɔnsra no ngo, sɛ fotufoɔ mma m’akoa Joseph, na ɔnhyɛ m’akoa Hyrum ananmu, ama m’akoa Hyrum afa Asɔfodie ne Agyapanin diberɛ, deɛ n’agya nam nhyira ne hokwan so yi maa no no;
Ama ɛfiri nnɛ de rekɔ no wakura agyapanin nsafoa de nhyira agu me nkorɔfoɔ nyina ara tiri so.

Ama obiara a ɔbɛhyira no no wɔahyira no, na obiara a ɔbɛdome no no wɔadome no; ama biribiara a ɔbɛkyekyere wɔ asase so no wɔakyekyere no wɔ soro; na biribibiara a ɔbɛsane wɔ asase so no wɔasane wɔ soro.
Na firi saa berɛ yi de rekɔ no mayi no sɛ ɔnyɛ nkɔmhyɛni, ɔdehunufoɔ, ne ɔdiyifoɔ mma m’asɔre, ɛne m’akoa Joseph;

Ama ɔne m’akoa Joseph nso abom adi dwuma; na ama wanya afotuo afiri m’akoa Joseph hɔ, ɔno na ɔbɛkyerɛ no nsafoa a ɔbɛfa so abisa na wanya, na ama wɔde nhyira korɔ no ara, ne animuonyam, ne anidie, ne asɔfodie, ne asɔfodie akyɛdeɛ no ahyɛ no ahenkyɛ, deɛ wɔde guu onii a na wɔfrɛ no m’akoa Oliver Cowdery so no;
Ama m’akoa Hyrum atumi adi adanseɛ afa nneɛma a mɛkyerɛ no no ho, ama wɔanya ne din ho nkaeɛ anidie mu afiri awoɔntoatoasoɔ so akɔ awoɔntoatoasoɔ so, daa afebɔɔ.

Momma m’akoa William Law nso nnya nsafoa a ɔnam so bɛtumi abisa na wanya nhyira; momma ɔmmrɛ ne ho ase wɔ m’anim, na ɔnkwati nnaadaa, na ɔbɛnya me Honhom, mpo Ɔwerɛkyekyefoɔ no, deɛ ɔbɛda nneɛma nyina ara ho nokorɛ adi akyerɛ no no, na ɔde bɛma no wɔ dɔnhwere no ara mu, deɛ ɔbɛka.
Na saa nsɛnkyerɛnne yi bɛdi n’akyi—ɔbɛsa ayarefoɔ yareɛ, ɔbɛtutu ahonhom bɔne, na wɔbɛgye no afiri wɔn a wɔbɛma no awuduro nsa mu;
Na wɔbɛdi n’anim wɔ akwan a awɔ a wɔwɔ ɛborɔ wɔ so, na wɔnntumi nka ne nantini, na ɔbɛforo akɔ soro wɔ n’adwene nsusuiɛ mu te sɛ deɛ ɔwɔ ɔkɔdeɛ ntaban so.
Na sɛ ɛyɛ me pɛ sɛ ɔbɛnyane awufoɔ a, mma ɔnnsi ne nne ho kwan.
Ne saa nti, momma m’akoa William ntea mu kɛseɛ na mma no ntwentwɛn ne nan ase, ɔmfa anigyeɛ ne ahurusie, ne hosana mma deɛ ɔte ahennwa no so afebɔɔ ne afebɔɔ, Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.

Hwɛ, mese mo, mede asɛmpatrɛ dwuma bi asie ato hɔ ama m’akoa William, ne m’akoa Hyrum, ne wɔn nko ara, na momma m’akoa Joseph ntena fie, ɛfiri sɛ wɔhia no. Nkaeɛ no mɛda n’adi akyerɛ mo akyire yi. Mpo saa ara. Amen.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, sɛ m’akoa Sidney bɛsom me na wayɛ fotufoɔ ama m’akoa Joseph a, momma no nsɔre na ɔmmra mmɛgyina ne frɛ diberɛ mu, na ɔmmrɛ ne ho ase wɔ m’anim.

Na sɛ ɔbɛma me afɔdeɛ a ɛfata, ne anisɔ, na ɔkɔ so ne me nkorɔfoɔ tena hɔ a, hwɛ, me, Awurade mo Nyankopɔn, bɛsa no yareɛ na ɔbɛnya ayaresa; na ɔbɛma ne nne so bio wɔ mmepɔ no so, na wayɛ kasamafoɔ wɔ m’anim.
Momma ɔmmra na ɔne n’abusua ntena mpɔtam a m’akoa Joseph te no.
Na n’akwantuo nyina ara mu no, ɔmma ne nne so te sɛ totorobɛnto nnyegyeɛ, na ɔmmɔ asase sotefoɔ no kɔkɔ ama wɔadwane abufuhyeɛ a ɛbɛba no.
Momma ɔmmoa m’akoa Joseph, na momma m’akoa William nso mmoa m’akoa Joseph, ma ɔnyɛ dawurobɔ a nokorɛ wɔ mu nkyerɛ asase so ahemfo, mpo sɛdeɛ maka akyerɛ no dada no.
Sɛ m’akoa Sidney bɛyɛ me pɛ a, mma ɔnnyi n’abusua mmfiri apueɛ nsase no so, mmom ɔnsesa wɔn tenabea, mpo sɛdeɛ maka no.
Hwɛ, ɛnnyɛ me pɛ sɛ ɔbɛhwehwɛ banbɔ ne dwanekɔbea wɔ kuropɔn a mayi ama mo no mu, mpo Nauvoo kuropɔn no.
Nokorɛ mese mo, mpo seesei, sɛ ɔbɛtie me nne a, ɛbɛsi no yie. Mpo saa ara. Amen.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, momma m’akoa Amos Davies ntua sika nto wɔn a mayi wɔn sɛ wɔnsi fie a wɔsoɛ mu no nsa mu, mpo Nauvoo Fie no.
Momma ɔnyɛ yei sɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔnya kyɛfa a; na ɔntie m’akoa Joseph afotuo, na ɔmfa ɔno ankasa nsa nyɛ adwuma ama nnipa anya awerɛhyemu wɔ ne mu.
Na berɛ a ɔbɛkyerɛ sɛ ɔyɛ nokorɛfoɔ wɔ nneɛma biara a wɔde bɛhyɛ ne nsa mu no, aane, mpo nneɛma kakraa bi no, wɔbɛyɛ no sodifoɔ wɔ bebree so;
Ɛno nti ma ɔmmrɛ ne ho ase ama wɔama no so. Mpo saa ara. Amen.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, sɛ m’akoa Robert D. Foster bɛtie me nne a, ɔnsi fie mma m’akoa Joseph, sɛdeɛ ahyɛmdie a ɔne no ayɛ no teɛ, te sɛ ɔpono no a ɛbɛbue ama no berɛ ano berɛ ano no.
Na ma no nsakyera mfiri ne nkwaseadeɛ nyina ara ho, na ɔmfa ɔdɔ mapa mfira; na ɔnnyae sɛ ɔyɛ bɔne, na ɔmfa ne kasa dennen nyina ara nto nkyɛn;
Na ɔntua sika ngu Nauvoo Fie no kuo no nsam, mma ne ho ne n’awoɔntoatoasoɔ a ɛbɛba n’akyi, firi awoɔntoatoasoɔ so de kɔ awoɔntoatoasoɔ so;
Na ɔntie me nkoa Joseph, ne Hyrum, ne William Law, ne wɔn a wɔama wɔn tumi a mafrɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnto Sion fapem no afotuo; na ɛbɛsi no yie daa afebɔɔ. Mpo saa ara. Amen.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, mma onipa biara ntua sika mma Nauvoo Fie no kuo no gye sɛ ɔyɛ Mormon Nwoma, ne adiyisɛm a mede ama mo no gyedini, Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ;
Ɛfiri sɛ deɛ ɛdɔɔso anaa ɛsua sene yei no firi bɔne mu, na nnome na ɛbɛdi akyire, na ɛnnyɛ nhyira, Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ. Mpo saa ara. Amen.

Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, momma Nauvoo Fie no kuo no nnya akatua a ɛfata mma wɔn nnwuma biara a wɔyɛ de si Nauvoo Fie no; na momma wɔn akatua nyɛ sɛdeɛ wɔbɛgye ato mu wɔ wɔn ara wɔn ntam, ɛwɔ sika afam.

Na momma onipa biara a ɔtua dwetire no mfa ne kyɛfa wɔ wɔn akatua no mu, sɛ ɛbɛhia a, na ɔmfa mmoa wɔn, Awurade na ɔseɛ; anyɛ saa a wɔbɛbu wɔn nnwuma no sɛ wɔwɔ dwetire wɔ saa fie no mu. Mpo saa ara. Amen.
Nokorɛ mese mo, afei mede ma mo diberɛ-kurafoɔ a moka m’Asɔfodie no ho, ama moakura nsafoa a ɛfa ho no, mpo Asɔfodie no wɔ Mɛlkisɛdɛk kwan so, a ɛwɔ me Ba a Mewoo no Korɔ no kwan so.

Deɛ ɛdi kan, mede Hyrum Smith ma mo sɛ ɔnyɛ agyapanin mma mo na ɔnkura m’asɔre nsɔano nhyira, mpo Honhom Kronkron bɔhyɛ no, a wɔnam so sɔ mo ano kɔsi ɔgyeɛ da no, ama moannhwe ase wɔ mpo dɔnhwere a sɔhwɛ bɛba mo so no.
Mede ma wo m’akoa Joseph sɛ yɛ titenani panin wɔ m’asɔre no nyina ara so, na yɛ asekyerɛni, ɔdiyifoɔ, ɔdehununi, ne nkɔmhyɛni.
Mede m’akoa Sidney Rigdon ne m’akoa William Law ma wo sɛ afotufoɔ, ama yeinom ayɛ kuo ne Atitenafoɔ a Wɔdi Kan, na wɔanya adiyisɛm ama asɔre mũ no nyina ara.
Mede ma wo m’akoa Brigham Young sɛ yɛ titenani wɔ Dumienu agyinatukuo a wɔtu kwan no so;
Saa Dumienu yi kura nsafoa a wɔdebue aheman no tumi so wɔ asase afanan nyina ara so, na ɛno akyire no wɔde m’asɛm no bɛsoma akɔma abɔdeɛ biara.
Wɔn ne Heber C. Kimball, Parley P. Pratt, Orson Pratt, Orson Hyde, William Smith, John Taylor, John E. Page, Wilford Woodruff, Willard Richards, George A. Smith;
Mafa David Patten ama me ho; hwɛ, n’asɔfodie no onipa biara nnye mmfiri ne hɔ; nanso, nokorɛ mese mo, wɔbɛtumi ayi ɔfoforɔ asi n’ananmu ama saa ɔfrɛ korɔ no ara.
Na bio, mese mo, mema mo agyinatukuo kɛseɛ, sɛ Sion tweaboɔ—

Wɔn din ne, Samuel Bent, Henry G. Sherwood, George W. Harris, Charles C. Rich, Thomas Grover, Newel Knight, David Dort, Dunbar Wilson—mafa Seymour Brunson ama me ho; onipa biara nnye n’asɔfodie mmfiri ne hɔ, nanso wɔbɛtumi ayi ɔfoforɔ asi n’ananmu ama asɔfodie korɔ no ara; na nokorɛ mese mo, momma wɔnhyɛ m’akoa Aaron Jackson sɔfoɔ mma saa ɔfrɛ yi wɔ n’ananmu—David Fullmer, Alpheus Cutler, William Huntington.
Na bio, mema mo m’akoa Don C. Smith sɛ ɔnyɛ titenani wɔ asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ kuo no so;
Saa ayɛyɛdeɛ a wɔahyehyɛ ama botae a wɔn a wɔbɛyi no bɛfata faakotena titenafoɔ anaa nkoa wɔ mpɛɛwa ahoroɔ a ahwete wɔ amannɔne no so;
Na wɔn nso bɛtumi atu kwan sɛ wɔpɛ a, nanso wɔnhyɛ wɔn asɔfoɔ mmom mma faakotena titenafoɔ; yei ne wɔn frɛ no diberɛ, Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.
Mema no Amasa Lyman ne Noah Packard sɛ afotufoɔ, ama wɔatumi ahwɛ m’asɔre asɔfoɔ mpaninfoɔ kuo no so, Awurade na ɔseɛ.

Na bio, mese mo, mema mo John A. Hicks, Samuel Williams, ne Jesse Baker, a wɔwɔ asɔfodie a wɔde bɛhwɛ mpaninfoɔ kuo no so, deɛ ɛyɛ kuo a wɔahyehyɛ ama faakotena asomfoɔ no; nanso wɔbɛtumi atu kwan, mmom wɔahyɛ wɔn asɔfoɔ sɛ wɔnyɛ faakotena asomfoɔ, Awurade na ɔseɛ.
Na bio, mema mo Joseph Young, Josiah Butterfield, Daniel Miles, Henry Herriman, Zera Pulsipher, Levi Hancock, James Foster, sɛ wɔnhwɛ aduɔsɔn kuo no so;
Wɔahyehyɛ saa kuo no ama mpaninfoɔ a wɔtu kwan kɔdi adanseɛ fa me din ho wɔ wiase nyina ara mu, baabiara a agyinatukuo kɛseɛ akwantufoɔ, m’asomafoɔ no, bɛsoma wɔn sɛ wɔnkɔsiesie kwan wɔ m’anim no.

Nsonsonoeɛ a ɛda saa kuo yi ne mpaninfoɔ kuo no ntam ne sɛ ɛwɔ sɛ baako tu kwan berɛ biara, na baako no nso hwɛ nsɔre no so berɛ ano berɛ ano; baako wɔ asɛdeɛ sɛ ɔhwɛ asɔre no so berɛ ano berɛ ano, na baako no nni asɛdeɛ biara sɛ ɔhwɛ asɔre no so, Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.

Na bio, mese mo, mema mo m’akoa Vinson Knight, Samuel H. Smith, ne Shadrach Roundy, sɛ ɔbɛgye a, sɛ wɔnhwɛ ɔhwɛfoɔ ne n’aboafoɔ no so; saa ɔhwɛfoɔ ne n’aboafoɔ kuo no ho nimdeɛ no, wɔde ama mo wɔ Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam nwoma no mu.
Na bio, mese mo, mema mo Samuel Rolfe ne n’afotufoɔ sɛ asɔfoɔ titenafoɔ, ne akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no titenani ne n’afotufoɔ, ne deaconfoɔ titenani ne n’afotufoɔ nso, ne pɛɛwa titenani ne n’afotufoɔ nso.
Mede diberɛ yi a ɛwɔ soro ha yi ama mo, ne ɛho nsafoa, sɛ ɛnyɛ mmoa ne nnisoɔ, mma ɔsom adwuma no ne m’ahotefoɔ no pɛyɛ.
Na mema mo mmarasɛm foforɔ bi, sɛ momfa nnipa nhyehyɛ saa diberɛ yi nyina ara mu na mongye din a maka ho asɛm no ntom, anaa mompo wɔ amansan nhyiamu;
Na monsiesie adan mma saa diberɛ yi nyina ara wɔ me fie berɛ a mobɛsi yei ama me din no, Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ. Mpo saa ara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/125.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 125
chapter_summary: 1–4, Ɛwɔ sɛ Ahotefoɔ no kyekyere nkuro na wɔboaboa wɔn ho ano kɔ wɔ Sion mpɛɛwa mu.

verses.text: Deɛn na ɛyɛ Awurade pɛ ɛfa ahotefoɔ a wɔwɔ Iowa Asase so no ho?

Nokorɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ nie, mese mo, sɛ wɔn a wɔde me din frɛ wɔn ho na wɔrepere sɛ wɔbɛyɛ m’ahotefoɔ no, sɛ wɔbɛyɛ me pɛ na wɔadi me mmaransɛm a ɛfa wɔn ho no so a, momma wɔn mmoaboa wɔn ho wɔn ho ano wɔ mmeammea a menam m’akoa Joesph so bɛkyerɛ wɔn no so, na wɔnkyekyere nkuro mma me din, ama wɔasiesie wɔn ama deɛ wɔakora ama berɛ a ɛbɛba no.
Momma wɔnkyekyere kuropɔn mma me din wɔ asase a ɛne Nauvoo kuro no di nhwɛanim no, na momma wɔmfa din a ɛyɛ Sarahemla nto so.

Na momma wɔn a wɔfiri apueɛ, ne atɔeɛ, ne atifi, ne anaafoɔ nyina ara a wɔwɔ pɛ sɛ wɔtena mu no, mfa wɔn apɛgyadeɛ wɔ mu, ɛne Nashville kuropɔn no mu, anaa Nauvoo kuropɔn no mu, ne mpɛɛwa no mu biara a mayi no mu, Awurade na ɔseɛ.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/126.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 126
chapter_summary: 1–3, Wɔbɔ Brigham Young aba so wɔ ne nnwuma ho na wɔma no gye n’ahome firi daakye amannɔne akwantuo ho.

verses.text: Ɔdɔfoɔ ne onuabarima dɔfo-pa, Brigham Young, nokorɛ sɛdeɛ Awurade se wo nie: M’akoa Brigham, wɔrenhwehwɛ mmfiri wo hɔ bio sɛ gya w’abusua hɔ sɛ mmerɛ a atwa mu kɔ no, ɛfiri sɛ w’afɔdeɛ sɔ m’ani.
Mahunu w’adwuma ne wo berɛ wɔ akwantuo a wotu maa me din no.
Ne saa nti mehyɛ wo sɛ soma ma wɔmfa m’asɛm no nkɔ amannɔne, na ɛfiri saa berɛ yi hwɛ w’abusua yie, firi saa berɛ yi de rekɔ ne afebɔɔ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/127.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 127
chapter_summary: 1–4, Joesph Smith di ahurusie wɔ ɔtaa ne amanehunu mu; 5–12, Ɛwɔ sɛ wɔkora nwoma a ɛfa awufoɔ asubɔ ho.

verses.text: Esiane sɛ Awurade ayi akyerɛ me sɛ m’atamfo, a wɔwɔ Missouri ne saa Man yi mu no rehwehwɛ me bio; na esiane sɛ wɔretaa me a botae biara nnim, na wɔnni sunsum ketewa bi anaa atɛntenenee ahosuo, anaa deɛ ɛyɛ nokorɛ wɔ wɔn afa a wɔde bɛpia wɔn kwaadu bɔ so de atia me; na mpɛn dodoɔ a wɔn ntwatosoɔ nyina ara gyina atorɔ a ɛyɛ tuntunkobire so nti, madwene ahunu sɛ ɛfata na ɛyɛ nyansa ma me sɛ mefiri saa bea yi berɛ tiawa bi, ɛnam me ara m’ahobanbɔ ne saa nkorɔfoɔ yi ahobanbɔ nti. Mɛka akyerɛ wɔn a mene wɔn wɔ adwuma yɛ no sɛ mede m’akyi agya ananmusifoɔ ne atwerɛtwerɛfoɔ no, na wɔbɛyɛ adwuma no nyina ara ntɛmso ne kwan a ɛfata so, na wɔbɛhwɛ atɔn m’agyapadeɛ, anaa biribi foforɔ, sɛdeɛ tebea no bɛkyerɛ, anaa sɛdeɛ asetena no bɛkyerɛ, de atua maka nyina ara wɔ berɛ a ɛsɛ mu. Sɛ mete sɛ ahum no atwam kɔ koraa a, afei mɛsan m’akyi aba mo nkyɛn bio.

Ɛfa asiane a wɔafrɛ me sɛ mefa mu no deɛ, mehunu no sɛ ade ketewa bi, ɛfiri sɛ onipa anibere ne n’abufuhyeɛ ayɛ me asetena me nkwa nna nyina ara; na deɛ ama ɛte saa no yɛ me ahintasɛm, ebia firi wiase fapem no wɔyii me maa botaeɛ papa, anaa bɔne bi, sɛdeɛ mobɛhunu no biara. Mo ara mommu ho atɛn. Onyankopɔn nim saa nneɛma yi nyina ara, sɛ ɛyɛ papa anaa bɔne. Nanso, bunu mu asudware ne adeɛ a akokwa me. Na ne nyina ara abɛyɛ me su a ɛtɔ so mmienu ama me; na mete nka sɛ Paulo, sɛ mɛdi ahurusie wɔ amanehunu mu; ɛfiri sɛ bɛsi saa berɛ yi m’agyanom Nyankopɔn agye me afiri wɔn nyina ara nsam, na ɔbɛgye me firi nnɛ de rekɔ; na hwɛ, na hunu, mɛdi m’atamfo nyina ara so nkonim, ɛfiri sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn na waka.
Ne saa nti, momma ahotefoɔ no nyina ara nni ahurusie, na wɔn ani nnye paa ara; ɛfiri sɛ Israel Nyankopɔn yɛ wɔn Nyankopɔn, na ɔbɛsusu akatua a ɛfata agu wɔn nhyɛsofoɔ nyina ara tiri so.

Na bio, nokorɛ sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ nie: Momma me tɛmpol ho adwuma no, ne nnwuma a mayi ama mo nyina ara no, monkɔ so na monnyae; na momma mo nsiyɛ, mo animia, mo aboterɛ, ne mo nnwuma mmɔho mmienu, na kwan biara so no morenhwere mo akatua, Asafo Awurade na ɔseɛ. Na sɛ wɔtaataa mo a, saa ara na wɔtaataa nkɔmhyɛfoɔ ne nnipa ateneneefoɔ a wɔadi mo anim kan no. Na akatua wɔ yei nyina ara ho wɔ soro.
Na bio, mema mo asɛm bi ɛfa mo awufoɔ asubɔ ho.

Nokorɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade se mo ɛfa mo awufoɔ ho nie: Sɛ mo mu bi bɔ asu ma mo awufoɔ a, monyi abasɛm twerɛfoɔ, na momma ɔnyɛ mo asubɔ ho dansefoɔ; momma ɔmfa n’aso ntie, ama wadi adanseɛ nokorɛ mu, Awurade na ɔseɛ;
Ama wɔ mo atwerɛtwerɛ nyina ara mu no wɔatwerɛ no wɔ soro; biribiara a mobɛkyekyere wɔ asase so no, wɔbɛkyekyere no wɔ soro; biribiara a mobɛsane wɔ asase so no, wɔasane wɔ soro;
Ɛfiri sɛ mereyɛ de nneɛma bebree asan aba asase so bio, ɛfa asɔfodie no ho, Asafo Awurade na ɔseɛ.
Na bio, momma wɔnhyehyɛ twerɛtohɔ no ne kwan so, ama wɔde ahyɛ me tɛmpol kronkron no nwoma korabea mu, ama wɔde ayɛ nkaeɛ firi awoɔntoatoasoɔ so de kɔ awoɔntoatoasoɔ so, asafo Awurade na ɔseɛ.

Mɛka akyerɛ ahotefoɔ no nyina ara, sɛ mewɔ ɔpɛ, a ɛyɛ ɔpɛ kɛseɛ paa ara sɛ mɛma wɔn kyerɛkyerɛ afiri asɛnkadwa yi so afa awufoɔ asubɔ ho, Homeda a ɛreba yi. Nanso esiane sɛ ɛnni me tumi mu sɛ mɛyɛ saa nti, mɛtwerɛ Awurade asɛm berɛ ano berɛ ano, afa saa asɛm no ho, na mede yei, ne nsɛm afoforɔ bebree, bɛgu krataa so asoma abrɛ mo.
Afei mewie me krataa no saa berɛ yi, ɛfiri sɛ mmerɛ nni hɔ; na ɔtamfo no ayɛ krado, na sɛdeɛ Agyenkwa no kaaeɛ no, wiase sodifoɔ no reba, nanso ɔnni tumi biara wɔ me so.
Hwɛ, mebɔ Onyankopɔn mpaeɛ sɛ wɔbɛgye mo nyina ara nkwa. Na mede me din hyɛ aseɛ sɛ mo akoa wɔ Awurade mu, nkɔmhyɛni ne ɔdehunufoɔ ma Yesu Kristo Asɔre a Ɛwɔ hɔ ma Nna a Ɛdi Akyire Ahotefo.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/128.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 128
chapter_summary: 1–5, Ɛwɔ sɛ mantam ne amansan twerɛtohɔfoɔ di adanseɛ fa awufoɔ asubɔ nsɛm ho; 6–9, Wɔn twerɛtohɔ di mu na wɔatwerɛ no wɔ asase so ne soro; 10–14, Asubɔ-bea no yɛ damena nsɛsoɔ; 15–17, Elia san de tumi a ɛfa awufoɔ asubɔ ho ba bio; 18–21, Wɔde asɛmpa mmerɛ a atwa mu no nsafoa, tumi, ne tumidie nyina ara asan aba bio; 22–25, Wɔka anigyeɛ ne animuonyam nsɛm kyerɛ ateasefoɔ ne awufoɔ.

verses.text: Sɛdeɛ mekaa kyerɛɛ mo wɔ me krataa no mu ansana merefiri me tenabea no, sɛ mɛtwerɛ mo krataa berɛ ano berɛ ano na mama mo nneɛma pii ho nsɛm no, afei meretoa awufo asubɔ ho asɛm no so, ɛfiri sɛ ɛrekame ayɛ sɛ saa asɛm no ayɛ m’adwene mu ma, na ɛhyɛ m’atenka so den pa ara, firi berɛ a m’atamfo dii m’akyi no.

Metwerɛɛ adiyisɛm nsɛm kakra bi de brɛɛ mo ɛfa abasɛm twerɛfoɔ bi ho. Manya nhumu kakra bi aka ho ɛfa saa asɛm yi ho, a afei masi so dua. Ɛne sɛ, mede too dwa wɔ me krataa dada no mu sɛ ɛwɔ sɛ wɔnya abasɛm twerɛfoɔ, deɛ ɔbɛyɛ ɔdansefoɔ a ɔde n’ani ahu, na ɔde n’aso nso bɛtie, ama wayɛ twerɛtohɔ a ɛyɛ nokorɛ wɔ Awurade anim.

Afei, ɛfa saa asɛm yi ho no, ɛbɛyɛ den pa ara sɛ abasɛm twerɛfoɔ baako pɛ bɛwɔ hɔ berɛ biara, na wadi dwuma biara. Sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a ɔhaw yi bɛfiri hɔ no, wɔbɛtumi ayi abasɛm twerɛfoɔ wɔ ward biara mu wɔ kuropɔn no mu, a wakwadare yie wɔ anodisɛm pɛpɛɛpɛ mu; na ɔmma dwumadie no nyina ara ho nsɛm-twerɛ no nyɛ korakora ne pɛpɛɛpɛ, na ɔnsi so dua wɔ ne twerɛtohɔ mu sɛ ɔde n’ani hunuuɛ, na ɔde n’aso teeɛ, ɔnkyerɛ da korɔ, ne din, ne deɛ ɛkeka ho, ne deɛ ɛkɔɔ so no nyina ara ho abakɔsɛm; na ɔmmɔ ankorɛankorɛ a wɔwɔ hɔ no mu mmiɛnsa nso din, sɛ ebi baaeɛ a, wɔn a wɔfrɛ wɔn berɛ biara a wɔbɛtumi asi adekorɔ no so dua, ama wɔanam adansefoɔ mmienu anaa mmiɛnsa ano mu asɛm so ama asɛm biara agyina.

Afei, momma wɔnyi amansan twerɛtohɔfoɔ, a wɔde saa twerɛtohɔ afoforɔ yi bɛhyɛ ne nsa, na wɔmfa adansedie nwoma nka ho a wɔde wɔn nsa ahyɛ aseɛ, na ɛnni adanseɛ sɛ twerɛtohɔ a wɔayɛ no yɛ nokorɛ. Afei asɔre amansan twerɛtohɔfoɔ no bɛtumi atwerɛ twerɛtohɔ no mu nsɛm agu asɔre no amansan nwoma no mu, ne adansedie nwoma no ne adansefoɔ a na wɔwɔ hɔ no nyina ara, ne ɔno ankasa ne nsɛm a ɛkyerɛ sɛ nokorɛ ɔgye asɛm a aba ne twerɛto hɔ no di sɛ ɛyɛ nokorɛ nokorɛ, ɛnam ne nimdeɛ a ɔwɔ fa saa nnipa no suban ne wɔn frɛ ho wɔ asɔre no mu. Na sɛ wɔyɛ yei wɔ asɔre amansan nwoma no mu wie a, twerɛtohɔ no bɛyɛ kronkron paa ara, na ɛbɛma ayɛyɛdeɛ no adi mũ te sɛ deɛ ɔno ara de n’ani hunuue na ɔde n’aso teeɛ, na ayɛ te sɛ deɛ ɔno na ɔyɛɛ twerɛtohɔ no wɔ asɔre amansan nwoma no mu.

Mobɛdwene sɛ saa nneɛma yi ho nhyehyɛeɛ yɛ sononko; nanso, momma menka nkyerɛ mo sɛ yei bɛhyɛ Onyankopɔn pɛ ma, ɛnam sɛ ɛbɛyɛ sɛdeɛ Awurade ayɛyɛdeɛ ne ne nhyehyɛeɛ a wayi na wasiesie firi wiase fapem no ase, ama awufoɔ nkwagyeɛ, wɔn a wɔbɛwuo wɔ berɛ a wɔnnya asɛmpa no ho nimdeɛ.

Na bio, mepɛ mokae sɛ na Yohane Ɔdiyifoɔ redwendwen saa asɛm yi ara ho ɛfa awufoɔ ho, berɛ a ɔde too dwa sɛ, sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ no wɔ Adiyisɛm 20:12—Na mehunuu awufoɔ, nketewa ne akɛseɛ, sɛ wɔgyinagyina Onyankopɔn ahennwa no anim; na wɔbuebuee nwoma no mu; na wɔbuee nwoma foforɔ mu, deɛ ɛyɛ nkwa nwoma no; na wɔbuu awufoɔ no atɛn nam saa nneɛma a wɔatwerɛ wɔ nwoma no mu sɛdeɛ wɔn nnwuma teɛ.

Mobɛhunu wɔ saa ɔsrɛka yi mu sɛ wɔbuebuee nwoma no mu; na wɔbuee nwoma foforɔ bi mu, deɛ ɛyɛ nkwa nwoma no; nanso wɔbuu awufoɔ atɛn firii nsɛm a na wɔatwerɛ no wɔ nwoma no mu, sɛdeɛ wɔn nnwuma teɛ; ɛno nti, nwoma a wɔaka ho asɛm no bɛtumi ayɛ nwoma a ɛkura wɔn nnwuma ho twerɛtohɔ, na ɛkyerɛ nwoma a wɔkora wɔ asase so. Na nwoma a na ɛyɛ nkwa nwoma no yɛ twerɛtohɔ a wɔkora wɔ soro; saa nyinasosɛm ne nkyerɛkyerɛ a wɔde hyɛɛ mo mmara wɔ adiyisɛm a na ɛwɔ krataa a metwerɛɛeɛ ansana merefiri me tenabea hɔ no mu no yɛ adwene pɛpɛɛpɛ—sɛ wɔbɛtwerɛ mo twerɛtohɔ nyina ara wɔ soro.

Afei, saa ayɛyɛdeɛ fapem yi wɔ asɔfodie no tumi mu, nam Yesu Kristo adiyisɛm so, ɛno mu nam wɔama ho kwan sɛ biribibiara mobɛkyekyere wɔ asase so no wɔbɛkyekyere no wɔ soro, na biribibiara a mosane wɔ asase so no wɔbɛsane no wɔ soro. Anaa, nsɛm foforɔ mu no, sɛ yɛhwɛ no wɔ nkyereaseɛ foforɔ mu a, biribibiara a mobɛtwerɛ wɔ asase so no wɔbɛtwerɛ no wɔ soro, na biribibiara a montwerɛ wɔ asase so no wɔrentwerɛ no wɔ soro; ɛfiri sɛ, nwoma no mu na wɔbɛbu mo awufoɔ atɛn, sɛdeɛ wɔn ankasa nnwuma teɛ, sɛ wɔn wɔnam wɔn ankaso sa nnipadau hwɛ yɛɛ ayɛyɛdeɛ no a, anaa sɛ wɔnam wɔn ara ankasa wɔn ananmusifoɔ so a, sɛdeɛ ayɛyɛdeɛ a Onyankopɔn asiesie ama wɔn nkwagyeɛ ansana wɔrebɛto wiase fapem no teɛ, sɛdeɛ nwoma a wɔakora afa wɔn awufoɔ ho no teɛ.

Ɛbinom bɛhunu no sɛ ɛyɛ akokoɔduro pa ara nkyerɛkyerɛ na yɛreka ho asɛm no—tumi a ɛtwerɛ anaa ɛkyekyere wɔ asase so na ɛkyekyere wɔ soro no. Nanso, wɔ wiase mmerɛ nyina ara mu no, berɛbiara a Awurade de asɔfodie no asɛmpa berɛ no ama onipa biara nam adiyisɛm ankasa so, anaa nnipa kuo biara no, wɔde saa tumi yi ma wɔn daa. Ɛno nti, biribibiara a saa nnipa yɛɛeɛ wɔ tumidie mu, wɔ Awurade din mu no, a wɔyɛɛe nokorɛ ne nokorɛdie mu, na wɔkoraa yei ho twerɛtohɔ a ɛdi mũ na ɛyɛ nokorɛ no, ɛbɛyɛɛ mmara wɔ asase so ne soro, na wɔrentumi mpepa, sɛdeɛ Yehowa kɛseɛ no mmara teɛ. Yei yɛ nokwasɛm. Hwan na ɔbɛtumi atie?

Na bio, deɛ ɛfoa deɛ ɛwɔ soro hɔ no so nie, Mateo 16:18, 19: Na me mese nso wo sɛ: Wone Petro, na ɔbotan yi so na mede m’asafo bɛsie; na hɛl pono remmu mmfa so. Na mede ɔsoro aheman nsafoa bɛma wo, na biribiara a wobɛkyekyere asase so no, wɔakyekyere no soro, na biribiara a wobɛsane asase soɔ no, wɔasane no soro.

Afei kokoa mu asɛm kɛseɛ a ɛso wɔ asɛm no nyina ara mu, ne ade papa a ɛkrɔn wɔ asɛm no ho nyina ara da yɛn anim, ɛne sɛ yɛbɛnya Asɔfodie Kronkron no tumi. Ɛfiri sɛ onii a wɔde saa nsafoa yi ama no no, ɛnnyɛ den mma no sɛ ɔbɛnya nsɛm ho nimdeɛ a ɛfa nnipa mma nkwagyeɛ ho, ɛfa awufoɔ ne ateasefoɔ nyina ara ho.

Yei mu na animuonyam ne anidie, ne ɔnnwuo tebea da ne nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ wɔ—Asubɔ ayɛyɛdeɛ wɔ nsuo mu, a wɔde obi bɛnu mu sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ owuo nsɛsoɔ, ama nyinasosɛm baako ne foforɔ no ayɛ pɛ; nu a wɔne obi bɛnu nsuo mu na wɔayi no afiri nsuo mu no yɛ awufoɔ wusɔreɛ no nsɛsoɔ, berɛ a wɔfiri nna mu ba no; ɛno nti, wɔhyehyɛɛ saa ayɛyɛdeɛ yi ama ɛne awufoɔ asubɔ ayɛyɛdeɛ no anya twaka, ɛnam sɛ ɛyɛ owuo nsɛsoɔ.

Ɛno nti, wɔhyehyɛɛ asubɔ adaka sɛ ɛnyɛ damena nsɛsoɔ, na wɔhyɛɛ sɛ wɔnyɛ wɔ fam wɔ bea a ateasefoɔ no ɛtaa hyia mu, na ɛnna nsonsonoeɛ a ɛda ateasefoɔ ne awufoɔ ntam, na ama nneɛma nyina ara atumi anya ne nsɛsoɔ, na ama wɔne wɔn ho ayɛ pɛ—ama deɛ ɛwɔ asase so ne deɛ ɛwɔ soro no ayɛ pɛ, sɛdeɛ Paulo aka, wɔ I Korintofoɔ 15:46, 47, ne 48 no:

Nanso ɛnnyɛ honhom mu deɛ no na ɛdi kan, mmom deɛ ɛyɛ abɔsu no, na akyire yi deɛ ɛyɛ honhom mu. Onipa a ɔdi kan no firi fam, ɔyɛ famni. Onipa a ɔtɔ so mmienu no ne Awurade a ɔfiri soro. Sɛdeɛ famni no teɛ no, saa ara nso na famfoɔ teɛ; na sɛdeɛ ɔsoroni teɛ no, saa ara nso na ɔsorofoɔ teɛ. Sɛdeɛ asase so twerɛtohɔ a wɔayɛ no nokorɛ mu no ne mo awufoɔ wɔ twaka no, saa ara na twerɛsɛm a ɛwɔ soro teɛ. Ɛno nti, yei yɛ nsɔano ne nkyekyereɛ tumi, na, wɔ nkyerɛkyerɛmu foforɔ mu no, ɛyɛ aheman no nsafoa, a ɛyɛ nimdeɛ safoa.

Na afei, me nuanom mmarima ne mmaa adɔfoɔ, ma mensi no pi nkyerɛ mo sɛ ɛnnsɛ sɛ wɔtoto saa nyinasosɛm yi ɛfa awufoɔ ne ateasefoɔ, a ɛfa yɛn nkwagyeɛ ho no ase koraa. Ɛfiri sɛ wɔn nkwagyeɛ hia na ɛfata ma yɛn nkwagyeɛ, sɛdeɛ Paulo kaae faa agyanom ho no—sɛ wɔnnka yɛn ho a wɔrenntumi nnyɛ pɛ-na yɛnnka yɛn awufoɔ ho a yɛrenntumi nnyɛ pɛ.

Afei, ɛfa awufoɔ asubɔ ho no, mɛma mo Paulo ɔsrɛka foforɔ wɔ, I Korintofoɔ 15:29: Na anka wɔn a wɔma wɔbɔ wɔn asu ma awufoɔ no, wɔyɛ de gye deɛn? Sɛ awufoɔ nnyane koraa a, adɛn nti nso na wɔma wɔbɔ wɔn asu ma wɔn?

Na bio, ɛka saa ɔsrɛka yi ho no, mɛma mo ɔsrɛka a ɛfiri nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no mu baako hɔ, ɔno a na ɔde n’ani asi asɔfodie no mmaeɛ bio no so no, animuonyam a wɔbɛda no adi wɔ nna a ɛtwa toɔ no mu no, na wɔ ɔkwan sononko so no, saa asɛm yi a animuonyam wɔ mu sene biara no, ka daapem asɛmpa no ho, deɛ ɛyɛ, awufoɔ asubɔ no; ɛfiri sɛ Malaki ka wɔ ti a ɛtwa toɔ, nkyekyɛmu nnum ne nsia no mu sɛ: Hwɛ meresoma odiyifoɔ Elia mabrɛ mo, ansana Awurade da kɛseɛ a ɛyɛ hu no aba. Na ɔbɛdanedane agyanom akoma aba mma so, na wadane mma no akoma akɔ agyanom so, na mamma ammɛfa nnome ammɔ asase no.

Anka mɛtumi ama nkyerɛaseɛ a ɛmu da hɔ ama yei, nanso ɛmu da hɔ yie a ɛbɛtumi afata me botae yi sɛdeɛ ɛteɛ yi. Ɛyɛ sɛ mobɛhunu, ɛfa saa asɛm yi ho, sɛ wɔde nnome bɛbɔ asase no gye sɛ wɔayɛ nsɔano a ɛmu yɛ den bi wɔ agyanom ne mma no ntam, wɔ asɛm bi ho anaa biribi foforɔ ho—na hwɛ deɛn ne saa asɛm yi? Ɛyɛ awufoɔ asubɔ, ɛfiri sɛ, sɛ wɔnnka yɛn ho a wɔrenntumi mma yɛnnyɛ pɛ; na saa ara nso na yɛnnka wɔn ho a ɛmma wɔnnyɛ pɛ. Na saa nso na wɔn anaa yɛn nntumi nnyɛ pɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔawu wɔ asɛmpa no mu no nso nnka ho a; ɛfiri sɛ ɛho hia ma mmerɛ mahyɛ no mu asɛmpa no nhyɛnmu no, saa asɛmpa berɛ a seesei ahyɛ aseɛ rehyɛn mu no, ama nkabom biara a ɛdi mu na ɛyɛ pɛ, ne asɛmpa mmerɛ nyina ara nsɔano, ne nsafoa, ne animuonyam atumi aba, na wɔada no adi afiri Adam nna no mu mpo bɛsi saa berɛ yi. Na ɛnnyɛ yei nko ara, mmom nneɛma a wɔnnaa no adi da firi wiase fapem, na mmom wɔde asie anyansafoɔ ne mmadwemma no, wɔbɛda no adi akyerɛ mmotafoa ne nufomma, mmerɛ mahyɛ no mu asɛmpa.

Afei, deɛn na yɛte wɔ asɛmpa no a yɛanya no mu? Anigyeɛ nne! Mmɔborɔhunu nne a ɛfiri soro; ne nokorɛ nne a ɛfiri asase mu; anigyesɛm a ɛkɔ ma awufoɔ; anigyeɛ nne ma ateasefoɔ ne awufoɔ; ɛdɛ kɛseɛ ho anigyesɛm. Sɛdeɛ wɔn a wɔka nneɛma pa ho anigyesɛm no nan si yɛ fɛ wɔ mmepɔ no so, na wɔka kyerɛ Sion sɛ: Hwɛ, wo Nyankopɔn di hene! Sɛdeɛ Karmel bosuo teɛ no, saa ara na Onyankopɔn ho nimdeɛ bɛsiane aba wɔn so!

Na bio, deɛn na yɛte? Asɛmpa anigyesɛm a ɛfiri Kumora! Moronae, ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔfiri soro, a ɔde nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no mahyɛ no reto dwa—nwoma a wɔbɛda no adi no. Awurade nne wɔ Fayette serɛ so, Seneca mansin mu, deɛ ɔde adansefoɔ mmiɛnsa a wɔbɛdi nwoma no ho adanseɛ reto dwa! Mikael nne a wɔ Susquehanna asubɔntene ho, deɛ ɔreda ɔbonsam adi berɛ a ɔyi ne ho kyerɛ sɛ hann bɔfoɔ no! Petro, Yakobo, ne Yohane nne wɔ ɛserɛ a ɛda Harmony, Susquehanna mantam, ne Colesville, Broome mansin, wɔ Susquehanna asubɔnten ho, ntam no, na wɔreda wɔn ho adi sɛ wɔkura aheman no nsafoa, ne mmerɛ mahyɛ no mu asɛmpa no!

Na bio, ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn nne wɔ ɔpanin Agya Whitmer asa so, wɔ Fayette, Seneca mansin, ne mmerɛ pii, wɔ mmea ahodoɔ nam saa Yesu Kristo Asɔre a Ɛwɔ hɔ ma Nna a Ɛdi Akyire Ahotefoɔ akwantuo ne amanehunu nyina ara mu! Ɛne Mikael ɔbɔfo-panin no nne; Gabrael, ne Rafael, ne abɔfoɔ ahodoɔ nne, firi Mikael anaa Adam so bɛsi saa berɛ yi, na wɔn nyina ara de wɔn asɛmpa berɛ, wɔn hokwan, wɔn nsafoa, wɔn anidie, wɔn kɛseyɛ ne animuonyam, ne wɔn asɔfodie tumi no reto dwa; wɔde ma nsaneeɛ a ɛdi nsaneeɛ so, ahyɛdeɛ a ɛdi ahyɛdeɛ so; ɛha kakra bi, na ɛhɔ kakra bi; wɔnam deɛ ɛbɛba ho dawurobɔ so ma yɛn awerɛkyekyerɛ, na ɛhyɛ yɛn anidasoɔ den!

Anuanom, so yɛrenkɔ so wɔ saa dwumadie kɛseɛ yi mu? Monkɔ mo anim na ɛnnyɛ mo akyi. Monnya akokoduro, anuanom; na monkɔso, nkɔdi nkonim! Momma mo akoma nni ahurusie, na mo ani nnye paa ara! Momma asase nhyɛ aseɛ nto dwom! Momma awufoɔ nto ayeyie a ɛnni awieɛ nnwom mma Ɔhene Immanuel, ɔno a, ansana wɔreyɛ wiase no, wahyehyɛ deɛ ɛbɛboa yɛn ma yɛagye wɔn afiri wɔn afiase no; ɛfiri sɛ nnaduafoɔ bɛde wɔn ho.

Momma mmepɔno mfa anigyeɛ ntea mu, na mo, mmonhwa nyina ara, montea mu denden, na mo ɛpo nyina ara ne nsase kesee, monka mo Ɔnniawieɛ Hene no anwanwadeɛ! Na mo nsubɔntene, ne nsuwa, ne nsutene, momfa anigyeɛ ntene nkɔ. Momma nkwaeɛ ne wuram nnua nyina ara nyi Awurade ayɛ; ne mo mmotan a ɛtintim hɔ pintinn, momfa anigyeɛ nsu! Na momma owia, ɔsrane, ne anɔpa nsoromma mmɔ mu nto dwom, na momma Onyankopɔn mma nyina ara mfa anigyeɛ ntea mu! Na momma abɔdeɛ a ɛnni awieɛ no mfa ne din nto dwa afebɔɔ ne afebɔɔ! Na bio mese, sɛdeɛ nne a yɛte firi soro no si wɔ animuonyam fa, deɛ ɛbɔ animuonyam, ne nkwagyeɛ, ne anidie, ne ɔnnwuo tebea, ne nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ ho dawuro wɔ yɛn aso mu; aheman, mpaninnie, ne tumi!

Hwɛ, Awurade da kɛseɛ no abɛn; na hwan na ɔbɛtumi agyina ne mmaeɛ da no ano, na hwan na sɛ ɔpue a ɔbɛtumi agyina? Ɛfiri sɛ ɔte sɛ ɔnanefoɔ gya, ne ntomasifoɔ samina; na ɔbɛtena ase te sɛ ɔnanefoɔ a ɔte dwetɛ ho, na ɔbɛte Lewi mmammarima no ho, na wayiyi wɔn mu te sɛ sika kɔkɔɔ ne dwetɛ, ama wɔatumi abɔ tenenee afɔdeɛ ama Awurade. Ne saa nti, momma, yɛn a yɛyɛ asɔre ne nnipa kuo, ne Nna a Ɛdi Akyire Ahotefoɔ no, mmɔ afɔdeɛ mma Awurade wɔ tenenee mu; na momma yɛmfa nwoma a ɛkura yɛn awufoɔ twerɛtohɔ a ɛfata nkamfoɔ nyina ara no nkɔ ne tɛmpol kronkron no mu, berɛ a wɔbɛwie no.
Anuanom, mewɔ nneɛma pii ka kyerɛ mo ɛfa saa asɛm yi ho; nanso mede bɛsi ha saa berɛ yi, na mɛtoa asɛm no so berɛ foforɔ. Medaso yɛ mo akoa ahobrɛaseɛni ne ɔyɔnkoɔ nokorɛfoɔ daa,

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/129.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 129
chapter_summary: 1–3, Yɛwɔ nipadua a awu asɔre ne deɛ ɛyɛ honhom nyina ara wɔ soro; 4–9, Wɔde nsafoa de ma a wɔbɛnam so ahunu abɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ nkatanimu no akyiri no.

verses.text: Ateasefoɔ ahodoɔ mmienu na wɔwɔ soro, wɔn ne: Abɔfoɔ a wɔyɛ abɔdeɛ a wɔasɔre afiri owuo mu, a wɔwɔ honam ne nnompe nipadua—
Ebi ne sɛ, Yesu kaa sɛ: Momfa mo nsa nka me nhwɛ, ɛfiri sɛ honhom nni honam ne nnompe sɛdeɛ mohunu sɛ mewɔ yi.
Deɛ ɛtɔ so mmienu: ateneneefoɔ a wɔayɛ pɛ ahonhom, wɔn a wɔnnsɔre mmfirii owuo mu, nanso wɔwɔ saa animuonyam no ara.
Sɛ ɔbɔfoɔ bi bɛka sɛ ɔwɔ nkransɛm bi firi Onyankopɔn hɔ a, tene wɔ nsa na bisa ne sɛ ɔnkyea wo.
Sɛ ɔyɛ ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔbɛyɛ saa, na wobɛte nka sɛ ne nsa wo nsam.
Sɛ ɔyɛ ɔteneneeni a wɔayɛ pɛ honhom a ɔbɛba wɔ n’animuonyam mu; ɛfiri sɛ saa kwan no nko ara so na ɔbɛtumi ada ne ho adi—
Bisa no sɛ ɔnkyea wo, nanso ɔnnkeka ne ho, esiane sɛ ɛne ɔsoro mmara bɔ abira sɛ onipa a ɔyɛ ɔteneneeni bɛyɛ daadaafoɔ; nanso ɔbɛkɔ so de ne nkransɛm no ama.
Sɛ ɛyɛ ɔbonsam na ayɛ hann bɔfoɔ a, sɛ wobisa no sɛ ɔnkyea wo a ɔbɛtene ne nsa, na wonte hwee; ne saa nti wobɛhunu no.
Yei ne nsafoa akɛseɛ mmiɛnsa a monam so bɛhunu sɛ ɔsom adwuma bi firi Onyankopɔn a.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/130.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 130
chapter_summary: 1–3, Agya no ne Ɔba no bɛtumi ayi wɔn ankasa wɔn ho adi akyerɛ nnipa; 4–7, Abɔfoɔ te sɛlɛstia wiase kurukuruwa mu; 8–9, Sɛlɛstia asase no bɛyɛ Urim ne Tumim kɛseɛ bi; 10–11, Wɔde ɔboɔ fitaa bi ma obiara a ɔwura sɛlɛstia wiase no mu; 12–17, Wɔde Mmaeɛ a ɛtɔ so Mmienu berɛ no hinta Nkɔmhyɛni no; 18–19, Nhumu a yɛbɛnya wɔ saa asetena yi mu ne yɛn bɛsɔre wɔ Owusɔreɛ no mu; 20–21, Setie a yɛyɛ ma mmara no na ɛde nhyira nyina ara ba; 22–23, Agya no ne Ɔba no wɔ nnipadua a ɛwɔ honam ne nnompe.

verses.text: Berɛ a Agyenkwa no bɛyi ne ho adi no yɛbɛhunu no sɛdeɛ ɔteɛ. Yɛbɛhunu sɛ ɔyɛ onipa te sɛ yɛn ara.
Na saa abusuabɔ a ɛte yɛn ntam wɔ ɛha no bɛtena yɛn ntam wɔ hɔ, nanso animuɔnyam a ɛnni awieɛ na ɛbɛka ho, deɛ ɛyɛ animuɔnyam a yɛnni seesei.
Yohane 14:23—Agya ne Ɔba no adiyie wɔ saa nkyekyɛmu no mu yɛ ɔno ankasa adiyie; na adwene a ɛkyerɛ sɛ Agya ne Ɔba no te onipa akoma mu no yɛ nyamesom dada bi nkyerɛkyerɛ, na ɛyɛ atorɔ.
Asɛmmisa yi ho mmuaeɛ—So Onyankopɔn mmerɛ ho akonta, abɔfoɔ mmerɛ, nkɔmhyɛni mmerɛ, onipa mmerɛ no nnyɛ sɛdeɛ okyinsoromma a wɔte so no teɛ?
Mɛyi ano sɛ aane. Nanso abɔfoɔ biara nnsom saa asase yi so gye sɛ wɔn a wɔte so anaa wɔatena so pɛn.
Abɔfoɔ nnte okyinsoromma a ɛte sɛ saa asase yi so;
Mmom wɔte Onyankopɔn anim, wɔ asatoa a ɛte sɛ ahwehwɛ ne ogya po so, baabi a, biribiara a ɛma wɔn animuonyam da adi, deɛ atwa mu, seesei ne daakye, na wɔwɔ Awurade anim daa.
Bea a Onyankopɔn teɛ no yɛ Urim ne Tumim kɛseɛ bi.

Saa asase yi, wɔ ne, nte ho ne ɔnnwuo tebea mu no, bɛyɛ te sɛ dɛnkyɛmboɔ na ɛbɛyɛ Urim ne Tumim ama wɔn a wɔteso no, na wɔnam so ada nneɛma nyina ara a ɛfa aheman nketewa ho, anaa deɛ ɛfa aheman a ɛwɔ fam nyina ara ho adi akyerɛ wɔn a wɔte so no; na saa wiase yi bɛyɛ Kristo dea.
Afei ɔboɔ fitaa a wɔaka ho asɛm wɔ Adiyisɛm 2:17 no bɛyɛ Urim ne Tumim ama ankorɛankorɛ biara a ɔbɛnya bie, na ɛnam so na wɔada aheman a ɛkrɔn ho asɛm adi;
Na wɔde ɔboɔ fitaa ma wɔn mu biara a ɔba sɛlɛstia aheman no mu, na ɛno so na wɔatwerɛ din foforɔ bi, a obiara nnim gye sɛ onii a ɔnya no. Din foforɔ no yɛ asɛmfua a ɛyɛ safoa.
Mehyɛ nkɔm, wɔ Awurade Nyankopɔn din mu, sɛ ahohiahia ahyɛaseɛ a ɛde mogya hwieguo bebree bɛba ansana Onipa Ba no bɛba no bɛsi wɔ South Carolina.
Ebia ɛbɛhyɛ aseɛ afiri nnɔnkɔ nsɛmsɛm no mu. Nne bi daa yei adi kyerɛɛ me, berɛ a na merebɔ mpaeɛ denden afa saa asɛm yi ho, wɔ Ɔpɛnimma 25, 1832 mu.
Berɛ bi na merebɔ mpaeɛ denden pa ara sɛ mɛhunu berɛ a Onipa Ba no bɛba, na metee sɛ nne bi resi deɛ ɛdi soɔ yi so dua:
Joseph, me babarima, sɛ wotena ase kɔsi sɛ wobɛnya mfeɛ aduɔwɔtwe num a, wobɛhunu Onipa Ba no anim; ne saa nti ma yei nso wo, na nha me bio mmfa saa asɛm yi ho.
Ɔgyaa me saa ara, a manntumi annsi gyinaeɛ sɛ saa mmaeɛ yi fa mfenhyia apem no ahyɛaseɛ ho anaa mmaeɛ dada bi, anaa sɛ mɛwu na mahunu n’anim a.
Megyedi sɛ Onipa Ba no mmaeɛ no remma ansana saa berɛ no aso.
Nhumu nyinasosɛm biara a yɛbɛnya wɔ saa asetena yi mu no, ɛne yɛn bɛsɔre wɔ owusɔreɛ no mu.
Na sɛ onipa bi nya nimdeɛ ne nhumu pii wɔ saa asetena yi mu nam ne nsiyɛ ne setie so kyɛn ɔfoforɔ a, ɔbɛnya mfasoɔ pa ara wɔ wiase a ɛbɛba no mu.
Mmara bi wɔ hɔ, a wɔahyehyɛ wɔ soro, ansana wɔrebɛto wiase yi fapem, a wɔnntumi nsesa no, ɛno so na nhyira nyina ara gyina—
Na sɛ yɛnya nhyira biara firi Onyankopɔn hɔ a, ɛnam setie a yɛyɛ ma saa mmara a ɛgyina so no so.

Agya no wɔ nipadua a ɛwɔ honam ne nnompe a wɔtumi sɔ mu te sɛ onipa deɛ; Ɔba no nso te saa ara; nanso Sunsum Kronkron no nni nipadua a ɛwɔ honam ne nnompɛ, mmom ɔyɛ Honhom nipa su. Sɛ ɛnte saa a, Sunsum Kronkron no nntumi nntena yɛn mu.
Onipa bɛtumi anya Sunsum Kronkron no, na ɛbɛtumi asiane wɔ ne so nanso ɔnne no nntena.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/131.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 131
chapter_summary: 1–4, Sɛlɛstia awareɛ ho hia ma mmasoɔ wɔ ɔsoro a ɛkorɔn pa ara no mu; 5–6, Wɔkyerɛkyerɛ sɛdeɛ wɔyɛ nnipa nsɔano ma nkwa ɛnni awieɛ no mu; 7–8, Honhom biara yɛ adebɔdeɛ.

verses.text: Wɔ sɛlɛstia animuonyam mu no ɔsoro anaa dibea mmiɛnsa na ɛwɔ hɔ;
Na sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ ma onipa anya deɛ ɛkorɔn pa ara no, ɛwɔ sɛ ɔwura saa asɔfodie nhyehyɛeɛ yi mu [ɛkyerɛ sɛ daapem apam foforɔ awareɛ no];
Na sɛ wanyɛ saa a, ɔnntumi nnya.
Ɔbɛtumi awura foforɔ no mu, nanso ɛno ne n’aheman awieɛ; ɔntumi nnya asefoɔ.
(Kɔtɔnimma 17, 1843.) Nkɔmhyɛ asɛm a ɛyɛ ampa pa ara kyerɛ sɛ onipa bɛhunu sɛ wɔayɛ nsɔano ama nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ, nam adiyisɛm ne nkɔmhyɛ honhom no so, nam Asɔfodie Kronkron no tumi no so.
Ɛnntumi mma sɛ wɔbɛgye onipa nkwa wɔ berɛ a ɔnni nimdeɛ.
Biribiara nni hɔ a wɔka no sɛ ɛnnyɛ adebɔdeɛ. Honhom biara yɛ adebɔdeɛ, nanso ɛyɛ fɛɛfɛ pa ara anaa korɔgyenn, na ani kronkron nko ara na ɛtumi hunu.
Yɛnntumi nnhunu ɛno; nanso sɛ wɔte yɛn nnipadua ho a yɛbɛhunu sɛ ne nyina ara yɛ adebɔdeɛ.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/132.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 132
chapter_summary: 1–6, Wɔnam daapem apam foforɔ so na nya mmasoɔ; 7–14, Wɔde nhyehɛeɛ a ɛfa saa apam yi ho no to dwa; 15–20, Sɛlɛstia awareɛ ne abusua ntoasoɔ no ma nnipa bɛyɛ anyame; 21–25, Kwan teatea ne hiahia kɔ nkwa a ɛnni ewieɛ mu; 26–27, Wɔde mmara a ɛfa abususɛm a ɛtia Honhom Kronkron no ma; 28–39, Wɔde asefoɔ a wɔnni awieɛ ne mmasoɔ ho bɔhyɛ ma nkɔmhyɛfoɔ ne Ahotefoɔ wɔ mmerɛ nyina ara mu; 40–47, Wɔma Joseph Smith tumi sɛ ɔnkyekyere na ɔnsɔ ano wɔ asase so ne soro; 48–50, Awurade kyekyere mmasoɔ wɔ ne so; 51–57, Wɔtu Emma Smith fo sɛ ɔnyɛ nokorɛfoɔ na ɔnni nokorɛ; 58–66, Wɔde mmara a ɛfa ayeredodoɔ awerɛ ho no to dwa.

verses.text: Nokorɛ, sei na Awurade se wo m’akoa Joseph, sɛ esiane sɛ woabisa afiri me nsa mu sɛ wobɛhunu na woate aseɛ afa deɛ nti a Me, Awurade, buu me nkoa Abraham, Isak, ne Yakob ne Mose nso, Dawid ne Solomon bem, ɛfa nyinasosɛm ne nkyerɛkyerɛ a ɛmaa wɔnyaa ɛyerenom ne mpenafoɔ bebree no ho—
Hwɛ, na hunu, Mene Awurade wo Nyankopɔn, na mɛma wo mmuaeɛ afa saa asɛm yi ho.
Ne saa nti, siesie w’akoma gye na yɛ setie ma nkyerɛkyerɛ a mede rebɛma wo yi; ɛfiri sɛ wɔn a wɔada saa mmara yi adi akyerɛ wɔn nyina ara no, ɛwɔ sɛ wɔdi so.
Na hwɛ, meda daapem apam foforɔ adi akyerɛ mo; na sɛ moanni saa apam no so a, ɛnneɛ na wɔabu mo fɔ; ɛfiri sɛ obiara nntumi mmpo saa apam yi a wɔbɛma no ho kwan ma wɔawura m’animuonyam mu.
Na wɔn a wɔbɛnya nhyira afiri me nsa mu nyina ara no bɛdi mmara a wɔayi ama saa nhyira no so, ne ɛho nhyehyɛeɛ, sɛdeɛ wɔhyehyɛɛeɛ ansana wɔreto wiase fapem no.
Na deɛ ɛfa daapem apam foforɔ no ho no, wɔhyehyɛɛeɛ maa m’animuonyam mahyɛ; na ɔnii a ɔnya ne mahyɛ no ɛwɔ sɛ, na ɛhia sɛ, ɔdi mmara no so, ɛnte saa a wɔbɛbu no fɔ, Awurade Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.

Na nokorɛ mese mo, nhyehyɛeɛ a ɛfa mmara yi ho nie: Apam, ahyemdie, mmara, ahyɛdeɛ, ntam, nsedie, adeɛyɛ, nkabom, fekubɔ, anaa akwanhwɛ nyina ara a wɔannyɛ anaa wɔannwura mu nam Honhom Kronkron no bɔhyɛ nsɔano so no, nam obi a wɔasra no ngo so ama mmerɛ mu ne daapem nyina ara mu, a ɛsan nso yɛ kronkron paa ara no, ɛnam adiyisɛm ne mmarasɛm so na ɛnam deɛ masra no ngo so, deɛ mayi no wɔ asase so sɛ ɔnkura saa tumi yi (na mayi m’akoa Joseph sɛ ɔnkura saa tumi yi wɔ nna a ɛtwa toɔ yi mu, na obiara nni hɔ gye sɛ ɔbaako pɛ na wɔde saa tumi ne asɔfodie nsafoa yi ma no wɔ asase so wɔ berɛ korɔ mu), nni mudie, tumi anaa ahoɔden biara wɔ owusɔreɛ no akyi; ɛfiri sɛ ahyemdie biara a wɔanyɛ wɔ saa botaeɛ yi so no, sɛ nnipa wuo a, ɛba awieɛ.
Hwɛ, me fie yɛ nhyehyɛe pa fie, Awurade Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ, na ɛnnyɛ basabasayɛ fie.
So mɛgye afɔdeɛ ato mu, Awurade na ɔseɛ, a wɔannyɛ no wɔ me din mu?
Anaa so mɛgye afiri mo nsa mu deɛ me nnyiiɛ?
Na so mɛyi biribi ama mo, Awurade na ɔseɛ, a ɛnnam mmara so, mpo te sɛ deɛ mene m’Agya ayi ama mo ansana wɔreyɛ wiase no?
Mene Awurade wo Nyankopɔn; na mema mo saa mmarasɛm yi—sɛ onipa biara rentumi mma Agya no nkyɛn gye sɛ ɔnam me so anaa m’asɛm so, a ɛyɛ me mmara no, Awurade na ɔseɛ.

Na biribiara a ɛwɔ wiase, sɛ wɔahyehyɛ nam nnipa so, ahennie, anaa mpaninnie, anaa tumidie, anaa nneɛma a agye din so o, biribiara a wɔyɛ, a ɛmmfa me so anaa m’asɛm so no, Awurade na ɔseɛ, wɔbɛto atwene fam, na nnipa wuo akyiri no ɛrennka hɔ, wɔ owusɔreɛ mu anaa n’akyi, Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.
Ɛfiri sɛ biribibiara a ɛbɛka no nam me so; na biribibiara a ɛnnam me so no wɔbɛwoso no asɛe no.

Ne saa nti, sɛ ɔbarima bi ware ɔyere bi wɔ wiase yi mu, na wammfa me so anaa m’asɛm so annware, na ɔne no kɔ apam mmerɛ dodoɔ a ɔwɔ wiase yi mu na ɔno nso ka ne ho no, wɔn apam ne awareɛ no nni ahoɔden biara berɛ a wɔawuwuo, ne berɛ a wɔafiri wiase yi mu; ne saa nti, mmara biara nnkyekyere wɔn berɛ a wɔnni wiase.

Ne saa nti, berɛ a wɔnni wiase yi mu no wɔnnware anaa wɔmmfa wɔn mma awareɛ; mmom wɔyi wɔn sɛ abɔfoɔ wɔ ɔsoro, saa abɔfoɔ a wɔyɛ nkoa asomfoɔ, sɛ wɔnsom mma wɔn a wɔfata ɛnni awieɛ animuonyam kɛseɛ a ɛkyɛn so koraa, na ɛboro so.

Ɛfiri sɛ saa abɔfoɔ yi anni me mmara so; ne saa nti, wɔrentumi nnyɛ wɔn kɛseɛ, mmom wɔbɛtete wɔn wɔn mu na wɔayɛ kɔntɛkorɔ mu, a wɔrennya mmasoɔ, wɔ wɔn gyeɛ tebea mu, wɔ daapem nyina ara mu; na ɛfiri saa berɛ no wɔnnyɛ anyame, mmom wɔyɛ Onyankopɔn abɔfoɔ daa afebɔɔ.

Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, sɛ ɔbarima bi ware ɔyere bi, na sɛ ɔne no kɔ apam wɔ mmerɛ mu ne daapem nyina ara mu a, sɛ saa apam no nnam me so anaa m’asɛm so, deɛ ɛyɛ me mmara no, na sɛ Honhom Kronkron bɔhyɛ no ansɔ ano a, nam deɛ masra no ngo na mayi ama saa tumi yi a, ɛnneɛ ɛnni mu anaa ɛnni ahoɔden berɛ a wɔafiri wiase yi mu, ɛfiri sɛ ɛnnyɛ me anaa m’asɛm na ɛkaa wɔn bɔɔ mu, Awurade na ɔseɛ; berɛ a wɔafiri wiase yi mu no wɔrenntumi nnye wɔn wɔ hɔ, esiane sɛ wɔayiyi abɔfoɔ ne anyame no wɔ hɔ, na wɔnntumi mpa wɔn ho nnkɔ; ɛno nti wɔnntumi nnya m’animuonyam; ɛfiri sɛ me fie yɛ nhyehyɛeɛ pa fie, Awurade Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.

Na bio, nokorɛ mese mo, sɛ ɔbarima bi ware ɔyere bi nam m’asɛm so, deɛ ɛyɛ me mmara, na ɛnam daapem apam foforɔ no so, na wɔyɛ nsɔano ma wɔn nam Honhom Kronkron bɔhyɛ no so, nam deɛ wɔasra no ngo so, ɔno a mayi saa tumi ne saa asɔfodie nsafoa yi ama no no; na wɔbɛka akyerɛ wɔn sɛ—Mobɛfiri adi aba wɔ owusɔreɛ a ɛdi kan no mu; na sɛ ɛyɛ owusɔreɛ a ɛdi kan no akyi a, ɛyɛ owusɔre a ɛtɔ so no mu; na wɔbɛnya ahennwa, aheman, mpaninnie ne tumi, tumidie, deɛ ɛkron nyina ara ne deɛ ɛwɔ bunu mu nyina ara adi—afei wɔbɛtwerɛ no wɔ Adwammaa no Nkwa Nwoma no mu sɛ mma ɔnni awu a ɛbɛma waka mogya a ɛdi bem agu, na sɛ ɔtena m’apam mu, na wanni awu a ɛbɛma waka mogya a ɛdi bem agu a, biribiara a m’akoa de agu wɔn so no, ɛbɛyɛ ama wɔn wɔ nneɛma nyina ara mu, wɔ mmerɛ mu, ne daapem nyina ara mu; na ɛbɛnya ahoɔden mua berɛ a wɔafiri wiase yi mu; na wɔbɛpa abɔfoɔ no ho, ne anyame no, a wɔde wɔn asisi hɔ no, akɔ wɔn mmasoɔ ne animuonyam wɔ ade nyina ara mu, sɛdeɛ wɔayɛ nsɔano wɔ wɔn tiri so no, saa animuonyam a ɛbɛyɛ mahyɛ ne asefoɔ ntoasoɔ daa afebɔɔ.

Afei wɔbɛyɛ anyame, esiane sɛ wɔnni awieɛ; ne saa nti wɔbɛfiri daapem akɔ daapem mu, ɛfiri sɛ wɔwɔ hɔ daa; afei wɔbɛboro ade nyina ara so, ɛfiri sɛ nneɛma nyina ara hyɛ wɔn ase. Afei wɔbɛyɛ anyame, esiane sɛ wɔwɔ tumi nyina ara, na abɔfoɔ no hyɛ wɔn ase.
Nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese mo, monntumi nnya saa animuonyam yi gye sɛ modi me mmara so.
Ɛfiri sɛ ɔpono no yɛ teatea, na kwan no a ɛkɔ mmasoɔ ne nkwa ntoasoɔ mu no yɛ hiahia, na kakraa bi na wɔhunu, esiane sɛ monnim me ɛna monnye me wɔ wiase yi mu.
Nanso sɛ mogye me wɔ wiase yi mu a, ɛnneɛ mobɛhunu me, na mobɛnya mo mmasoɔ; ama faako a me wɔ no mo nso moaba hɔ.
Yei yɛ nkwa ahodoɔ a ɛnni awieɛ—sɛ wɔbɛhunu nyansafoɔ ne nokorɛfoɔ Nyankopɔn korɔ no ara, ne Yesu Kristo a wasoma no no. Me ne ɔno. Ne saa nti, monnye me mmara.
Ɛpono a ɛso ne kwan a ɛtrɛ no na ɛkɔ owuo mu, na wɔn a wɔwura mu no yɛ bebree, esiane sɛ wɔnnye me, nna wɔnntena me mmara mu.

Nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese mo, sɛ ɔbarima bi ware ɔyere bi sɛdeɛ m’asɛm teɛ, na wɔnam Honhom Kronkron bɔhyɛ no so yɛ nsɔano, sɛdeɛ me frɛ teɛ, na ɔbarima no anaa ɔbaa no yɛ bɔne anaa ɔto daapem apam foforɔ no mmara biara, anaa ɔdi abususɛm nyina ara, na sɛ wanni awu a ɔnam so de ka mogya a ɛdi bem gu a, wɔbɛtumi afiri adi aba wɔ owusɔreɛ a ɛdi kan no mu na wɔawura wɔn mmasoɔ mu; nanso wɔbɛseɛ wɔn wɔ honam mu, na wɔayi wɔn ama Satan ayaayaadeɛ kɔsi ɔgyeɛ da no, Awurade Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.

Abususɛm a ɛtia Sunsum Kronkron no, deɛ wɔmmfa nkyɛ wɔ wiase yi mu anaa wiase yi akyi no, ne sɛ mobɛdi awu a ɛnam so mobɛka mogya a ɛdi bem agu, na mobɛfoa me wuo so, akyire yi a moanya me daapem apam foforɔ no, Awurade Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ; na onii a ɔrenntena saa mmara yi mu no, kwan biara so no rentumi nwura m’animuonyam mu, mmom wɔbɛbu mo fɔ, Awurade na ɔseɛ.
Mene Awurade wo Nyankopɔn, na mɛma wo m’Asɔfodie Kronkron no mmara, sɛdeɛ mene m’Agya hyehyɛɛeɛ ansana wɔreyɛ wiase no.
Abraham nyaa nneɛma nyina ara, biribiara a ɔnyaae no, nam adiyisɛm ne mmarasɛm so, nam m’asɛm so, Awurade na ɔseɛ, na wawura ne mmasoɔ mu na ɔte n’ahennwa so.

Abraham nyaa bɔhyɛ faa n’aseni, ne n’asene mu aduaba ho—wofiri n’asene mu, ɛyɛ wo, m’akoa Joseph Smith—a ɛwɔ sɛ wɔkɔ so tena ase berɛ dodoɔ a wɔwɔ wiase mu; na ɛfa Abraham ne n’aseni ho no, wɔfiri wiase yi mu a wɔbɛkɔ so atena hɔ; wɔ wiase yi mu ne berɛ a wɔafiri wiase no, wɔbɛkɔ so awɔ hɔ sɛ nsoromma a wɔnni anobuo; anaa sɛ, sɛ wobɛtumi akan anwea a ɛwɔ mpoano a monntumi nnkan wɔn.
Saa bɔhyɛ yi yɛ mo nso mo dea, esiane sɛ mofiri Abraham mu, na wɔde bɔhyɛ no maa Abraham; na ɛnam saa mmara yi so na m’Agya nnwuma no ntoasoɔ wɔ, ɛno mu na ɔhyɛ ne ho animuonyam.
Ne saa nti, monkɔ na monkɔyɛ Abraham nnwuma; monwura me mmara mu na wɔbɛgye mo.
Nanso sɛ moannwura me mmara mu a morenntumi nnya m’Agya bɔhyɛ no, deɛ ɔde hyɛɛ Abraham no.

Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ Abraham, na Sarah de Hagar maa Abraham sɛ ɔyere. Na adɛn nti na ɔyɛɛ saa? Esiane sɛ na yei yɛ mmara no; na Hagar mu na nnipa bebree firi baaeɛ. Ne saa nti, yei hyɛɛ bɔhyɛ no ne nneɛma afoforɔ ma.
Ɛno nti, na Abraham wɔ afɔbuo ase anaa? Nokorɛ mese mo, Daabi; ɛfiri sɛ me, Awurade, na mehyɛɛ yei.
Wɔhyɛɛ Abraham sɛ ɔmfa ne ba Isak mmɔ afɔdeɛ; nanso, wɔatwerɛ sɛ: Nni awu. Nanso, Abraham ammpo, na wɔbuu yei sɛ teneneeɛ maa Abraham no.

Abraham nyaa mpenafoɔ, na wɔwowoo mma maa no; na wɔbuu yei sɛ teneneeyɛ maa Abraham, ɛfiri sɛ wɔde wɔn maa no, na ɔtenaa me mmara mu; sɛdeɛ Isak ne Yakob nso annyɛ biribiara gye sɛ deɛ wɔhyɛɛ wɔn no; na esiane sɛ wɔanyɛ biribiara gye sɛ deɛ wɔhyɛɛ wɔn no nti, wɔawura wɔn mmasoɔ mu, sɛdeɛ bɔhyɛ no teɛ, na wɔte nhennwa so, na wɔnnyɛ abɔfoɔ mmom wɔyɛ anyame.

Dawid nso nyaa yerenom ne mpenafoɔ bebree, ne me nkoa Solomon ne Mose nso, ne me nkoa afoforɔ bebree nso, firi abɔdeɛ ahyɛaseɛ bɛsi saa berɛ yi; na wɔanyɛ bɔne wɔ biribiara mu gye sɛ deɛ ɛfa nneɛma a wɔannya ammfiri me hɔ no ho.

Me na mede Dawid yerenom ne ne mpenafoɔ no maa no, nam m’akoa Natan nsa so, ne nkɔmhyɛfoɔ afoforɔ a wɔkura saa tumi yi nsafoa so; na wɔ saa nneɛma yi mu biara no wannyɛ bɔne anntia me gye sɛ deɛ ɛfa Uria ne ne yere ho; na, ne saa nti wahwe ase afiri ne mmasoɔ mu, na wanya ne kyɛfa; na ɔrennya yeinom nni wɔ saa wiase yi akyi, ɛfiri se mede yeinom maa ɔfoforɔ, Awurade na ɔseɛ.
Mene Awurade wo Nyankopɔn, na memaa wo, m’akoa Joseph, ɔfrɛ bi, na mede nneɛma nyina ara san ba bio. Bisa deɛ wopɛ, na wɔde bɛma wo sɛdeɛ m’asɛm teɛ.

Na sɛdeɛ woabisa afa awaresɛeɛ ho no, nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese wo sɛ, sɛ ɔbarima bi nya ɔyere wɔ daapem apam foforɔ no mu, na sɛ ɔkɔka ɔbarima foforɔ ho, na menyii no maa no nam me ngosra kronkron no so a, ɛnneɛ wasɛe awareɛ na wɔbɛseɛ no.
Na sɛ ɔnni daapem apam foforɔ no mu, na ɔkɔka ɔbarima foforɔ ho a, wasɛe awareɛ.
Na sɛ ne kunu kɔka ɔbaa foforɔ ho, na sɛ ɔwɔ bɔhyɛ ase a, ɛnneɛ wabu ne bɔhyɛ no so, na wasɛe awareɛ.

Na sɛ ɔnsɛee awareɛ, na mmom ɔdi bem na ɔmmuu ne bɔhyɛ so, na ɔnnim yei, na meda n’adi kyerɛ wo, m’akoa Joseph a, ɛnneɛ wobɛnya tumi, nam m’Asɔfodie Kronkron no tumi so agye no na wode no ama deɛ ɔnsɛee awareɛ na mmom wayɛ nokorɛfoɔ; ɛfiri sɛ wɔbɛyɛ no sodifoɔ wɔ nneɛma bebree so.
Na mede asɔfodie no nsafoa ne tumi no ma wo, ɛnam ɛno so na mede nneama nyina ara aba bio, na mɛda nneɛma nyina ara adi akyerɛ wo mmerɛ a ɛsɛ mu.

Na nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese wo sɛ biribiara a wobɛsɔ ano wɔ asase so no wɔbɛsɔ ano wɔ soro; na biribiara a wobɛkyekyere wɔ asase so wɔ me din mu na ɛnam m’asɛm so no, Awurade na ɔseɛ, wɔbɛkyekyere afebɔɔ wɔ ɔsoro; na obibiara a wode ne bɔne bɛfiri no wɔ asase so no wɔde bɛfiri no; na obibiara a woma ne bɔne tena hɔ wɔ asase so no wɔbɛma no atena hɔ wɔ soro.
Na bio, nokorɛ mese, obibiara a wobɛhyira no mɛhyira no, na obibiara a wobɛdome no mɛdome, Awurade na ɔseɛ; ɛfiri sɛ me, Awurade, meyɛ wo Onyankopɔn.

Na bio, nokorɛ mese wo, m’akoa Jospeh, sɛ biribibiara a wode bɛma wɔ asase so, na obibiara a woma no obi wɔ asase so, nam m’asɛm so ne sɛdeɛ m’asɛm teɛ no, wɔde nhyira, ɛne me tumi, bɛsra no na nnyɛ nnome, Awurade na ɔseɛ na ɔrennya afɔbuo biara wɔ asase so ne soro.

Ɛfiri sɛ mene Awurade wo Nyankopɔn, na mɛka wo ho mpo kɔsi wiase awieɛ, ne daapem nyina ara mu; ɛfiri sɛ nokorɛ mesɔ wo mmasoɔ ano wɔ wo so, na mesiesie ahennwa ma wo wɔ m’Agya aheman no mu, ne w’Agya Abraham.

Hwɛ, mahunu w’afɔrebɔ, na mede wo bɔne nyina ara bɛkyɛ wo; mahunu w’afɔrebɔ wɔ setie a woyɛ ma deɛ maka akyerɛ wo no. Ne saa nti, kɔ na mɛyɛ kwan ama woafiri mu, sɛdeɛ megyee Abraham afɔdeɛ a na ɛyɛ ne ba Isak no.

Nokorɛ, mese wo: Mede mmarasɛm bi ma wo yere, Emma Smith, m’abaawa, a mede no ama wo no sɛ ɔngyae na mma ɔmmfa deɛ mehyɛɛ wo sɛ fa ma no no; ɛfiri sɛ meyɛɛ yei de sɔɔ mo nyina hwɛɛe, Awurade na ɔseɛ sɛdeɛ meyɛɛ Abraham no, na ama mahwehwɛ afɔdeɛ afiri mo nsa mu, nam apam ne afɔrebɔ so.

Na ma m’abaawa, Emma Smith, nnye wɔn a wɔde wɔn ama m’akoa Joseph no nyina ara, ne wɔn a wɔyɛ wɔn ho teɛ na wɔyɛ kronkron wɔ m’anim; na wɔn a wɔn nnyɛ kronkron, na wɔaka sɛ wɔyɛ kronkron no, wɔbɛsɛe wɔn, Awurade Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.

Ɛfiri sɛ mene Awurade wo Nyankopɔn; na monyɛ setie mma me nne; na mema m’akoa Joseph kwan sɛ ɔnyɛ sodifoɔ wɔ nneɛma pii so; ɛfiri sɛ wayɛ nokorɛfoɔ wɔ nneɛma kakra bi ho, na ɛfiri nnɛ de rekɔ no mɛhyɛ no den.

Na mehyɛ m’abaawa, Emma Smith, sɛ ɔntena m’akoa Joseph ho na ɔmfam ne ho, na ɛnnyɛ obi foforɔ biara. Nanso sɛ wanni saa mmarasɛm yi so a wɔbɛsɛe no, Awurade na ɔseɛ; ɛfiri sɛ mene Awurade wo Nyankopɔn, na sɛ wanntena me mmara mu a mɛsɛe no.

Nanso sɛ ɔrenni saa mmarasɛm yi so a, ɛnneɛ m’akoa Joseph bɛyɛ nneɛma nyina ara ama no, mpo sɛdeɛ waka no; na mɛhyira no na mayɛ no mmɔho mmɔho na mama no agyanom ne ɛnanom mmɔho ɔha wɔ saa wiase yi mu, anuanom mmarima ne mmaa, afie ne nsase, yerenom ne mma, ne nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ ahenkyɛ wɔ ɛnni awieɛ wiase no mu.

Na bio, nokorɛ mese, ma m’abaawa mfa m’akoa Joseph mmaratoɔ nkyɛ no; na afei wɔde ne mmaratoɔ bɛkyɛ no, deɛ ɔnam so ato mmara atia me no; na me, Awurade wo Nyankopɔn, bɛhyira no, na mayɛ no mmɔho mmɔho, na mama n’akoma adi ahurisie.

Na bio, mese, mma m’akoa Joseph nnyi n’agyapdeɛ mmfiri ne nsa mu, anyɛ saa a ɔtamfo bɛba abɛsɛe no; ɛfiri sɛ Satan hwehwɛ sɛ ɔbɛsɛe no; na mene Awurade wo Nyankopɔn, na ɔyɛ m’akoa; na hwɛ, na hunu, meka ne ho, sɛdeɛ na meka Abraham, w’agya ho no, mpo kɔsi ne mmasoɔ ne n’animuonyam mu.
Afei, ɛfa asɔfodie mmara no ho no, nneɛma pii wɔ mu a ɛka ho.

Nokorɛ, sɛ m’Agya frɛ onipa bi, sɛdeɛ ɔyɛɛ Aaron no, a me ara mede me nne frɛɛ no no, na sɛ ɛyɛ deɛ ɔsomaa me no nne so, na mama no asɔfodie tumi no nsafoa a, sɛ ɔyɛ biribi wɔ me din mu, na ɛnam m’asɛm so, na sɛ ɛyɛ sɛdeɛ me mmara teɛ a, ɔnnyɛɛ bɔne, na mɛbu no bem.
Ne saa nti, mma obiara nkasa ntia m’akoa Joseph ; ɛfiri sɛ mɛbu no bem ; na ɔbɛbɔ afɔdeɛ a merehwehwɛ afiri ne nsam ama ne mmaratoɔ, Awurade wo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.

Na bio, deɛ ɛfa asɔfodie mmara no ho no—sɛ ɔbarima bi ware ɔbaabunu na sɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔware foforɔ, na sɛ deɛ ɔdi kan no ma ne ho kwan, na sɛ ɔware deɛ ɔtɔ so mmienu no, na wɔyɛ mmaabunu, na wɔnhyɛɛ ɔbarima foforɔ biara bɔ a, ɛnneɛ wɔbu no bem; ɔrentumi nsɛe awareɛ ɛfiri sɛ wɔde wɔn ama no; na ɔrentumi mmɔ deɛ ɛyɛ ne deɛ na ɛnnyɛ obi foforɔ deɛ ho adwamman.
Na sɛ wɔnam saa mmara yi so de mmaabunu du ma no a, ɔrentumi nsɛe awareɛ, ɛfiri sɛ wɔyɛ ne dea, na wɔde wɔn ama no; ɛno nti wɔbu no.

Nanso, sɛ akyire yi mmaabunu du a waware wɔn yi mu baako anaa emu biara kɔka ɔbarima foforɔ ho a, wasɛe awareɛ, na wɔbɛsɛe no; ɛfiri sɛ wɔde ama no sɛ ɔnnɔre na ɔnhyɛ asase so ma, sɛdeɛ me mmara teɛ, na ɔnhyɛ bɔhyɛ a m’Agya de maaeɛ ansana wɔreto wiase fapem no ma, na ama wɔn mmasoɔ wɔ ɛnni awieɛ wiase ahodoɔ no mu, ama wɔatumi awowo nnipa akra; na yei mu na wɔtoa m’Agya adwuma so, ama wɔahyɛ no animuonyam.

Na bio, nokorɛ, nokorɛ mese mo, sɛ ɔbarima bi wɔ yere, na ɔkura saa tumi yi nsafoa, na ɔkyerɛkyerɛ no m’asɔfodie no mmara, deɛ ɛfa saa nneɛma yi ho a, ɛnneɛ ɔbɛgye adi na wasom no, anyɛ saa a wɔbɛsɛe no, Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ; ɛfiri sɛ mɛsɛe no; ɛfiri sɛ mɛyɛ me din kɛseɛ wɔ wɔn a wɔgye me mmara na wɔtena mu no nyina ara so.

Ne saa nti, sɛ ɔyere no annye saa mmara yi a, mɛnya ho kwan ama no okunu no anya nneɛma nyina ara biribibiara a me, Awurade ne Nyankopɔn, de bɛma no, ɛfiri sɛ ɔyere no annye anni na wannsom no sɛdeɛ m’asɛm teɛ; na ɛno nti ɔyere no bɛyɛ mmaratofoɔ no; na ɛnnhia sɛ okunu no di Sara mmara no so, deɛ ɔsomm Abraham sɛdeɛ mmara no teɛ berɛ a mehyɛɛ Abraham sɛ ɔmfa Hagar sɛ ɔyere no.
Na afei, deɛ ɛfa saa mmara yi ho no, nokorɛ, nokorɛ, mese mo, mɛda pii adi akyerɛ mo akyire yi; ne saa nti, ma yei nso ha saa berɛ yi. Hwɛ, mene Alfa ne Omega. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/133.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 133
chapter_summary: 1–6, Wɔhyɛ Ahotefoɔ no sɛ wɔnsiesie wɔn ho ntwɛn Mmaeɛ a ɛtɔ so Mmienu no; 7–16, Wɔhyɛ nnipa nyina ara sɛ wɔnnwane mfiri Babel, wɔmmra Sion, na wɔnsiesie wɔn ho ntwɛn Awurade da kɛseɛ no; 17–35, Ɔbɛgyina Sion Bepɔ no so, nsasepɔn no bɛyɛ asase baako, na Israel mmusuakuo a wɔayera no bɛsan wɔn akyi aba; 36–40, Wɔnam Joseph Smith so de asɛmpa no baa bio sɛ wɔnka ho asɛm wɔ wiase nyina ara mu; 41–51, Awurade bɛsiane aba fam wɔ awerɛtɔ mu wɔ atirimuɔdenfoɔ so; 52–56, Ɛbɛyɛ wɔn a Wagye wɔn no afe; 57–74, Ɛwɔ sɛ wɔsoma ma wɔde asɛmpa no firi adi kɔgye Ahotefoɔ no na wɔde sɛe atirimuɔdenfoɔ.

verses.text: Monyɛ aso, O mo nkorɔfoɔ a mowɔ m’asɔre mu, Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ, na montie Awurade asɛm a ɛfa mo ho—
Awurade a ɔbɛba ne tɛmpol mu mpofirim; Awurade a ɔbɛba fam de nnome aba wiase so wɔ atemmuo mu; aane, wɔ aman biara a wɔn werɛ firi Onyankopɔn so, ne wɔn a wɔnni nyamesu a wɔwɔ mo mu nyina ara so.
Na ɔbɛyi ne basa kronkron no adi wɔ amanaman nyina ara ani so, na asase ano nyina ara bɛhunu wɔn Nyankopɔn nkwagyeɛ.
Ɛno nti, monsiesie mo ho, monsiesie mo ho, O me nkurɔfoɔ; monte mo ho; mommoa mo ho ano, O mo nkurɔfoɔ a mowɔ m’asɔre mu, wɔ Sion asase so, mo a wɔnhyɛɛ mo sɛ montena nyina ara no.
Momfiri Babel nkɔ. Monte mo ho mo a mosoa Awurade nnwineɛ no.
Momfrɛ mo nhyia kronkron no, na montaa ne mo ho mo ho nkasa. Na momma obiara mfrɛ Awurade din.
Aane, nokorɛ mese mo bio, berɛ no aso sɛ Awurade nne bɛba mo hɔ: Momfiri Babel nkɔ; mommoa mo ho ano mfiri aman no ntam, mfiri mframa nnan no mu, mfiri ɔsoro ano baako nkɔ baako so.
Monsoma m’asɔre mpaninfoɔ nkɔ aman a wɔwɔ akyirikyiri no hɔ; nkɔ ɛpo asupɔ so; monsoma nkɔ amannɔne nsase so; momfrɛ aman nyina ara, ɛdi kan amanamanmufoɔ, na afei Yudafoɔ no.

Na hwɛ, na hunu, yei bɛyɛ wɔn nteamu, ne Awurade nne a ɛkɔ nnipa nyina ara hɔ: Momfiri adi nkɔ Sion asase so, ama wɔatrɛ me nkorɔfoɔ ahyeɛ mu, na ama wɔahyɛ ne mpɛɛwa den, na ama Sion afiri adi akɔ amantam a atwa ahyia no nyina ara mu.

Aane, ma nne no mfiri adi nkɔ nnipa nyina ara hɔ: Monnyane na monsɔre na momfiri adi nkɔhyia Ayeforɔkunu no; hwɛ na hunu, Ayeforɔkunu no reba; momfiri adi nkɔhyia no. Monsiesie mo ho mma Awurade da kɛseɛ no.
Ne saa nti, monwɛn, ɛfiri sɛ monnim da no anaa dɔnhwere no.
Ne saa nti, ma wɔn a wɔwɔ Amanamanmufoɔ no mu no nnwane nkɔ Sion.
Na ma wɔn a wɔfiri Yuda mu no nnwane nkɔ Yerusalem, nkɔ mmepɔ no so Awurade fie no.
Momfiri aman no mu nkɔ, mpo momfiri Babel, mfiri atirimuɔdensɛm mu, deɛ ɛyɛ honhom mu Babel no.
Nanso nokorɛ, sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ nie, mma mo mmirikatuo nnyɛ ntɛmpɛ so, mmom momma wɔnsiesie nneɛma nyina ara wɔ mo anim; na deɛ ɔrekɔ no, mma no nnhwɛ n’akyi anyɛ saa a sɛeɛ bɛba no so mpofirim.
Monyɛ aso na montie, O mo asase sotefoɔ. Montie mmɔ mu, mo m’asɔre mpaninfoɔ, na montie Awurade nne; ɛfiri sɛ ɔfrɛ nnipa nyina ara, na ɔhyɛ nnipa wɔ baabiara nyina ara sɛ wɔnsakyera.
Na hwɛ, Awurade Nyankopɔn asoma ne bɔfoɔ afiri adi a ɔretea mu wɔ soro mu ka sɛ: Monsiesie Awurade kwan no, na momma n’anammɔn kwan ntene, ɛfiri sɛ ne dɔnhwere a ɔreba no abɛn—
Berɛ a Adwammaa no bɛgyina Sion Bepɔ so, na mpem ɔha aduanan nnan ka ne ho, a wɔatwerɛ n’Agya no din agu wɔn moma so no.
Ɛno nti, monsiesie mo ho mma Ayeforokunu no mmaeɛ no; monkɔ, momfiri adi nkɔhyia no.
Na hwɛ, ɔbɛgyina Ngo-Bepɔ no so, ne ɛpo kɛseɛ no so, mpo ɛbunu kɛseɛ no so, ne ɛpo nsupɔ so, ne Sion asase so.
Na ne ɔbɛma nne so afiri Sion, na ɔbɛkasa afiri Yerusalem, na wɔbɛte ne nne wɔ nnipa nyina ara mu;
Na ɛbɛyɛ sɛ asuo pii nne, na ayɛ te sɛ apranaa kɛseɛ nne, a ɛbɛbubu mmepɔ, na wɔrenhunu mmɔnhwa bio.
Ɔbɛhyɛ ɛbunu kɛseɛ no, na wɔbɛpia no asan akɔ n’akyiri akɔ atifi aman no mu, na nsupɔ no bɛyɛ asase baako;
Na wɔbɛsan de Yerusalem asase ne Sion asase no asan akɔ wɔn ankasa bea bio, na asase no bɛyɛ te sɛ deɛ na ɛteɛ wɔ nna no mu ansana wɔrekyekyɛ mu no.
Na Awurade, mpo Agyenkwa no, bɛgyina ne nkorɔfoɔ mfinfini, na ɔbɛdi hene wɔ honam nyina ara so.
Na wɔbɛkae wɔn a wɔwɔ atifi aman mu no wɔ Awurade anim; na wɔn nkɔmhyɛfoɔ bɛte ne nne, na wɔrennsi wɔn ho kwan bio; na wɔbɛbɔ abotan na asukɔtwea no bɛtene agu fam wɔ wɔn anim.
Na wɔbɛyi kwantempɔn wɔ ebunu kɛseɛ no mfinfini.
Wɔn atamfo bɛyɛ afo adeɛ ama wɔn,
Na nkwa nsuo mmura bɛfiri anweatam hunu so aba; na asase wesee no rennyɛ asase a sukɔm de no bio.
Na wɔde wɔn ademudeɛ a ɛsom bo bɛba abɛma Efraim mma, me nkoa no.
Na esie a ɛwɔ hɔ daapem ahyeɛ so bɛwoso wɔ wɔn anim.
Na ɛhɔ no wɔbɛhwe ase na wɔbɛhyɛ wɔn animuonyam ahenkyɛ, mpo wɔ Sion, nam Awurade nkoa, mpo Efraim mma no, nsa so.
Na wɔde daapem anigyeɛ nnwom bɛhyɛ wɔn ma.
Hwɛ, yei ne Onyankopɔn a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no nhyira wɔ Israel mmusuakuo no so, na nhyira a ɛsom bo kyɛn yei bɛgu Efraim ne ne mfɛfoɔ tiri so.
Na wɔn a wɔwɔ Yuda abusukuo mu no nso, wɔn yaw akyi no, wɔbɛte wɔn ho wɔ kronkronyɛ mu wɔ Awurade anim, ma wɔatena ne nkyɛn adekyeeɛ ne adesaeɛ, daa afebɔɔ.

Na afei, nokorɛ Awurade na ɔseɛ, sɛdeɛ mobɛhunu saa nneɛma yi wɔ mo ntam no, O mo asase sotefoɔ, masoma ɔbɔfoɔ afiri adi a watu nenam ɔsoro mu, a ɔkura daapem asɛmpa no, deɛ wayi ne ho adi akyerɛ ebinom na ɔde ama onipa no, deɛ ɔbɛyi ne ho adi akyerɛ bebree a wɔwɔ asase no so.
Na wɔbɛka saa asɛmpa yi akyerɛ ɔman, ne abusuakuo biara mu, ne kasa, ne nnipa nyina ara mu.
Na Onyankopɔn nkoa bɛfiri adi akɔ, na wɔde nne kɛseɛ aka sɛ: Monsuro Onyankopɔn na momfa animuonyam mma no, ɛfiri sɛ n’atemmuo berɛ no aso;
Na monsom deɛ ɔyɛɛ ɔsoro, ne asase, ne ɛpo, ne nsutire no—
Na wɔbɛfrɛ Awurade din adekyee ne anadwo, aka sɛ: O sɛ anka wobɛsunsuane ɔsoro mu na woasiane aba fam, ama mmepɔ no atene agu fam wɔ w’anim a.
Na ɛho mmuaeɛ bɛgu wɔn tiri so; ɛfiri sɛ Awurade anim bɛyɛ sɛ ogya a ɛrenane na ɛrehyeɛ, ne sɛdeɛ ogya yɛ ma nsuo huru.
O Awurade, wobɛba fam na woada wodin adi akyerɛ w’atamfo, na aman nyina ara ho bɛpopo wɔ w’anim—
Berɛ a woyɛ nneɛma huuhu no, nneɛma a wɔn ani nna no;
Aane, berɛ a wobɛba fam, na mmepɔ bɛtene agu fam wɔ w’anim no, wobɛhyia ɔnii a ɔdi ahurisie na ɔyɛ tenenee adwuma, deɛ ɔkae wo wɔ w’akwan mu no.
Ɛfiri sɛ fiti wiase ahyɛaseɛ no nnipa nntee, aso nso nntee, anaa ani nnhunuui, O Nyankopɔn, gye wo nko, nneɛma akɛseɛ a woasiesie ama deɛ ɔtwɛn woɔ no.
Na wɔbɛka sɛ: Hwan ne deɛ ɔresane firi Onyankopɔn hɔ wɔ soro reba yi a ne ntaadeɛ abere kɔɔ yi; aane na ɔrefiri mmeaɛ a wɔnnim, na ɔhyɛ animuonyam ataade, na ɔde ahoɔden kɛseɛ retu kwan yi?
Na ɔbɛka sɛ: Mene deɛ ɔkasaae wɔ tenenee mu, a ɔwɔ tumi sɛ ɔgye nkwa no.
Na Awurade aduradeɛ bɛyɛ kɔkɔɔ, n’ataadeɛ bɛyɛ sɛ deɛ ɔtiatia nsa-akyi amena so deɛ no.
