Na n’anim animuonyam no bɛyɛ kɛseɛ pa ara ma owia de n’anim bɛsie aniwuo mu, na ɔsrane remma ne hann bio, na nsoromma bɛtoto agu afiri wɔn tenaberɛ.
Na wɔbɛte ne nne: Me nko ara matiatia nsa-akyi-amena no mu, na mede atemmuo aba nnipa nyina ara so; nan a obiara nnka me ho;

Na matiatia wɔn so wɔ m’abufuhyeɛ mu, na metiatiaa wɔn so wɔ me m’abufuo mu, na mapete wɔn mogya agu m’ataadeɛ mu, na makeka m’aduradeɛ mu nyinaa ara; ɛfiri sɛ na yei yɛ m’awerɛtɔ da a na ɛwɔ m’akoma mu.
Na afei wɔn a magye wɔn no afe aso; na wɔbɛka wɔn Awurade adɔyɛ no, ne deɛ ɔde agu wɔn so no nyina ara sɛdeɛ ne papayɛ teɛ, ne sɛdeɛ n’adɔyɛ teɛ, afebɔɔ ne daa.
Na wɔ wɔn amanehunu mu no ɔhunuu amane. Na n’anim bɔfoɔ gyee wɔn nkwa; na ne dɔ, ne ne mmɔborɔhun mu no, ɔgyee wɔn, na ɔmaa wɔn so, na ɔsoaa wɔn tete nna no nyina ara;
Aane, Henok nso, ne wɔn a na wɔka ne ho; nkɔmhyɛfoɔ a na wɔdi n’anim; ne Noa nso, ne wɔn a na wɔdi n’anim; ne Mose nso, ne wɔn a na wɔdi n’anim;
Na ɛfiri Mose so kɔ Elia so, na ɛfiri Elia so kɔ Yohane so, wɔn a na wɔka Kristo ho wɔ ne wusɔreɛ mu no, ne asomafoɔ kronkron no, ne Abraham, Isak, ne Yakob, bɛwɔ Odwammaa no anim.

Na ahotefoɔ no nnamena so bɛbuebue; na wɔbɛfiri adi aba na wɔbɛgyina Odwammaa no nsa nifa so, berɛ a ɔbɛgyina Sion Bepɔ so, ne Ahenkuro Kronkron no mu, Yerusalem foforɔ no; na wɔbɛto Odwammaa no dwom, adekyee ne adesaeɛ daa afebɔɔ.
Na yei nti, sɛdeɛ nnipa bɛnya animuonyam a wɔrebɛda no adi no mu kyɛfa nti, Awurade maa n’asɛmpa no mahyɛ no, ne daapem apam no, firii adi baae, na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ mu pefee, korɔgyeen—

Sɛdeɛ ɛbɛsiesie wɔn a wɔyɛ mmrɛ ama nneɛma a ɛreba asase so ne Awurade soma no wɔ da a wɔn a wɔyɛ mmrɛ no bɛhyɛ anyansafoɔ aniwuo no mu, na aketewa no abɛyɛ ɔman hoɔdenfoɔ, na mmienu ama mpen dudu adwane.
Na Awurade nam nneɛma a ɛyɛ mmrɛ wɔ asase so bɛposa aman no nam ne Honhom tumi no so.
Na yei nti na wɔde saa mmaransɛm yi maae; wɔhyɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔmfa nsie wiase wɔ da a wɔde maae no mu, nanso seesei ɛwɔ sɛ ɛfiri adi kɔ ma honam nyina ara hɔ—
Na yei sɛdeɛ Awurade adwene ne ne pɛ teɛ, deɛ ɔdi honam nyina ara so no.
Na deɛ ɔsakyera na ɔdwira ne ho wɔ Awurade anim no wɔbɛma no nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ.
Na wɔn a wɔnntie Awurade nne no, deɛ wɔnam nkɔmhyɛni Mose so twerɛɛe no bɛba mu wɔ wɔn so sɛ wɔbɛtwa wɔn afiri nkorɔfoɔ no mu.

Na deɛ nkɔmhyɛni Malaki twerɛɛe no nso: Na hwɛ, da no reba a ɛbɛhye sɛ fononoo, na ahantanfoɔ nyina ara ne wɔn a wɔyɛ atirimuɔdensɛm bɛyɛ ɛserɛ dwaneeɛ; na da a ɛreba no bɛhye wɔn, asafo Awurade na ɔseɛ, na ɛrennya wɔn nhini anaa mman.
Ɛno nti, yei bɛyɛ mmuaeɛ a Awurade de bɛma wɔn:
Na saa da no a mebaa me deɛ mu no, onipa biara a ɔwɔ mo ntam annye me, na wɔpamoo mo.
Berɛ a mefrɛɛ bio no na mo mu biara nni hɔ a ɔbɛgye so; nanso na me nsa nyɛɛ tiawa koraa sɛ merenntumi mma ɔgyeɛ, anaa me tumi nnsua sɛ ɛbɛgye nkwa.
Hwɛ, wɔ me nkaanim mu no, mema ɛpo we. Mema nsubɔnten dane ɛserɛ; ɛmu nam bɔn, na sukɔm kunkum wɔn.
Mede esum kabii fira ɔsorosoro na meyɛ wɔn nkataho ayitoma.
Na mobɛnya yei afiri me nsa mu—mobɛda fam wɔ awerɛhoɔ mu.
Hwɛ, na hunu, obiara nni hɔ a ɔbɛgye mo; ɛfiri sɛ moannyɛ setie amma me nne berɛ a mefrɛɛ mo firii ɔsorosoro no; moannye me nkoa anni, na berɛ a wɔsomaa wɔn baa mo nkyɛn no moannye wɔn.
Ɛno nti, wɔsɔɔ adanseɛ no ano na wɔkyekyeree mmara no, na wɔyii mo maa esum.
Yeinom bɛkɔ akyirikyiri sum mu, faako a esu, ne benabɔ, ne setwerɛ wɔ no.
Hwɛ Awurade mo Nyankopɔn na aka. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/134.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 134
chapter_summary: 1–4, Ɛwɔ sɛ aban kora ahonim ne ɔsom ho fahodie; 5–8, Ɛwɔ sɛ nnipa nyina ara boa wɔn aban na wɔde obuo ne ahobrɛaseɛ ma mmara no; 9–10, Ɛnnsɛ sɛ nyamesom akuo de aban mmara tumi di dwuma; 11–12, Nnipa di bem sɛ wɔbɛbɔ wɔn ho na wɔn agyapadeɛ ho ban.

verses.text: Yɛgye di sɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔhyehyɛɛ amammuo maa onipa mfasoɔ; na ɔbɛma wɔabu wɔn nneyɛɛ a ɛfa yeinom ho akonta, wɔ mmara hyehyɛ ne ɛho dwumadie mu, sɛdeɛ manmufoɔ bɛnya yiedie ne banbɔ.

Yɛgye di sɛ amammuo biara nntumi nnyɛ adwuma wɔ asomdwoeɛ mu, gye sɛ wɔyɛ ɛmu mmara na wɔdi so a wɔnntoto no ase, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛma ankorɛankorɛ biara anya ahofadie de n’ahonim abɔ ne nkwa ne n’agyapadeɛ ho ban, anya ho kwan ahwɛ so.

Yɛgyedi sɛ amammuo nyina ara hia aman adwumayɛfoɔ pa ara a wɔbɛhwɛ ma saa mmara yi ayɛ adwuma; na ɛwɔ sɛ wɔhwehwɛ wɔn a wɔde mmara no bɛsom wɔ pɛpɛyɛ ne atɛntenenee mu, na wɔnam nkorɔfoɔ no nne so sɔ wɔn mu, sɛ ɛyɛ kwasafoman, anaa ɔhene no pɛ a.

Yɛgye di sɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔhyehyɛɛ nyamesom; na nnipa bu akonta kyerɛ no, ɔno nko ara, wɔ ɛho dwumadie mu, gye sɛ wɔn nyamesom nsusuiɛ kyerɛ wɔn sɛ wɔntiatia afoforɔ hokwan ne wɔn fahodie so; nanso yɛn-nnye nni sɛ nnipa mmara wɔ ho kwan sɛ ɛba nyamesom mmara nhyehyɛeɛ mu na ɛkyekyere nnipa ahonim, anaa ɛkyerɛ badwam ne kokoa som yɔbea; ama aban asɛnnifoɔ no asi adebɔne ho kwan, mmom ɛnnsɛ sɛ ɔdi ahonim so dabiara da; ɛwɔ sɛ ɔma ɛfɔdie ho asotwe, nanso, ɛnnsɛ sɛ ɔtiatia ɔkra fahodie so.

Yɛgye di sɛ ɛyɛ, nnipa nyina ara asɛdeɛ sɛ, amammuo biara a wɔwɔ mu no wɔsɔ mu na wɔtae akyire, berɛ a saa amammuo yi mu mmara no bɔ wɔn awosuo ne hokwan a wɔntumi nnye ho ban; na ɔsɔretia ne atuateɛ mmfata ɔman ba biara a ɔwɔ saa ahobanbɔ yi, na ɛwɔ sɛ wɔma ho asotwe sɛdeɛ ɛsɛ; na aban biara wɔ ho kwan sɛ ɔyɛ mmara a wɔn ankasa susu sɛ ɛfata pa ara sɛ ɛyɛ ma ɔmanmufoɔ no obiara; nanso, berɛ korɔ no ara mu no, ɛwɔ sɛ ɛsan nso bu ahonim fahodie sɛ ɛyɛ kronkron.

Yɛgye di sɛ ɛwɔ sɛ wɔde anidie ma onipa biara wɔ ne diberɛ mu, sodifoɔ ne asɛnnifoɔ sɛdeɛ wɔn diberɛ teɛ, wɔn a wɔayi wɔn sɛdeɛ bemdifoɔ bɛnya ahobanbɔ na wɔn a wɔdi fɔ bɛnya asotwe; na ɛwɔ sɛ nnipa nyina ara de obuo ne ahobrɛaseɛ ma mmara no, ɛsiane sɛ sɛ yeinom nni hɔ a basabasayɛ ne ehu bɛhyɛ asomdwoeɛ ne koroyɛ ananmu; na wɔhyehyɛɛ nnipa mmara maa botaeɛ pɔtee sɛ ɛmma ankorɛankorɛ ne aman yiedie, wɔ onipa ne onipa ntam; na wɔde mmara kronkron firi soro maae, a ɛkyerɛ mmara a ɛfa honhom mu nsɛm ho, sɛ ɛnnyɛ gyedie ne ɔsom, na onipa ama ɛho mmuaeɛ akyerɛ ne Yɛfoɔ.

Yɛgye di sɛ sodifoɔ, aman, ne aban wɔ hokwan, na ɛyɛ asɛdeɛ sɛ wɔyɛ mmara ma ɔman mma nyina ara ahobanbɔ wɔ wɔn nyamesom gyedie ho dwumadie wɔ fahodie mu; nanso yɛn-nnye nni sɛ wɔwɔ hokwan wɔ mmara mu sɛ wɔbɛsi ɔman mma ho kwan wɔ saa akwannya yi ho, anaa wɔbɛbara wɔn wɔ wɔn nsusuiɛ mu, sɛ wɔkyerɛ obuo ne anidie ma mmara no na saa nyamesom nsusuiɛ no mmu sɔretia ne tirisopam bem a.

Yɛgye di sɛ ɛwɔ sɛ wɔma bɔne ho asotwe sɛdeɛ mfomsoɔ no teɛ; na awudie, oyima, korɔnobɔ, awi, ne amansam asomdwoeɛ sɛeɛ, wɔ kwan biara so no, ɛwɔ sɛ wɔma ɛho asotwe sɛdeɛ mfomsoɔ no anoɔden teɛ ne sɛdeɛ suban bɔne a ɛbɛtumi aba nnipa ntam no teɛ, wɔmfa saa aban no a wɔyɛɛ saa mfomsoɔ no wɔ mu no mmara na ɛnyɛ; na sɛdeɛ asomdwoeɛ ne ahotɔ bɛba ɔman no mu no, ɛsɛ sɛ nnipa nyina ara nam wɔn tumi so tu anamɔn de wɔn a wɔfom mmara pa no ba asotwe mu.

Yɛn-nnye nni sɛ ɛtene sɛ wɔde nyamesom nkɛntɛnsoɔ fra aban amammuo mu, a wɔnam so de pagya nyamesom kuo bi na wɔbara ɔfoforɔ wɔ ne honhom mu akwannya ho, na asɔremma no ankorɛankorɛ hokwan, sɛ ɔman mma no, wɔde kame wɔn.

Yɛgye di sɛ nyamesom akuo nyina ara wɔ hokwan sɛ wɔne wɔn kuo-mma di wɔ suban a ɛmmfata ho, sɛdeɛ mmara ne ahyɛdeɛ a ɛwɔ saa kuo no mu no teɛ; gye sɛ saa anodie no fa ayɔnkofa ne gyinabea pa ho; nanso, yɛn-nnye nni sɛ nyamesom kuo biara wɔ tumi sɛ wɔsɔ nnipa hwɛ wɔ agyapadeɛ hokwan anaa nkwa ho, sɛ wɔbɛgye wiase yi mu nneɛma afiri wɔn hɔ, anaa wɔde wɔn bɛto asiane mu wɔ wɔn nkwa anaa honam akwaa bi ho, anaa sɛ wɔde honam mu asotwe bɛba wɔn so. Deɛ wɔbɛtumi ayɛ ara ne sɛ wɔbɛyi wɔn adi afiri wɔn kuo no mu, na wɔde kuo no mu ayɔnkofa akame wɔn.

Yɛgye di sɛ nnipa wɔ ho kwan sɛ wɔde asɛm kɔdan ɔman mmara no de siesie nsɛm a ɛnnyɛ ne nsɛm a ɛyɛ yaw, berɛ a wɔadi obi dɛm anaa wɔatiatia obi agyapadeɛ hokwan so anaa wɔasɛe obi din, baabi a saa mmara yi wɔ a ɛbɛbɔ yeinom ho ban; nanso yɛgye di sɛ nnipa nyina ara di bem sɛ wɔbɔ wɔn ho wɔn, wɔn nnamfo, ne wɔn agyapadeɛ, ne aban no ho ban firi ntɔkwa a ɛmmfa mmara kwan mu ne ataataa wɔ nnipa biara so wɔ mmerɛ a ɛyɛ den mu, berɛ a wɔnntumi nnkɔdan mmara no, na wɔnni ɔgyefoɔ biara.

Yɛgye di sɛ ɛfata sɛ yɛka asɛmpa no kyerɛ asase so aman nyina ara, na yɛbɔ ateneneefoɔ kɔkɔ sɛ wɔnnye wɔn ho mfiri wiase yi porɔeɛ no mu; nanso yɛn-nnye nni sɛ ɛfata sɛ yɛde yɛn ho hyehyɛ nkoasom nsɛm mu, anaa yɛka asɛmpa no kyerɛ wɔn, anaa yɛbɔ wɔn asu wɔ berɛ a ɛtia wɔn awuranom pɛ anaa wɔn apɛdeɛ, anaa yɛde yɛn ho gyegye mu anaa yɛnya nkɛntɛnsoɔ ketewa bi mpo wɔ wɔn so ma wɔkyi wɔn abrabɔ mu tebea, na yɛanam so de nnipa nkwa akɔ asiane mu; yɛgye di sɛ saa ahohyehyɛ yi nnyɛ mmara na ɛmmfata, na ɛtumi sɛe ɔman biara asomdwoeɛ na ɛma adasamma kɔ nkoasom mu.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/135.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 135
chapter_summary: 1–2, Wɔkum Joseph ne Hyrum wɔ Carthage Afiase; 3, Wɔka Nkɔmhyɛni no gyinabea kɛseɛ pa ara ho asɛm; 4–7, Wɔn mogya a ɛdi bem no di adanseɛ fa adwuma no nokorɛ ne ne kronkronyɛ ho.

verses.text: Sɛdeɛ yɛbɛsɔ saa nwoma yi ne Mormon Nwoma no adanseɛ ano no, yɛde Joseph Smith Nkɔmhyɛni no, ne Hyrum Smith Agyapanin no mogyadansedie to dwa. Akakabensɛmfoɔ a wɔkura akodeɛ—a wɔaka wɔn ho tuntum—a wɔyɛ nnipa bɛyɛ 150 de rekɔ 200 na wɔbɔɔ wɔn tuo wɔ Carthage afiase, wɔ Ayewohomummɔ 27, 1844, bɛyɛ anwummerɛ nnɔnnum. Hyrum na wɔbɔɔ no tuo kane na ɔtɔɔ fam dinn, na ɔkaa sɛ: mayɛ owufoɔayɛ owufoɔ! Joseph huri firii mpoma no ano, nanso berɛ a ɔgu so no wɔbɔɔ no tuo kumm no, na ɔteaa mu kaa sɛ: O Awurade me Nynakopɔn Awurade me Nynakopɔn! Wɔn wuo akyi no, wɔbɔɔ wɔn mmienu no tuo atirimuɔden kwan so, na wɔbɔɔ wɔn mmienu no akoraboɔ nnan.

John Taylor ne Willard Richards, Dumienu no mu mmienu, nko ara ne nnipa a na wɔwɔ hɔ saa berɛ no; wɔde tuo akoraboɔ nnan piraa deɛ ɔdi kan no atirimuɔden so, nanso seesei ne ho atɔ no; deɛ ɔdi akyiri nam Onyankopɔn adom so firii mu a tokuro baako mpo anntɔ n’ataadeɛ mu.

Joseph Smith, Awurade Nkɔmhyɛni ne ne Dehunufoɔ no, ayɛ pii ama nnipa nkwagyeɛ wɔ wiase yi mu kyɛn onipa biara a watena mu da, gye sɛ Yesu nko ara. Wɔ mmerɛ tiawa mu a ɛyɛ mfeɛ aduonu no, ɔde Mormon Nwoma a ɔnam Onyankopɔn akyɛdeɛ ne ne tumi so kyerɛɛ aseɛ no afiri adi aba, na wɔnam no so na wɔabɔ ho dawuro wɔ nsasepɔn mmienu so; ɔde daapem asɛmpa no mahyɛ no a ɛwɔ mu no akɔ wiase afanan nyina ara; ɔde adiyisɛm ne mmaransɛm a ɛbɔ mu yɛ saa Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam nwoma yi mu no afiri adi aba, ne nyansa nwoma ne nkyerɛkyerɛ afoforɔ bebree a ɛma nnipa mma mfasoɔ; ɔboaboaa Nna a Ɛdi Akyire Ahotefoɔ mpempem bebree ano, ɔkyekyeree ahenkuro kɛseɛ, na ɔgyaa atenka pa ne din a wɔrentumi nsɛe. Ɔbɔɔ okunini bra, na ɔwuui sɛ okunini wɔ Onyankopɔn ne ne nkorɔfoɔ ani so; na te sɛ Awurade nnipa a ɔsraa wɔn ngo wɔ tete berɛ no mu pii no, ɔde ɔno ankasa mogya sɔɔ ne som-adwuma ne ne nnwuma ano; ne nua Hyrum nso saa ara. Wɔ nkwa mu no wɔn mu antete, na owuo mu nso wɔn mu ampaapae!

Berɛ a Joseph kɔɔ Carthage sɛ ɔde ne ho rekɔma mmara ho nhyehyɛeɛ a wɔapatu ayɛ no, nna mmienu anaa mmiɛnsa ansana a wɔrebɛkum no no, ɔkaa sɛ: “Merekɔ nankumbea te sɛ odwamma; nanso mayɛ dinn te sɛ ahuhuroberɛ anɔpa; mewɔ ahonim a ɛnni fɔ wɔ Onyankopɔn fam, ne nnipa nyina ara fam. Mɛwu bemdie mu, na wɔbɛka nso afa me ho sɛ—wɔhyɛɛ da na wɔkumm no.”—Saa anɔpa no ara, Hyrum siesie ne ho wiee sɛ ɔrekɔ no—so na ɛwɔ sɛ yɛka sɛ ɔrekɔ nankumbea hɔ? Aane, ɛfiri sɛ saa na na ɛteɛ—ɔkann ɔkasapɛn a ɛtoa so yi, ɛrekɔ Eter ti dumienu awieɛ hɔ, wɔ Mormon Nwoma no mu, na ɔbuu krataa no ano hɔ too so:

Na ɛbaa sɛ mebɔɔ mpaeɛ kyerɛɛ Awurade sɛ ɔbɛma Amanamanmufoɔ no adom, ama wɔanya ɔdɔ mapa. Na ɛbaa sɛ Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Sɛ wɔnni ɔdɔ mapa a, ɛho nnhia mma wo, woadi nokorɛ; ɛno nti, wo ntadeɛ ani bɛte hann. Na ɛnam sɛ woahunu wo mmerɛyɛ no nti, wɔbɛma woayɛ, ara mpo ama wo de akɔtena baabi a masiesie wɔ m’agya fie no. Na afei me … ne Amanamanmufoɔ no di nkra, aane, ne me nuanom nso a medɔ wɔn no, kɔsi mmerɛ a yɛbɛhyia mu wɔ Kristo atɛmmuo-adwa no anim, ɛhɔ na nnipa nyina ara bɛhunu sɛ mo mogya nkekaa me ntadeɛ mua ɛbaa sɛ mebɔɔ mpaeɛ kyerɛɛ Awurade sɛ ɔbɛma Amanamanmufoɔ no adom, ama wɔanya ɔdɔ mapa. Na ɛbaa sɛ Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Sɛ wɔnni ɔdɔ mapa a, ɛho nnhia mma wo, woadi nokorɛ; ɛno nti, wo ntadeɛ ani bɛte hann. Na ɛnam sɛ woahunu wo mmerɛyɛ no nti, wɔbɛma woayɛ, ara mpo ama wo de akɔtena baabi a masiesie wɔ m’agya fie no. Na afei me … ne Amanamanmufoɔ no di nkra, aane, ne me nuanom nso a medɔ wɔn no, kɔsi mmerɛ a yɛbɛhyia mu wɔ Kristo atɛmmuo-adwa no anim, ɛhɔ na nnipa nyina ara bɛhunu sɛ mo mogya nkekaa me ntadeɛ mu. Seesei adansefoɔ no awuwu, na wɔn samanseɛ no wɔ tumi.

Hyrum Smith nyaa mfeɛ aduanan nan wɔ Ogyefuo, 1844 mu, na Joseph Smith nyaa aduasa-nwɔtwe wɔ Ɔpɛnimma, 1843 mu; na firi saa berɛ yi de rekorɔ no, wɔn din bɛka nyamesom mogyadansefoɔ no ho; na ɛbɛbɔ deɛ ɔkenkan wɔ ɔman biara mu nkaeɛ sɛ Mormon Nwoma no, ne saa asɔre yi Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam Nwoma no boɔ somm mogya a ɛdi mu sene biribiara, wɔ afeha dunkron no mu sɛdeɛ ɛde yeinom bɛfiri adi aba ama wiase a asɛe nkwagyeɛ; na sɛ ogya bɛtumi ahye dua mono ahyɛ Onyankopɔn animuonyam a, ɛnneɛ ɛbɛyɛ mmerɛ sɛ ɛbɛhye nnua a awo de ate bobeturo no ho afiri porɔyɛ ho. Wɔtenaa ase maa animuonyam; wɔwu maa animuonyam; na animuonyam ne wɔn nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ akatua. Firi berɛ kɔ berɛ mu no wɔn din bɛsiane akɔ asefoɔ hɔ te sɛ wɔn a wɔadwira wɔn no hyerɛmmoɔ.

Na wɔnni bɔne biara ho fɔ, sɛdeɛ na ada adi mpɛn pii no, na wɔnam ɔfatwafoɔ ne atirimuɔdenfoɔ atirisopam nko ara so na wɔde wɔn too afiase; na wɔn mogya a ɛdi bem a ɛgu Carthage afiase asan so no yɛ nsɔano kɛseɛ a ɛbata “Mormon-som” ho a asase yi so asɛnnibea biara nntumi mmpo, na wɔn mogya a ɛdi bem no bɛwɔ Illinois Man no agyinahyɛdeɛ so, na gyedie a ɛwɔ Ɔman no mu a wɔabu so no, deɛ amrado no hyɛɛ ho bɔ no, bɛyɛ nokorɛ ho adanseɛ ama daapem asɛmpa no a wiase nyina ara nntumi nnye ho kyim; na wɔn mogya a ɛdi bem a ɛbɛwɔ Amerika Man fahodie frankaa ne magna charta no so no bɛyɛ ɔnanmusifoɔ ama Yesu Kristo som no, na ɛbɛka nnipa nokorɛfoɔ a wɔwɔ aman nyina ara mu akoma; na wɔn mogya a ɛdi bemogya a ɛdi bem, ne mogyaadansefoɔ nyina ara mogya a ɛdi bem a Yohane hunuu wɔ afɔrebukyia no ase no bɛsu afrɛ Asafo Awurade kɔsi sɛ ɔbɛtɔ wɔn mogya so werɛ wɔ asase so. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/136.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 136
chapter_summary: 1–16, Wɔkyerɛ kwan a wɔmfa so nhyehyɛ Israel nsraban mma atɔeɛ fam akwantuo no; 17–27, Wɔhyɛ Ahotefoɔ no sɛ wɔnni asɛmpa susudua bebree so; 28–33, Ɛwɔ sɛ Ahotefoɔ no to dwom, wɔdi asa, bɔ mpaeɛ, na wɔsua nyansa; 34–42, Wɔkum Nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no sɛdeɛ wɔbɛdi wɔn nni na wɔabu atirimuɔdenfoɔ fɔ.

verses.text: Awurade Asɛm ne ne Pɛ a ɛfa Israel Nsraban ho wɔ wɔn akwantuo a wɔretu akɔ Atɔeɛ no.

Momma nkorɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ Yesu Kristo Asɔre a Ɛwɔ hɔ ma Nna a Ɛdi Akyire Ahotefoɔ no mu, ne wɔn a wɔne wɔn retu kwan no nhyehyɛ wɔn ho akuoakuo mu, na wɔnyɛ apam na wɔnhyɛ bɔ sɛ wɔbɛdi Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn mmaransɛm ne n’ahyɛdeɛ nyina ara so.
Momma akuoakuo no nhyehyɛ wɔn ho ɔhaha ne wɔn asafohene, aduonum aduonum ne wɔn asafohene, du du ne wɔn asafohene, na titenani ne n’afotufoɔ mmienu nhwɛ wɔn so, wɔ Asomafoɔ Dumienu no akwankyerɛ ase.
Na yei bɛyɛ yɛn apam—sɛ yɛbɛnante wɔ Awurade ayɛyɛdeɛ nyina ara mu.
Momma kuo biara mpɛ anantwie, apɔnkɔ-twe teaseɛnam, aduane, aduradeɛ, ne nneɛma afoforɔ a wɔbɛtumi anya a wɔbɛhia wɔ wɔn akwantuo no mu.
Sɛ wɔhyehyɛ akuoakuo no wie a, momma wɔmfa wɔn ahoɔden nkɔ, nkɔsiesie wɔn ho ntwɛn wɔn a wɔbɛka akyire no.

Momma kuo biara, ne wɔn asafohene ne atitenafoɔ, nsi gyinaeɛ wɔ nnipa dodoɔ a wɔbɛtumi akɔ hɔ fefɛ berɛ a ɛreba yi ho; afei wɔnyi nnipa a wɔwɔ honam mu ahoɔden na wɔnim de ne nimdeɛfoɔ a wɔbɛso, ma wɔmfa anantwie, nnuaba, ne nnadeɛ a wɔde yɛ afuo, na wɔnkɔ sɛ akannifoɔ na wɔnkɔ yɛ ahoboa sɛ wɔbɛdua fefɛ berɛ afifideɛ no.

Momma kuo biara nnya pɛpɛɛpɛ, sɛdeɛ wɔn agyapadeɛ nkyekyɛmu teɛ, wɔ hwɛ a wɔbɛhwɛ onnibiefoɔ, akunafoɔ, nnwisia, ne wɔn a wɔakɔ ɔsa mu mmusuafoɔ, ama akunafoɔ ne nnwisia su amma Awurade aso mu antia saa nkorɔfoɔ yi.
Momma kuo biara nsiesie fie, ne afuo a wɔde bɛdua burofua, mma wɔn a wɔbɛka akyire saa berɛ yi; na yei ne Awurade pɛ ɛfa ne nkorɔfoɔ no.
Momma onipa biara mfa ne nkɛntɛnsoɔ ne n’agyapadeɛ a ɔwɔ mfa nyi saa nkorɔfoɔ yi nkɔ bea a Awurade bɛyi sɛ Sion pɛɛwa.
Na sɛ mode akoma a ɛmu teɛ yɛ yei, wɔ nokorɛdie nyina ara mu a, wɔbɛhyira mo; wɔbɛhyira mo wɔ mo nnwankuo mu, wɔ mo mmoakuo, ne mo afuo mu, ne mu afie mu, ne mo mmusuafoɔ mu.
Momma me nkoa Ezra T. Benson ne Erastus nhyehyɛ kuo.
Na momma me nkoa Orson Pratt ne Wilford Woodruff nhyehyɛ kuo.
Momma me nkoa Amasa Lyman ne George A. Smith nhyehyɛ kuo.
Na monyi titenafoɔ, ne ɔhaha so, ne aduonum aduonum so, ne du du so asafohene.
Na momma me nkoa a wɔayi wɔn no nkɔ nkɔkyerɛkyerɛ yei, a ɛyɛ me pɛ, nkyerɛ ahotefoɔ no, ama wɔayɛ krado sɛ wɔbɛkɔ asomdwoeɛ asase so.
Monkɔ mo kwan na monyɛ sɛdeɛ maka akyerɛ mo no, na monnsuro mo atamfoɔ; ɛfiri sɛ wɔrennya tumi nnsi m’adwuma ho kwan.
Na wɔbɛgye Sion wɔ me ara me berɛ a ɛsɛ mu.
Na sɛ onipa bi hwehwɛ sɛ ɔbɛma ne ho so, na ɔnnhwehwɛ m’afotuo a, ɔrennya tumi biara, na wɔbɛda ne nkwaseasɛm adi.
Monhwehwɛ; na monkora bɔhyɛ a mowɔ ma mo ho mo ho; na mma mo ani mmere deɛ ɛyɛ mo nuanom dea.
Montwe mo ho mfiri bɔne a ɛma mobobɔ Awurade din kwa no ho, ɛfiri sɛ mene Awurade mo Nyankopɔn, mpo mo agyanom Nyankopɔn, Abraham ne Isak ne Yakob Nyankopɔn no.
Mene deɛ ɔdii Israel mma no anim firii Misraim asase so; na matene m’abasa mu wɔ nna a ɛtwa toɔ yi mu regye me nkorɔfoɔ Israel nkwa.
Monnyae sɛ mo ne mo ho mo ho bɛdi aperepereɛ; monnyae sɛ mobɛka nsɛmmɔne afa mo ho mo ho.
Monnyae nsaborɔ; na momma mo nsɛmka mmoa nto mo ho mo ho so.
Sɛ wofɛm biribi firi wo nua hɔ a, san fa deɛ woafɛm no kɔma; na sɛ wonntumi nntua a, ɛnneɛ kɔ wo nua no hɔ ntɛmpa ara na kɔka kyerɛ no, anyɛ saa a ɔbɛbu wo fɔ.
Sɛ wohunu adeɛ a wo nua bi ayera no a, fa nsiyɛ hwehwɛ no kɔsi sɛ wode bɛma no bio.
Ɛwɔ sɛ wode nsiyɛ kora deɛ wowɔ, ama woayɛ hwɛsofoɔ nyansafoɔ; ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ akyɛdeɛ a ɛfiri wo Nyankopɔn hɔ, na woyɛ hwɛsofoɔ ma no.
Sɛ woresɛpɛ wo ho a, fa nnwontoɔ, ne dwom, ne asa, ne ayɛyie, ne nnaaseɛ mpaeɛ kamfo Awurade.
Sɛ woredi awerɛhoɔ a, fa nkotosrɛ frɛ Awurade wo Onyankopɔn, ama wo kra anya anigyeɛ.
Nnsuro w’atamfo, ɛfiri sɛ wɔwɔ me nsam na mɛyɛ wɔn sɛdeɛ mepɛ.
Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔsɔ me nkorɔfoɔ hwɛ wɔ nneɛma nyina ara mu, sɛdeɛ wɔbɛsiesie wɔn ho de agye animuonyam a mewɔ ma wɔn no, mpo Sion animuonyam no; na onii a ɔrennye animka no mmfata m’aheman.
Ma deɛ ɔnnim de no mmrɛ ne ho ase nsua nyansa na ɔmfrɛ Awurade ne Nyankopɔn, ama n’ani abue ama watumi ahunu adeɛ, na n’aso abue ama watumi ate asɛm;
Ɛfiri sɛ wɔasoma me Honhom afiri adi akɔ wiase sɛ ɔnkɔma ahobrɛaseɛfoɔ ne nnuhofoɔ no hann, na ɔmmu abɔnefoɔ fɔ.
Wo nuanom apo wo ne w’adanseɛ, mpo ɔman no apamo wo afiri adi;
Na afei na wɔn amanehunu da no reba, mpo awerɛhoɔ nna no, te sɛ ɔbaa a awoɔ aka no; na wɔn awerɛhoɔ no bɛyɛ kɛseɛ gye sɛ wɔsakyera ntɛmntɛm, aane ntɛmntɛm pa ara.
Ɛfiri sɛ wɔkumm nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no, ne wɔn a wɔsomaa wɔn no; na wɔaka mogya a ɛdi bem agu, a ɛsu firi fam tia wɔn.

Ne saa nti, mma saa nneɛma yeinom nnyɛ mo nwanwa, ɛfiri sɛ mo ho nnya nnteeɛ; monntumi nnyina m’animuonyam ano seesei; nanso sɛ mode nokorɛ di me nsɛm a mede ama mo no nyina ara so a, firi Adam nna no so kɔ Abraham so a mobɛhunu yei, firi Abraham so kɔ Mose so, Mose so kɔ Yesu ne n’asomafoɔ so, na ɛfiri Yesu ne n’asomafoɔ no so kɔ Joseph Smith so, deɛ menam m’abɔfoɔ, me nkoa asomfoɔ no, so frɛɛ no no, ɛne me ara me nne so a ɛfiri ɔsorosoro no, sɛ ɔmfa m’adwuma mfiri adi mmra.
Ɔtoo saa fapem no, na ɔyɛɛ nokorɛfoɔ; na mefaa no baa me nkyɛn.
Ayɛ pii nwanwa ɛnam ne wuo no nti; nanso na ɛhia sɛ ɔde ne mogya sɔ n’adanseɛ ano, ama wɔama no anidie na wɔabu atirimuɔdenfoɔ fɔ.
So mannye mo ammfiri mo atamfo nsam, wɔ yei mu nko ara na magya me din ho adanseɛ?
Ne saa nti, afei, montie, O mo, nkorɔfoɔ a mowɔ m’asɔre mu ; ne mo, mpanimfoɔ, montie mmɔ mu ; moanya m’aheman no.
Momfa nsiyɛ nni me mmaransɛm nyina ara so, anyɛ saa a atemmuo bɛba mo so, na mo gyedie ayɛ kwa, na mo atamfo adi mo so nkonim. Saa nti, mennyi bi nka ho nkyerɛ seesei. Amen ne Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/137.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 137
chapter_summary: 1–6, Nkɔmhyɛni no hunu ne nua Alvin wɔ sɛlɛstia aheman mu; 7–9, Wɔda awufoɔ nkwagyeɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ no adi; 10, Wɔgye mmɔfra nyina ara nkwa wɔ sɛlɛstia aheman mu.

verses.text: Ɔsorosoro buee wɔ yɛn so, na mehunuu Nyankopɔn sɛlɛstia aheman no, ne n’animuonyam no, sɛ na mewɔ honam mu anaa menni honam mu o, menntumi nnkyerɛ.
Mehunuu ɔpono a ɛyɛ fɛ boro so no, a wɔn a wɔbɛnya aheman no bɛwura mu no, a ɛte sɛ gyaframa a etwa kɔntɔnkrɔn;
Ɛnne Onyankopɔn gya framfram ahennwa no nso, deɛ na Agya ne Ɔba no te soɔ no.
Mehunuu saa aheman no borɔno-akwan fɛɛfɛ, a ɛte sɛ deɛ wɔde sika kɔkɔɔ na ayɛ.
Mehunuu Agya Adam ne Abraham; ne me papa ne me maame; ne me nua Alvin, a wawu dadaada no;

Na sɛdeɛɛ ɛyɛɛe a ɔnyaa apɛgyadeɛ wɔ aheman no mu no yɛɛ me nwanwa, esiane sɛ ɔfirii asetena yi mu ansana Awurade retene ne nsa sɛ ɔbɛboaboa Israel berɛ a ɛtɔ so mmienu no, nna wammɔ asu annkɔ bɔne fafiri mu.
Sei na Awurade nne a ɛbaa me hɔ no kaaeɛ: Wɔn a wɔwuui a wɔannya saa asɛmpa yi ho nimdeɛ no nyina ara no, wɔn a sɛ wɔmaa wɔn kwan tenaa ase a anka wɔgyeeɛ no bɛnya Onyankopɔn sɛlɛstia aheman no;
Wɔn nso a firi saa berɛ yi de rekorɔ wɔbɛwuwu a wɔnni ɛho nimdeɛ no, wɔn a anka wɔde wɔn akoma nyina ara bɛgye no, bɛnya saa aheman no;
Ɛfiri sɛ me Awurade, mɛbu nnipa nyina ara atɛn sɛdeɛ wɔn nnwuma teɛ sɛdeɛ wɔn akoma apɛdeɛ teɛ.
Na mehunuu nso sɛ mmɔfra a wɔwuwu ansana wɔduru akontabuo mfeɛ so nyina ara no, wɔagye wɔn nkwa wɔ ɔsoro sɛlɛstia aheman no mu.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/138.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ ne Apam 138
chapter_summary: 1–10, Titenani Joseph F. Smith dwene Petro ntwerɛeɛ no ne Awurade nsrahwɛ wɔ honhom wiase no ho; 11–24, Titenani Smith hunu awufoɔ ateneneefoɔ no nhyiamu wɔ paradise ne Kristo nyamedwuma wɔ wɔn ntam; 25–37, Ɔhunu kwan a wɔfaa so hyehyɛɛ asɛmpaka no wɔ ahonhom no ntam; 38–52, Ɔhunu Adam, Hawa, ne nkɔmhyɛfoɔ kronkron no mu pii wɔ honhom wiase no mu, a wɔhwɛɛ wɔn honhom tebea ansana owusɔreɛ no bɛba no sɛ nkoasom; 53–60, Ateneneefoɔ awufoɔ wɔ saa mmerɛ yi mu no gu so reyɛ wɔn adwuma wɔ ahonhom wiase.

verses.text: Wɔ Ahinime da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa, wɔ afe apem ahankron ne dunwɔtwe mu no, na mete me dan mu a na meredwendwen twerɛsɛm no ho;
Na na meresusu ɔgyeɛ no mpata kɛseɛ no a Onyankopɔn Ba no yɛɛe maa wiase gyeɛ no ho;
Ɛnne ɔdɔ nwanwasoɔ kɛseɛ a Agya no ne Ɔba no ada no adi wɔ Ɔgyefoɔ no mmaeɛ wɔ wiase yi mu;
Na ɛnam ne mpata no, ne asɛmpa no nnyinasosɛm ho setie so na wɔbɛtumi agye adasamma nkwa.

Berɛ a na megu so reyɛ yei no, m’adwene dane kɔɔ ɔsomafoɔ Petro ntwerɛeɛ no so, a ɔde kɔmaa tete ahotefoɔ a na wɔabɔ ahweteɛ wɔ Ponto, Galatia, Kapadokia, ne Asia afaafa afoforɔ nyina ara, faako a na wɔaka asɛmpa no, wɔ Awurade asɛnnuamubɔ akyire no.
Mebuee Twerɛ Kronkron no mu na mekann Petro nwoma a ɛdi kan no ti mmiɛnsa ne nnan, na mekenkaneeɛ no menyaa nkannyan kɛseɛ, kyɛn sɛdeɛ na manya da wɔ akenkansɛm a ɛtoa so yi ho:
“Ɛfiri sɛ Kristo nso hunuu bɔne ho amaneɛ prɛko, deɛ ɔtene hunuu maa wɔn a wɔntene, sɛ ɔde yɛn bɛkɔ Nyankopɔn nkyɛn. Wɔkum no honam mu, na wɔmaa no tenaa ase honhom mu:
“Ɛno mu nso na ɔkɔ kɔkaa asɛm kyerɛɛ ahonhom a wɔwɔ afiase;
“A tete no wɔyɛ asoɔdenfoɔ, ɛberɛ a Nyankopɔn abodwekyɛre twɛneeɛ, Noa nna a wɔreyɛ adaka no mu. Emu na akra kakraabi a wɔsi baawɔtwe nyaa nkwa nsuo no mu.” (1 Petro 3:18–20.)
“Na yei nti na wɔkaa asɛmpa no kyerɛɛ awufoɔ nso, na wɔabu wɔn atɛn sɛ nnipa a wɔwɔ honam mu, na wɔatena ase sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn te wɔ honhom mu.” (1 Petro 4:6.)
Berɛ a meredwendwen saa nneɛma a wɔatwerɛ yi ho no, wɔbuee me nteaseɛ ani, na Awurade honhom baa me so, na mehunuu awufoɔ akuoakuo, nketewa ne akɛseɛ nyina ara.
Na na ateneneefoɔ ahonhom buburugyaa aboaboa wɔn ano akuoakuo abɔ mu wɔ bea baako, wɔn a na wɔayɛ nokorɛfoɔ fa Yesu ho adansedie no mu berɛ a na wɔwɔ deɛ ɛwuo asetena mu no;
Na wɔabɔ afɔdeɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn Ba no afɔdeɛ kɛseɛ no nsɛsoɔ, na wɔahunu amaneɛ wɔ wɔn Gyefoɔ no din mu.
Na yeinom nyina ara afiri owuo asetena yi mu, a wɔwɔ anidasoɔ pintinn wɔ animuonyam wusɔreɛ mu no, a ɛnam Agya Nyankopɔn adom ne Ne Ba a Ɔwoo no Korɔ, Yesu Kristo, so.
Mehunuu sɛ na ɛdɛ ne anigyeɛ ahyɛ wɔn ma, na na wɔredi ahurisie abɔ mu ɛfiri sɛ na wɔn ɔgyeɛ da no aba.
Na wɔahyia mu a wɔretwɛn Onyankopɔn Ba no mmaeɛ wɔ honhom wiase, sɛ ɔde ɔgyeɛ a ɛfiri owuo mpokyerɛ mu no bɛto dwa.
Wɔde wɔn mfuturo a adeda no bɛsan aba pɛpɛyɛ tebea mu, dompe bɛkɔ ne dompe mu, ne ntini ne honam a ɛwɔ ho no, honhom ne honamdua no bɛka abɔ mu a wɔn mu renntete bio, ama wɔanya ɛdɛ mahyɛ.
Berɛ a saa nipa-kuo kɛseɛ yi retwɛn na wɔredi nkɔmmɔ, na wɔredi ahurisie wɔ wɔn fahodie wɔ owuo mpokyerɛ mu no, Onyankpɔn Ba no pueeɛ, na ɔde ɔgyeɛ too dwa maa nnɔmum a wɔadi nokorɛ no;
Na ɛhɔ no ɔkaa daapem asɛmpa no kyerɛɛ wɔn, ne owusɔreɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ, ne gye a wɔbɛgye adasamma afiri ahweaseɛ no ne ankorɛankorɛ bɔne mu nam nsakyeraeɛ so.
Nanso atirimuɔdenfoɔ no hɔ deɛ wankɔ, na wɔn a wɔnni nyamesu ne wɔn a wɔnnsakyera a wɔguu wɔn ho fi berɛ a na wɔwɔ honam mu no, wamma ne nne so annkyerɛ wɔn;
Nna atuatefoɔ a wɔpoo tete nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no adanseɛ ne wɔn kɔkɔbɔ no nso annhunu n’anim, na wɔahwɛ n’anim.
Faako a na yeinom wɔ no, na esum di hene nanso ateneneefoɔ no ntam deɛ na asomdwoeɛ wɔ hɔ;
Na ahotefoɔ no dii ahurisie wɔ wɔn gyeɛ mu, na wɔbuu kotodwe na wɔgyee Onyankopɔn Ba no too mu sɛ wɔn Gyefoɔ ne wɔn Agyenkwa firi owuo ne ɔbonsam gya nkɔnsɔnkɔsɔn mu.
Wɔn anim hwɛbea hyerɛnnee, na hann a ɛfiri Awurade anim no baa wɔn so, na wɔtoo ayeyie nnwom maa ne din kronkron no.

Ɛyɛɛ me nwanwa, ɛfiri sɛ metee aseɛ sɛ Agyenkwa no de bɛyɛ mfeɛ mmiɛnsa na ɛyɛɛ ne nyamedwuma no wɔ Yudafoɔ no ne wɔn a wɔyɛ Israel fiefoɔ no ntam, na ɔperee sɛ ɔbɛkyerɛ wɔn daapem asɛmpa no na wafrɛ wɔn aba nsakyeraeɛ mu;

Na, ne nnwuma akɛseɛ, ɛne anwandeɛ, ne nokorɛ a ɔbɔɔ ho dawuro, wɔ tumi kɛseɛ ne tumidie mu no nyina ara akyiri no, kakraa bi pɛ na wɔtiee ne nne, na wɔdii ahurisie wɔ n’anim, na wɔnyaa nkwagyeɛ firii ne nsam.
Nanso ne nyamedwuma wɔ wɔn a wɔawuwuo no mu yɛɛ berɛ tiawa, a na ɛtwa asɛnnuamubɔ ne ne wusɔreɛ no ntam;

Na medwendwenn Petro nsɛm no ho—a ɔkaa sɛ Onyankopɔn Ba no kaa asɛmpa no kyerɛɛ ahonhom a wɔwɔ afiase, a tete no wɔyɛ asoɔdenfoɔ, berɛ a Nyankopɔn abodwekyɛre twɛneeɛ, Noa nna no mu—ne sɛdeɛ ɛyɛɛe a ɔtumi kaa asɛmpa no kyerɛɛ saa ahonhom no na ɔyɛɛ adwuma a ɛhia wɔ wɔn ntam wɔ berɛ tiawa saa mu.
Na berɛ a meredwendene ho no, wɔbuee m’ani, na wɔkanyanee me nteaseɛ, na metee aseɛ sɛ Awurade ankasa annkɔ atirimuɔdenfoɔ ne asoɔdenfoɔ no a wɔpoo nokorɛ no ntam annkɔ kyerɛkyerɛ wɔn;

Mmom hwɛ, ɔhyehyɛɛ ne dɔm firii ateneneefoɔ no ntam na ɔyii abɔfoɔ, maa wɔn tumi ne tumidie, na ɔmaa wɔn asodie sɛ wɔnkɔ na wɔmfa asɛmpa hann no nkɔma wɔn a na wɔwɔ esum mu, mpo mma nnipa ahonhom nyina ara; na sei na wɔfaa so kaa asɛmpa no kyerɛɛ awufoɔ no.

Na abɔfoɔ a wɔayi wɔn no firii adi kɔbɔɔ Awurade anisɔ da no ho dawuro na wɔde ɔgyeɛ too dwa maa nnɔmum a na wɔakyekyere wɔn no, mpo maa wɔn a wɔbɛsakyera afiri wɔn bɔne ho na wɔagye asɛmpa no nyina ara no.
Na sei na wɔfaa so kaa asɛmpa no kyerɛɛ wɔn a wɔwuui wɔ wɔn bɔne mu, a wɔannya nokorɛ no ho nimdeɛ, anaa wɔwɔ mmaratoɔ mu, ɛnam sɛ wɔpoo nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no nti.
Wɔkyerɛɛ yeinom gyedie wɔ Onyankopɔn mu, bone ho nsakyeraeɛ, asubɔ a wɔgyina mu yɛ de ma afoforɔ de nya bɔne fafiri, Sunsum Kronkron akyɛdeɛ a ɛnam nsa wɔde gu soɔ so no.
Ne asɛmpa no nyinasosɛm foforɔ biara a ɛhia sɛ wɔhunu ama wɔafata sɛ wɔbu wɔn atɛn sɛ nnipa a wɔwɔ honam mu na wɔatena ase sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn te wɔ Honhom mu.
Ɛno nti wɔdaa no adi kyerɛɛ awufoɔ no, nketewa ne akɛseɛ nyina ara, abɔnefoɔ ne nokorɛdifoɔ nso, sɛ wɔayɛ ɔgyeɛ nam Nyankopɔn Ba no afɔdeɛ wɔ asɛnnua no so.
Saa na wɔdaa no adi sɛ yɛn Gyefoɔ no dii ne mmerɛ wɔ ahonhom wiase hɔ wɔ n’akwantuo no mu, de yɛɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ na ahosiesie nkɔmhyɛfoɔ maa ahonhom nokorɛfoɔ a wɔdii no ho adanseɛ wɔ honam mu no.
Ama wɔatumi de ɔgyeɛ nkransɛm no akɔma awufoɔ no nyina ara, wɔn a ɔno ankasa anntumi annkɔ wɔn nkyɛn no, esiane wɔn atuateɛ ne wɔn mmaratoɔ nti, ama wɔafa ne nkoa no som so atumi ate ne nsɛm no.
Wɔ atitire ne atumfoɔ no a wɔhyiaae wɔ saa ateneneefoɔ asafomma kɛseɛ yi ntam no na Agya Adam, Deɛ Wadi Nna pii a ɔyɛ obiara agya no ka ho bi.
Ɛne yɛn Maame animuonyamfoɔ Hawa, ne ne mma mmaa nokorɛfoɔ pii a wɔatena ase wɔ mfeɛ pii mu na wɔasom Onyankopɔn nokorɛfoɔ ne teasefoɔ no.
Habel, mogyadansefoɔ a ɔdi kan no nso wɔ hɔ, ne ne nua Set, atumfuɔ no mu baako, deɛ ne nsɛsoɔ te sɛ n’agya, Adam no.
Noa, deɛ ɔmaa nsuyire ho kɔkɔbɔ no; Sem, ɔsɔfoɔ panin kɛseɛ no; Abraham, nokorɛdifoɔ Agya no; Isak, Yakob, ne Mose, Israel mmarahyɛfoɔ kɛseɛ no;

Ne Yesaia nso wɔ hɔ, deɛ ɔnam nkɔmhyɛ so bɔɔ dawuro sɛ wɔasra Ɔgyefoɔ no ngo sɛ ɔnkyekyere wɔn a wɔn akoma abubuo no werɛ, sɛ ɔmmɔ fahodie ho dawuro nkyerɛ nnommumfoɔ no, ne afiase mmueɛ mma wɔn a wɔakyekyere wɔn no.
Afei nso, Hesekiel, a wɔkyerɛɛ no nnompe a ɛho akokwa wɔ bonhwa kɛseɛ bi mu wɔ anisoadehunu mu, a wɔde honam bɛdura ho, na wɔafiri adi aba bio wɔ awufoɔ wusɔreɛ mu, sɛ akra ateasefoɔ;
Daniel, a ɔhunuui na ɔhyɛɛ nkɔm faa Onyankopɔn aheman no nkyekyereɛ ho wɔ nna a ɛdi akyire no mu, a wɔnnsɛe no bio da anaa wɔremmfa mma nnipa foforɔ no;
Elia, a na ɔne Mose wɔ Nsakyeraeɛ Bepɔ no;

Ne Malaki, nkɔmhyɛni no a ɔdii adanseɛ faa Elia mmaeɛ ho no—deɛ Moronae nso kaa ne ho asɛm kyerɛɛ Nkɔmhyɛni Joseph Smith no, de too dwa sɛ ɛwɔ sɛ ɔba ansana wɔde Awurade da kɛseɛ a ɛyɛ hu no ahyɛnmu no─ nso wɔ hɔ bi.
Na ɛwɔ sɛ nkɔmhyɛni Elia dua bɔhyɛ a wɔde hyɛɛ wɔn agyanom bɔ no wɔ mma no akoma mu,

Ɛno na ɛkyerɛ adwuma kɛseɛ a na wɔrebɛyɛ wɔ Awurade tɛmpol mu asɛmpa berɛ mu mahyɛ no mu, ayɛ ɔgyeɛ ama awufoɔ, ayɛ mma nsɔano ama wɔn awofoɔ, anyɛ saa a wɔde nnome bɛbɔ asase no nyina ara ma asɛe korakora wɔ ne mmaeɛ no.
Yeinom nyina ara ɛne dodoɔ no ara, mpo na nkɔmhyɛfoɔ a na wɔtenaa Nifaeoɔ no ntam na wɔdii Onyankopɔn Ba no mmaeɛ ho adanseɛ no fraa mu wɔ nhyiamu kɛseɛ no mu a na wɔretwɛn wɔn gyeɛ,
Ɛfiri sɛ na awufoɔ no ahwɛ mmerɛ tenten a na wɔn ahonhom nni wɔn nnipadua no mu sɛ nkoasom.
Awurade kyerɛɛ yeinom adeɛ, na ɔmaa wɔn tumi sɛ wɔmfiri awufoɔ mu mfiri adi, ne wusɔreɛ akyiri no, na wɔnwura n’Agya aheman mu, ɛhɔ na wɔde ɔnnwuo tebea ne nkwa a ɛnni awieɛ bɛhyɛ wɔn ahenkyɛ.
Na wɔbɛtoa wɔn adwuma so firi saa berɛ no de rekorɔ sɛdeɛ Awurade ahyɛ ho bɔ no, na wɔbɛnya nhyira biara a wɔakora ama wɔn a wɔdɔ no no mu kyɛfa.

Nkɔmhyɛni Joseph Smith, ne me Papa, Hyrum Smith, Brigham Young, John Taylor, Wilford Woodruff, ne ahonhom afoforɔ a wɔsom bo a wɔkoraa wɔn sɛ wɔmfiri adi mmra wɔ mmerɛ mahyɛ mu na wɔmmɛka ho nto nna a ɛdi akyire adwuma kɛseɛ no fapem,
Ɛne tɛmpol sie ne ayɛyɛdeɛ ho dwumadie a wɔyɛ no wɔ mu de gye awufoɔ no—nso wɔ honhom wiase hɔ bi.
Mehunuu sɛ wɔn a wɔyii wɔn ahyɛaseɛ no sɛ wɔmmɛyɛ sodifoɔ wɔ Onyankopɔn Asɔre no mu nso wɔ animuonyamfoɔ ne atitire no ntam.

Mpo ansana wɔrebɛwo wɔn no, wɔne afoforɔ pii nyaa wɔn adesua a ɛdi kan wɔ ahonhom no wiase na wɔsiesiee wɔn sɛ wɔmfiri adi mmra wɔ Awurade berɛ a ɛsɛ mu mmɛyɛ adwuma wɔ ne bobeturo no mu mma nnipa akra anya nkwagyeɛ.

Mehunuu sɛ saa asɛmpa berɛ mpanin nokorɛfoɔ no, sɛ wɔfiri ewuo asetena yi mu a, wɔtoa wɔn nnwuma so ka nsakyeraeɛ ne ɔgyeɛ asɛmpa no a ɛnam Onyankopɔn Ba a Ɔwoo no Korɔ no afɔdeɛ no so, wɔ wɔn a wɔwɔ esum mu na wɔhyɛ bɔne nkoasom ase wɔ awufoɔ ahonhom wiase kɛseɛ no mu.
Awufoɔ a wɔsakyera no wɔbɛgye wɔn, nam setie a wɔyɛ ma ayɛyɛdeɛ a ɛwɔ Onyankopɔn fie no mu,
Na akyire yi a wɔatua wɔn mmarato ho asotwe awie, na wɔahohoro wɔn ho ma wɔn ho ate no, wɔbɛnya akatua sɛdeɛ wɔn nnwuma teɛ, ɛfiri sɛ wɔyɛ nkwagyeɛ adedifoɔ.
Na saa na wɔyii awufoɔ gyeɛ ho anisoadehunu kyerɛɛ me, na medi adanseɛ, na menim sɛ saa adanseɛ yi yɛ nokorɛ, nam yɛn Awurade ne yɛn Agyenkwa, Yesu Kristo nhyira so, mpo saa ara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/od/1.title: Asɔre no Dawurubɔ 1
text: Ɛkɔ Ma Wɔn a Ɛfa Wɔn ho:

Ɛnam sɛ wɔde dawurobɔ krataa a ɛwɔ amanyɔsɛm atirimpɔ mu nsɛm asoma afiri Salt Lake Ahenkuro mu, na wɔama ahyeta baabiara, deɛ Utah Abatoɔ Adwuma Kuo no twerɛɛe wɔ nansa yi ara amaneɛbɔ nsɛm mu, kɔmaa Banbɔ Twerɛtwerɛfoɔ no, a ɛka sɛ wɔgu so rehyira awaredodoɔ so, na awareɛ a ɛte saa aduanan anaa deɛ ɛboro saa na wɔayɛ wɔ Utah firi Ayɛwohomumɔ anaa afe a atwam no mu; afei nso wɔn badwa mu nkasaeɛ mu no, Asɔre no akannifoɔ no akyerɛkyerɛ, ahyɛ nkuran, atu fo sɛ wɔnkɔ so nnye ayeredodoɔ—

Ne saa nti, me a meyɛ Titenani ma Yesu Kristo Asɔre a ɛwɔ hɔ ma Nna a Ɛdi Akyire Ahotefoɔ no fa yei so, wɔ aniberɛ kɛseɛ kwan so, de to dwa sɛ saa kwaadu yi yɛ atorɔsɛm. Yɛnnkyerɛkyerɛ ayeredodoɔ awareɛ anaa awareɛdodoɔ, nna yɛmma kwan mma onipa biara nnyɛ saa, na meka sɛ ɛnnyɛ nokorɛ sɛ wɔahyira awaredodoɔ awareɛ aduanan anaa dodoɔ biara wɔ yɛn Tɛmpol mu anaa bea foforɔ biara wɔ yɛn Asase so.

Asɛm baako ho amaneɛ a ɛbaae, a ɛmu no akuo no ka sɛ wɔyɛɛ awareɛ no wɔ Akyɛdeɛ Kronkron Fie hɔ, wɔ Salt Lake Ahenkuro mu, wɔ Fefɛ berɛ 1889 mu, nanso menntumi nhunuu oniiko a ɔyɛɛ awaregyeɛ no; biribiara a wɔyɛɛ wɔ saa asɛm yi mu no, na mennim. Ɛnam saa asɛm a wɔaka sɛ ɛsiiɛ no nti, ɛnam m’akwankyerɛ so, wɔanntwentwɛn wɔn nan ase abubu Akyɛdeɛ Kronkron Fie no agu.

Esiane sɛ mmarahyɛfoɔ ahyɛ mmara a ɛbara awaredodoɔ, mmara a asɛnnibea a ɛtwa toɔ no de ato dwa sɛ ɛyɛ amanyɔ-mmara nti, me fa yei so de m’adwene to dwa sɛ yɛbɛdi saa mmara no so, na mede me nkɛntɛnsoɔ ne Asɔre no asafomma a mehwɛ wɔn so no bɛma wɔn ayɛ saa ara.

Biribiara nni me nkyerɛkyerɛ a mede maa Asɔre no anaa ɛwɔ m’apamfo deɛ mu, wɔ berɛ a wɔaka ho asɛm mu no, a ɛbɛma wɔadwene sɛ ɛfoa ayere-dodoɔ awareɛ so anaa ɛhyɛ ho nkuran; na berɛbiara a Asɔre Panin bi akasa ma ayɛ sɛ saa nkyerɛkyerɛ no, wɔka n’anim ntɛmpa ara. Na afei m’afotuo a mede to dwa wɔ badwam de ma Nna a Ɛdi Akyire Ahotefoɔ ne sɛ wɔntwe wɔn ho mfiri awareɛ biara a asase no mmara bara no ho.
Wilford Woodruff
Yesu Kristo Asɔre a Ɛwɔ hɔ ma Nna a Ɛdi Akyire Ahotefoɔ Titenani.
Titenani Lorenzo Snow de deɛ ɛtoa soɔ yi to wɔn anim:

“Mesusu sɛ, ɛnam sɛ yɛgye Wilford Woodruff to mu sɛ Yesu Kristo Asɔre a Ɛwɔ hɔ ma Nna a Ɛdi Akyire Ahotefoɔ Titenani, ne onipa baako pɛ a ɔwɔ asase so saa berɛ yi a ɔkura ayɛyɛdeɛ nsɔano nsafoa nti, yɛhu no sɛ ɔwɔ tumi a ɛdi mu, ɛnam ne diberɛ nti, sɛ ɔde Dawurubɔ no to dwa, deɛ wɔakan ama yɛate yi, a wɔyɛɛ no Ɛbɔ 24, 1890, na yɛahyia mu sɛ Asɔre wɔ Amansan Nhyiamu yi, yɛgye saa mpaemuka yi a ɛfa awaredodoɔ ho yi to mu sɛ ɛwɔ tumi na ɛyɛ nkyekyere.”
Salt Lake Ahenkuro, Utah, Ahinime 6, 1890.

Awurade remma me anaa onipa foforɔ biara a ɔgyina hɔ sɛ Asɔre yi Titenani ho kwan mma ɔnni mo kan nnkɔ mfomsoɔ mu. Ɛnni ahyehyɛdeɛ no mu. Ɛnni Onyankopɔn adwene mu. Sɛ meyɛ m’adwene sɛ mɛyɛ saa ara a, Awurade bɛyi me afiri me diberɛ mu, na saa na Ɔbɛyɛ onipa biara a ɔbɛyɛ n’adwene sɛ ɔbɛdi nnipa mma kan akɔ mfomsoɔ mu ma wɔafiri Onyankopɔn nkɔmhyɛfoɔ adiyisɛm ne wɔn asɛdeɛ ho. (Asɔre no afe-fa amansan Nhyiamu a ɛtɔ so aduosia baako, Dwoada, Ahinime 6, 1890, Salt Lake Ahenkuro, Utah. Wɔyɛɛ amaneɛbɔ yi wɔ Deseret Evening News mu, Ahinime 11, 1890, kratafa 2.)
Ɛmmfa ho ne deɛ ɔte ase anaa deɛ wawuo, anaa deɛ wɔafrɛ no sɛ ɔnni saa Asɔre yi anim, ɛwɔ sɛ ɔnam Otumfoɔ Nyankopɔn nkannyan so de di anim. Sɛ wannyɛ no saa kwan no so a, ɔrenntumi nnyɛ koraa. …
Manya adiyisɛm binom nnansa yi, a ɛho hia ma me pa ara, na mɛka deɛ Awurade aka akyerɛ me no akyerɛ mo. Ma mentwe mo adwene nsi deɛ wɔfrɛ no dawurobɔ no so. …

Awurade aka akyerɛ me sɛ memmisa Nna a ɛdi akyire Ahotefoɔ no asɛm bi, na Ɔsan nso ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ sɛ wɔbɛtie deɛ meka kyerɛɛ wɔn no na wɔyi asɛmmisa a wɔde ama wɔn no ano a, ɛnam Onyankopɔn Honhom ne ne tumi so no, wɔn nyina ara bɛma mmuaeɛ korɔ, na wɔn nyina ara bɛnya gyedie korɔ afa saa asɛm yi ho.

Asɛmmisa no nie: Deɛ ɛwɔ he na ɛyɛ nyansa kwan ma Nna a Ɛdi akyire Ahotefoɔ no sɛ wɔfa so—sɛ wɔbɛtoa so apere sɛ wɔbɛwɔ ayere-dodoɔ, wɔ berɛ a ɔman mmara no tia na nnipa bɛyɛ ɔpepem aduosia tia, na ɛbɛma wɔagye yɛn tɛmpol na yɛahwere no nyina ara, na wɔbɛgyae ayɛyɛdeɛ biara a wɔyɛ wɔ mu, ma ateasefoɔ ne awufoɔ no, na wɔakye Atitenafoɔ a Wɔdi Kan no ne Dumienu ne mpaninfoɔ a wɔwɔ mmusua mu no agu afiase, na wɔagye nkorɔfoɔ no ankasa agyapadeɛ (a ne nyina ara bɛsi saa dodoɔawareɛ no ano kwan); anaa, deɛ yɛayɛ ne deɛ yɛahunu ho amaneɛ wɔ setie a yɛayɛ ama saa nyinasosɛm yi akyire no, yɛbɛgyae dodoɔawareɛ no na yɛdi mmara no so, na sɛ yɛyɛ saa a yɛama Nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no, Asomafoɔ ne agyanom a wɔwɔ fie akɔ so awɔ hɔ, ama wɔatumi akyerɛkyerɛ nkorɔfoɔ no na wɔahwɛ ayɛ Asɔre no asɛdeɛ, na ama wɔagyae tɛmpol no wɔ Ahotefoɔ no nsam, ama wɔahwɛ ayɛ Asɛmpa no ayɛyɛdeɛ no ama ateasefoɔ ne awufoɔ?

Awurade nam anisoadehunu ne adiyisɛm so yii deɛ anka ɛbɛsi pɔtee kyerɛɛ me, sɛ yɛannyae saa adeɛ no a. Sɛ anka yɛannyae a, morennya mfasoɔ biara … wɔ nnipa a wɔwɔ saa tɛmpol yi mu wɔ Logan ha; ɛfiri sɛ anka wɔbɛgyaeɛ ayɛyɛdeɛ biara wɔ Sion asase nyina ara so. Anka basabasayɛ bɛdi hene wɔ Israel nyina ara, na wɔbɛyɛ nnipa pii nneduafoɔ. Anka saa ɔhaw yi bɛba Asɔre mũ no nyina ara so, na anka wɔbɛhyɛ yɛn sɛ yɛnnyae saa adeɛ no yɛ. Afei asɛmmisa no ne sɛ, so ɛwɔ sɛ wɔfa saa kwan yi so ma yɛgyae, anaa wɔ kwan a Awurade ada no adi akyerɛ yɛn no so, na wɔagya yɛn Nkɔmhyɛfoɔ ne Asomafoɔ ne agyanom ma wɔade wɔn ho, na tɛmpol no aka nkorɔfoɔ no nsa mu, ama wɔatumi agye awufoɔ no. Ɛnam saa nkorɔfoɔ yi so wɔagye dodoɔ no ara afiri afiase dada wɔ honhom wiase hɔ, ɛno nti adwuma no nkɔ so anaa ɛnnyae? Yei ne asɛmmisa a mede to Nna a ɛdi akyire Ahotefoɔ no anim. Merennyi ano; ɛwɔ sɛ mo ara mosusu ho hwɛ. Mepɛ sɛ mo ara moyi ano; nanso meka kyerɛ mo sɛ saa tebea yi pɛpɛɛpɛ na anka yɛn nkorɔfoɔ bɛkɔ mu, sɛ anka yɛammfa kwan a yɛfaa so no a.

… Mehunuu deɛ na ɛbɛba yɛn so no pɛpɛɛpɛ sɛ anka yɛanyɛ biribi a. Saa honhom yi awɔ me so akyɛ. Nanso mepɛ sɛ meka yei: Anka mɛma tɛmpol no nyina ara afiri yɛn nsa akɔ; anka me ara mɛkɔ afiase, na mama onipa biara nso akɔ hɔ bi, sɛ anka ɔsoro Nyankopɔn annhyɛ me sɛ menyɛ deɛ meyɛɛ no a; na mmerɛ no soo a wɔhyɛɛ sɛ menyɛ saa no, ɛdaa adi pefee maa me. Mekɔɔ Awurade anim, na metwerɛɛ deɛ Awurade see me sɛ mentwerɛ no. …
Mede yei gya mo sɛ monnwennwen ho na monsusu ho. Awurade ne yɛn reyɛ adwuma. (Cache Stake Nhyiamu, Logan, Utah, Kwasiada, Obubuo 1, 1891. Wɔyɛɛ amaneɛbɔ yi wɔ Deseret Weekly mu, wɔ Obubuo 14, 1891.)

Afei mɛka deɛ wɔdaa no adi kyerɛɛ me no ne deɛ Onyankopɔn Ba no yɛɛe wɔ saa adeɛ yi ho no akyerɛ mo. … Sɛ wɔammfa saa Dawurubɔ no amma a, sɛ Otumfoɔ Nyankopɔn te aseɛ yi, anka saa nneɛma yi nyina ara bɛba mu. Ne saa nti, ɛyɛɛ Onyankopɔn Ba no pɛ sɛ wɔmfa saa adeɛ no nto Asɔre no ne wiase nyina ara anim ɛnam botaeɛ a ɛwɔ ɔno ara adwene mu nti. Awurede na ɔhyɛɛ sɛ wɔnkyekyere Sion. Ɔno na ɔhyɛɛ sɛ wɔnwie saa tɛmpol yi. Ɔno na ɔhyɛɛ sɛ wɔmfa nkwagyeɛ mma ateasefoɔ ne awufoɔ wɔ saa mmepɔ yi mmɔnhwa mu. Na Otumfoɔ Nyankopɔn na ɔhyɛɛ sɛ mma Ɔbonsam nnsi ho kwan. Sɛ mobɛte yei ase a, ɛno na ɛyɛ yei ho safoa. (Ɛfiri kasa a wɔkaae wɔ ahyiamu a ɛtɔ so nsia wɔ Salt Lake Tɛmpol tu-hyɛ-nsa som no mu wɔ Oforisuo 1893. Tu-hyɛ-nsa som no ho ntwerɛeɛ, Nwoma korabea, Asɔre no Abakɔsɛm Asoɛeɛ, Salt Lake Ahenkuro, Utah.)

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/od/2.title: Asɔre no Dawurubɔ 2
text: Ɛkɔ Ma Wɔn a Ɛfa Wɔn ho:

Wɔ Ɛbɔ 30, 1978, wɔ Yesu Kristo Asɔre a Ɛwɔ hɔ ma Nna a Ɛdi Akyire Ahotefoɔ no afe-fa Amansan Nhyiamu a ɛtɔ so 148 no, Otitenani N. Eldon Tanner, Fotufoɔ a Ɔdi kan wɔ Asɔre no Atitenafoɔ a Wɔdi kan no mu no de deɛ ɛtoa soɔ yi too dwa:

Wɔ Ayɛwohomumɔ ahyɛaseɛ wɔ saa afe yi mu no, Atitenafoɔ a Wɔdi kan no de too dwa sɛ Otitenani Spencer W. Kimball anya adiyisɛm a ɛma kwan ma wɔde asɔfodie tumi no ne tɛmpol nhyira no ma asɔremma mmarima a wɔn ho teɛ wɔ Asɔre no mu nyina ara. Titenani Kimball asrɛ sɛ menka nkyerɛ nhyiamu no sɛ ɔnyaa saa adiyisɛm, a ɛbaa ne so wɔ adwennwene ne mpaebɔ tenten akyire no wɔ adan kronkron mu wɔ ne tɛmpol kronkron no mu, ɔde too n’afotufoɔ no anim, ma wɔpenee so na wɔgye too mu. Afei wɔde too Asomafoɔ Dumienu Kuo no anim, ma wɔde anokorɔ gye too mu, na akyire yi no wɔde too Amansan Sodifoɔ a aka no nyina ara anim, maa wɔn nso de anokorɔ gye too mu.
Otitenani Kimball asrɛ sɛ seesei menkenkan saa krataa yi:
Ayɛwohomummɔ 8, 1978
Wɔde ma amansan ne borɔno so asɔfodie asomfoɔ nyina ara wɔ Yesu Kristo Asɔre a Ɛwɔ hɔ ma Nna a Ɛdi Akyire Ahotefoɔ a wɔwɔ wiase nyina ara:
Anuanom Adɔfoɔ:

Berɛ a yɛrehunu sɛ Awurade adwuma no retrɛ wɔ asase so nyina ara no, ɛyɛ yɛn anisɔ sɛ aman pii so nkorɔfoɔ ani agye asɛmpa a asan aba bio no nkransɛm no ho, na wɔabɛdɔm Asɔre no a wɔn dodoɔ rekɔ anim pa ara. Yei akanyan yɛn ma yɛanya ɔpɛ bi sɛ yɛde akwannya ne nhyira a asɛmpa no de ba no bɛma Asɔreba biara a ɔfata.

Ɛnam sɛ yɛnim bɔhyɛ a Asɔre no nkɔmhyɛfoɔ ne atitenafoɔ a wɔadi yɛn anim kan no ahyɛ no nti, wɔ Onyankopɔn ɛnni awieɛ nhyehyɛeɛ mu no, yɛn nuanom a wɔfata nyina ara no bɛtumi anya asɔfodie no, na ɛnam sɛ yɛhunu wɔn a wɔde asɔfodie no akame wɔn no nokorɛdie nti, yɛde nsiyɛ asrɛ akyɛ ama yeinom, yɛn nuanom nokorɛfoɔ no, na yɛahwere nnɔnhwere bebree wɔ Tɛmpol Abansorodan no mu asrɛ ɔsoro akwankyerɛ.

Watie yɛn mpaebɔ, na ɔnam adiyisɛm so asi so dua sɛ da a wɔahyɛ ho bɔ dadaada no aba a ɔbarima nokorɛfoɔ a ɔfata biara wɔ Asɔre no mu no bɛtumi anya asɔfodie kronkron no, na wanya tumi sɛ ɔde ɛhokwan kronkron no bɛdi dwuma, na ɔne n’adɔfoɔ anya nhyira biara a ɛfiri mu ba no, a tɛmpol mu nhyira no ka ho. Ne saa nti, wɔbɛtumi ahyɛ Asɔremma mmarima a wɔfata biara asɔfoɔ, ɛmmfa ho ne wɔn nnipa ban anaa wɔn ahosuo. Wɔakyerɛ asɔfodie akannifoɔ no sɛ wɔnni nhyehyɛeɛ no so mfa ahwɛyie mmisabisa wɔn a wɔrebɛgye Aaron anaa Mɛlkisɛdɛk Asɔfodie no asɔfohyɛ no nyina ara, ama nokorɛ mu wɔahunu sɛ wɔfata susudua a wɔahyehyɛ no.
Yɛde anidahɔ ka to dwa sɛ Awurade ada ne pɛ adi afei sɛ ɔbɛhyira ne mma a wɔwɔ asase so nyina ara, wɔn a wɔbɛtie ne nkoa a wɔama wɔn hokwan no nne, na wɔbɛsiesie wɔn ho agye asɛmpa no nhyira biara.
Yɛn Anokwafoɔ,
Spencer W. Kimball
N. Eldon Tanner
Marion G. Romney
Atitenafoɔ a Wɔdi Kan no

Ɛnam sɛ yɛgye Spencer W. Kimbal to mu sɛ nkɔmhyɛni, ɔdehunufoɔ, ne odiyifoɔ, ne titenani ma Yesu Kristo Asɔre a Ɛwɔ hɔ ma Nna a Ɛdi Akyire Ahotefoɔ nti, yɛsusu sɛ yɛn a yɛyɛ mmarahyɛfoɔ kuo no bɛgye adiyisɛm yi ato mu sɛ Awurade asɛm ne ne pɛ. Wɔn a wɔpene so nyina ara, mesrɛ, momma mo nsa nifa so mfa nkyerɛ. Wɔn a wɔtia mfa nsɛnkyerɛnne korɔ no ara.
Abatoɔ a ɛfa saa nsusuiɛ yi ho nyina ara no kɔɔ anokorɔ mu de foaa so.
Salt Lake Ahenkuro, Utah, Ɛbɔ 30, 1978.
